17.name: Wooden Arrow
17.description: Arrow made of wood. It is an arrow used for a No-grade bow.

396.name: Salamander Skin Mail
396.description: One-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

431.name: Robe of Magic
431.description: One-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

438.name: Sage's Rags
438.description: One-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

440.name: Robe of Seal
440.description: One-piece upper and lower body armor. Additional lower body armor cannot be worn while wearing this.

503.name: Sealed Zubei's Helmet
503.description: Sealed Zubei's Helmet. The seal can be removed by a blacksmith in any village.

554.name: Sealed Zubei's Boots
554.description: Sealed Zubei's Boots. The seal can be removed by a blacksmith in any village.

600.name: Sealed Avadon Boots
600.description: Sealed Avadon Boots. The seal can be removed by a blacksmith in any village.

601.name: Sealed Doom Boots
601.description: Sealed Doom Boots. The seal can be removed by a blacksmith in any village.

612.name: Sealed Zubei's Gauntlets
612.description: Sealed Zubei's Gauntlets. The seal can be removed by a blacksmith in any village.

687.name: Darin's Letter
687.description: The love letter that Darin Has written to Roxxy. Darin Has asked you to deliver this letter to Gatekeeper Roxxy.

688.name: Roxxy's Kerchief
688.description: Roxxy's Kerchief. Roxxy handed this over as a reply to Darin's letter. It must be delivered to Darin.

689.name: Poetry Book
689.description: Poetry book treasured by Arujien. The book contains poems that he Has written. Take this to Greenis.

693.name: Greenis' Letter
693.description: Greenis' letter, refusing Arujien's love. Take this to Arujien.

694.name: Ingredient List
694.description: List of ingredients: 3 omen Animal Bloods, 2 mana seeker husks, 2 gargoyle horns

695.name: Onyx Beast's Blood
695.description: The blood of an Onyx Beast.

696.name: Mana Seeker's Husk
696.description: The husk of a mana seeker.

698.name: Gilbert's List
698.description: List of things to eliminate: orcs, hobgoblins, walking fungus

702.name: Wolf Pelt
702.description: Gather forty wolf pelts and take them to Trader Lector of the weapons and armor shop.

703.name: Giant Spider's Poison Sac
703.description: Giant Spider's Poison Sacs obtained from the dead giant spider. Take this to Priest Yohanes.

704.name: Fever Medicine
704.description: Medicine concocted by Priest Yohanes for the students who are ill with fever. Take this to Elias.

707.name: Spore Sac
707.description: Sac obtained from the spore fungus. Gather 10 of these and take them to Trader Vollodos.

729.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-grade)
729.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for A-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles.

730.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (A-grade)
730.description: P. Def. +1 for A-grade armor and accessories. Starting from +4, P. Def. +3. Can be safely enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can be safely enchanted up to +4.

734.name: Wind Walk Potion
734.description: Magical potion that increases movement Speed.

735.name: Haste Potion
735.description: Magical potion that increases Atk. Spd.

736.name: Scroll of Escape
736.description: Scroll of enchantment that relocates you to the nearest village.

737.name: Scroll of Resurrection
737.description: Scroll of enchantment that resuscitates a dead person.

738.name: Sword of Solidarity
738.description: Bronze sword crafted long ago in memory of the union between the Humans and the Elves.

739.name: Broken Sword Handle
739.description: The handle portion of the sword of solidarity. Take this to Blacksmith Altran.

740.name: Broken Blade Bottom
740.description: Take this, and the upper portion of the blade to Blacksmith Altran.

741.name: Broken Blade Top
741.description: Take this, and the lower portion of the blade to Blacksmith Altran.

742.name: Altran's Note
742.description: Letter requesting the handle of the sword from Roien. Take this to Grand Master Roien of Sedrick's Training Hall.

743.name: Sword of Sentinel
743.description: Steel blade issued to those fighters that have been acknowledged as protectors of the woods.

744.name: Staff of Sentinel
744.description: Staff issued to those magicians that have been acknowledged as protectors of the woods.

746.name: Alberius' List
746.description: Deliver the medicine to Sentinel Berros, Sentinel Veltress, Sentinel Rayen, and Sentinel Gartrandell.

747.name: Wand of Adept
747.description: The wand presented to those who have finished their studies at the school of magic.

748.name: Gallint's Oak Wand
748.description: Oak wand enchanted by Gallint's spell. This will capture and seal the spirit of mirrors, if used physically.

752.name: Orc Amulet
752.description: Amulet that the Orcs carry for magical purposes. Take this to Captain Gilbert.

754.name: Red Sunset Staff
754.description: Staff used by warriors belonging to the Red Sunset clan.

796.name: Roien's Letter
796.description: Letter on which Roien summarized the historical information related to the sword of solidarity. Take this to Blacksmith Altran.

809.name: Bone Fragment
809.description: Bone fragments obtained from the undead skeletons. Collect ten of these and take to Tetrarch Kaitar.

875.name: Ring of Knowledge
875.description: Gold ring with delicately engraved rune characters of knowledge.

876.name: Ring of Anguish
876.description: Gold ring with engraved rune characters of anguish.

906.name: Necklace of Knowledge
906.description: Silver necklace engraved with rune characters of knowledge.

907.name: Necklace of Anguish
907.description: Silver necklace engraved with rune characters of anguish.

937.name: Directions to Ruins
937.description: Follow the northwestern path from the village, and head west when you meet the Obelisk of Victory. The entrance to the ruins lies at the slope of the mountain.

945.name: Skeleton Buckler
945.description: Small wooden shield that perpetrators of mages use.

947.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (B-grade)
947.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for B-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles.

948.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (B-grade)
948.description: P. Def. + 1 for B-grade armor and accessories. Starting from + 4, P. Def. + 3. Can be safely enchanted up to + 3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to + 4. HP gradually increases with each enchant level starting from + 4.

951.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-grade)
951.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for C-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles.

952.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (C-grade)
952.description: P. Def. + 1 for C-grade armor and accessories. Increases by 3 starting from + 4. It can safely be enchanted up to + 3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to + 4. HP gradually increases with each enchant level starting from + 4.

955.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (D-grade)
955.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for D-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles.

956.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (D-grade)
956.description: P. Def. + 1 for D-grade armor and accessories. Increases by 3 starting from + 4. It can safely be enchanted up to + 3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to + 4. HP gradually increases with each enchant level starting from + 4.

959.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (S-grade)
959.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +5 for S-grade one-handed swords/blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +6 for two-handed swords/blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +10 for bows. M. Atk. +4 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus quadruples.

960.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (S-grade)
960.description: When enchanted, P. Def. +2 for S-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. +8. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but full-body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. Starting at +4 armor, HP increases depending on the enchant value.

963.name: Orc Arrowhead
963.description: Arrowhead that Turath orc marksmen use on Talking Island. Collect these and take to Master Minia.

964.name: Alberius' Letter
964.description: Letter from Alberius. Take this to Master Cobendell.

965.name: Evergreen Amulet
965.description: Necklace set with a green Elemental stone. You must possess this to slay the dryad and obtain the dryad's tears.

966.name: Dryad's Tears
966.description: Jewel that contains the essence of a dryad's soul. Gather ten of these and take them to Master Cobendell.

968.name: Karrod's Letter
968.description: Letter written by Blacksmith Karrod. Take this to the Abyssal Celebrant Cecktinon in the Shilen Temple.

969.name: Cecktinon's First Voucher
969.description: Introduction letter from the Abyssal Celebrant Cecktinon. Take this and seek Magister Harne in the village.

970.name: Cecktinon's Second Voucher
970.description: Introduction letter from the Abyssal Celebrant Cecktinon. Go to the School of Dark Arts, hunt skeletons, and gather 10 bone fragments.

971.name: Soul Catcher
971.description: Item used during the exorcism ritual to call upon a spirit of the dead. Take this to the Abyssal Celebrant Cecktinon.

972.name: Preserving Oil
972.description: Oil that when used, prevents the rotting of corpses. Take this and go hunt zombies in the swamps.

973.name: Zombie Head
973.description: The head of tree Elf zombies that have been cut after they are defeated. Take this to the abyssal celebrant Cecktinon.

974.name: Steelbender Head
974.description: Please, I beg of you! Don't take me to that nasty-tempered blacksmith!

975.name: Blood Saber
975.description: An Oriharukon sword crafted in the Abella style of the east.

976.name: 1st Badge of Sentinel
976.description: A badge that certifies that its bearer is an Elven Sentinel. Destroy an orc Tanuki skullcrusher and report to Sentinel Kendell.

977.name: 2nd Badge of Sentinel
977.description: A badge that certifies that its bearer is an Elven Sentinel. Destroy an orc Bhato bloodspear and report to Sentinel Kendell.

978.name: Skullcrusher Amulet
978.description: The amulet that represents the Skullcrusher Orc tribe. Take this to Sentinel Kendell.

979.name: Bloodspear Amulet
979.description: The amulet that represents the Bloodspear Orc tribe. Take this to Sentinel Kendell.

981.name: Red Sunset Sword
981.description: Sword used by warriors belonging to the Red Sunset clan.

984.name: 1st Onyx Talisman
984.description: Necklace crafted of onyx. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia.

985.name: 2nd Onyx Talisman
985.description: Necklace crafted of onyx. Recover the original scrolls from the blackskull Orcs and bring them to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia.

986.name: Ancient Scroll
986.description: Ancient scroll called Kaysha's Revelation. Take it along with the clay tablet to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia.

987.name: Ancient Clay Tablet
987.description: Ancient clay tablet engraved with text. Take it along with the ancient scroll to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia.

988.name: Kartia's Translation
988.description: Kartia's translation of Kaysha's Revelations. Take it to Tetrarch Thifiell.

989.name: Eldritch Dagger
989.description: Steel dagger engraved with the runes of Shilen and Gran Kain.

1008.name: Harrys' 1st Receipt
1008.description: The receipt that Harrys received after ordering tools. Take this and go to Blacksmith Altran.

1009.name: Harrys' 2nd Receipt
1009.description: The receipt that Harrys has received after placing an order for his tools. Go and gather golem shards needed for creating the tool.

1010.name: Golem Shard
1010.description: Shards of rock that have fallen from the Golem's body. Gather 5 and take them to Blacksmith Altran.

1011.name: Tool Box
1011.description: Toolbox containing the tools that Blacksmith Altran forged. Take this to Magister Harrys at the temple.

1012.name: Delivery List
1012.description: Take the heavy wooden box to Trader Jackson. The bolts of cloth to Trader Silvia. Take the clay pot to the warehouse keeper Rant.

1013.name: Heavy Wood Box
1013.description: The wooden box to be delivered to Trader Jackson of the weapons shop.

1014.name: Cloth Bundle
1014.description: Bolts of cloth that need to be delivered to Trader Silvia of the grocery store.

1015.name: Clay Pot
1015.description: The clay pot that must be delivered to the warehouse keeper Rant.

1016.name: Jackson's Receipt
1016.description: The receipt that Jackson Has issued upon receiving his wooden box. Take this to Guard Arnold.

1017.name: Silvia's Receipt
1017.description: The receipt that Silvia Has issued upon receiving her bolts of cloth. Take this to Guard Arnold.

1018.name: Rant's Receipt
1018.description: The receipt issued by Rant upon his receiving of the clay pot. Take this to Guard Arnold.

1019.name: Official Letter
1019.description: Official letter that the Lord of Gludio Has sent to Sir Colin Windawood, calling a meeting. Deliver this to Sir Windawood.

1020.name: Flame Shard
1020.description: Fragment of Soulstone of fire. Can be taken from the fire spirit salamander. Give it to Trader Katerina.

1021.name: Ice Shard
1021.description: Fragment of Elemental stone of water. Can be taken from the water spirit undine. Give to Trader Katerina.

1022.name: Lilith's Letter
1022.description: Letter written by Lilith in longing for her lover, separated a thousand years ago. Find out news about her lover for her.

1023.name: Teon's Diary
1023.description: Diary written by Teon in longing for his lover, separated a thousand years ago. Take this to Lilith.

1024.name: Adamantite Ore
1024.description: Adamantite ore. All of it is imported from Gracia. Gather 20 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Wilford.

1025.name: Clay Tablet
1025.description: Tablet praising Beleth that the devil Nerkas possessed. Deliver this to High Priest Biotin.

1026.name: Silvery Spidersilk
1026.description: The spider silk of the silver spider. Take this to Trader Unoren of the weapons shop.

1027.name: Unoren's Receipt
1027.description: The receipt issued by the magic shop. Take this and go to Trader Creamees.

1028.name: Creamees' Ticket
1028.description: Ticket issued by the warehouse. Take this and go to Warehouse Keeper Julia.

1029.name: Nightshade Leaf
1029.description: The leaf of the nightshade plant. Take this to Nerupa.

1030.name: Cracked Skull
1030.description: The cracked skull of the Dark Horror. Take this to Magister Vlasty.

1031.name: Perfect Skull
1031.description: Skull of the dark horror. Take this to Magister Vlasty.

1032.name: Fox Fur
1032.description: Mane of Keltirs. It is soft and luxurious, and used to spin thread and yarn. Take this to Cristel.

1033.name: Fox Fur Yarn
1033.description: Yarn spun out of the fur of keltirs. Take this to the former tailor Warehouse Keeper Rolfe, and he will make it into a the doll's hair.

1034.name: Maiden Doll
1034.description: Doll resembling a Human maiden. Take this to Lighthouse Keeper Rockswell.

1035.name: Plague Dust
1035.description: Powder obtained from the plague zombie. Take this to Hierarch Asterios.

1036.name: Andellia's Letter
1036.description: Letter from Andellia asking her sister Thalia to send her the fruit of the Mother Tree.

1037.name: Fruit of the Mother Tree
1037.description: Fruit that the Mother Tree bears once every few years. Take this to Andellia.

1038.name: Rumiel’s First Poem
1038.description: The scroll containing Rumiel Moonshine's first poem. Gather all four and take them to Sentinel Starden.

1039.name: Rumiel’s Third Poem
1039.description: The scroll containing Rumiel Moonshine's third poem. Gather all four and take them to Sentinel Starden.

1040.name: Rumiel’s Fourth Poem
1040.description: The scroll containing Rumiel Moonshine's fourth poem. Gather all four and take them to Sentinel Starden.

1041.name: Rumiel’s Fifth Poem
1041.description: The scroll containing Rumiel Moonshine's fifth poem. Gather all four and take them to Sentinel Starden.

1042.name: Wererat's Fang
1042.description: The fang of a dead ratman. Collect these to take to Master Ellenia.

1043.name: Varool Foulclaw's Fang
1043.description: The fang of Varool Foulclaw, leader of the ratmen. Take this to Master Ellenia.

1044.name: Kirunak Skull
1044.description: Kirunak's skull obtained after killing Kirunak, the leader of the Dre Vanuls. Take this to Trader Creamees.

1045.name: Zombie's Skin
1045.description: Skin obtained from marshland zombies. Collect five and go to Trader Minaless.

1046.name: Nightmare Crystal
1046.description: Crystal used by the Succubus Merkenis to cast nightmares. Take this to Tetrarch Vellior.

1048.name: Spellbook: Might
1048.description: Spellbook needed to learn Might. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

1049.name: Spellbook: Ice Bolt
1049.description: Spellbook needed to learn Ice Bolt. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

1050.name: Spellbook: Battle Heal
1050.description: Spellbook needed to learn Battle Heal. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 14

1051.name: Spellbook: Vampiric Touch
1051.description: Spellbook needed to learn Vampiric Touch. Used by Human Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 14

1052.name: Spellbook: Flame Strike
1052.description: Spellbook needed to learn Flame Strike. Used by Human Wizards, Elven Wizards and Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 20

1053.name: Spellbook: Cure Poison
1053.description: Spellbook needed to learn Cure Poison. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

1054.name: Spellbook: Group Heal
1054.description: Spellbook needed to learn Group Heal. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 14

1055.name: Spellbook: Curse Poison
1055.description: Spellbook needed to learn Curse Poison. Used by Human Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

1056.name: Spellbook: Curse Weakness
1056.description: Spellbook needed to learn Curse Weakness. Used by Human Mystics and Elven Mystics.\nRequired level: 14

1057.name: Spellbook: Summon Meal
1057.description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Meal.

1058.name: Spellbook: Shield
1058.description: Spellbook needed to learn Shield. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

1059.name: Spellbook: Know Enemy
1059.description: Spellbook needed to learn Know Enemy.

1060.name: Healing Potion
1060.description: Magical potion that slowly restores HP. Lasts 15 sec.

1061.name: Major Healing Potion
1061.description: Magical potion that slowly restores HP. Lasts 15 sec.

1067.name: Recommendation
1067.description: Take the recommendation to Grand Master Roien.

1068.name: Recommendation
1068.description: Take the recommendation to Grand Magister Gallint.

1069.name: Leaf of the Mother Tree
1069.description: Take the leaf of the Mother Tree to Nerupa.

1070.name: Blood of Mitraell
1070.description: Take the blood of Mitraell to Hierarch Mitraell.

1071.name: Hyacinth Charm
1071.description: Charm given by Hierarch Asterios. Go to the water source to seek those who pollute the waters of the Elven village.

1072.name: Hyacinth Charm
1072.description: Charm given by Hierarch Asterios. Go to the water source and obtain five handfuls of plague dust from the zombies.

1073.name: Healing Potion (Novice)
1073.description: Magical potion that slowly restores HP. Short-lasting.

1076.name: Carlon's Letter
1076.description: First half year financial summary of the Iron Gate Guild: balance sheet and profit and loss statement of the Dark Elf Village guild.

1077.name: Venom Sac
1077.description: A Giant Spider's Poison Sac of poisonous spider. Gather ten of these and take to Astaron.

1078.name: Wind Crystal
1078.description: Fragment of the Elemental stone of wind. You can get them from Lirein, the wind spirits. Collect these to take to Rizraell.

1079.name: Darin's Receipt
1079.description: Receipt for a magical potion Darin received after paying Baulro. This must be handed to Baulro.

1080.name: Baulro's Potion
1080.description: Potion of courage that Baulro Has created for the shy Darin, but its effects are unknown. This must be delivered to Darin.

1081.name: Onyx Beast's Eye
1081.description: The first of three materials Tetrarch Talos asked you to collect.

1082.name: Taint Stone
1082.description: The second of three materials Tetrarch Talos asked you to collect.

1083.name: Succubus Blood
1083.description: The third of three materials Tetrarch Talos asked you to collect.

1084.name: Gludio Lord's Badge
1084.description: A badge indicating that the bearer is carrying out the orders of the lord. Keep this in your possession and hunt Orcs or werewolves.

1085.name: Orc's Necklace
1085.description: Bone necklace that Orc fighters possess on their bodies for magic purposes. Take this to Captain Gilbert.

1086.name: Werewolf's Fang
1086.description: Fangs from a dead werewolf. Take this to Captain Gilbert.

1087.name: Giant Spider's Leg
1087.description: The legs cut off from a giant spider. Collect 8 of these and take them to Alshupes.

1088.name: Undrias' Letter
1088.description: Abyssal Celebrant Undrias' letter. Take this letter to Trader Iria, Warehouse Keeper Dorankus, and Master Trudy.

1089.name: Ceremonial Dagger
1089.description: Ceremonial dagger used during the mass of darkness. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Undrias.

1090.name: Dreviant Wine
1090.description: Holy wine used in the mass of darkness. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Undrias.

1091.name: Garmiel's Scripture
1091.description: The scripture used during the mass of darkness. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Undrias.

1092.name: Arujien's Letter
1092.description: The letter that Arujien Has written in longing for Greenis. Show this to Gatekeeper Mirabel.

1093.name: Arujien's Letter
1093.description: The letter that Arujien Has written in longing for Greenis. Show this to Trader Herbiel.

1094.name: Arujien's Letter
1094.description: Arujien's love letter. Since you have shown this to Mirabel and Herbiel, you must go back to Arujien.

1095.name: Spellbook: Attack Aura
1095.description: Spellbook needed to learn Attack Aura. Used by Elven Fighters and Dark Fighters.\nRequired level: 10

1096.name: Spellbook: Elemental Heal
1096.description: Spellbook needed to learn Elemental Heal. Used by Elven Fighters.\nRequired level: 15

1097.name: Spellbook: Drain Energy
1097.description: Spellbook needed to learn Drain Energy. Used by Human Knights and Dark Fighters.\nRequired level: Human Knight - 20, Dark Fighter - 13

1098.name: Spellbook: Wind Walk
1098.description: Spellbook needed to learn Wind Walk. Used by Clerics, Elven Oracles and Shillien Oracles.\nRequired level: 20

1099.name: Spellbook: Wind Shackle
1099.description: Spellbook needed to learn Wind Shackle. Used by Elven Mage and Dark Mage.\nRequired level: 14

1102.name: Tunic of Magic
1102.description: Tunic that is designed to be comfortable for those who use magic.

1103.name: Cotton Stockings
1103.description: Pair of pants made of tough cotton.

1105.name: Stockings of Magic
1105.description: A pair of pants that is designed to be comfortable for those who use magic.

1106.name: Norman's Letter
1106.description: First half year financial summary of the Iron Gate guild: balance sheet and profit and loss statement of the Gludio region guild.

1107.name: Bone Fragment
1107.description: Bone fragments of the undead skeletons. Collect ten of these and go back to Magister Harne.

1114.name: Orc Amulet
1114.description: Amulet possessed by Kaboo Orcs for magic purposes. Take it to Sentinel Rayen.

1115.name: Orc's Necklace
1115.description: Bone necklace possessed by Kaboo Orc fighters for magic purposes. Take it to Sentinel Rayen.

1116.name: Orc Amulet
1116.description: Amulet that the Balor Orcs possess for magical purposes. Take this to Sentry Kayleen.

1117.name: Orc's Necklace
1117.description: Bone necklace that the Balor Orc fighters carry for magical purposes. Take this to Sentry Kayleen.

1118.name: Spore Sac
1118.description: Sac containing spore pollen. Give 10 spore sacs to Herbiel.

1130.name: Cobendell's Medicine
1130.description: Fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

1131.name: Cobendell's Medicine
1131.description: Fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

1132.name: Cobendell's Medicine
1132.description: Fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

1133.name: Cobendell's Medicine
1133.description: Fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

1134.name: Cobendell's Medicine
1134.description: Fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

1135.name: Spiritbound Wand
1135.description: The wand where the spirit of mirrors is bound to. Trap all three spirits of mirrors into a the wand and take it to Grand Magister Gallint.

1136.name: Spiritbound Wand
1136.description: The wand where the Spirit of Mirrors is bound to. Trap all three Spirits of Mirrors into a the wand and take it to Grand Magister Gallint.

1137.name: Spiritbound Wand
1137.description: The wand where the spirit of mirrors is bound to. Trap all three spirits of mirrors into a the wand and take it to Grand Magister Gallint.

1138.name: Auron's Letter
1138.description: Letter written by Master Auron. Take this to Trader Simplon in the Town of Gludio.

1139.name: Warrior Guild Badge
1139.description: A badge that shows that player is a member of the Warrior Guild. Take this to the Ruins of Agony and kill tracker skeletons.

1140.name: Rusted Bronze Sword
1140.description: Old bronze sword used by tracker skeletons. Collect ten and give them to Trader Simplon.

1141.name: Rusted Bronze Sword
1141.description: Old and rusted bronze sword given by Trader Simplon, who said it was a 'Sword of Trial'. Take this to Master Auron.

1142.name: Rusted Bronze Sword
1142.description: Old and rusty bronze sword called the 'Sword of Trial'. Use this to hunt Venomous Spiders and Arachnid Trackers.

1143.name: Simplon's Letter
1143.description: Letter written by Trader Simplon. Take this to Master Auron.

1144.name: Giant Venomous Spider's Leg
1144.description: Leg cut from a dead Venomous Spider or an Arachnid Tracker. Collect twenty of these and take to Master Auron.

1145.name: Medallion of Warrior
1145.description: Take this medallion and go to the Grand Master of the Warrior's Guild to change your occupation to a Warrior.

1150.name: Spellbook: Wind Strike
1150.description: Spellbook needed to learn Wind Strike.

1151.name: Spellbook: Self Heal
1151.description: Spellbook needed to learn Self Heal.

1152.name: Spellbook: Heal
1152.description: Spellbook needed to learn Heal. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

1153.name: Jenna's Letter
1153.description: Letter from Sentry Jenna to Master Harant.

1154.name: Sentry Blade
1154.description: Adamantite sword newly issued to sentries.

1155.name: Sentry Blade
1155.description: Adamantite sword newly issued to sentries.

1156.name: Sentry Blade
1156.description: Adamantite sword newly issued to sentries.

1157.name: Old Bronze Sword
1157.description: Bronze sword used in the past by sentries. Recover this and take it to Sentry Jenna.

1158.name: Bone Fragment
1158.description: Bone fragment obtained from the undead skeletons. Gather 10 bone fragments and 3 Elf skulls, and take them to Unoren.

1159.name: Elf Skull
1159.description: The skull of an undead Elf. Gather 10 bone fragments and 3 Elf skulls, and take them to Unoren.

1160.name: Abyss Spirit Ore
1160.description: Gather 13 dark bezoars and take them to Sentry Nelsya.

1161.name: Ritual Sword
1161.description: Take this sword to the Grand Master of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to a Knight.

1162.name: Coin of Lords
1162.description: Gold coin engraved with the Gludio Lord's Badge. Gather two or more of these to end the Apprentice Knight's Trial.

1163.name: Coin of Lords
1163.description: Gold coin engraved with the Gludio Lord's Badge. Gather two or more of these to end the Apprentice Knight's Trial.

1164.name: Coin of Lords
1164.description: Gold coin engraved with the Gludio Lord's Badge. Gather two or more of these to end the Apprentice Knight's Trial.

1165.name: Coin of Lords
1165.description: Gold coin engraved with the Gludio Lord's Badge. Gather two or more of these to end the Apprentice Knight's Trial.

1166.name: Coin of Lords
1166.description: Gold coin engraved with the Gludio Lord's Badge. Gather two or more of these to end the Apprentice Knight's Trial.

1167.name: Coin of Lords
1167.description: Gold coin engraved with the Gludio Lord's Badge. Gather two or more of these to end the Apprentice Knight's Trial.

1168.name: Gludio Guard's 1st Crest
1168.description: Crest that proves guard membership. As Captain Bathis requested, hunt Bugbear Raiders.

1169.name: Bugbear Necklace
1169.description: Necklace worn by Bugbears for incantation purposes. Collect ten of these and visit Captain Bathis.

1170.name: Einhasad's 1st Temple Badge
1170.description: As High Priest Raymond requested, go to the Ruins of Despair, defeat the departed spirits of priests, and collect 12 Einhasad's Crucifixes.

1171.name: Einhasad's Crucifix
1171.description: Holy symbol of Einhasad, the goddess of light. Collect 12 of these and go to High Priest Raymond.

1172.name: Gludio Guard's 2nd Crest
1172.description: Crest that distinguishes guard membership. As Captain Bezique requested, hunt giant spiders.

1173.name: Giant Venomous Spider's Leg
1173.description: Severed leg of a dead Venomous Spider. Collect twenty of these and go to Captain Bezique.

1174.name: Einhasad's 2nd Temple Badge
1174.description: As High Priest Levian requested, kill Langk lizardmen and collect the proof.

1175.name: Lizardman's Totem
1175.description: Small sculpture Langk lizardmen carry with them. Collect twenty of these and take them to High Priestess Levian.

1176.name: Gludio Guard's 3rd Crest
1176.description: Crest that proves guard membership. As Captain Gilbert requested, hunt giant spiders.

1177.name: Giant Spider's Husk
1177.description: The husk of a giant spider that you peeled off. Collect twenty of these and take them to Captain Gilbert.

1178.name: Einhasad's 3rd Temple Badge
1178.description: As High Priest Biotin requested, hunt Silent Horrors in the Elven Ruins.

1179.name: Skull of Silent Horror
1179.description: The skull of a long-dead Elf. Collect 10 and take them to High Priest Biotin.

1180.name: Bezique's Letter
1180.description: Captain Bezique's letter to Neti. Find Neti in the Village of Gludin and give her the letter.

1181.name: Neti's Bow
1181.description: Favorite bow used by Neti, who was once a Treasure Hunter. Use it when hunting the skeletons and Spartoi of the Ruins of Agony to gather bone pieces.

1182.name: Neti's Dagger
1182.description: Neti used this dagger when she was a Treasure Hunter. Use it when hunting the skeletons and Spartoi of the Ruins of Agony to gather bone pieces.

1183.name: Spartoi's Bones
1183.description: Undead bone pieces. Collect 10 and take them to Neti.

1184.name: Horseshoe of Light
1184.description: Proof you received after passing Neti's test. You must take it to Captain Bezique.

1185.name: Most Wanted List
1185.description: It is written that whoever does away with the Cat's Eye bandits and recovers the stolen goods will be rewarded.

1186.name: Stolen Jewelry
1186.description: Fair amount of jewelry the Cat's Eye bandits stole. You must take them to Captain Bezique.

1187.name: Stolen Tomes
1187.description: Rare tome the Cat's Eye bandits stole. You must take it to Captain Bezique.

1188.name: Stolen Ring
1188.description: Expensive necklace that the Cat's Eye bandits have stolen. You must take it back to Captain Bezique.

1189.name: Stolen Necklace
1189.description: Expensive necklace the Cat's Eye bandits stole. You must take it to Captain Bezique.

1190.name: Bezique's Recommendation
1190.description: Take this medallion to the Grand Masters of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to a Rogue.

1191.name: 1st Letter of Order
1191.description: Certificate of forbidden book collection given by Priest Zigaunt. Carry this around and collect all the forbidden books.

1192.name: 2nd Letter of Order
1192.description: Certificate that proves that you represent the religious body. This certificate is given by Priest Zigaunt. Take this to Lionel for covenant.

1193.name: Lionel's Book
1193.description: The last book of Lioniel. Hand this book to Grand Magister Gallint in the Einhovant School of Magic.

1194.name: Book of Vivyan
1194.description: Forbidden book Simplon sold to Vivyan. Collect five forbidden books and take them to Priest Zigaunt.

1195.name: Book of Simplon
1195.description: The rest of Simplon's forbidden books. Collect 5 forbidden books and take them to Priest Zigaunt.

1196.name: Book of Praga
1196.description: Forbidden book Simplon sold to Praga. Collect 5 forbidden books and take them to Priest Zigaunt.

1197.name: Gallint's Certificate
1197.description: Certificate that Gallint gives for safekeeping of forbidden books. Give to Lionel and receive covenant.

1198.name: Pendant of Mother
1198.description: The pendant of his mother that Guard Praga lost in the ruins. Take this to Guard Praga and receive a forbidden book.

1199.name: Necklace of Mother
1199.description: Necklace chain where a pendant used to hang. Recover the pendant from the zombies in the Ruins of Agony to make it complete.

1200.name: Lionel's Covenant
1200.description: Lionel's pledge not to use the forbidden book again. Give it to Priest Zigaunt and receive the mark of faith.

1201.name: Mark of Faith
1201.description: Take this token to the high priest of the temple to change your occupation to a Cleric.

1202.name: Sorius' Letter
1202.description: Letter received from Master Sorius to be given to Blacksmith Kluto in the Village of Gludin.

1203.name: Kluto Box
1203.description: Box that Kluto asked to give to Master Sorius.

1204.name: Elven Knight Brooch
1204.description: Take this brooch to the Grand Master of the Fighter Guild and he will change your occupation to a Knight.

1205.name: Topaz Piece
1205.description: Piece of topaz obtained from the undead in the ruins. Collect 20 to take to Master Sorius.

1206.name: Emerald Piece
1206.description: Piece of emerald obtained from the Ol Mahum Novices. Collect 20 of these to take to Blacksmith Kluto.

1207.name: Reisa's Letter
1207.description: Master Reisa's letter to Guard Moretti. Find Guard Moretti and give him the letter.

1208.name: Prias' 1st Torn Letter
1208.description: Torn piece of letter written by Prias and is not legible. Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti.

1209.name: Prias' 2nd Torn Letter
1209.description: Torn piece of letter written by Prias and is not legible Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti.

1210.name: Prias' 3rd Torn Letter
1210.description: Torn piece of letter written by Prias and is not legible. Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti.

1211.name: Prias' 4th Torn Letter
1211.description: Torn piece of letter written by Prias and is not legible. Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti.

1212.name: Moretti's Herb
1212.description: An herb that Guard Moretti asked to give to Prias.

1213.name: Guard's Bow
1213.description: Bow given by Guard Moretti. May be efficiently used for some purpose.

1214.name: Moretti's Letter
1214.description: Urgent letter from Guard Moretti to Prias.

1215.name: Prias' Letter
1215.description: Reply of Prias to the letter from Guard Moretti. Hand this to Moretti.

1216.name: Honorary Guard
1216.description: Letter written by Guard Moretti to Master Reisa. Take it to Master Reisa.

1217.name: Reisa's Recommendation
1217.description: Take this recommendation to the Grand Master of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to an Elven Scout.

1218.name: Rosella's Letter
1218.description: Letter from Rosella to Elven Magister Greenis. Related to ruby, the symbol of fire.

1219.name: Red Down
1219.description: Material needed to make ruby of magical powers. Collect 5 and take them to Magister Greenis for the magical power ruby.

1220.name: Ruby of Magic
1220.description: Ruby that symbolizes fire. Gather 4 jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rosella for a token to change occupations.

1221.name: Pure Aquamarine
1221.description: Aquamarine that symbolizes water. Gather the 4 jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rosella for a token to change occupations.

1222.name: Appetizing Apple
1222.description: Very ripe apple. Give it to Thalia for information on the aquamarine of water.

1223.name: Gold Leaves
1223.description: Leaves used as fertilizer for the Mother Tree. Collect five leaves and give them to Thalia for an aquamarine.

1224.name: Immortal Love
1224.description: Book Northwind wanted to borrow. If you give this book to Northwind, you can obtain information on the amethyst.

1225.name: Amethyst
1225.description: Amethyst obtained by killing Mist Terror. Give two to Northwind for a Nobility Amethyst.

1226.name: Nobility Amethyst
1226.description: Amethyst that symbolizes wind. Gather 4 jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rosella for a token to change occupations.

1227.name: Rosella's Recommendation
1227.description: Rosella's recommendation. If you show this to Varsak, you can get information on the fertility peridot.

1228.name: Peridot
1228.description: Peridot you can get if you kill a sniper skeleton. If you collect 3 and show them to Varsak, you can get the fertility peridot.

1229.name: Fertility Peridot
1229.description: Peridot that symbolizes the earth. Gather 4 jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rosella for a token to change occupations.

1230.name: Eternity Diamond
1230.description: Take this token to the Grand Master of the Magician Guild to change your occupation to an Elven Wizard.

1231.name: Crystal Medallion
1231.description: Necklace given by Priest Manuel. Take this and go to the port Gludin to find the girl who works miracles.

1232.name: Swindler's Money
1232.description: Money from Perrin's swindling. Give it to Allana.

1233.name: Allana's Diary
1233.description: Diary with records of fraud miracle. Show this to Priest Manuel as proof.

1234.name: Lizard Captain Order
1234.description: Order of lizard captain to kidnap the sacred flame of prophecy.

1235.name: Leaf of Oracle
1235.description: Take this to the high priest to change your occupation to an Oracle.

1236.name: Half of Diary
1236.description: Half of the diary given by Allana. You must get money from Perrin and find the other half of the diary.

1237.name: Palus Charm
1237.description: Charm inscribed with palus runes that symbolize a deep lake. Carry this and hunt lycanthrope in the Neutral Zone.

1238.name: Lycanthrope Skull
1238.description: Skull obtained after killing Lycanthrope. Collect thirteen and take them to Master Virgil.

1239.name: Virgil's Letter
1239.description: Letter written by Master Virgil. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Kalinta of the village of Gludin.

1240.name: Morte Talisman
1240.description: Talisman with inscription of rune of Morte, symbol of death. Carry this and find materials needed for coffin.

1241.name: Giant Venomous Spider's Carapace
1241.description: The hard carapace of a Venomous Spider. Take this and five Arachnid Tracker Silk threads to Abyssal Celebrant Kalinta.

1242.name: Arachnid Tracker Silk
1242.description: Arachnid Tracker web threads. Take five of these and a giant Venomous Spider carapace to Abyssal Celebrant Kalinta.

1243.name: Coffin of Eternal Rest
1243.description: Coffin used in funeral of Dark Elven Knight. Take this to Master Virgil.

1244.name: Gaze of Abyss
1244.description: Take this token to the Grand Master of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to a Knight.

1245.name: Shilen's Call
1245.description: Letter received from Triskel. Go to Witch Arkenia of the Altar of Rites.

1246.name: Arkenia's Letter
1246.description: Letter received from Arkenia. Take this to Guard Leikan to obtain information about the thief.

1247.name: Leikan's Note
1247.description: Simple contract given by Guard Leikan. Must hunt moonstone beasts and collect their molars.

1248.name: Moonstone Beast's Molar
1248.description: Molar obtained after killing a moonstone beast. Collect 10 of these to take to Guard Leikan.

1249.name: Leikan's Knife
1249.description: Knife received as present from Leikan. They say it works well against the Calpicos.

1250.name: Shilen's Tears
1250.description: Magic liquid stolen from the Altar of Rites. Give this to Witch Arkenia.

1251.name: Arkenia's Recommendation
1251.description: Token of thanks received from Arkenia. Take this to Triskel.

1252.name: Iron Heart
1252.description: Take this to the Grand Master of the Dark Elf Guild to change your occupation to an Assassin.

1253.name: Seed of Anger
1253.description: Seed obtained from Charkeren, who is full of anger. Take this to Witch Varika.

1254.name: Seed of Despair
1254.description: Seed obtained from Witch Varika. You must obtain all four seeds to earn the Dark Jewel.

1255.name: Seed of Horror
1255.description: Seed obtained from Annika, who is full of horror. Take this to Witch Varika.

1256.name: Seed of Lunacy
1256.description: Seed obtained from a lunatic. Take this to Witch Varika.

1257.name: Family's Remains
1257.description: Remains of Charkeren's slain family. Find 3 and return to Charkeren.

1258.name: Varika's Liquor
1258.description: Medicine Varika made for the son of Duchess Dwell. If you give it to Duchess, you can obtain the Seed of Despair.

1259.name: Knee Bone
1259.description: The knee bone of undead that Annika was looking for. Give this to Annika to obtain the Seed of Horror.

1260.name: Heart of Lunacy
1260.description: The hearts of those who have been turned into a skeletons by a sorcerer of lunacy. Collect 3 Hearts of Lunacy and take them to Arkenia.

1261.name: Dark Jewel
1261.description: Take this token to the Grand Master of the Dark Elf guild to change your occupation to a Dark Wizard.

1262.name: Sidra's Letter
1262.description: The letter of introduction written by Magister Sidra. Take this to Magister Talbot.

1263.name: Blank Sheet
1263.description: Blank scroll. Take this and hunt dark Succubus to obtain bloody runes.

1264.name: Bloody Rune
1264.description: Runes written with the blood of dark Succubus. Collect 5 and take to Magister Talbot.

1265.name: Garmiel's Book
1265.description: The sacred book of Gran Kain, god of darkness, written in elven language. One of two books Sidra told you to find.

1266.name: Prayer of Adonius
1266.description: The widely beloved prayer book. Take this to Priest Adonius in the village of Gludin.

1267.name: Penitent's Badge
1267.description: A badge that shows one is in the course of repenting one's sins. Carry this and hunt skeletons and zombies in the Ruins of Despair.

1268.name: Ashen Bones
1268.description: Bones from the skeletons and zombies in the Ruins of Despair. Gather 10 and take them to Priest Adonius.

1269.name: Andariel Book
1269.description: The sacred book of Einhasad, goddess of light, written in the Elven language. One of two books Sidra told you to find.

1270.name: Orb of Abyss
1270.description: Take this token to a Grand Master of a Dark Elf Guild in any major city to change your occupation to a Shillien Oracle.

1271.name: Squire's Badge
1271.description: A badge that indicates an esquire. Wander around the villages in Gludio and meet with guard captains and high priests.

1272.name: Greenis' Charm
1272.description: Greenis' good luck charm. Kill pincer spiders and give 5 red down to Greenis.

1273.name: Sap of the Mother Tree
1273.description: Sap of Mother Tree that dryad elders like. Find 5 gold leaves and give them to Thalia.

1274.name: Lucky Potpourri
1274.description: Northwind's Lucky Potpourri. Give Northwind 2 Amethysts obtained by killing Mist Terror.

1275.name: Tamil's Necklace
1275.description: Tamil's necklace. Show it to Perrin.

1276.name: Kluto's Memo
1276.description: Memo from Blacksmith Kluto asking to defeat the Ol Mahum Novices.

1277.name: Lucky Key
1277.description: Bronze key. Hunt zombies in the swamp area, collect 3 remains, and take them to Charkeren.

1278.name: Candle
1278.description: Candle that lights up the dark. Collect 2 knee bones from the undead and give them to Annika for the Seed of Horror.

1279.name: Herb Scent
1279.description: Fragrant herb potpourri. Obtain 3 Hearts of Lunacy from a skeleton scout and take them to Arkenia.

1280.name: Map of Light
1280.description: Map given by the Flame Salamander. Kill ratman fighters and give the key of flame to the salamander in exchange for the token of fire.

1281.name: Key of Flame
1281.description: The key that can be obtained by killing a ratman fighter. When you give it to a salamander, he will give you the token of fire.

1282.name: Flame Earring
1282.description: The token of fire given by fire spirit salamander. Collect four tokens and give them to Parina to receive the token that enables changing occupations.

1283.name: Broken Bronze Mirror
1283.description: The mirror given by the Wind Sylph. Go to the lizardmen of the Wastelands and obtain the Wind Feather and return it to the Wind Sylph.

1284.name: Wind Feather
1284.description: The feather hidden by the Wind Sylph near the Wastelands. Return this to the Wind Sylph to receive a Wind Token.

1285.name: Wind Bangle
1285.description: The Wind Token given to you by the Wind Spirit Sylph. Collect all four tokens and give them to Parina to receive a special token that will enable you to change occupations.

1286.name: Rama's Diary
1286.description: Kill water seer and take two sparkle pebbles to water Undine for the token of water.

1287.name: Sparkle Pebble
1287.description: Kill water seer in Lake Fellmere for stones. If you give this to Water Undine, she will give you the token of water.

1288.name: Water Necklace
1288.description: The token of water given by water spirit Undine. Collect four tokens and give them to Parina to receive the token that enables changing occupations.

1289.name: Rusty Coin
1289.description: The coin given by earth snake. Kill red bear and give red soil to earth snake for Token of Earth.

1290.name: Red Soil
1290.description: The soil obtained from killing red bear. Give to the earth snake for the token of earth.

1291.name: Earth Ring
1291.description: Token of Earth given by earth snake. Collect 4 tokens and give them to Parina to receive the token that enables changing occupations.

1292.name: Bead of Season
1292.description: Take this bead to the high priest of the temple to change your occupation to a Wizard.

1293.name: Rusted Key
1293.description: The key that unlocks Prias' shackles. Take this and go to Prias.

1294.name: Spellbook: Defense Aura
1294.description: Spellbook needed to learn Defense Aura. Used by Elven Fighters and Dark Fighters.\nRequired level: 5

1334.name: Predator's Fang
1334.description: Collect 100 predator's fangs and take them to Pixy Murika.

1335.name: Goblin Club
1335.description: Sturdy club made from thick tree branches and carried by goblins. Take this to Treant Bremac.

1336.name: Glass Shard
1336.description: Broken glass piece. Can be sold in any shop for a low price.

1337.name: Emerald
1337.description: Can be sold in any shop for a high price.

1338.name: Blue Onyx
1338.description: Blue jewel. Can be sold in any shop.

1339.name: Onyx
1339.description: Black jewel. Can be sold in any shop.

1340.name: Silvery Leaf
1340.description: The leaf of a silvery mistletoe. Can be sold in any shop.

1341.name: Bone Arrow
1341.description: Arrow made from a piece of sharpened bone. It is used as an arrow for a D-grade bow.

1342.name: Steel Arrow
1342.description: Powerful arrow made of steel. It is used as an arrow for a C-grade bow.

1344.name: Mithril Arrow
1344.description: Steel Arrow coated by mithril. For A-grade bows.

1345.name: Arrow of Light
1345.description: Arrows made of an unknown material. Used with an S-grade bow. Very light.

1346.name: Golem's Stoneheart
1346.description: Stone found within the remains of a destroyed golem. Take this to Trader Rorento.

1347.name: Monster Eye Meat
1347.description: The carcass of monster eye. Take this to Trader Sarien.

1348.name: Basilisk's Gizzard
1348.description: The digestive organ of a basilisk. Take this to Trader Sarien.

1349.name: Anatomy Diagram
1349.description: Diagram designed by Avella physicians for human anatomy. Use this to perform Samed's request.

1350.name: Zombie Head
1350.description: Head of zombie from ruins. Take this to Samed of the Town of Gludio.

1351.name: Zombie Heart
1351.description: Heart of zombie from ruins. Take this to Samed in the Town of Gludio.

1352.name: Zombie Liver
1352.description: Liver of zombie from ruins. Take this to Samed in the Town of Gludio.

1353.name: Deadman's Skull
1353.description: Skull of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the Town of Gludio.

1354.name: Deadman's Rib Bone
1354.description: Rib of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the Town of Gludio.

1355.name: Deadman's Spine
1355.description: Spine of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the Town of Gludio.

1356.name: Deadman's Arm Bone
1356.description: Arm bone of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the Town of Gludio.

1357.name: Deadman's Thigh Bone
1357.description: Thigh bone of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the Town of Gludio.

1358.name: Deadman's Complete Skeleton
1358.description: Complete skeleton put together with bone pieces by undertaker Varsak. Take this to Samed in the Town of Gludio.

1359.name: Red Cross Badge
1359.description: Soldier badge of foreign troops. Take this to Leopold in Gludin.

1360.name: Blue Cross Badge
1360.description: Badge of high ranking of Gracian foreign troops. Take this to Leopold in Gludin.

1361.name: Black Cross Badge
1361.description: Badge of captain ranking of Gracian foreign troops. Take this to Leopold in Gludin.

1362.name: Spider's Carapace
1362.description: The hard carapace of a spider. Often used to coat a shield or a helmet. Take this to Trader Arodin.

1363.name: Spider Silk
1363.description: Tough, stretchy spider web. Used to make bowstrings. Take this to Trader Arodin.

1364.name: Spider's Poison Sac
1364.description: Sac with a spider's deadly Poison in it. Can be sold to Trader Cullinas in Gludin.

1365.name: Broken Stoneheart
1365.description: Small pieces of stone found within the remains of a destroyed golem. Take this to Trader Rorento.

1366.name: Monster Eye's Lens
1366.description: The transparent part of monster eye. Take this to Trader Sarien.

1367.name: Wolf Claw
1367.description: Collect 50 wolf claws and take them to Trader Payne of the weapons and armor shop.

1368.name: Imp Shackles
1368.description: The metal shackles attached around the neck of the imp race. Take this to Sentry Kristin.

1369.name: Black Lion Badge
1369.description: A badge that indicates one is a member of the Black Lion troop.

1370.name: Spellbook: Aqua Swirl
1370.description: Spellbook needed to learn Aqua Swirl. Used by Elven Wizards.\nRequired level: 20

1371.name: Spellbook: Twister
1371.description: Spellbook needed to learn Twister. Used by Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 20

1372.name: Spellbook: Blaze
1372.description: Spellbook needed to learn Blaze. Used by Human Wizards.\nRequired level: 20

1374.name: Greater Wind Walk Potion
1374.description: Magical potion that increases movement Speed dramatically for 5 minutes.

1375.name: Greater Haste Potion
1375.description: Magical potion that increases Atk. Spd. Dramatically for 5 minutes.

1377.name: Spellbook: Poison Recovery
1377.description: Spellbook needed to learn Poison Recovery. Used by Elven Knights and Elven Scouts.\nRequired level: Elven Knight - 20, Elven Scout - 24

1378.name: Spellbook: Divine Heal
1378.description: Spellbook needed to learn Divine Heal. Used by Human Knights.\nRequired level: 26

1379.name: Spellbook: Cure Bleeding
1379.description: Spellbook needed to learn Cure Bleeding. Used by Elven Knights and Elven Scouts.\nRequired level: 24

1380.name: Spellbook: Entangle
1380.description: Spellbook needed to learn Entangle. Used by Elven Knights and Elven Scouts.\nRequired level: 36

1381.name: Spellbook: Freezing Strike
1381.description: Spellbook needed to learn Freezing Strike. Used by Palus Knights and Assassins.\nRequired level: 34

1382.name: Spellbook: Power Break
1382.description: Spellbook needed to learn Power Break. Used by Palus Knights and Assassins.\nRequired level: 32

1383.name: Spellbook: Poison
1383.description: Spellbook needed to learn Poison. Used by Palus Knights and Assassins.\nRequired level: 20

1384.name: Spellbook: Sprint
1384.description: Spellbook needed to learn Sprint. Used by Elven Knights and Elven Scouts.\nRequired level: 32

1385.name: Spellbook: Recharge

1387.name: Spellbook: Poison Resistance
1387.description: Spellbook needed to learn Poison Resistance. Used by Oracles and Prophets.\nRequired level: Oracle - 35, Prophet - 60

1388.name: Spellbook: Mental Shield
1388.description: Spellbook needed to learn Mental Shield. Used by Clerics, Elven Oracles and Shillien Oracles.\nRequired level: 25

1389.name: Spellbook: Holy Weapon
1389.description: Spellbook needed to learn Holy Weapon. Used by Clerics and Elven Oracles.\nRequired level: 25

1390.name: Spellbook: Regeneration

1392.name: Spellbook: Berserker Spirit

1394.description: Spellbook needed to learn Sleep. Used by Human Wizards, Clerics, Elven Wizards, Elven Oracles, Dark Wizards, and Shillien Oracles.\nRequired level: 23

1399.name: Spellbook: Concentration
1399.description: Spellbook needed to learn Concentration. Used by Human Wizards, Clerics, Elven Wizards, Elven Oracles, Dark Wizards, and Shillien Oracles.\nRequired level: 20

1407.description: Spellbook needed to learn Servitor Magic Boost. Used by Elven Wizards.\nRequired level: 35

1408.name: Spellbook: Mighty Servitor
