1411.name: Spellbook: Aura Burn
1411.description: Spellbook needed to learn Aura Burn. Used by Wizards, Elven Wizards and Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 20

1412.name: Spellbook: Water Resistance
1412.description: Spellbook needed to learn Water Resistance. Used by Elven Wizards and Prophets.\nRequired level: Elven Wizard - 25, Prophet - 58

1413.name: Spellbook: Wind Resistance
1413.description: Spellbook needed to learn Wind Resistance. Used by Shillien Oracles and Prophets.\nRequired level: Shillien Oracle - 35, Prophet - 58

1414.name: Spellbook: Fire Resistance
1414.description: Spellbook needed to learn Fire Resistance. Used by Clerics.\nRequired level: 30

1415.name: Spellbook: Dryad Root
1415.description: Spellbook needed to learn Dryad Root. Used by Clerics, Oracles, and Shillien Oracles.\nRequired level: 23

1416.name: Spellbook: Curse Chaos
1416.description: Spellbook needed to learn Curse Chaos. Used by Human Wizards and Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 35

1417.name: Spellbook: Surrender to Earth
1417.description: Spellbook needed to learn Surrender to Earth. Used by Elven Wizards.\nRequired level: 35

1418.name: Spellbook: Surrender to Poison
1418.description: Spellbook needed to learn Surrender to Poison. Used by Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 25

1419.name: Proof of Blood
1419.description: Item needed to upgrade a clan to level 5.

1420.name: Ingredient List
1420.description: List of cooking ingredients from Jonas. Mandragora essence. Honey. Dionian potato. Marsh moss. Floating eye meat.

1421.name: Sonia's Botany Book
1421.description: Picture that shows what a mandragora looks like. You need this to get mandragora roots.

1422.name: Red Mandragora Root
1422.description: Red mandragora root. Collect these to take them to Trader Sonia.

1423.name: White Mandragora Root
1423.description: Rare white mandragora root. Collect these to take them to Trader Sonia.

1424.name: Red Mandragora Sap
1424.description: Red mandragora sap. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas' cooking.

1425.name: White Mandragora Sap
1425.description: Transparent mandragora sap. One of the ingredients needed for Jonas' cooking.

1426.name: Jacob's Insect Book
1426.description: Diagram that depicts the drawing of a bee. You must possess this in order to obtain nectar and royal jelly from the bloody bee or the Weird Wasp.

1427.name: Nectar
1427.description: Honey water taken from a giant bee. Collect 20 of these to take them to Guard Jacob.

1428.name: Royal Jelly
1428.description: Rare ingredient that can be taken only from newborn working bees. Collect these and take them to Guard Jacob.

1429.name: Honey
1429.description: Honey made from the nectar you collected from bees. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas' cooking.

1430.name: Golden Honey
1430.description: Golden honey made from the nectar and the royal jelly you collected from bees. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas' cooking.

1431.name: Pano's Contract
1431.description: Contract Grocer Pano gave you. It says, if you kill Hobgoblins and bring 30 pieces of proof, he will give you potatoes as a reward.

1432.name: Hobgoblin Amulet
1432.description: Amulet made of a feather that Hobgoblins carry on themselves. Collect 30 of these and take them to Grocer Pano.

1433.name: Dionian Potato
1433.description: The highest-quality potatoes grown in the rich soil of southern Dion. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas' cooking.

1434.name: Glyvka's Botany Book
1434.description: Picture that explains how to collect moss. You need this to collect marsh moss from grey ants or crimson ants.

1435.name: Green Marsh Moss
1435.description: Green marsh moss is sometimes used in cooking. Collect this and take it to Priestess Glyvka.

1436.name: Brown Marsh Moss
1436.description: Rare brown marsh moss. Its flavors are superior to the green ones. Collect this and take it to Priestess Glyvka.

1437.name: Green Moss Bundle
1437.description: Bundle of well-cared-for moss, collected from a marshy place for cooking. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas' cooking.

1438.name: Brown Moss Bundle
1438.description: Bundle of well-cared-for moss, collected from a marshy place for cooking. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas' cooking.

1439.name: Rollant's Creature Book
1439.description: Picture that shows what a monster eye looks like. You need this to collect the right monster eye searcher or the monster eye gazer.

1440.name: Body of Monster Eye
1440.description: Severed Deadman's Flesh body of monster eye. Take this to Magister Rollant.

1441.name: Monster Eye Meat
1441.description: The dead body of a monster eye, ready to cook. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas' cooking.

1442.name: Jonas' 1st Steak Dish
1442.description: Plate that contains Jonas' monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

1443.name: Jonas' 2nd Steak Dish
1443.description: Plate that contains Jonas' monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

1444.name: Jonas' 3rd Steak Dish
1444.description: Plate that contains Jonas' monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

1445.name: Jonas' 4th Steak Dish
1445.description: Plate that contains Jonas' monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

1446.name: Jonas' 5th Steak Dish
1446.description: Plate that contains Jonas' monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

1447.name: Mirien's Review
1447.description: Letter from Magister Mirien about the taste of Jonas' dish. Take this to Jonas.

1452.name: Harpy's Feather
1452.description: Feather taken from a harpy. Collect these and take them to Guard Belton.

1453.name: Medusa's Venom
1453.description: Poison extracted from the snake hair of a medusa. Collect these and take them to Guard Belton.

1454.name: Wyrm's Tooth
1454.description: Sharp fang of a Wyrm. Collect these and take them to Guard Belton.

1455.name: Jonas' Salad Recipe
1455.description: Jonas' recipe for making marsh moss salad.

1456.name: Jonas' Sauce Recipe
1456.description: Jonas' recipe for making mandragora sauce.

1457.name: Jonas' Steak Recipe
1457.description: Jonas' recipe for making monster eye meat steak.

1463.name: Soulshot (D-grade)
1463.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a D-grade weapon.

1464.name: Soulshot (C-grade)
1464.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a C-grade weapon.

1465.name: Soulshot (B-grade)
1465.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a B-grade weapon.

1466.name: Soulshot (A-grade)
1466.description: The power of a Soulshot is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing the power of attack. Used with A-grade weapons.

1467.name: Soulshot (S-grade)
1467.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, spontaneously increasing power of attack. Used with an S-grade weapon.

1473.name: Kasha Wolf Fang
1473.description: Fang that is obtained by killing a kasha wolf. Collect fifty and take these to Praetorian Rukain.

1474.name: Grave Robber's Head
1474.description: The head of goblin robbers, who damaged the graves of Orc ancestors. Collect 50 to take to Seer Livina.

1475.name: Black Soulstone
1475.description: Black soulstone pulled out of the heart of a rakeclaw imp. Collect these to take to Atuba Chief Varkees.

1476.name: Red Soulstone
1476.description: Red soulstone pulled out of the heart of a rakeclaw imp. Collect these to take to Atuba Chief Varkees.

1477.name: Maraku Werewolf Head
1477.description: The head of a Maraku werewolf that has been cut off after they were defeated. Collect 40 of these and take them to Prefect Brukurse.

1478.name: Blackwing Bat Fang
1478.description: Fang of a Blackwing Bat. Collect 70 of these and take them to Neruga Chief Tantus.

1479.name: Varangka's Parasite
1479.description: Evil parasite that summons Varangka's trackers.

1480.name: Kasha's Parasitic Spirit
1480.description: Parasite-type evil spirit that comes out of the grey bear polluted by kasha's evil spirit. This is the key calling forth the kasha totem spirit.

1481.name: Kasha's Crystal
1481.description: Crystal obtained by killing the grey bear totem polluted by kasha's evil spirit. Take this to Seer Tanapi.

1482.name: Black Wolf Pelt
1482.description: Pelt of a black wolf. Collect 40 to take to Maryse Redbonnet.

1483.name: Goblin Necklace
1483.description: Necklace obtained by killing a low-level goblin. Collect these and take them to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

1484.name: Goblin Pendant
1484.description: Necklace obtained by killing a high-level goblin. Collect these and take them to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

1485.name: Goblin Lord Pendant
1485.description: Necklace obtained by killing the goblin lord. Collect these and take them to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

1486.name: Suspicious Memo
1486.description: Suspicious memo obtained by killing a goblin brigand leader. Take this to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

1487.name: Suspicious Contract
1487.description: Suspicious contract completed by collecting Suspicious Memos. This contract reveals that the Silver Scale Guild requested the brigands to attack the freight wagons.

1488.name: Chrysolite Ore
1488.description: Chrysolite Ore received from defeating Utuku Orcs. Collect these and take them to Filaur of the Grey Pillar.

1489.name: Torn Map Piece
1489.description: Part of the map that reveals the hidden vein of Chrysolite. Collect 4 of these pieces to complete the map.

1490.name: Hidden Ore Map
1490.description: Map that reveals a hidden vein of Chrysolite. Take this to Filaur of the Grey Pillar.

1491.name: Bat Fang
1491.description: Fang taken by killing a blade bat or a barb bat. Collect 100 and take them to Bronze Key's Keef

1492.name: Floating Stone
1492.description: Stone that floats on water. Obtain it from a magical weaver. Collect 50 and take them to Black Anvil's Arin.

1493.name: Tarantula Spider Silk
1493.description: The spider silk that makes when making their nests. Collect these and take them to Trader Mion.

1494.name: Tarantula Spinnerette
1494.description: Pocket shaped organ that makes spider silk. Take this to Defender Nathan.

1495.name: Giant Spider's Skin
1495.description: The husk of a giant spider that you peel off. Collect them and take them to Edmond.

1496.name: Mark of Flame
1496.description: This mark represents the qualification of Orc fighters. Take this and go to the Flame Guardian Vulkus.

1497.name: Necklace of Flame
1497.description: The necklace of flame given by Vulkus. Hand this to Kakai, the Lord of Flame, king of the Orcs.

1498.name: Mining License
1498.description: License given to Dwarves to allow them to mine. Take this and go to Foreman Laferon.

1499.name: Laferon's Recommendation
1499.description: The recommendation of Foreman Laferon. Take this and go to First Elder Lockirin.

1500.name: Totem of Hestui
1500.description: The totem of the Hestui. Can be sold in any shop for a high price.

1501.name: Maraku Werewolf Totem
1501.description: Maraku Wolfmen Totem. Can be sold in any shop.

1502.name: Grandma's Pearl
1502.description: Article left by the grandmother of Redbonnet. Can be sold in any shop for a high price.

1503.name: Grandma's Mirror
1503.description: Article left by the grandmother of Redbonnet. Can be sold in any shop.

1504.name: Grandma's Necklace
1504.description: Article left by the grandmother of Redbonnet. Can be sold in any shop.

1505.name: Grandma's Hairpin
1505.description: Article left by the grandmother of Redbonnet. Can be sold in any shop.

1506.name: Necklace of Courage
1506.description: Necklace that is given to young Orcs who have proven their courage.

1507.name: Necklace of Valor
1507.description: Necklace that is given to young Orcs who have proven their valor.

1508.name: Ring of Raccoon
1508.description: Ring given to apprentices of the Bronze Key Guild.

1509.name: Ring of Firefly
1509.description: Ring given to apprentices of the Black Anvil Guild.

1510.name: Butcher's Sword
1510.description: Sword granted to young Orc Fighters who distinguished themselves at war.

1511.name: Silversmith Hammer
1511.description: Hammer silversmiths of the ancient Elmoreden used.

1512.name: Spellbook: Confusion
1512.description: Spellbook needed to learn Confusion. Used by Palus Knights and Assassins.\nRequired level: 24

1513.name: Spellbook: Charm
1513.description: Spellbook needed to learn Charm. Used by Elven Knights and Elven Scouts.\nRequired level: 20

1514.name: Spellbook: Resurrection
1514.description: Spellbook needed to learn Resurrection. Used by Clerics, Elven Oracles, and Shillien Oracles.\nRequired level: 20

1515.name: Spellbook: Eva's Kiss
1515.description: Spellbook needed to learn Eva's Kiss. Used by Clerics, Elven Oracles and Shillien Oracles.\nRequired level: 20

1516.name: Spellbook: Corpse Life Drain
1516.description: Spellbook needed to learn Corpse Life Drain. Used by Human Wizards and Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 30

1517.name: Spellbook: Body To Mind
1517.description: Spellbook needed to learn Body To Mind. Used by Human Wizards, Elven Wizards, and Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 25

1518.name: Amulet: Chant of Flame
1518.description: Amulet required for the Chant of Flame spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 30

1519.name: Amulet: Pa'agrio's Gift
1519.description: Amulet required for the Pa'agrio's Gift spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 30

1520.name: Amulet: Pa'agrio's Blessing
1520.description: Amulet required for the Pa'agrio's Blessing spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 35

1521.name: Amulet: Chant of Fire
1521.description: Amulet required for the Chant of Fire spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 20

1522.name: Amulet: Chant of Battle
1522.description: Amulet required for the Chant of Battle spell. Used by Orc Mystics.\nRequired level: 14

1523.name: Amulet: Chant of Shielding
1523.description: Amulet required for the Chant of Shielding spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 20

1524.name: Amulet: Soul Shield
1524.description: Amulet required for the Soul Shield spell. Used by Orc Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

1525.name: Amulet: Life Drain
1525.description: Amulet required for the Life Drain spell. Used by Orc Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

1526.name: Amulet: Fear
1526.description: Amulet required for the Fear spell. Used by Orc Mystics.\nRequired level: 14

1527.name: Amulet: Venom
1527.description: Amulet required for the Venom spell. Used by Orc Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

1528.name: Amulet: Seal of Chaos
1528.description: Amulet required for the Seal of Chaos spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 30

1529.name: Amulet: Dreaming Spirit
1529.description: Amulet required for the Spirit Dream spell. Used by Orc Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

1530.name: Amulet: Seal of Slow
1530.description: Amulet required for the Seal of Slow spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 35

1531.name: Amulet: Chill Flame
1531.description: Amulet required for the Chill Flame spell. Used by Orc Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

1532.name: Amulet: Blaze Quake
1532.description: Amulet required for the Blaze Quake spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 25

1533.name: Amulet: Aura Sink
1533.description: Amulet required for the Aura Sink spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 25

1534.name: Amulet: Madness
1534.description: Amulet required for the Madness spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 20

1535.name: Amulet: Frost Flame
1535.description: Amulet required for the Frost Flame spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 20

1536.name: Amulet: Seal of Binding
1536.description: Amulet required for the Seal of Binding spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 25

1537.name: Amulet: Seal of Poison
1537.description: Amulet required for the Seal of Poison spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 20

1538.name: Blessed Scroll of Escape
1538.description: Magical scroll that relocates you to the nearest village

1539.name: Major Healing Potion
1539.description: Magical potion that quickly restores HP. Its effect lasts for 15 seconds.

1540.name: Quick Healing Potion
1540.description: Magic potion that instantly restores HP. Instant effect with no duration. Cannot be used when HP is full.

1541.name: Honey Khandar
1541.description: Miraculous medicine made of the mixture of honey and khandar extract. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

1542.name: Bear Fur Cloak
1542.description: Cloak made of grizzly bear's fur. Excellent for keeping warm. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

1543.name: Bloody Axe
1543.description: Axe that holds the blood of wild animals. It is said to strengthen its owner's life force. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

1544.name: Ancestor Skull
1544.description: Skull of an ancestor of Urutus. It is said to strengthen its owner's life force. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

1545.name: Spider Dust
1545.description: Grain of powder made of dried legs of poisonous spiders. Smelling it will make you feel refreshed. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

1546.name: Deep Sea Orb
1546.description: Pearl brought out of a deep sea. It is said to help predict the future. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

1547.name: Bolter's List
1547.description: The list of things that Bolter wants you to bring from the village.

1548.name: Mining Boots
1548.description: Pair of mining boots you got from Trader Garita. Take this to Miner Bolter.

1549.name: Miner's Pick
1549.description: Miner's pick you got from Blacksmith Brunon. Take this to Miner Bolter.

1550.name: Boomboom Powder
1550.description: Sack of boomboom powder you got from Trader Shari. Take this to Miner Bolter.

1551.name: Redstone Beer
1551.description: Delicious beer you got from Warehouse Chief Reed. Take this to Miner Bolter.

1552.name: Bolter's Smelly Socks
1552.description: Pair of socks that Miner Bolter gave you. For what...?

1553.name: Hatos' 1st Order
1553.description: The order to kill Baranka's messenger. After killing him, recover the letter and take it to Urutu Chief Hatos.

1554.name: Hatos' 2nd Order
1554.description: The order states that you must kill Baranka's messenger. After killing him, recover the letter and take it to Urutu Chief Hatos.

1555.name: Hatos' 3rd Order
1555.description: The order states that you must kill Baranka's messenger. After killing him, recover the letter and take it to Urutu Chief Hatos.

1556.name: Secret Letter to Dark Elf
1556.description: The secret letter that Baranka is sending to Dark Elven Magister Kaland. Take the letter to Urutu Chief Hatos.

1557.name: Secret Letter to Human
1557.description: The secret letter that Baranka is sending to Duke Van Halter. Take the letter to Urutu Chief Hatos.

1558.name: Secret Letter to Elf
1558.description: The secret letter that Baranka is sending to Elven Master Laria. Take the letter to Urutu Chief Hatos.

1559.name: Gouph's Contract
1559.description: Collector Gouph drew up this contract when buying the star diamond from Trader Reep. Take this to Trader Reep.

1560.name: Reep's Contract
1560.description: Trader Reep drew up this contract when he requested the delivery of the star diamond. Take this to Carrier Torocco.

1561.name: Elven Wine
1561.description: Carrier Torocco bought this high quality wine to give it to his old friend, Maron, as a present. Take this to Miner Maron.

1562.name: Brunon's Dice
1562.description: These dice were specially made for gambling. Take these to Blacksmith Brunon.

1563.name: Brunon's Contract
1563.description: This contract says if Brunon gets the 20 stolen jewels back from goblins, he can get the star diamond back.

1564.name: Aquamarine
1564.description: This jewel is obtained by the goblin brigand leader. Take 10 aquamarines and 10 chrysoberyls to Blacksmith Brunon.

1565.name: Chrysoberyl
1565.description: This jewel is obtained by the goblin brigand leader. Take 10 aquamarines and 10 chrysoberyls to Blacksmith Brunon.

1566.name: Jewel Box
1566.description: Blacksmith Brunon gives this Jewel Box. Take it to Collector Gouph.

1567.name: Coal Piece
1567.description: This coal piece is in the Jewel Box. Take this to Blacksmith Brunon.

1568.name: Brunon's Letter
1568.description: Blacksmith Brunon sends this letter to Warehouse Keeper Murdoc asking for the right box.

1569.name: Berry Tart
1569.description: Sweet strawberry-flavored tart. Warehouse Keeper Murdoc sends this to Warehouse Keeper Airy as a present of apology.

1570.name: Bat Diagram
1570.description: This diagram shows the blade bat in details. Take this and go hunt blade bats to obtain the star diamond.

1571.name: Star Diamond
1571.description: Everyone is looking for this diamond. Take this to the real owner.

1572.name: Star Stone
1572.description: Mineral collected from the destroyed greystone golem. Collect 20 of these and take them to Gatekeeper Tamil.

1573.name: Star Stone
1573.description: Mineral obtained by defeated whinstone golems. Collect twenty and take them to Gatekeeper Wirphy.

1574.name: Mirien's Review
1574.description: Letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas' dish. Take this and go to Jonas.

1575.name: Mirien's Review
1575.description: Letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas' dish. Take this to Jonas.

1576.name: Mirien's Review
1576.description: Letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas' dish. Take this to Jonas.

1577.name: Mirien's Review
1577.description: Letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas' dish. Take this to Jonas.

1578.name: Green Blood
1578.description: Goblin's blood. If you have enough of this item, the Kuruka ratman leader appears.

1579.name: Goblin Dwelling Map
1579.description: Map showing goblins' dwelling. Take this and find the goblin tribes and destroy them.

1580.name: Kuruka Ratman Tooth
1580.description: Tooth obtained after killing Kuruka ratman leader. Collect ten of these to take to Prefect Karukia.

1581.name: Betrayer's Report
1581.description: Detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

1582.name: Betrayer's Report
1582.description: Detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

1583.name: Betrayer's Report
1583.description: Detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

1584.name: Betrayer's Report
1584.description: Detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

1585.name: Betrayer's Report
1585.description: Detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

1586.name: Betrayer's Report
1586.description: Detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

1587.name: Betrayer's Report
1587.description: Detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

1588.name: Betrayer's Report
1588.description: Detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

1589.name: Betrayer's Report
1589.description: Detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

1590.name: Betrayer's Report
1590.description: Detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

1591.name: Head of Betrayer
1591.description: The head of a traitor orc. Collect 2 and take them to Prefect Kasman in Gludin Village.

1592.name: Badge of Raider
1592.description: Necklace given to an Orc who has earned the qualification to become an Orc Raider. Take this to the high prefect to change your occupation to an Orc Raider.

1593.name: Pomegranate
1593.description: Red pomegranate fruit given by Gantaki. Take this and go to Khavatari Rosheek.

1594.name: 1st Leather Pouch
1594.description: Leather pouch given by Khavatari Rosheek. Take this and hunt kasha bears and collect 5 of their claws.

1595.name: 2nd Leather Pouch
1595.description: Leather pouch given by Khavatari Rosheek. Hunt kasha blade spiders with this and collect 5 talons.

1596.name: 3rd Leather Pouch
1596.description: Leather pouch Khavatari Rosheek gave you. Take this while hunting scarlet salamanders to obtain 5 of their scales.

1597.name: 1st Leather Pouch (Full)
1597.description: Pouch that contains 5 kasha bear claws. Take this to Khavatari Rosheek.

1598.name: 2nd Leather Pouch (Full)
1598.description: Pouch that contains 5 pincers of kasha blade spider talon. Take this to Khavatari Rosheek.

1599.name: 3rd Leather Pouch (Full)
1599.description: Pouch that contains 5 scales from the scarlet salamander. Take this to Khavatari Rosheek.

1600.name: Kasha Bear Claw
1600.description: Claw pulled out from a kasha bear after killing it. Collect 5 of these.

1601.name: Kasha Blade Spider Talon
1601.description: Talon pulled out from a kasha blade spider after killing it. Collect 5 of these.

1602.name: Scarlet Salamander Scale
1602.description: Scale of a scarlet salamander. Collect 5 of these.

1603.name: Fiery Spirit Scroll
1603.description: The first scroll containing secret of kabart, the Orcs' traditional martial arts.

1604.name: Rosheek's Letter
1604.description: Letter written by Khavatari Rosheek. Take this to Gantaki Zu Urutu.

1605.name: Gantaki's Letter of Recommendation
1605.description: Gantaki's letter of recommendation. Receive the help of Gatekeeper Tamil and take this recommendation to Prefect Kasman in the Village of Gludin.

1606.name: Fig
1606.description: Fig given by Prefect Kasman. Take this to Khavatari Toruku.

1607.name: 4th Leather Pouch
1607.description: Leather pouch given by Khavatari Toruku. Take this, kill fighters of various races and collect 12 tokens.

1608.name: 4th Leather Pouch (Full)
1608.description: Full pouch of 12 tokens after killing fighters of various races. Take this to Khavatari Toruku.

1609.name: Vuku Orc Tusk
1609.description: Tusk obtained after killing a vuku Orc. Gather 3 of these.

1610.name: Ratman Fang
1610.description: Fang from a dead ratman fighter. Gather 3 of these.

1611.name: Langk Lizardman Tooth
1611.description: Tooth obtained after killing a Langk lizardman. Gather 3 of these.

1612.name: Felim Lizardman Tooth
1612.description: Tooth obtained after killing the Felim lizardman. Gather 3 of these.

1613.name: Iron Will Scroll
1613.description: The second scroll that contains secret of the Orcs' traditional martial arts, Kabart.

1614.name: Toruku's Letter
1614.description: Letter from Khavatari Toruku. Take this to Prefect Kasman.

1615.name: Khavatari Totem
1615.description: Token given to one who has qualifications to change occupations to Orc Monk. Take this to the high prefect to change your occupation to an Orc Monk.

1616.name: Fire Charm
1616.description: Charm with inscription of fire mantra. Take this and find the 3 items that Tataru spoke of.

1617.name: Kasha Bear Pelt
1617.description: Pelt of kasha bear. Take to Tataru along with kasha bladespider husk and fiery egg.

1618.name: Kasha Blade Spider Husk
1618.description: The husk of a kasha blade spider. Take it to Tataru, along with a kasha bear pelt and a fiery egg.

1619.name: 1st Fiery Egg
1619.description: Spirit egg obtained from a scarlet salamander. Take it to Tataru along with a kasha bear pelt and a kasha bladespider husk.

1620.name: Hestui Mask
1620.description: Mask in shape of bear. Take this and go to Hestui totem spirit.

1621.name: 2nd Fiery Egg
1621.description: Spirit egg received from a scarlet salamander. Take this to the Hestui totem spirit.

1622.name: Totem Spirit Claw
1622.description: Claw received from Hestui totem spirit. Take this and go to Tataru.

1623.name: Tataru's Letter of Recommendation
1623.description: Letter written by Tataru. Take this to Seer Umos in the town of Gludin.

1624.name: Flame Charm
1624.description: Charm with inscription of flame mantra. Take this and gather grizzly blood and take to Seer Umos.

1625.name: Grizzly Blood
1625.description: Glass bottle filled with grizzly blood. Gather 3 and take to Seer Umos.

1626.name: Blood Cauldron
1626.description: Cauldron filled with grizzly blood. Take this to the Duda-Mara totem spirit.

1627.name: Spirit Net
1627.description: Net made with Spirit's Spider Silk. Use this to capture Durka Spirit hidden inside Venomous Spiders.

1628.name: Durka Spirit
1628.description: Durka spirit bound inside Spirit Net. Take this to the Duda-Mara totem spirit.

1629.name: Durka Parasite
1629.description: Evil parasite spirit that comes out from spiders contaminated with the evil durka spirit. It is the key for calling upon the evil durka spirit.

1630.name: Totem Spirit Blood
1630.description: Blood spilt by the Duda-Mara totem spirit. Take this and go to Seer Umos.

1631.name: Mask of Medium
1631.description: Token that shows one Has the qualifications to become an Orc Shaman. Take this to the high prefect, to change your occupation to an Orc Shaman.

1632.name: Silvera's Ring
1632.description: Ring given to artisan aspirants by Blacksmith Silvera. Strike down the boogle ratman gang and collect their front teeth.

1633.name: 1st Pass Certificate
1633.description: The certificate for passing the 1st artisan test. To take the next test, you must go to Blacksmith Kluto of the village Gludin.

1634.name: 2nd Pass Certificate
1634.description: The certificate for passing the 2nd artisan test. Take this and go to Blacksmith Kluto in Gludin.

1635.name: Final Pass Certificate
1635.description: The certificate for passing the final Artisan test. Take this to the head blacksmith to change occupations to an Artisan.

1636.name: Boogle Ratman Tooth
1636.description: The ugly front bucktooth of a boogle ratman. Just looking at it will make you nauseous. Collect 10 of these and take them to Blacksmith Silvera.

1637.name: Boogle Ratman Leader's Tooth
1637.description: The boogle ratman leader's big tooth. Before its stink makes you pass out, collect 2 of them and take them to Blacksmith Silvera.

1638.name: Kluto's Letter
1638.description: Blacksmith Kluto's letter. Take to Blacksmith Pinter in the Town of Gludio.

1639.name: Footprint of Thief
1639.description: Trace left by thieves. Kill Vuku Orc fighters, recover stolen items and take them to Blacksmith Pinter.

1640.name: Stolen Secret Box
1640.description: Secret box stolen by Vuku orc fighters. The contents of the box are unknown, but anyway, take it to Blacksmith Pinter.

1641.name: Secret Box
1641.description: Secret box received from Pinter. The contents are unknown, but do not worry and take it to Blacksmith Kluto in the Village of Gludin.

1642.name: Ring of Raven
1642.description: Mark certifying that one Has earned the right to become a Scavenger. If you take it to a Warehouse Chief, you can transfer your class to Scavenger.

1643.name: Pippi's Letter of Recommendation
1643.description: Letter of introduction written by Collector Pipi. Take this to Trader Mion.

1644.name: Raut's Scroll of Escape
1644.description: Order sheet given by Warehouse Freightman Raut. Give it to Torai, in the south of Death Pass.

1645.name: Succubus Undies
1645.description: The underwear of Succubus received from Torai. Take this to Warehouse Freightman Raut of Gludin.

1646.name: Mion's Letter
1646.description: Letter sent from Trader Mion to her brother. Take this letter and go to Master Toma.

1647.name: Bronk's Ingot
1647.description: Ingot to be given to Chief Blacksmith Bronk.

1648.name: Shari's Axe
1648.description: Axe to be given to Trader Shari.

1649.name: Zimenf's Potion
1649.description: Potion to give to Priest of the Earth Zimenf.

1650.name: Bronk's Pay
1650.description: Product cost given by Chief Blacksmith Bronk. Take this to Trader Mion.

1651.name: Shari's Pay
1651.description: Product cost given by Shari. Take this to Trader Mion.

1652.name: Zimenf's Pay
1652.description: Product cost given by Zimenf. Take this to Trader Mion.

1653.name: Teddy Bear Picture
1653.description: Picture of a bear received by Master Toma. Take this to hunt hunter bears, then the honey bear will appear.

1654.name: Tarantula Picture
1654.description: Picture of spider received by Master Toma. Use this to hunt tarantulas.

1655.name: Honey Jar
1655.description: Honey jar taken from a honey bear. Collect 5 and take them to Master Toma.

1656.name: Bead
1656.description: Bead obtained from tarantula. Gather 20 of these and give to Master Toma.

1657.name: Bead Parcel
1657.description: Parcel made of beads. Give this to Warehouse Freightman Raut of Gludin.

1658.name: Gatekeeper Charm
1658.description: Used to teleport from the Orc Village to Gludin.

1659.name: Gatekeeper Token
1659.description: Used to teleport from the Dwarven Village to Gludin.

1660.name: Cursed Maingauche
1660.description: Cursed Maingauche. P. Atk. is low, but it can inflict Bleeding after Critical Attack with a certain probability.

1665.name: World Map
1665.description: Ancient, obsolete map. Can be purchased at any shop.

1666.name: Recipe: Wooden Arrow
1666.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for a Wooden Arrow. Requires Create Item Lv. 1. The success rate is 100%.

1667.name: Spellbook: Summon Shadow
1667.description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Shadow. Used by Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 20

1668.name: Spellbook: Summon Mew the Cat
1668.description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Mew the Cat. Used by Human Wizards.\nRequired level: 20

1669.name: Spellbook: Summon Boxer the Unicorn
1669.description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Boxer the Unicorn. Used by Elven Wizards.\nRequired level: 20

1670.name: Spellbook: Summon Mirage the Unicorn
1670.description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Mirage the Unicorn. Used by Elven Wizards.\nRequired level: 20

1671.name: Spellbook: Summon Silhouette
1671.description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Silhouette. Used by Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 20

1785.name: Soulstone
1785.description: Material used to make Dwarven items. Can be sold in any shop.

1786.name: Recipe: Broadsword
1786.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for a Broadsword. Requires Create Item - Skill Lv. 1. The success rate is 100%.

1804.name: Recipe: Soulshot (D-grade)
1804.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for a soulshot-D-grade . Requires Create Item - Skill Lv. 2. The success rate is 100%.

1805.name: Recipe: Soulshot (C-grade)
1805.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for a soulshot-C-grade . Requires Create Item - Skill Lv. 4. The success rate is 100%.

1806.name: Recipe: Soulshot (B-grade)
1806.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for a soulshot-B-grade. Requires Create Item - Skill Lv. 6. The success rate is 100%.

1807.name: Recipe: Soulshot (A-grade)
1807.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for a soulshot-A-grade . Requires Create Item - Skill Lv. 7. The success rate is 100%.

1808.name: Recipe: Soulshot (S-grade)
1808.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for a Soulshot (S-grade). Create Item skill must be level 8. The success rate is 100%.

1814.name: Recipe: Leather
1814.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for Leather. Requires Create Item - Skill Lv. 1. The success rate is 100%.

1817.name: Recipe: Cord
1817.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for Cord. Requires Create Item - Skill Lv. 2. The success rate is 100%.

1825.name: Recipe: Oriharukon
1825.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for Oriharukon. Requires Create Item - Skill Lv. 4. The success rate is 100%.

1829.name: Scroll of Escape: Clan Hall
1829.description: Scroll that relocates you to your clan hall. If you don't have a clan hall, it will relocate you to the nearest village.

1830.name: Scroll of Escape: Castle
1830.description: Scroll that relocates you to your castle. If you don't have a castle, it will relocate you to the nearest village.

1832.name: Greater Antidote
1832.description: High-quality reagent that neutralizes powerful Poison .

1833.name: Bandage
1833.description: Medical bandage that stops Bleeding when injured.

1834.name: Emergency Dressing
1834.description: Medical bandage that stops Bleeding fast when severely injured.

1835.name: Soulshot (No-grade)
1835.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a No-grade weapon.

1836.name: Kendell's 1st Order
1836.description: Punish Kaboo Chief Uoph. He should be somewhere around the ruins over the hill, west of the Elven Village.

1837.name: Kendell's 2nd Order
1837.description: Punish Kaboo Chief Kracha. He should be somewhere around the Nine obelisk, southwest of the Elven Village.

1838.name: Kendell's 3rd Order
1838.description: Punish Kaboo Chief Batoh. He should be somewhere around the entrance of the underground fortress of the Elves.

1839.name: Kendell's 4th Order
1839.description: Punish Kaboo Chief Tanukia. He should be somewhere around the open-air theatre ruins, southwest of the Elven Village.

1840.name: Kendell's 5th Order
1840.description: Punish Kaboo Chief Turel. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, northwest of Lake Iris.

1841.name: Kendell's 6th Order
1841.description: Punish Kaboo Chief Roko. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, west of Lake Iris.

1842.name: Kendell's 7th Order
1842.description: Punish Kaboo Chief Kamut. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, south of Lake Iris.

1843.name: Kendell's 8th Order
1843.description: Punish Kaboo Chief Murtika. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, east of Lake Iris.

1844.name: Kaboo Chief's 1st Torque
1844.description: Necklace taken by killing the chief of Kaboo orcs. Take this to Sentinel Kendell.

1845.name: Kaboo Chief's 2nd Torque
1845.description: Necklace taken by killing the chief of Kaboo orcs. Take this to Sentinel Kendell.

1846.name: Turek Dog Tag
1846.description: Military identification necklace of Turek orc fighters. Collect these and take them to Piotur for a reward.

1847.name: Turek Medallion
1847.description: Military identification necklace of Turek orc officers. Collect these and take them to Piotur for a reward.

1848.name: Clay Urn Fragment
1848.description: Relic of the Elmoreden empire. Piece of a broken clay urn.

1849.name: Brass Trinket Piece
1849.description: Relic of the Elmoreden empire. Part of a brass trinket.

1850.name: Bronze Mirror Piece
1850.description: Relic of the Elmoreden empire. Part of a bronze mirror.

1851.name: Jade Necklace Bead
1851.description: Relic of the Elmoreden empire. Part of a jade necklace.

1852.name: Ancient Clay Urn
1852.description: Clay urn of the Elmoreden empire. Can be sold at a store.

1853.name: Ancient Brass Tiara
1853.description: Relic of the Elmoreden empire. Formal brass tiara. Can be sold at a store.

1854.name: Ancient Bronze Mirror
1854.description: Relic of the Elmoreden empire. Bronze mirror. Can be sold at a store.

1855.name: Ancient Jade Necklace
1855.description: Relic of the Elmoreden empire. Jade necklace. Can be sold at a store.

1856.name: Amulet: Chant of Life
1856.description: Amulet required for the Chant of Life spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 20

1857.name: Keltir Fang
1857.description: Fang taken by killing keltirs. Collect 4 and take them to any of the Masters.

1858.name: Keltir Fang
1858.description: Fang taken by killing keltirs. Collect 4 and take them to any of the Magisters.

1859.name: Keltir Fang
1859.description: Fang taken by killing keltirs. Collect 4 and take them to any Mother Tree Guardian.

1860.name: Keltir Fang
1860.description: Fang taken by killing keltirs. Collect 4 and take them to any Abyssal Celebrant.

1861.name: Keltir Fang
1861.description: Fang taken by killing keltirs. Collect 4 and take them to the Priest of fire.

1862.name: Keltir Fang
1862.description: Fang taken by killing keltirs. Collect 4 and take them to the Miner.

1863.name: Map: Elmore
1863.description: Ancient, obsolete map. Can be purchased at any shop.
