2627.name: Mark of Challenger
2627.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Challenger. Item for occupational change.

2628.name: Letter of Kash
2628.description: Kash's introduction letter. Take this letter to Martien in Town of Giran.

2629.name: Watcher's 1st Eye
2629.description: Item obtained from the monster, Gorr. Take this to Martien in Town of Giran.

2630.name: Watcher's 2nd Eye
2630.description: Item obtained from the monster Baraham. Show this to Raldo and...

2631.name: Scroll of Shyslassys
2631.description: Ancient scroll obtained by slaying Shyslassys. Take this to Kash in the Town of Dion.

2632.name: Broken Key
2632.description: Key obtained by slaying Shyslassys. This key is needed in order to open the Chest of Shyslassys.

2633.name: Mark of Duty
2633.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Trial of Duty. Item for occupational change.

2634.name: Letter of Dustin
2634.description: Letter given by Dustin. Deliver the letter to Grand Master Hannavalt in Town of Giran.

2635.name: Knight's Tear
2635.description: Obtained from the Spirit of Sir Herod. Take this to Sir Aaron Tanford who is waiting for you in a house near Ol Mahum Checkpoint, south of the Wastelands.

2636.name: Mirror of Orpic
2636.description: This is needed in order to speak with the Spirit Of Sir Talianus. Follow him to Execution Grounds and destroy the Hangman Tree.

2637.name: Tear of Confession
2637.description: Obtained from the Spirit Of Sir Talianus. Take this to Sir Kiel Nighthawk of the Dark Elf Guild in the Town of Dion.

2638.name: Report Piece
2638.description: Report Scrap obtained from killing a Lesser Ghoul or a Lesser Strain in the Execution Grounds. Collect 10 pieces to get the full Report of Sir Talianus.

2639.name: Talianus' Report
2639.description: The completed report. After speaking with Sir Kiel Nighthawk of the Dark Elf Guild in the Town of Dion, deliver the report to the Spirit Of Sir Talianus.

2640.name: Tear of Loyalty
2640.description: This item can be obtained from Isael Silvershadow in Hunters Village. Take it to Priest Dustin who can be found in the Temple of Einhasad in Giran.

2641.name: Militia's Article
2641.description: You can receive this item when you catch a Leto Lizardman on the Plains of the Lizardmen. Collect 20 of them and take them to Isael Silvershadow in Hunters Village.

2642.name: Saint's Ash Urn
2642.description: Object received from Priest Dustin of the Temple of Einhasad in Giran. Deliver this to Sir Windawood who are waiting for you near the Obelisk of Victory on Talking Island.

2643.name: Athebaldt's Skull
2643.description: Item from a Breka Orc Prefect obtained in Breka's Stronghold. Take it, along with ribs and shin, to Priest Dustin of the Temple of Einhasad in Giran.

2644.name: Athebaldt's Ribs
2644.description: Item from a Breka Orc Prefect obtained in Breka's Stronghold. Take it, along with skull and shin, to Priest Dustin of the Temple of Einhasad in Giran.

2645.name: Athebaldt's Shin
2645.description: Item from a Breka Orc Prefect obtained in Breka's Stronghold. Take it, along with ribs and skull, to Priest Dustin of the Temple of Einhasad in Giran.

2646.name: Letter of Windawood
2646.description: Letter received from Sir Windawood near the Obelisk of Victory on Talking Island. Show it to Priest Dustin of the Temple of Einhasad in Giran.

2647.name: Dufner's Letter
2647.description: Letter sent by Master Genwitter from the Warrior Guild of Giran to Master Terry in Dion.

2648.name: Terry's 1st Order
2648.description: Investigate the Neer Ghoul Berserkers of the Execution Grounds.

2649.name: Terry's 2nd Order
2649.description: Investigate the Neer Ghoul Berserkers of the Execution Grounds.

2650.name: Terry's Letter
2650.description: Letter sent by Master Terry of the Warrior Guild of Dion to Weapon Merchant Viktor of Hunters Village.

2651.name: Viktor's Letter
2651.description: Letter sent by Trader Viktor to Master Terry in the Town of Dion. The letter Has Terry's seal.

2652.name: Hawkeye's Letter
2652.description: Letter sent by Hawkeye to Trader Viktor of the Hunter's Village.

2653.name: Mysterious Spirit Ore
2653.description: Mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying Neer Crawler Berserkers on the Execution Grounds. Take this to Master Terry.

2654.name: Ol Mahum Spirit Ore
2654.description: Mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying the Ol Mahum Captain in Partisan's Hideaway. Take this to Master Terry of the Warrior Guild of Dion.

2655.name: Turek Spirit Ore
2655.description: Mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying the Turek Orc Prefect in Orc Barracks. Take this to Master Terry of the Warrior Guild of Dion.

2656.name: Ant Spirit Ore
2656.description: Mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying the Ant Captain in the Wastelands or the Ant Nest. Take this to Master Terry of the Warrior Guild of Dion.

2657.name: Turak Bugbear Spirit Ore
2657.description: Mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying the Turak Bugbear Warrior in the Gorgon Flower Garden. Take this to Master Terry of the Warrior Guild of Dion.

2658.name: Terry's Box
2658.description: Chest containing the mysterious Spirit Ore. Take this to Weapon Merchant Viktor of the Hunters Village.

2659.name: Viktor's Request
2659.description: Request issued by Trader Viktor. "Please kill Medusa in the Gorgon Flower Garden and gather 10 Medusa Scales."

2660.name: Medusa Scales
2660.description: Medusa Scales obtained from killing Medusa in the Gorgon Flower Garden. Collect 10 such scales and take them to Trader Viktor.

2661.name: Abyss Spirit Ore
2661.description: Strange Spirit Ore obtained from the bodies of mutant species. They seem to be related to Shilen, the goddess of death.

2662.name: Analysis Request
2662.description: Request letter sent to Magister Marina of the Ivory Tower from Weapon Merchant Viktor. The letter asks Marina to analyze the Abyss Spirit Ore.

2663.name: Marina's Letter
2663.description: Letter sent by Magister Marina to Blacksmith Brunon of the Dwarven Village.

2664.name: Experiment Tools
2664.description: ExperiMental tools crafted by Blacksmith Brunon. Deliver these to Magister Marina of the Ivory Tower.

2665.name: Analysis Result
2665.description: Document where Magister Marina Has organized the analyzed results of the Abyss Spirit Ore. Deliver this to Master Terry in the Town of Dion.

2666.name: Terry's 3rd Order
2666.description: Master Terry's orders. The orders give instructions to come back for the next task after reaching level 36.

2667.name: Host List
2667.description: List of the Spirit Ore hosts. "Marsh Stakato Drone in Cruma Marshlands, Breka Orc Prefect, in Breka's Stronghold, Ant Warrior Captain in the Ant Nest, Leto Lizardman Warrior on the Plains of the Lizardmen".

2668.name: Abyss Spirit Ore
2668.description: Spirit Ore retrieved from the body of a Marsh Stakato Drone in Cruma Marshlands. Take this to Master Terry of the Warrior Guild of Dion.

2669.name: Abyss Spirit Ore
2669.description: The Spirit Ore retrieved from the body of the Breka Orc Prefect in Breka's Stronghold. Take this to Master Terry of the Warrior Guild of Dion.

2670.name: Abyss Spirit Ore
2670.description: The Spirit Ore retrieved from the body of the Ant Warrior Captain in the Ant Nest. Take this to Master Terry of the Warrior Guild of Dion.

2671.name: Abyss Spirit Ore
2671.description: The Spirit Ore retrieved from the body of the Leto Lizardman Warrior on the Plains of the Lizardmen. Take this to Master Terry of the Warrior Guild of Dion.

2672.name: Terry's Report
2672.description: Report detailing information about the Spirit Ore incident. Take this to Master Dufner of the Warrior Guild of Giran.

2673.name: Mark of Seeker
2673.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Seeker. Occupation change related item.

2674.name: Mark of Scholar
2674.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Scholar. Occupation change related item.

2675.name: Mirien's 1st Badge
2675.description: A badge given by Magister Mirien from Dion while giving orders to complete High Priest Sylvain's request.

2676.name: Mirien's 2nd Badge
2676.description: A badge given by Magister Mirien from Dion while giving orders to complete Grand Magister Jurek's request.

2677.name: Mirien's 3rd Badge
2677.description: A badge given by Magister Mirien from Dion when giving orders to complete Elder Cronos' request.

2678.name: Mirien's Instruction
2678.description: Note that contains instructions of Magister Mirien from Dion. The note gives instructions to come back for the next task after reaching level 36.

2679.name: Maria's Letter
2679.description: Letter sent by Maria from the Grocery Shop to Captain Lucas in the Town of Dion.

2680.name: Maria's Letter
2680.description: Letter sent by Maria from the Grocery Shop of Dion. Take it to Astrologer Creta of the village of Floran.

2681.name: Lucas' Letter
2681.description: Letter sent by Captain Lucas in the Town of Dion to Maria from the Grocery Shop of Dion.

2682.name: Lucilla's Handbag
2682.description: The handbag left by Lucilla, friend of Maria from the Grocery Shop of Dion, on the night of the theft. Take this to Astrologer Creta.

2683.name: Creta's 1st Letter
2683.description: Letter sent by the Astrologer Creta to Maria from the Grocery Shop in the Town of Dion.

2684.name: Creta's Painting 1
2684.description: Painting by Astrologer Creta. It contains a shadow presumed to be that of the thief. Take this to Maria from the Grocery Shop of Dion.

2685.name: Creta's Painting 2
2685.description: Painting by Astrologer Creta. It contains a shadow presumed to be that of the thief. Take this to Captain Lucas.

2686.name: Creta's Painting 3
2686.description: Painting painted by Astrologer Creta. The shadow in the painting is that of a Leto Lizardman warrior from the Plains of the Lizardmen.

2687.name: Brown Scroll Scrap
2687.description: Scrap of a scroll that contains directions on how to create the Crystal of purity. Gather 5 of these and take them to Maria from the Grocery Shop of Dion.

2688.name: Crystal of Purity
2688.description: Crystal used to purify the earth. Take this to High Priest Sylvain in the Town of Dion.

2689.name: High Priest's Badge
2689.description: A badge received from High Priest Sylvain. Proof given to those who are carrying out the orders of the High Priest.

2690.name: Grand Magister's Badge
2690.description: A badge received from Grand Magister Jurek. Proof given to those who are carrying out the orders of the Grand Magister.

2691.name: Crono's Badge
2691.description: A badge received from Elder Cronos. This signifies proof that someone is carrying out orders from Elder Cronos.

2692.name: Sylvain's Letter
2692.description: High Priest Sylvain's letter. Take this to Maria from the Grocery Shop in the Town of Dion.

2693.name: Mark of Sylvain
2693.description: Mark given to those who have passed High Priest Sylvain's test. Take this to Magister Mirien in the Town of Dion.

2694.name: Jurek's List
2694.description: The list of evil creatures that Grand Magister Jurek asked you to investigate. "Monster Eye Destroyer from the Plains of Dion, Breka Orc Shaman from Breka's Stronghold, Shackle from Ivory Tower Crater."

2695.name: Monster Eye Destroyer's Skin
2695.description: Skin of Monster Eye Destroyer from the Plains of Dion. Gather 5 of these and take them to Grand Magister Jurek of Town of Giran.

2696.name: Shaman's Necklace
2696.description: A Breka Orc Shaman's Necklace from Breka's Stronghold. Gather 5 of these and take them to Grand Magister Jurek in Town of Giran.

2697.name: Shackle's Scalp
2697.description: Skin of the Shackle's head from Ivory Tower Crater. Gather 2 of these and take them to Grand Magister Jurek of Town of Giran.

2698.name: Mark of Jurek
2698.description: Mark given to those who have passed Grand Magister Jurek's test. Take this to Magister Mirien in the Town of Dion.

2699.name: Cronos Letter
2699.description: Letter sent by Elder Cronos to Magister Dieter in the Town of Giran.

2700.name: Dieter's Key
2700.description: Key to the chest where Dieter Has hidden the Scriptures of Knowledge. Take this to Astrologer Creta in Floran Village.

2701.name: Creta's 2nd Letter
2701.description: Creta's letter describing the theft of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Take this to Magister Dieter in the Town of Giran.

2702.name: Dieter's Letter
2702.description: Letter from Magister Dieter to Trader Edroc of the weapons shop of Hunter's Village.

2703.name: Dieter's Diary
2703.description: Magister Dieter's Diary, given by him in hopes that it may be of aid in recovering the Scriptures of Knowledge.

2704.name: Raut's Letter Envelope
2704.description: Plain letter envelope with no contents. The envelope is addressed "To Warehouse Keeper Raut from Gludin".

2705.name: Triff's Ring
2705.description: Ring given by Drunkard Triff. Show this ring to those whom Triff Has entrusted with the Scriptures of Knowledge.

2706.name: Scripture Volume 1
2706.description: The 1st book of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books.

2707.name: Scripture Volume 2
2707.description: The 2nd book of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books.

2708.name: Scripture Volume 3
2708.description: The 3rd book of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books.

2709.name: Scripture Volume 4
2709.description: The 4th book of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books.

2710.name: Valkon's Request
2710.description: Request of Warehouse Keeper Valkon from Giran. The instructions are to bring back the Crystal of Purity.

2711.name: Poitan's Notes
2711.description: Blacksmith Poitan's accounting books. Take this to Elder Casian of the Wastelands.

2712.name: Scriptures of Knowledge
2712.description: Scripture edited by Elder Cronos. It is said to contain a vast knowledge of the past. It is part of a 4-scripture set.

2713.name: Strong Liquor
2713.description: As its name indicates, a strong liquor. Take this to Drunkard Triff at the harbor.

2714.name: Crystal of Purity
2714.description: Item that Warehouse Keeper Valkon in Town of Giran agreed to trade with you for scripture chapter 2.

2715.name: Casian's List
2715.description: 10 Ghoul's Skins, 12 bottles of Medusa's Blood, 5 units of Fettered Soul Fluids, and 5 Reinforced Gargoyle's Nails.

2716.name: Ghoul's Skin
2716.description: "10 Ghoul's Skins (Execution Grounds), 12 samples of Medusa's Blood (Gorgon Flower Garden), 5 samples of Fettered Soul Fluids (Death Pass), and 5 Reinforced Gargoyle's Nails (Ivory Tower Crater)."

2717.name: Medusa's Blood
2717.description: Medusa's Blood from the Gorgon Flower Garden. Gather 12 samples and take them to Elder Casian.

2718.name: Fettered Soul Fluids
2718.description: The ichor of a fettered soul from Death Pass. Gather 5 samples and take them to Elder Casian.

2719.name: Reinforced Gargoyle's Nail
2719.description: The enchanted nails of a gargoyle from Ivory Tower Crater. Gather 5 of these and take them to Elder Casian.

2720.name: Mark of Cronos
2720.description: The mark of Cronos, the top sage of the continent. Take this to Magister Mirien in the Town of Dion.

2721.name: Mark of Pilgrim
2721.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Pilgrim. Occupation change related item.

2722.name: Book of Sage
2722.description: Book received from Elder Casian. Take this book to Hermit Santiago in Orc Barracks.

2723.name: Mark of Trial
2723.description: Mark given by Hermit Santiago in Orc Barracks. Show this to Seer Tanapi of Orc Village.

2724.name: Heart of Flame
2724.description: Proof that you have an understanding of the Heart of Flame. In order to carry out the next stage of this trial, go see Gauri Twinklerock of Dwarven Village.

2725.name: Essence of Flame
2725.description: Jewel obtained from the lava salamander. Take this to the Ancestor Martankus.

2726.name: Book of Gerald
2726.description: Book given by Priest Gerald. The book looks very cheap.

2727.name: Grey Badge
2727.description: Badge given by Wanderer Dorf. Take this to Priest Primos at Town of Giran.

2728.name: Picture of Nahir
2728.description: Picture of the monster, Nahir. Defeat Nahir, who lurks in the depths of the Elven Ruins on Talking Island.

2729.name: Hair of Nahir
2729.description: The hair of the monster, Nahir. Take this to Priest Petron of Talking Island.

2730.name: Einhasad's Statue
2730.description: Einhasad's Statue given by Priest Petron. Take this to Andellia, who lives near the Mother Tree Glade in the Elven Village.

2731.name: Book of Darkness
2731.description: Book given by Uruha. The book contains unrecognizable letters written in blood.

2732.name: Debris of Willow
2732.description: Debris obtained from the black willow. Go and seek Uruha in the Neutral Zone while in possession of this.

2733.name: Tag of Rumor
2733.description: This contains rumors regarding Wanderer Dorf and Priest Gerald.

2734.name: Mark of Trust
2734.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Trust. Occupation change related item.

2735.name: Letter to Elf
2735.description: Letter requesting the trust of the Elves. Deliver it to Hierarch Asterios of the Elven Village.

2736.name: Letter to Dark Elf
2736.description: Letter requesting the trust of the Dark Elves. Deliver this to Tetrarch Thifiell of the Dark Elf Village.

2737.name: Letter to Dwarf
2737.description: Letter requesting the trust of the Dwarves. Deliver this to Lockirin at the Hall of Elders in the Dwarven Village.

2738.name: Letter to Orc
2738.description: Letter requesting the trust of the Orcs. Deliver it to the Pa'agrio Lord Kakai in the Orc Village.

2739.name: Letter to Seresin
2739.description: Letter given by High Priest Hollint of Oren. Deliver this to Cardinal Seresin at the Town of Oren.

2740.name: Scroll of Dark Elf Trust
2740.description: Scroll of Hierarch Thifiell. Deliver it, along with the scroll of the Elf trust, to High Priest Hollint of Oren.

2741.name: Scroll of Elf Trust
2741.description: Scroll Hierarch Asterios. Deliver it, along with the Scroll of Dark Elf Trust, to High Priest Hollint of Oren.

2742.name: Scroll of Dwarf Trust
2742.description: Scroll given by Lockirin of the Iron Gate. Deliver this, along with the Scroll of Orc Trust, to Cardinal Seresin at the Town of Oren.

2743.name: Scroll of Orc Trust
2743.description: Scroll given by Kakai, Lord of Flame. Deliver this, along with the Scroll of Dwarf Trust, to Cardinal Seresin at the Town of Oren.

2744.name: Hollint's Recommendation
2744.description: Deliver this to High Priest Biotin at the Temple of Einhasad on Talking Island.

2745.name: Order of Asterios
2745.description: "Slay Luell of Zephyr Winds and Actea of Verdant Wilds and bring back proof of their deaths. Luelle of the Zephyr Winds can be found to the south of the Elven Forest when hunting Lirein, Lirein Turen. Actea of Verdant Wilds can be found to the south of the Elven Forest when hunting Dryad, Dryad Elder."

2746.name: Breath of Winds
2746.description: Obtained from the body of Luelle of the Zephyr Winds. Deliver it, along with the Seed of Verdure, to Hierarch Asterios at the Elven Village.

2747.name: Seed of Verdure
2747.description: Obtained from the body of Actea of the Verdant Wilds. Deliver it, along with the Breath of Winds, to Hierarch Asterios at the Elven Village.

2748.name: Thifiell's Letter
2748.description: Give that to Clayton, Magister of the Dark Elf Guild in the Town of Dion.

2749.name: Guardian Basilisk Blood
2749.description: Blood taken from a Guardian Basilisk in Death Pass. Collect 5 samples to produce Basilisk Plasma.

2750.name: Giant Aphid
2750.description: Acquired from various Ant Soldiers in the Ant Nest. Collect 5 to create Honey Dew.

2751.name: Stakatos Fluids
2751.description: Fluid acquired from various Marsh Stakatos in Cruma Marshlands. Collect 5 to produce Stakato Ichor.

2752.name: Basilisk Plasma
2752.description: Give that, along with Honey Dew and Stakato Ichor, to Clayton, Magister of the Dark Elf Guild in the Town of Dion.

2753.name: Honey Dew
2753.description: Give that, along with Basilisk Plasma and Stakato Ichor, to Clayton, Magister of the Dark Elf Guild in the Town of Dion.

2754.name: Stakato Ichor
2754.description: Give that, along with Honey Dew and Basilisk Plasma, to Clayton, Magister of the Dark Elf Guild in the Town of Dion.

2755.name: Order of Clayton
2755.description: Obtain Basilisk Plasma from a Guardian Basilisk in Death Pass, Stakato Ichor from a Marsh Stakato in Cruma Marshlands, Honey Dew from an Ant Guard in the Ant Nest and take them all to Clayton, Magister of the Dark Elf Guild in the Town of Dion.

2756.name: Parasite of Lota
2756.description: This may be obtained from the Windsus. Gather 10 of these and take them to Priest Manakia of the Orc Guild in Giran.

2757.name: Letter to Manakia
2757.description: Letter received from Pa'agrio Lord Kakai. Deliver it to Priest Manakia of the Orc Guild in the Town of Giran.

2758.name: Manakia's Letter
2758.description: Letter received from Priest Manakia of the Orc Guild of the Town of Giran. Deliver it to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai.

2759.name: Letter to Nikola
2759.description: Letter received from Lockirin of the Iron Gate. Deliver this to Maestro Nikola. You can find him near Cruma Tower.

2760.name: Order of Nikola
2760.description: Slay Porta in Cruma Tower, obtain the Heartstone of Porta and take it to Maestro Nikola. You can find him near Cruma Tower.

2761.name: Heartstone of Porta
2761.description: Heartstone acquired from Porta. Bring it to Maestro Nikola. You can find him near Cruma Tower.

2762.name: Mark of Duelist
2762.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Duelist. Item for occupational change.

2763.name: Order Gludio
2763.description: Kill at least 10 Punchers in the Wastelands on Gludio Territory and 10 Noble Ant Captains in the Ant Nest.

2764.name: Order Dion
2764.description: Kill at least 10 Marsh Stakato Drones in Cruma Marshlands on Dion Territory and 10 Corpse Trackers on the Execution Grounds.

2765.name: Order Giran
2765.description: Kill at least 10 Breka Orc Prefects in Breka's Stronghold on Dion Territory and 10 Fettered Souls in Death Pass.

2766.name: Order Oren
2766.description: Kill at least 10 Leto Lizardman Overlords on the Plains of the Lizardmen on Oren Territory and 10 Reinforced Monster Eyes in Ivory Tower Crater.

2767.name: Order Aden
2767.description: "Kill at least 10 Tamlin Orcs and 10 Tamlin Orc Archers at Hunters Valley in Aden Territory."

2768.name: Puncher's Shard
2768.description: Shard of the broken Puncher. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien of the Warrior Guild of Oren.

2769.name: Noble Ant's Feeler
2769.description: Noble Ant's Feelers. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien of the Warrior Guild of Oren.

2770.name: Drone's Chitin
2770.description: Drone's Chitin of the Marsh Stakato. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien of the Warrior Guild of Oren.

2771.name: Corpse Tracker Fang
2771.description: Corpse Tracker Fang. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien of the Warrior Guild of Oren.

2772.name: Overlord's Necklace
2772.description: Breka Orc Prefect's Necklace. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien of the Warrior Guild of Oren.

2773.name: Fettered Soul's Chain
2773.description: The chains that surround a Fettered Soul's body. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien of the Warrior Guild of Oren.

2774.name: Chief's Amulet
2774.description: Collect 10 Amulets of Leto Lizardman Overlord on the Plains of the Lizardmen and take them to Duelist Kaien of the Warrior Guild of Oren.

2775.name: Reinforced Monster Eye Meat
2775.description: Reinforced Monster Eye Meat. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien of the Warrior Guild of Oren.

2776.name: Tamlin Orc's Ring
2776.description: Tamlin Orc's Ring. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien of the Warrior Guild of Oren.

2777.name: Tamlin Orc's Arrow
2777.description: Tamlin Orc's Arrow. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien of the Warrior Guild of Oren.

2778.name: Final Order
2778.description: Defeat the Excuro and Krator of the Cruma Tower, the Grandis of Giran, the Timak Orc Overlord of Oren, and the Lakin of Aden 3 times.

2779.name: Excuro's Skin
2779.description: Excuro's Skin. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien of the Warrior Guild of Oren.

2780.name: Krator's Shard
2780.description: Krator's Shard. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien of the Warrior Guild of Oren.

2781.name: Grandis' Skin
2781.description: Grandis' Skin. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien of the Warrior Guild of Oren.

2782.name: Timak Orc's Belt
2782.description: The Belt of a Timak Orc Prefect. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien of the Warrior Guild of Oren.

2783.name: Lakin's Mace
2783.description: Lakin's Mace. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien of the Warrior Guild of Oren.

2784.name: Luther's Letter
2784.description: Letter given by Master Luther. Take this to Alex of the village of Floran.

2785.name: Alex's Warrant
2785.description: Warrant written by Alex. Take this to Leirynn who can be found near the fishing spot of Floran Village.

2786.name: Leirynn's Order
2786.description: List of orders given by Leirynn. "Slay 10 Delu Lizardmen Shamans on the outskirts of Floran Village and bring back their tokens."

2787.name: Delu Totem
2787.description: The totem of the Delu Lizardmen Shaman. Take this, along with the rest of totems, to Leirynn who can be found near the fishing spot of Floran Village.

2788.name: Leirynn's Order
2788.description: List of orders given by Leirynn. Slay Delu Chief Kalkis at the west of Floran Village and bring back proof.

2789.name: Chief Kalki's Fang
2789.description: Proof that the Delu chief Kalkis Has been slain. Take this to Leirynn who can be found near the fishing spot of Floran Village.

2790.name: Leirynn's Report
2790.description: Report issued by Militiaman Leirynn. Take this to Captain Alex in Floran Village.

2791.name: Strange Map
2791.description: Strange map obtained from the Delu chief Kalkis.

2792.name: Lambert's Map
2792.description: Map where the name of Lambert, the former lord's guard, is written.

2793.name: Alex's Letter
2793.description: Letter given by Alex. Take this and go to drunkard Borys at the Town of Gludio.

2794.name: Alex's Order
2794.description: Alex's orders. The orders give instructions to find and recover Duke Ashton's missing gold.

2795.name: Wine Catalog
2795.description: List of premium wine published by the Giran Traders' Guild. Show this to Grocer Tyra who can be found on the outskirts of the Spider Nest to the west from Dark Elven Altar of Rites.

2796.name: Tyra's Contract
2796.description: The contract that Trader Tyra Has drawn up. The contract states that Tyra will trade 10 pouches of Red Spore Dust for a Malrukian wine.

2797.name: Red Spore Dust
2797.description: Red spore dust obtained by slaying the Giant Fungus. Collect 10 of these and take them to Grocer Tyra who can be found on the outskirts of the Spider Nest to the west from Dark Elven Altar of Rites.

2798.name: Malrukian Wine
2798.description: Premium wine crafted following the methods of the Maluk tribe. Take this to Drunkard Borys near the blacksmith' shop in the Town of Gludio.

2799.name: Old Order
2799.description: Old order received from Drunkard Borys. Take this and go to Escort Jax at the south of the Wastelands.

2800.name: Jax' Diary
2800.description: Diary that bodyguard Jax Has given, saying that it will aid in the search for Solt's and Makel's maps.

2801.name: 1st Torn Map Piece
2801.description: Piece of the map that belonged to the former lord's guard Solt. Gather 4 of these.

2802.name: 2nd Torn Map Piece
2802.description: Piece of the map that belonged to the former lord's guard Makel. Gather 4 of these.

2803.name: Solt's Map
2803.description: Map where the name of the former lord's guard Solt is written.

2804.name: Makel's Map
2804.description: Map where the name of the former lord's guard Makel is written.

2805.name: Combined Map
2805.description: Using the map (alt-m), find the hiding place of the lord's gold bar.

2806.name: Rusted Key
2806.description: Rusty copper key discovered while digging under the tree indicated on the map.

2807.name: Gold Bar
2807.description: Gold bar engraved with Duke Ashton's seal. Take this to Alex.

2808.name: Alex's Recommend
2808.description: Recommendation written by Captain Alex. Take this to Master Luther of the Warrior Guild of Hunters Village.

2809.name: Mark of Searcher
2809.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Searcher. Occupation change related item.

2810.name: Report of Perrin
2810.description: Take this report and go seek Perrin in Gludin Harbor.

2811.name: Kristina's Letter
2811.description: Letter given by Saint Kristina. Deliver this to Master Sorius of the Warrior Guild of Gludio.

2812.name: Picture of Windy
2812.description: Picture of Windy. Take this drawing to Windy.

2813.name: Golden Statue
2813.description: The reward given by the head of the orphanage. Something good happens if this is in possession?

2814.name: Windy's Pebbles
2814.description: Pebble that Windy Has picked up from the Wastelands. Take this to Gupu, the head of the orphanage near Gludio.

2815.name: Order of Sorius
2815.description: Take these orders and show them to Daurin, who is located west of the Orc Barracks.

2816.name: First Secret Letter
2816.description: The documents of Leto Lizardmen from the Plains of the Lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina.

2817.name: Second Secret Letter
2817.description: The documents of Leto Lizardmen from the Plains of the Lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina.

2818.name: Third Secret Letter
2818.description: The documents of Leto Lizardmen from the Plains of the Lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina.

2819.name: Fourth Secret Letter
2819.description: The documents of Leto Lizardmen from the Plains of the Lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina.

2820.name: Mark of Healer
2820.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Healer. Occupation change related item.

2821.name: Mark of Reformer
2821.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Reformer. Occupation change related item.

2822.name: Book of Reform
2822.description: Book received from Priestess Pupina. Go to the Execution Grounds and slay the nameless undeads with the power of light.

2823.name: Letter of Introduction
2823.description: Letter introducing Priestess Pupina. Take this and meet with to Prophet Sla of the Wastelands.

2824.name: Sla's Letter
2824.description: Letter given by Sla. Take this to Katari, who is near the waterfalls of the Neutral Zone.

2825.name: Letter of Greetings
2825.description: Letter sent by Sla to her disciples. Go to the Orc Village, Dwarven Village, and Talking Island in this order.

2826.name: Ol Mahum's Money
2826.description: Ol Mahum currency given by the themselves as a reward. For what...? Nobody knows.

2827.name: Katari's Letter
2827.description: Katari's reply letter to Sla. Collect 3 reply letters from Sla's disciples and deliver them to Prophet Sla at the Plains of Dion.

2828.name: Nyakuri's Letter
2828.description: Nyakuri's letter to Sla. Collect three reply letters from Sla's disciples and deliver them to Prophet Sla at the Plains of Dion.

2829.name: Undead List
2829.description: Slay Skeleton Archer, Skeleton Lord, Skeleton Marksman, Misery Skeleton, and Silent Horror at the Elven Ruins and collect their Bone Fragments.

2830.name: Ramus' Letter
2830.description: Reply letter sent by Ramus to Sla. Deliver this to Sla after meeting all of Sla's disciples.

2831.name: Ripped Diary
2831.description: Diaries containing the final words of young women unfairly killed during the witch hunts of Duke Byron Ashton. Collect 7 of them.

2832.name: Huge Nail
2832.description: The large nail that was embedded in Aruraune's skull. Take this to Priestess Pupina at Town of Giran.

2833.name: Letter of Betrayer
2833.description: Letter given by an Ol Mahum Betrayer. Take it to Katari in the swamp area of the Dark Forest.

2834.name: Silent Horror's Bone Fragment
2834.description: Silent Horror's Bone Fragment. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus who can be found on the southern side of Talking Island's Elven Ruins.

2835.name: Skeleton Lord's Bone Fragment
2835.description: Skeleton Lord's Bone Fragment. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus who can be found on the southern side of Talking Island's Elven Ruins.

2836.name: Skeleton Marksman's Bone Fragment
2836.description: Skeleton Marksman's Bone Fragment. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus who can be found on the southern side of Talking Island's Elven Ruins.

2837.name: Misery Skeleton's Bone Fragment
2837.description: Misery Skeleton's Bone Fragment. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus who can be found on the southern side of Talking Island's Elven Ruins.

2838.name: Skeleton Archer's Bone Fragment
2838.description: Skeleton Archer's Bone Fragment. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus who can be found on the southern side of Talking Island's Elven Ruins.

2839.name: Bone Fragment
2839.description: Bone fragment of a skeleton. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus.

2840.name: Mark of Magus
2840.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Magus. Item for occupational change.

2841.name: Rukal's Letter
2841.description: Letter sent by Bard Rukal to Parina of the Temple of Einhasad in Dion.

2842.name: Parina's Letter
2842.description: Letter sent by Parina to Elder Casian. The letter makes inquiries regarding the singing flower.

2843.name: Lilac Charm
2843.description: Protection charm created by Elder Casian. Take this and seek out the 3 types of singing flowers.

2844.name: 1st Golden Seed
2844.description: The seed of the singing flower, which absorbs blood in order to bloom. Gather 3 of these and take them to Bard Rukal at the Temple of Einhasad in Dion.

2845.name: 2nd Golden Seed
2845.description: The seed of the singing flower, which absorbs blood in order to bloom. Gather 3 of these and take them to Bard Rukal at the Temple of Einhasad in Dion.

2846.name: 3rd Golden Seed
2846.description: The seed of the singing flower, which absorbs blood in order to bloom. Gather 3 of these and take them to Bard Rukal at the Temple of Einhasad in Dion.

2847.name: Score of Elements
2847.description: Music score sheet given by Bard Rukal at the Temple of Einhasad in Dion. Take this and find the Elemental tones.

2848.name: Dazzling Drop
2848.description: Dazzling, tear-shaped jewel. Gather 20 of these and take them to the Water Undine on the outskirts of Fellmere Lake.

2849.name: Flame Crystal
2849.description: Crystal obtained from the ghost fire. Gather 5 of these and take them to the Flame Salamander who can be found at the southern part of the Ruins of Despair

2850.name: Harpy's Feather
2850.description: The Feather of a slain Harpy. Gather 20 of these and take them to the Wind Sylph who can be found at the southern exit from the Wastelands.

2851.name: Wyrm's Wingbone
2851.description: Wyrm's Wingbone obtained in the Gorgon Flower Garden. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Wind Sylph who can be found at the northern exit from the Wastelands.

2852.name: Windsus Mane
2852.description: The mane of a slain Windsus. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Wind Sylph who can be found at the northern exit from the Wastelands.

2853.name: Reinforced Monster Eye Shell
2853.description: The skin of a slain enchanted eye. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Earth Snake who can be found on the outskirts of the Ruins of Despair.

2854.name: Reinforced Stone Golem Powder
2854.description: Stone powder obtained after slaying a Reinforced Stone Golem. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Earth Snake who can be found on the outskirts of the Ruins of Despair.

2855.name: Reinforced Steel Golem Shard
2855.description: Fragment of a destroyed Reinforced Steel Golem. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Earth Snake who can be found on the outskirts of the Ruins of Despair.

2856.name: Tone of Water
2856.description: One of the notes that comprise the beautiful melody of the four elements. Take this to Bard Rukal at the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Dion.

2857.name: Tone of Fire
2857.description: One of the notes that comprise the beautiful melody of the four elements. Take this to Bard Rukal at the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Dion.

2858.name: Tone of Wind
2858.description: One of the notes that comprise the beautiful melody of the four elements. Take this to Bard Rukal at the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Dion.

2859.name: Tone of Earth
2859.description: One of the notes that comprise the beautiful melody of the four elements. Take this to Bard Rukal at the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Dion.

2860.name: Salamander Charm
2860.description: Charm of agreement given by the Flame Salamander. It promises to give the Tone of Fire in return for 5 Flame Crystals after you kill Ghost Fire in Ivory Tower Crater.

2861.name: Sylph Charm
2861.description: Charm of agreement given by the Wind Sylph. It promises to give the Tone of Wind if you slay Harpies and Wyrms in the Gorgon Flower Garden and collect 20 Harpy's Feathers and 10 Wyrm's Wingbones. As well as 10 Windsus Manes that can be obtained in Death Pass.

2862.name: Undine Charm
2862.description: Charm of agreement given by the Water Undine. It promises to give the Tone of Water in return for 20 Dazzling Drops if you slay Toad Lord and Stakato Drone in Cruma Marshlands and collect 20 Dazzling Drops.

2863.name: Snake Amulet
2863.description: Charm of agreement given by the Earth Snake. It promises to give the Tone of Earth in return for collecting the materials it needs by slaying Reinforced Stone Golem, Reinforced Steel Golem and Reinforced Monster Eye in Ivory Tower Crater.

2864.name: Recommendation of Balanki
2864.description: Recommendation given by Balanki. Gather all 3 recommendations and visit Lockirin at the Hall of Elders in the Dwarven Village.

2865.name: Recommendation of Filaur
2865.description: Recommendation given by Filaur. Gather all 3 recommendations and visit Lockirin at the Hall of Elders in the Dwarven Village.

2866.name: Recommendation of Arin
2866.description: Recommendation given by Arin. Gather all 3 recommendations and visit Lockirin at the Hall of Elders in the Dwarven Village.

2867.name: Mark of Maestro
2867.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Maestro. Occupation change related item.

2868.name: Letter of Solder Detachment
2868.description: Letter from Chief Croto that promises to send soldiers. Deliver this to Lockirin at the Hall of Elders in the Dwarven Village.

2869.name: Paint of Kamuru
2869.description: Painting of Kamuru. Go to the Cave of Trials in the orc kingdom to seek him out.

2870.name: Kamuru's Necklace
2870.description: Necklace worn by Kamuru. Deliver this to Captain Croto in the Dwarven Village.

2871.name: Paint of Teleport Device
2871.description: Drawing of a teleport device. Recover this device from Master Toma.

2872.name: Teleport Device
2872.description: Teleport device given by Master Toma. Deliver this to Arin at the Hall of Elders in the Dwarven Village.

2873.name: Architecture of Cruma
2873.description: Simple explanation of Cruman architecture. Take this to the research team stationed at the entrance of the Cruma Tower.

2874.name: Report of Cruma
2874.description: Report recording the results of investigations made by the Cruma research team. Deliver this to Filaur at the Hall of Elders in the Dwarven Village.

2875.name: Antidote Ingredients List
2875.description: Gather 10 Weird Wasp Needles, 10 Marsh Spider Webs, and 10 Leech Blood Vials and deliver them to Researcher Lorain on the outskirts of Cruma Tower.

2876.name: Weird Wasp Needle
2876.description: Collect 10 of these and deliver them, along with everything else, to Researcher Lorain who can be found on the outskirts of Cruma Tower.

2877.name: Marsh Spider's Web
2877.description: Collect 10 of these and deliver them, along with everything else, to Researcher Lorain who can be found on the outskirts of Cruma Tower.

2878.name: Leech Blood
2878.description: Collect 10 of these and deliver them, along with everything else, to Researcher Lorain who can be found on the outskirts of Cruma Tower.

2879.name: Mark of Warspirit
2879.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Test of the War Spirit. Item for occupational change.

2880.name: Vendetta Totem
2880.description: Totem given to the Orcs who seek to punish betrayers of their race. Take this and hunt the Tamlin Orcs.

2881.name: Tamlin Orc Head
2881.description: The head of a slain Tamlin Orc. Gather 13 of these and take them to Seer Somak.

2882.name: Warspirit Totem
2882.description: Totem used in the Ritual of the War Spirit. Take this to Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials.

2883.name: Orim's Contract
2883.description: I will give you Braki's remains in return for 10 Porta Eyes, 10 Excuro Scales and 10 Mordeo Talons.""

2884.name: Porta's Eye
2884.description: Jewel pried from the Porta's Eye. Gather 10 of these and take them to Shadow Orim in Death Pass.

2885.name: Excuro's Scale
2885.description: Excuro's Scale. Gather 10 of these and take them to Shadow Orim in Death Pass.

2886.name: Mordeo's Talon
2886.description: The talons of a Mordeo. Gather 10 of these and take them to Shadow Orim in Death Pass.

2887.name: Braki's Remains
2887.description: The remains of Braki, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 3 remains, to Seer Somak in Dion.

2888.name: Pekiron's Totem
2888.description: Guardian totem received from Seer Pekiron. Take this and go to the Leto Lizardman Shamans and Chiefs on the Plains of the Lizardmen to recover Tonar's remains.

2889.name: Tonar's Skull
2889.description: The skull of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional remains, to Seer Pekiron in Dion.

2890.name: Tonar's Rib Bone
2890.description: The rib bones of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional remains, to Seer Pekiron in Dion.

2891.name: Tonar's Spine
2891.description: The spine of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional remains, to Seer Pekiron in Dion.

2892.name: Tonar's Arm Bone
2892.description: The arm bones of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional remains, to Seer Pekiron in Oren.

2893.name: Tonar's Thigh Bone
2893.description: The thigh bones of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional remains, to Seer Pekiron in Oren.

2894.name: Tonar's Remains
2894.description: The remains of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the other 3 heroes' remains, to Seer Somak in Dion.

2895.name: Manakia's Totem
2895.description: Totem received from Priest Manakia. Take this and go to the medusas and Stenoa, the gorgon queen, to recover Hermodt's remains.

2896.name: Hermodt's Skull
2896.description: The skull of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional remains, to Priest Manakia of the Orc Guild in Giran.

2897.name: Hermodt's Rib Bone
2897.description: The rib bones of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional remains, to Priest Manakia of the Orc Guild in Giran.

2898.name: Hermodt's Spine
2898.description: The spine of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional remains, to Priest Manakia of the Orc Guild in Giran.

2899.name: Hermodt's Arm Bone
2899.description: The arm bones of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional remains, to Priest Manakia of the Orc Guild in Giran.

2900.name: Hermodt's Thigh Bone
2900.description: The thigh bones of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional remains, to Priest Manakia of the Orc Guild in Giran.

2901.name: Hermodt's Remains
2901.description: The remains of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the other three heroes' remains, to Seer Somak in Dion.

2902.name: Racoy's Totem
2902.description: Totem given by Seer Racoy of the Orc Guild in Gludio. Take this and go to the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Gludio to ask about Kiruna.

2903.name: Vivyan's Letter
2903.description: Letter from Priestess Vivyan. Take this to Trader Sarien of the Southern Wastelands.

2904.name: Insect Diagram Book
2904.description: Insect encyclopedia that Trader Sarien Has given as aid. Take this and hunt noble ants to recover Kiruna's remains.

2905.name: Kiruna's Skull
2905.description: The skull of Kiruna, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional remains, to Seer Racoy of the Orc Guild in Gludio.

2906.name: Kiruna's Rib Bone
2906.description: The rib bones of Kiruna, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional remains, to Seer Racoy of the Orc Guild in Gludio.

2907.name: Kiruna's Spine
2907.description: The spine of Kiruna, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional remains, to Seer Racoy of the Orc Guild in Gludio.

2908.name: Kiruna's Arm Bone
