3079.description: Spellbook needed to learn Cancel. Used by Sorcerers and Spellsingers.\nRequired level: 48

3080.name: Spellbook: Sleeping Cloud
3080.description: Spellbook needed to learn Sleeping Cloud. Used by Sorcerers and Spellsingers.\nRequired level: 44

3081.name: Spellbook: Aura Flare
3081.description: Spellbook needed to learn Aura Flare. Used by Sorcerers and Spellsingers.\nRequired level: 40

3082.name: Spellbook: Surrender to Water
3082.description: Spellbook needed to learn Surrender to Water. Used by Spellsingers.\nRequired level: 40

3083.name: Spellbook: Frost Wall
3083.description: Spellbook needed to learn Frost Wall. Used by Spellsingers.\nRequired level: 52

3084.name: Spellbook: Freezing Shackle
3084.description: Spellbook needed to learn Freezing Shackle. Used by Spellsingers.\nRequired level: 44

3085.name: Spellbook: Hydro Blast
3085.description: Spellbook needed to learn Hydro Blast. Used by Spellsingers.\nRequired level: 40

3086.name: Spellbook: Frost Bolt
3086.description: Spellbook needed to learn Frost Bolt. Used by Spellsingers.\nRequired level: 40

3087.name: Spellbook: Ice Dagger
3087.description: Spellbook needed to learn Ice Dagger. Used by Spellsingers.\nRequired level: 44

3088.name: Spellbook: Freezing Skin
3088.description: Spellbook needed to learn Freezing Skin. Used by Spellsingers.\nRequired level: 40

3089.name: Spellbook: Tempest
3089.description: Spellbook needed to learn Tempest. Used by Spellhowlers.\nRequired level: 46

3090.name: Spellbook: Hurricane
3090.description: Spellbook needed to learn Hurricane. Used by Spellhowlers.\nRequired level: 40

3091.name: Spellbook: Servitor Magic Shield
3091.description: Spellbook needed to learn Servitor Magic Shield. Used by Warlocks, Elemental Summoners and Phantom Summoners.\nRequired level: 44

3092.name: Spellbook: Servitor Physical Shield
3092.description: Spellbook needed to learn Servitor Physical Shield. Used by Warlocks, Elemental Summoners and Phantom Summoners.\nRequired level: 40

3093.name: Spellbook: Servitor Haste
3093.description: Spellbook needed to learn Servitor Haste. Used by Warlocks, Elemental Summoners and Phantom Summoners.\nRequired level: 44

3094.name: Spellbook: Invigor
3094.description: Spellbook needed to learn Invigor. Used by Prophets.\nRequired level: 40

3095.name: Spellbook: Magic Barrier
3095.description: Spellbook needed to learn Magic Barrier. Used by Prophets.\nRequired level: 44

3096.name: Spellbook: Blessed Body
3096.description: Spellbook needed to learn Blessed Body. Used by Prophets.\nRequired level: 44

3097.name: Spellbook: Blessed Soul
3097.description: Spellbook needed to learn Blessed Soul. Used by Prophets.\nRequired level: 44

3098.name: Spellbook: Return
3098.description: Spellbook needed to learn Return. Used by Prophets and Elders.\nRequired level: Prophet- 40, Elder: 44

3099.name: Spellbook: Haste
3099.description: Spellbook needed to learn Haste. Used by Prophets.\nRequired level: 44

3100.name: Spellbook: Guidance
3100.description: Spellbook needed to learn Guidance. Used by Prophets and Shillien Elders.\nRequired level: 40

3101.name: Spellbook: Death Whisper
3101.description: Spellbook needed to learn Death Whisper. Used by Prophets and Shillien Elders.\nRequired level: 40

3102.name: Spellbook: Blessed Shield
3102.description: Spellbook needed to learn Blessed Shield. Used by Prophets and Elven Elders.\nRequired level: 40

3103.name: Amulet: Pa'agrio's Wisdom
3103.description: Amulet required for the Pa'agrio's Wisdom spell. Used by Overlords.\nRequired level: 40

3104.name: Amulet: Pa'agrio's Glory
3104.description: Amulet required for the Pa'agrio's Glory spell. Used by Overlords.\nRequired level: 40

3105.name: Amulet: Seal of Winter
3105.description: Amulet required for the Seal of Winter spell. Used by Overlords.\nRequired level: 40

3106.name: Amulet: Seal of Flame
3106.description: Amulet required for the Seal of Flame spell. Used by Overlords.\nRequired level: 48

3107.name: Amulet: Seal of Gloom
3107.description: Amulet required for the Seal of Gloom spell. Used by Overlords.\nRequired level: 44

3108.name: Amulet: Seal of Mirage
3108.description: Amulet required for the Seal of Mirage spell. Used by Overlords.\nRequired level: 44

3109.name: Amulet: Seal of Silence
3109.description: Amulet required for the Seal of Silence spell. Used by Overlords.\nRequired level: 48

3110.name: Amulet: Seal of Scourge
3110.description: Amulet required for the Seal of Scourge spell. Used by Overlords.\nRequired level: 40

3111.name: Amulet: Seal of Suspension
3111.description: Amulet required for the Seal of Suspension spell. Used by Overlords.\nRequired level: 48

3112.name: Amulet: Pa'agrio's Vision
3112.description: Amulet required for the Pa'agrio's Vision spell. Used by Overlords.\nRequired level: 44

3113.name: Amulet: Pa'agrio's Protection
3113.description: Amulet required for the Pa'agrio's Protection spell. Used by Overlords.\nRequired level: 40

3114.name: Amulet: Steal Essence
3114.description: Amulet required for the Steal Essence spell. Used by Warcryers and Overlords.\nRequired level: 40

3115.name: Amulet: Freezing Flame
3115.description: Amulet required for the Freezing Flame spell. Used by Warcryers.\nRequired level: 40

3116.name: Amulet: Chant of Fury
3116.description: Amulet required for the Chant of Fury spell. Used by Warcryers.\nRequired level: 48

3117.name: Amulet: Chant of Evasion
3117.description: Amulet required for the Chant of Evasion spell. Used by Warcryers.\nRequired level: 40

3118.name: Amulet: Chant of Rage
3118.description: Amulet required for the Chant of Rage spell. Used by Warcryers.\nRequired level: 44

3119.name: Mark of Guildsman
3119.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Guildsman. Occupation change related item.

3120.name: Valkon's Recommendation
3120.description: Recommendation letter written by Warehouse Keeper Valkon from Giran. Take this and go to Blacksmith Altran of the Talking Island Village.

3121.name: Mandragora Berry
3121.description: The fruit of mandragoras, known for their uses in treating ailments.

3122.name: Altran's Instructions
3122.description: Blacksmith Altran's instructions. The instructions are to gather materials and create 7 journeyman's rings.

3123.name: Altran's 1st Recommendation
3123.description: Recommendation letter written by Blacksmith Altran. Take this and go to Warehouse Keeper Norman of the Village of Gludin.

3124.name: Altran's 2nd Recommendation
3124.description: Recommendation letter written by Blacksmith Altran. Take this and go to Blacksmith Pinter of the Town of Gludio.

3125.name: Norman's Instructions
3125.description: Instructions of Warehouse Keeper Norman from the Village of Gludin. The instructions are to go to Blacksmith Duning of Hunters Village and bring back the key.

3126.name: Norman's Receipt
3126.description: Receipt of Warehouse Keeper Norman from the Village of Gludin. Take this and go to Blacksmith Duning of the Hunters Village.

3127.name: Duning's Instructions
3127.description: Blacksmith Duning's instructions. It gives an order to recover 30 keys from Breka orcs.

3128.name: Duning's Key
3128.description: Mithril key recovered from Breka orcs. Collect 30 and take them to Blacksmith Duning.

3129.name: Norman's List
3129.description: List of Warehouse Keeper Norman from the Village of Gludin. Procure Grey Bone Powder by slaying a Lesser Ghoul or a Lesser Strain on the Execution Grounds; procure Granite Whetstones by slaying a Lesser Granite Golem on the Execution Grounds; procure Red Pigment by slaying a Lesser Corpse Tracker on the Execution Grounds; procure Braided Yarn by slaying a Silenos on the Plains of Dion. Collect 70 units of each above mentioned ingredient.

3130.name: Grey Bone Powder
3130.description: The powder collected from the bones of Lesser Ghoul and Lesser Strain dwelling on the Execution Grounds. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman in the Village of Gludin.

3131.name: Granite Whetstone
3131.description: Whetstone made from the fragments of Lesser Granite Golem dwelling on the Execution Grounds. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman in the Village of Gludin.

3132.name: Red Pigment
3132.description: Red Pigment obtained by slaying the Lesser Corpse Tracker dwelling on the Execution Grounds. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman in the Village of Gludin.

3133.name: Braided Yarn
3133.description: Braided Yarn obtained by slaying Silenos on the Plains of Dion. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman in the Village of Gludin.

3134.name: Journeyman Gem
3134.description: Material used to make the journeyman's ring.

3135.name: Pinter's Instructions
3135.description: Instructions of Blacksmith Pinter: Gather 70 amber beads. You can get them by slaying a Wastelands Lizardman and an Ant from the Ant Nest, but there is another way too.

3136.name: Amber Bead
3136.description: Bead-shaped piece of amber. Collect 70 of these and take them to Blacksmith Pinter in Gludio.

3137.name: Amber Lump
3137.description: Unrefined lump of amber. The material used in creating the Amber Bead.

3138.name: Journeyman Deco Beads
3138.description: Ingredient item used to make a journeyman's ring.

3139.name: Journeyman Ring
3139.description: To pass the Trial of the Guildsman, you must create 7 of these rings. Take the completed rings to Warehouse Keeper Valkon in Giran.

3140.name: Mark of Life
3140.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Life. Occupation change related item.

3141.name: Cardien's Letter
3141.description: Letter by Master Cardien. Take this and go to Hierarch Asterios of the Elven Village.

3142.name: Camomile Charm
3142.description: A charm given by Hierarch Asterios of the Elven Village. Take it to Master Cardien in the Town of Dion.

3143.name: Hierarch's Letter
3143.description: Letter given by Hierarch Asterios of the Elven Village. Take this and go to Thalia, who lives on the eastern shores of Iris Lake.

3144.name: Moonflower Charm
3144.description: A charm given by Hierarch Asterios of the Elven Village. Keep it while searching for the Water of Life.

3145.name: Grail Diagram
3145.description: Diagram of the grail, given by Thalia. Take this and go to Blacksmith Pushkin of Town of Giran.

3146.name: Thalia's 1st Letter
3146.description: Thalia's letter. Take this and go to Arkenia, who is at the Altar of Rites.

3147.name: Thalia's 2nd Letter
3147.description: Thalia's letter. Take this and go to Isael Silvershadow of the Hunter's Village.

3148.name: Thalia's Instructions
3148.description: Letter containing Thalia's instructions. The instructions are to come back after reaching level 38.

3149.name: Pushkin's List
3149.description: List given by Blacksmith Pushkin from Giran. He needs 10 pieces of Pure Mithril Ore obtained by slaying a Guardian Basilisk in Death Pass, 20 units of Ant Soldier Acid obtained by slaying Ant Soldiers in the Ant Nest, 20 Wyrm's Fangs obtained by slaying Wyrms in the Gorgon Flower Garden.

3150.name: Pure Mithril Cup
3150.description: Cup crafted by Blacksmith Pushkin of Giran that is made of pure mithril. Take this back to Thalia who can be found on an eastern shore of Iris Lake.

3151.name: Arkenia's Contract
3151.description: Contract written by Arkenia. The contract states that she will give stardust in return for Andariel's book from the Village of Gludin.

3152.name: Arkenia's Instructions
3152.description: Arkenia's instructions. The instructions are to bring back Andariel's book from the Temple of Einhasad in the Village of Gludin.

3153.name: Adonius' list
3153.description: List given by Priest Adonius of the Village of Gludin. 20 sample of Spider Ichor from a Marsh Spider dwelling in Cruma Marshlands, 20 Harpy's Feathers from a Harpy nesting in the Gorgon Flower Garden.

3154.name: Andariel's Scriptures Copy
3154.description: Andariel's Scriptures Copy given by Priest Adonius of the Village of Gludin. Take it to Witch Arkenia at the Altar of Rites in the Dark Elven Forest.

3155.name: Stardust
3155.description: The silver dust received from Witch Arkenia at the Altar of Rites. Take it to Thalia at the eastern shore or Iris Lake.

3156.name: Isael's Instructions
3156.description: Orders of Isael Silvershadow from Hunters Village. Collect 6 pieces of Talin's Spear from Leto Lizardman Shamans and Leto Lizardman Chiefs on the Plains of the Lizardmen.

3157.name: Isael's Letter
3157.description: Letter given by Isael Silvershadow from Hunters Village. Take this, along with Talin's Spear, back to Thalia at the eastern shore or Iris Lake.

3158.name: Grail of Purity
3158.description: A cup of Pure Mithril. Gather Tears of Unicorn in the Cup and take it back to Thalia at the eastern shore or Iris Lake.

3159.name: Tears of Unicorn
3159.description: The tears shed by Eva's unicorn when it was killed with Talin's Spear. Take this back to Thalia at the eastern shore or Iris Lake.

3160.name: Water of Life
3160.description: Water of Life. It has the power to rejuvenate the Tree of Life. Take it to Hierarch Asterios in Elven Village.

3161.name: Pure Mithril Ore
3161.description: The ore of pure mithril. Gather 10 of these, along with the rest of the ingredients, and take them back to Blacksmith Pushkin in Giran.

3162.name: Ant Soldier Acid
3162.description: The acid collected from ant soldiers at the Ant Nest after slaying them. Gather 20 bottles of this, along with the rest of the ingredients, and take them back to Blacksmith Pushkin in Giran.

3163.name: Wyrm's Talon
3163.description: The talon of a Wyrm from the Gorgon Flower Garden obtained after slaying it. Gather 20 of these, along with the rest of the ingredients, and take them back to Blacksmith Pushkin in Giran.

3164.name: Spider Ichor
3164.description: The ichor of a marsh spider. Gather 20 units of this and take them back to Priest Adonius in the Village of Gludin.

3165.name: Harpy's Down
3165.description: The down feathers obtained after slaying a harpy. Gather 20 of these and take them back to Priest Adonius in the Village of Gludin.

3166.name: Talin's Spear Blade
3166.description: The blade portion of Talin's Spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow in Hunters Village.

3167.name: Talin's Spear Shaft
3167.description: The shaft portion of Talin's Spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow in Hunters Village.

3168.name: Talin's Ruby
3168.description: Decorative jewel that adorned Talin's Spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow in Hunters Village.

3169.name: Talin's Aquamarine
3169.description: Decorative jewel that adorned Talin's Spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow in Hunters Village.

3170.name: Talin's Amethyst
3170.description: Decorative jewel that adorned Talin's Spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow in Hunters Village.

3171.name: Talin's Peridot
3171.description: Decorative jewel that adorned Talin's Spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow in Hunters Village.

3172.name: Mark of Fate
3172.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Fate. Item for occupational change.

3173.name: Kaira's Letter
3173.description: Letter sent by Magister Kaira to Brother Metheus from the Temple of Einhasad of Giran.

3174.name: Metheus' Funeral Jar
3174.description: Jar for storing the remains of the dead. Take this to the Execution Grounds and search for the remains of Metheus' sister.

3175.name: Kassandra's Remains
3175.description: The remains of Kassandra, Metheus' sister. Take this back to Brother Metheus of the Temple of Einhasad of Giran.

3176.name: Herbalism Textbook
3176.description: Textbook of various herbs and their usages. It also contains information about the deadly Poison belladonna.

3177.name: Ixia's List
3177.description: Obtain 10 units of each of the following items: Medusa's Blood from slaying Medusa in the Gorgon Flower Garden, Marsh Spider Fluids from slaying a Marsh Spider in Cruma Marshlands, Corpse Tracker Dung from slaying a Corpse Tracker on the Execution Grounds, Tyrant's Blood from slaying Tyrant in the Wastelands, and Nightshade Root from slaying a Marsh Stakato in Cruma Marshlands.

3178.name: Medusa's Blood
3178.description: The bottled blood of a medusa. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia in Dion.

3179.name: Marsh Spider Fluids
3179.description: The bottled fluids of a marsh spider. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia in Dion.

3180.name: Corpse Tracker Dung
3180.description: The dung of Corpse Tracker bats. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia in Dion.

3181.name: Tyrant's Blood
3181.description: The bottled blood of Tyrant. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia in Dion.

3182.name: Nightshade Root
3182.description: The roots of the rare nightshade herb. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia in Dion.

3183.name: Belladonna
3183.description: Legendary Poison that can kill a bull with a single drop. Take this to Brother Metheus of the Temple of Einhasad in Giran.

3184.name: Alders' Skull
3184.description: The skull of Alders, who drafted the copy of Kaysha's Revelations. Take this to Magister Kaira in Giran.

3185.name: Alders' Skull
3185.description: Skull of Priest Alders. Take it to Magister Roa, a distant descendant of the priest. Magister Roa can be found in the Mystic Guild of Giran.

3186.name: Alders' Receipt
3186.description: The receipt for the item that Alder entrusted to the warehouse. Take this and go to the warehouse in the Village of Gludin.

3187.name: Revelations Manuscript
3187.description: Copy of Kaysha's Revelations. Take this to Magister Kaira in Giran.

3188.name: Kaira's Instructions
3188.description: Note where the instructions of Magister Kaira of Giran are written. The instructions are to come back after reaching level 38.

3189.name: Kaira's Recommendation
3189.description: Recommendation letter written by Magister Kaira of Giran. Take it to Hierarch Thifiell of the Dark Elf Village.

3190.name: Palus Charm
3190.description: Charm given by Tetrarch Thifiell to keep in possession until the Initiation Ceremony of the Shillien Circle is complete.

3191.name: Thifiell's Letter
3191.description: Letter from Tetrarch Thifiell to Arkenia. Arkenia is at the Dark Elven Initiation Altar.

3192.name: Arkenia's Note
3192.description: Arkenia's Note stating that she needs Red Fairy Dust and Blight Treant Sap. You can obtain them by killing a Bloody Pixy and Blight Treant at the east of Dark Elf Village near Shilen Temple.

3193.name: Pixy Garnet
3193.description: Garnet given by the Bloody Pixy as a token of promise. Bring one skull each of four different races. For this, you need to slay Grandis in Death Pass, Karul Bugbear in Hunters Village, Breka Orc Prefect in Breka's Stronghold and Leto Lizardman Overlord on the Plains of the Lizardmen.

3194.name: Grandis' Skull
3194.description: The skull of Grandis. Bring this to the Bloody Pixy who can be found at the east of Dark Elf Village near Shilen Temple.

3195.name: Karul Bugbear Skull
3195.description: The skull of Karul Bugbear. Bring this to the Bloody Pixy who can be found at the east of Dark Elf Village near Shilen Temple.

3196.name: Breka Overlord Skull
3196.description: The skull of Breka Overload. Bring this to the Bloody Pixy who can be found at the east of Dark Elf Village near Shilen Temple.

3197.name: Leto Overlord Skull
3197.description: The skull of Leto Lizardman Overlord. Bring this to the Bloody Pixy who can be found at the east of Dark Elf Village near Shilen Temple.

3198.name: Red Fairy Dust
3198.description: Red fairy dust given by the Bloody Pixy. Take this to Arkenia at the Altar of Rites.

3199.name: Blight Treant Seed
3199.description: Seed given by a Blight Treant as a mark of promise. Slay the Black Willow Lurker and bring back its leaf. Black Willow Lurker can be found in a Swampland at the south of Dark Elf Village.

3200.name: Black Willow Leaf
3200.description: Leaf obtained by slaying the Black Willow Lurker. Take this to the Blight Treant who can be found at the east of Dark Elf Village and near Shilen Temple.

3201.name: Blight Treant Sap
3201.description: The sap of a Blight Treant. Take this to Arkenia at the Altar of Rites.

3202.name: Arkenia's Letter
3202.description: Letter written by Arkenia. It states that the Initiation Ceremony of the Shillien Circle is complete. Take it to Hierarch Thifiell in Dark Elf Village.

3203.name: Mark of Glory
3203.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Glory. Item for occupational change.

3204.name: Vokian's Order
3204.description: Procure 10 units of each of the following items: Manashen Shard after slaying Manashen Gargoyle in Ivory Tower Crater, Tyrant's Talon after slaying Tyrant in the Wastelands and Guardian Basilisk Fang after slaying Guardian Basilisk in Death Pass.

3205.name: Manashen Shard
3205.description: Shard of the broken Manashen. Collect 10 and take them back to Prefect Vokian at the Orc Guild of Giran.

3206.name: Tyrant's Talons
3206.description: The talons plucked from a slain Tyrant. Collect 10 and take them back to Prefect Vokian at the Orc Guild of Giran.

3207.name: Guardian Basilisk Fang
3207.description: The fangs of a Guardian Basilisk slain in Death Pass. Collect 10 and take them back to Prefect Vokian at the Orc Guild of Giran.

3208.name: Vokian's Order
3208.description: Orders of Prefect Vokian of the Orc Guild of Giran. The instructions are to go and seek out the Gandi Chief Chianta in the Town of Dion.

3209.name: Necklace of Authority
3209.description: Symbol given to those representing Pa'agrio Lord Kakai.

3210.name: Chianta's 1st Order
3210.description: Orders of Gandi Chief Chianta. The instructions are to go and recover the flame scepter from the lower orc tribes.

3211.name: Scepter of Breka
3211.description: Scepter of flame which can be obtained from a Breka Orc Chief. Take it along with 4 other tribes' scepters and go see Gandi Chief Chianta in Dion.

3212.name: Scepter of Enku
3212.description: The flame scepter received from the Enku Orc Chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta in Dion.

3213.name: Scepter of Vuku
3213.description: The flame scepter received from the Vuku Orc Chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta in Dion.

3214.name: Scepter of Turek
3214.description: The flame scepter received from the Turek Orc Chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta in Dion.

3215.name: Scepter of Tunath
3215.description: The flame scepter received from the Lennunt Orc Chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta in Dion.

3216.name: Chianta's 2nd Order
3216.description: Gandi Chief Chianta's orders. The instructions are to come back for further orders after reaching level 38.

3217.name: Chianta's 3rd Order
3217.description: Gandi Chief Chianta's orders. The instructions are to bring back 20 each of Timak and Tamlin Orc heads. You can find the former at Timak Orc Barracks and the latter near Hunters Village.

3218.name: Tamlin Orc Head
3218.description: The head of a Tamlin Orc cut off after being slain. Collect 20 of these and take them to Gandi Chief Chianta in Dion.

3219.name: Timak Orc Head
3219.description: The head of a Timak Orc, cut off after being slain. Collect 20 of these and take them to Gandi Chief Chianta in Dion.

3220.name: Scepter Box
3220.description: Box containing the 5 flame scepters recovered from the lesser orc tribes. Take this to Seer Tanapi of the Orc Village.

3221.name: Pashika's Head
3221.description: Kill Pashika, son of Voltar, cut his head off and show it to Breka Chief Voltar at Breka's Stronghold.

3222.name: Vultus' Head
3222.description: Kill Vultus, son of Voltar, cut his head off and show it to Breka Chief Voltar at Breka's Stronghold.

3223.name: Gloves of Voltar
3223.description: Gloves that was thrown out by Breka Chief Voltar. Slay Pashika and Vultus, sons of Voltar.

3224.name: Enku Overlord Head
3224.description: The head of an Enku Overlord, cut off after being slain. Show this to Enku Chief Kepra at the south-east part of the Plains of Dion.

3225.name: Gloves of Kepra
3225.description: The glove thrown down by Enku Chief Kepra. Go and slay the Enku overlords.

3226.name: Makum Bugbear Head
3226.description: The head of a Makum bugbear warrior, cut off after being slain. Show this to Turek Chief Burai.

3227.name: Gloves of Burai
3227.description: The glove thrown down by Turek Chief Burai. Go and slay the Makum bugbear warriors.

3228.name: Manakia's Letter
3228.description: Letter of Priest Manakia of the Orc Guild of Giran. Take it to Breka Orc Chief.

3229.name: Manakia's Letter
3229.description: Letter of Priest Manakia of the Orc Guild of Giran. Take it to Enku Orc Chief.

3230.name: Kasman's Letter
3230.description: Prefect Kasman's letter. Take this and go to the Vuku Orc Chief.

3231.name: Kasman's Letter
3231.description: Prefect Kasman's letter. Take this and go to the Turek Orc Chief.

3232.name: Kasman's Letter
3232.description: Prefect Kasman's letter. Take this and go to the Tunath Orc Chief.

3233.name: Driko's Contract
3233.description: Vuku Chief Driko's contract. The contract contains instructions to hunt the Marsh Stakato Drones in the Cruma Marshlands.

3234.name: Marsh Stakato Drone Husk
3234.description: The husks of a Marsh Stakato Drone. Collect 30 of these and take them to Vuku Chief Driko.

3235.name: Tanapi's Order
3235.description: Seer Tanapi's orders. Hunt the Ragna Orc Chief and seers and recover the scepter of Tantosc.

3236.name: Scepter of Tantos
3236.description: The flame scepter of the now-perished Tantos tribe. Take this to Seer Tanapi.

3237.name: Ritual Box
3237.description: Box containing the scepters recovered from the Orcs of the Tantos tribe. Take this to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai.

3238.name: Mark of Prosperity
3238.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Prosperity. Occupation change related item.

3239.name: 1st Ring of Trials
3239.description: Ring given to those Dwarves attempting the Testimony of Prosperity. Find the 4 proofs of prosperity.

3240.name: 2nd Ring of Trials
3240.description: Ring given to those Dwarves attempting the Testimony of Prosperity. Find Maphr's tablet, which contains the ultimate secrets of geometry.

3241.name: Old Account Book
3241.description: Iron Gate Lockirin's account book. The proof of wealth. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Town of Giran.

3242.name: Blessed Seed
3242.description: Seed containing the blessings of Maphr. The proof of fertile lands. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Town of Giran.

3243.name: Emily's Recipe
3243.description: Recipe good for childbirth and childbirth recovery. The proof of fertility. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Town of Giran.

3244.name: Lilith's Elven Wafer
3244.description: Food regarded as the secret to the Elves' longevity. The proof of health. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Town of Giran.

3245.name: Maphr Tablet Fragment
3245.description: Fragment of Maphr's tablet, which contains the ultimate secrets of geometry. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Town of Giran.

3246.name: Collection License
3246.description: License that allows the bearer to collect guild contributions. Seek out those who still owe contributions and collect the funds from them.

3247.name: Lockirin's Notice
3247.description: Notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Elder Spiron of the Elder Council of Dwarven Village.

3248.name: Lockirin's Notice
3248.description: Notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Elder Balanki of the Elder Council of Dwarven Village.

3249.name: Lockirin's Notice
3249.description: Notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Elder Keef of the Elder Council of Dwarven Village.

3250.name: Lockirin's Notice
3250.description: Notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Elder Filaur of the Elder Council of Dwarven Village.

3251.name: Lockirin's Notice
3251.description: Notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Elder Arin of the Elder Council of Dwarven Village.

3252.name: Contribution of Shari
3252.description: Trader Shari's guild contribution. Take this to Elder Spiron of the Elder Council of Dwarven Village.

3253.name: Contribution of Mion
3253.description: Trader Mion's guild contribution. Take this to Elder Balanki of the Elder Council of Dwarven Village.

3254.name: Contribution of Maryse
3254.description: Trader Maryse Redbonnet's guild contribution. Take this to Elder Balanki of the Elder Council of Dwarven Village.

3255.name: Maryse's Request
3255.description: Note containing Maryse Redbonnet's request that you bring back 10 leather hides for use in crafting items.

3256.name: Contribution of Toma
3256.description: Trader Master Toma's guild contribution. Take this to Elder Arin of the Elder Council of Dwarven Village.

3257.name: Receipt of Bolter
3257.description: Miner Bolter's receipt. Take this to Elder Filaur of the Elder Council of Dwarven Village.

3258.name: Receipt of Contribution
3258.description: The contribution receipt received from Elder Spiron. Collect 5 receipts from various guilds and take them to First Elder Lockirin at the Hall of Elders of Dwarven Village.

3259.name: Receipt of Contribution
3259.description: The contribution receipt received from Elder Balanki. Collect 5 receipts from various guilds and take them to First Elder Lockirin at the Hall of Elders of Dwarven Village.

3260.name: Receipt of Contribution
3260.description: The contribution receipt received from Elder Keef. Collect 5 receipts from various guilds and take them to First Elder Lockirin at the Hall of Elders of Dwarven Village.

3261.name: Receipt of Contribution
3261.description: The contribution receipt received from Elder Filaur. Collect 5 receipts from various guilds and take them to First Elder Lockirin at the Hall of Elders of Dwarven Village.

3262.name: Receipt of Contribution
3262.description: The contribution receipt received from Elder Arin. Collect 5 receipts from various guilds and take them to First Elder Lockirin at the Hall of Elders of Dwarven Village.

3263.name: Procuration of Torocco
3263.description: The bearer of this procuration hereby agrees to make contributions on behalf of Torocco. Take this to Elder Keef of the Elder Council of Dwarven Village.

3264.name: Bright's List
3264.description: List of ingredients that Guard Bright Has written. "20 mandragora petals, 10 bunches of crimson moss"

3265.name: Mandragora Petal
3265.description: Mandragora Petal. Collect 20 of these and take them to Guard Bright at the eastern part of Dion.

3266.name: Crimson Moss
3266.description: Crimson Moss obtained from giant red ants. Collect 10 of these and take them to Guard Bright at the eastern part of Dion.

3267.name: Mandragora Bouquet
3267.description: Flower bouquet made of mandragora petals and crimson moss. Take this to Emily in the Town of Dion.

3268.name: Parman's Instructions
3268.description: Note containing Warehouse Keeper Parman's instructions. The instructions are to come back after reaching level 38.

3269.name: Parman's Letter
3269.description: Warehouse Keeper Parman's letter. Bring it to Maestro Nikola. You can find him near Cruma Tower.

3270.name: Clay Dough
3270.description: Piece of clay that Maestro Nikola has given when you met near Cruma Tower. Use this to make a copy of the keyhole from the Lesser Giant's box.

3271.name: Pattern of Keyhole
3271.description: The keyhole pattern made from clay dough. Take this to Maestro Nikola. You can find him near Cruma Tower.

3272.name: Nikola's List
3272.description: 20 Stakato Shells obtained by slaying Stakato in Cruma Marshlands, 10 Toad Lord Sacs obtained by slaying a Toad Lord in Cruma Marshlands, 10 Spider Thorns obtained by slaying a Marsh Spider in Cruma Marshlands and 10 D-grade Crystals.

3273.name: Stakato Shell
3273.description: The shell of a Marsh Stakato. Key ingredient in making the Lesser Giant's key.

3274.name: Toad Lord Sac
3274.description: The Giant Spider's Poison Sac removed from the neck of a toad lord. Key ingredient in making the Lesser Giant's Key.

3275.name: Marsh Spider's Thorn
3275.description: Thorn removed from the shell of a Marsh Spider. Key ingredient in making the Lesser Giant's Key.

3276.name: Mark of Champion
3276.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Champion. Item for occupational change.

3277.name: Ascalon's 1st Letter
3277.description: Veteran Ascalon's letter. Take this to Mason in the Town of Dion.

3278.name: Mason's Letter
3278.description: Letter from Mason to Veteran Ascalon of Town of Giran.

3279.name: Iron Rose Ring
3279.description: Ring given by Mason. The ring is engraved with the symbol of the iron rose. Complete the revenge in place of Mason.

3280.name: Ascalon's 2nd Letter
3280.description: Veteran Ascalon's letter. Take this to Trader Groot of Town of Giran.

3281.name: White Rose Insignia
3281.description: Insignia given by Trader Groot. It was formerly worn by the medics of the iron rose. Aid Trader Groot in his material gathering.

3282.name: Groot's Letter
3282.description: Letter from Trader Groot to Veteran Ascalon in Town of Giran.

3283.name: Ascalon's 3rd Letter
3283.description: Veteran Ascalon's letter. Take this to Captain Mouen of the Town of Oren.

3284.name: Mouen's 1st Order
3284.description: Orders to collect 10 heads of Road Scavengers or Road Collectors in Death Pass.

3285.name: Mouen's 2nd Order
3285.description: Orders to destroy the Leto Lizardmen on the Plains of the Lizardmen and bring back 10 of their fangs.

3286.name: Mouen's Letter
3286.description: Letter from Captain Mouen to Veteran Ascalon of Town of Giran.

3287.name: Harpy's Egg
3287.description: Egg obtained after slaying a harpy. Collect 30 of these and take them to Trader Groot of Town of Giran.

3288.name: Medusa's Venom
3288.description: The venom obtained after slaying a medusa. Collect 30 of these and take them to Trader Groot of Town of Giran.

3289.name: Windsus Bile
3289.description: The bile obtained after slaying a Windsus. Collect 30 of these and take them to Trader Groot of Town of Giran.

3290.name: Bloody Axe Head
3290.description: The head of a Bloody Axe Elite. Collect 10 of these and return to Mason in the Town of Dion.

3291.name: Road Ratman Head
3291.description: The severed head of a Road Scavenger or Road Collector. Collect 10 of them and take them to Captain Mouen.

3292.name: Leto Lizardman Fang
3292.description: Fang from a slain Leto Lizardman from the Plains of the Lizardmen. Collect 10 of these and take them to Captain Mouen.

3293.name: Mark of Sagittarius
3293.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Sagittarius. Occupation change related item.

3294.name: Bernard's Introduction
3294.description: Take this letter and go to Sagittarius Hamil of the Village of Floran.

3295.name: Hamil's 1st Letter
3295.description: Deliver this letter to Sir Aron Tanford who can be found near the Ol Mahum Checkpoint at the southern part of the Wastelands.

3296.name: Hamil's 2nd Letter
3296.description: The letter of Sagittarius Hamil to Prefect Vokian of Town of Giran.

3297.name: Hamil's 3rd Letter
3297.description: The letter of Sagittarius Hamil to Gauen of the Ivory Tower region.

3298.name: First Hunter's Rune
3298.description: Stone engraved with a hunter's rune. Collect 10 of these and take them to Hamil of the Village of Floran.

3299.name: Second Hunter's Rune
3299.description: Rune obtained from Breka Orcs. Collect 10 of these and take them, along with the Snake Amulet, to Prefect Vokian of the Orc Guild of Giran.

3300.name: Talisman - Kadesh
3300.description: Strange talisman obtained after slaying Kadesh. Take this to Sagittarius Hamil of the Village of Floran.

3301.name: Snake Amulet
3301.description: Charm that is related to a serpent totem spirit worshiped by Breka orcs. Take it to Prefect Vokian of the Orc Guild of Town of Giran.

3302.name: Mithril Clip
3302.description: Key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

3303.name: Stakato Chitin
3303.description: Key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

3304.name: Reinforced Bowstring
3304.description: Key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

3305.name: Manashen's Horn
3305.description: Key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

3306.name: Lizardman's Blood
3306.description: The blood shed by Leto Lizardmen from the Plains of the Lizardmen. Kadesh appears when enough of this is gathered.

3307.name: Mark of Witchcraft
3307.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Test of Witchcraft. Occupation change related item.

3308.name: Orim's Diagram
3308.description: Diagram of relics, given by Shadow Orim in Death Pass. The 6 jewels needed for opening the Cube of Aklantoth are depicted here.

3309.name: Alexandria's Book
3309.description: Book that contains records on who purchased Aklantoth' Gems. "Magister Iker of the Mystic Guild of Giran, Magister Kaira from Giran, Grocer Lars from Dion"

3310.name: Iker's List
3310.description: Procure 20 units of each of the following items: Dire Wyrm Fangs, obtained by slaying Dire Wyrm in the Sea of Spores; Leto Lizardman Amulets, obtained by slaying Leto Lizardman on the Plains of the Lizardmen; Reinforced Stone Golem Heartstones, obtained by slaying Reinforced Stone Golem in Ivory Tower Crater.

3311.name: Dire Wyrm Fang
3311.description: The fangs of a slain Dire Wyrm. Collect 20 of these and take them to Magister Iker of the Mystic Guild of Giran.

3312.name: Leto Lizardman Amulet
3312.description: Totem obtained after slaying the Leto Lizardman. Collect 20 of these and take them to Magister Iker of the Mystic Guild of Giran.

3313.name: Reinforced Stone Golem Heartstone
3313.description: Crystal found amongst the shattered fragments of a Reinforced Stone Golem. Collect 20 of these and take them to Magister Iker of the Mystic Guild of Giran.

3314.name: Lars' Memo
3314.description: Sales records of Grocer Lars from Dion. It is recorded that a man named Ismel bought the jewel from Lars.

3315.name: Nestle's Memo
3315.description: Trader Nestle's purchase records. It is recorded that Leopold of the Black Lion brought the jewel.

3316.name: Leopold's Journal
3316.description: Portion of Leopold's Diary. It is recorded that 3 deserters died and became undead while escaping to the Wastelands.

3317.name: Aklantoth 1st Gem
3317.description: Gem that can be obtained from Magister Iker. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Shadow Orim in Death Pass.

3318.name: Aklantoth 2nd Gem
3318.description: Gem that can be obtained from Magister Kaira of Giran. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Shadow Orim in Death Pass.

3319.name: Aklantoth 3rd Gem
3319.description: The gem that can be obtained by killing a Nameless Revenant. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Shadow Orim in Death Pass.

3320.name: Aklantoth 4th Gem
3320.description: The gem that can be obtained by slaying a Skeleton Mercenary. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Shadow Orim in Death Pass.

3321.name: Aklantoth 5th Gem
3321.description: The gem that can be obtained by slaying a Skeleton Mercenary. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Shadow Orim in Death Pass.

3322.name: Aklantoth 6th Gem
3322.description: The gem that can be obtained by slaying a Skeleton Mercenary. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Shadow Orim in Death Pass.

3323.name: 1st Brimstone
3323.description: Mark left behind by the Dre Vanul Prince Zeruel when escaping from his binds.

3324.name: Orim's Instructions
3324.description: Set of instructions written by Shadow Orim. The instructions are to bring back the Sword of Seal and Soul Trap Crystal from Death Pass.

3325.name: Orim's 1st Letter
3325.description: Letter from Shadow Orim of Death Pass to Sir Karol Vasper of the Village of Gludin. The letter asks for the loan of the Sword of Seal.

3326.name: Orim's 2nd Letter
3326.description: Letter from Shadow Orim of Death Pass to Magister Iker of Town of Giran. The letter asks for the loan of the Bound Crystal.

3327.name: Sir Vasper's Letter
3327.description: Letter from Sir Klaus Vasper to Vadin of the Town of Oren. The letter gives permission for the use of the Sword of Seal.

3328.name: Vadin's Crucifix
3328.description: Holy crucifix of the order, given by Vadin. Take this and go hunt Tamlin Orcs.

3329.name: Tamlin Orc Amulet
3329.description: Amulets that the Tamlin Orcs carry for sorcery purposes. Gather 20 of these and take them to Vadin in Oren.

3330.name: Vadin's Sanctions
3330.description: Sanctions letter from Vadin allowing for the use of the Sword of Seal. Take this to Sir Klaus Vasper of the Town of Gludin.

3331.name: Iker's Amulet
3331.description: Amulet given by Magister Iker. It is said to have powers of protection against evil...

3332.name: Bound Crystal
3332.description: Crystal with the power to trap and seal the soul of a monster. Use this to seal the spirit of the Dre Vanul Zeruel.

3333.name: Purgatory Key
3333.description: Key needed to close Aklantoth' Chest. Take this to Shadow Orim in Death Pass.

3334.name: Zeruel Bind Crystal
3334.description: Crystal that contains the trapped soul of the Dre Vanul Prince Zeruel. Take this to Shadow Orim in Death Pass.

3335.name: 2nd Brimstone
3335.description: Mark left behind by the Dre Vanul Prince Zeruel while escaping from the body of Fisher Evert.

3336.name: Mark of Summoner
3336.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Summoner. Occupation change related item.

3337.name: Leto Lizardman Amulet
3337.description: Amulet obtained after slaying the Leto Lizardman on the Plains of the Lizardmen. Collect 30 of these and take them to Trader Lars in Dion.

3338.name: Red Spore Dust
3338.description: Red spores obtained from the bodies of the Giant Fungus. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Grocer Lars in Dion.

3339.name: Karul Bugbear Totem
3339.description: Totem obtained after slaying the Karul Bugbear. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Grocer Lars in Dion.

3340.name: Manashen Shard
3340.description: Shard of the shattered Manashen. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Grocer Lars in Dion.

3341.name: Breka Orc Totem
3341.description: Totem that can be obtained after slaying a Breka Orc. Collect 30 of them and take them to Grocer Lars in Dion.

3342.name: Crimson Bloodstone
3342.description: Soul Stone embedded in the body of a fettered soul. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Grocer Lars in Dion.

3343.name: Tyrant's Talons
3343.description: The talon of a slain Tyrant. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Grocer Lars in Dion.

3344.name: Noble Ant's Wings
3344.description: Wings obtained after slaying Noble Ants at the Ant Nest. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Grocer Lars in Dion.

3345.name: Windsus Tusk
3345.description: The tusks of a slain Windsus. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Grocer Lars in Dion.

3346.name: Wyrm's Fangs
3346.description: Fangs of a Wyrm slain in the Gorgon Flower Garden. Collect 30 of these and take them to Grocer Lars in Dion.

3347.name: Lars' List
3347.description: Collect 30 Leto Lizardman Amulets from the Plains of the Lizardmen and 30 units of Red Spore Dust from the Giant Fungus in the Sea of Spores.

3348.name: Lars' List
3348.description: Collect 30 Karul Bugbear Totems from Hunters Valley and 30 Manashen Shards from the Crater of the Ivory Tower.

3349.name: Lars' List
3349.description: Collect 30 Breka Orc Totems from Breka's Stronghold and 30 Crimson Bloodstones of Fettered Soul from Death Pass.

3350.name: Lars' List
3350.description: Collect 30 Tyrant's Talons from the Wastelands and 30 Windsus Tusks from Death Pass.

3351.name: Lars' List
3351.description: Collect 30 Noble Ant Wings from the Ant Nest and 30 Wyrm Fangs from Gorgon's Flower Garden.

3352.name: Galatea's Letter
3352.description: Letter from Head Summoner Galatea to Trader Lara in the Town of Dion.

3353.name: Beginner's Arcana
3353.description: Arcana card used by apprentice Summoners. You must have this in order to participate in Summoner battles.

3354.name: Almors' Arcana
3354.description: Summoner Almors' Arcana. The proof of victory from a battle. Take this to Head Summoner Galatea at the Magic Shop of the Village of Gludin.

3355.name: Camoniell's Arcana
3355.description: Summoner Camoniell's Arcana. The proof of victory from a battle. Take this to Head Summoner Galatea at the Magic Shop of the Village of Gludin.

3356.name: Belthus' Arcana
3356.description: Summoner Belthus' Arcana. The proof of victory from a battle. Take this to Head Summoner Galatea at the Magic Shop of the Village of Gludin.

3357.name: Basillia's Arcana
3357.description: Summoner Basillia's Arcana. The proof of victory from a battle. Take this to Head Summoner Galatea at the Magic Shop of the Village of Gludin.

3358.name: Celestiel's Arcana
3358.description: Summoner Celestiel's Arcana. The proof of victory from a battle. Take this to Head Summoner Galatea at the Magic Shop of the Village of Gludin.

3359.name: Brynthea's Arcana
3359.description: Summoner Brynthea's Arcana. The proof of victory from a battle. Take this to Head Summoner Galatea at the Magic Shop of the Village of Gludin.

3360.name: 1st Crystal of Starting
3360.description: Indication that a Summoner battle Has begun.

3361.name: 1st Crystal of Inprogress
3361.description: Indication that a Summoner battle is in progress.

3362.name: 1st Crystal of Foul
3362.description: Indication that foul play was involved in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Almors.

3363.name: 1st Crystal of Defeat
3363.description: Indication that the Summoner Has been defeated in battle. Take this to Summoner Almors.

3364.name: 1st Crystal of Victory
3364.description: Indication that the Summoner Has been victorious in a battle. Take this to Summoner Almors.

3365.name: 2nd Crystal of Starting
3365.description: Indication that a Summoner battle Has begun.

3366.name: 2nd Crystal of Inprogress
3366.description: Indication that a Summoner battle is in progress.

3367.name: 2nd Crystal of Foul
3367.description: Indication that foul play was involved in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Camoniell.

3368.name: 2nd Crystal of Defeat
3368.description: Indication that the Summoner Has been defeated in a battle. Take this to Summoner Camoniell.

3369.name: 2nd Crystal of Victory
3369.description: Indication that the Summoner Has been victorious in a battle. Take this to Summoner Camoniell.

3370.name: 3rd Crystal of Starting
3370.description: Indication that a Summoner battle Has begun.

3371.name: 3rd Crystal of Inprogress
3371.description: Indication that a Summoner battle is in progress.

3372.name: 3rd Crystal of Foul
3372.description: Indication that foul play was involved in a summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Belthus.

3373.name: 3rd Crystal of Defeat
3373.description: Indication that the Summoner Has been defeated in a battle. Take this to Summoner Belthus.

3374.name: 3rd Crystal of Victory
3374.description: Indication that the Summoner Has been victorious in a battle. Take this to Summoner Belthus.

3375.name: 4th Crystal of Starting
3375.description: Indication that a Summoner battle Has begun.

3376.name: 4th Crystal of Inprogress
3376.description: Indication that a Summoner battle is in progress.

3377.name: 4th Crystal of Foul
3377.description: Indication that foul play was involved in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Basillia.

3378.name: 4th Crystal of Defeat
3378.description: Indication that the Summoner Has been defeated in a battle. Take this to Summoner Basillia.

3379.name: 4th Crystal of Victory
3379.description: Indication that the Summoner Has been victorious in a battle. Take this to Summoner Basillia.

3380.name: 5th Crystal of Starting
3380.description: Indication that a Summoner battle Has begun.

3381.name: 5th Crystal of Inprogress
3381.description: Indication that a Summoner battle is in progress.

3382.name: 5th Crystal of Foul
3382.description: Indication that foul play was involved in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Celestiel.

3383.name: 5th Crystal of Defeat
3383.description: Indication that the Summoner Has been defeated in a battle. Take this to Summoner Celestiel.

3384.name: 5th Crystal of Victory
3384.description: Indication that the Summoner Has been victorious in a battle. Take this to Summoner Celestiel.

3385.name: 6th Crystal of Starting
3385.description: Indication that a Summoner battle Has begun.

3386.name: 6th Crystal of Inprogress
3386.description: Indication that a Summoner battle is in progress.

3387.name: 6th Crystal of Foul
3387.description: Indication that foul play was involved in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Brynthea.

3388.name: 6th Crystal of Defeat
3388.description: Indication that the Summoner Has been defeated in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Brynthea.

3389.name: 6th Crystal of Victory
3389.description: Indication that the Summoner Has been victorious in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Brynthea.

3390.name: Mark of Lord
3390.description: Mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Lord. Item for occupational change.

3391.name: Ritual Necklace
3391.description: Necklace given to those who are attempting the Test of the Lord. Go seek 5 Chiefs of different tribes and return with their approvals.

3392.name: Varkee's Charm
3392.description: The Atuba Chief Varkees's charm. Return to him after completing this task. He is waiting for you near the House of the King in Orc Village.

3393.name: Tantus' Charm
3393.description: The Neruga Chief Tantus' charm. Return to him after completing this task. He is waiting for you near the House of the King in Orc Village.

3394.name: Hatos' Charm
3394.description: The Urutu Chief Hatos' charm. Return to him after completing this task. He is waiting for you near the House of the King in Orc Village.

3395.name: Takuna's Charm
3395.description: The Duda-Mara Chief Takuna's charm. Return to him after completing this task. He is waiting for you at the Orc Guild of Oren.

3396.name: Chianta's Charm
3396.description: Gandi Chief Chianta's charm. Return to him after completing this task. He is waiting for you at the Orc Guild of Dion.

3397.name: Manakia's Orders
3397.description: Document containing orders of Priest Manakia of the Orc Guild of Giran. It tells you to kill Breka Orc Shamans and Breka Orc Overlords and bring back 20 Breka Orc fangs.

3398.name: Breka Orc Fang
3398.description: A Breka Orc's fang. Collect 20 of them and take them to Priest Manakia at the Orc Guild of Giran.

3399.name: Manakia's Amulet
3399.description: Mark received after passing Manakia's test. Take this to Atuba Chief Varkees in Orc Village.

3400.name: Huge Orc Fang
3400.description: The totem of the Atuba tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai.

3401.name: Sumari's Letter
3401.description: Letter from Blacksmith Sumari to Seer Somak in the Town of Dion.

3402.name: Urutu Blade
3402.description: Blade crafted by Blacksmith Sumari. Take this to Urutu Chief Hatos.

3403.name: Timak Orc Skull
3403.description: The skull of a slain Timak Orc. Gather 10 of these and take them to Urutu chief Hatos.

3404.name: Sword Into Skull
3404.description: The totem of the Urutu tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai at the House of the King in Orc Village.

3405.name: Neruga Axe Blade
3405.description: The blade portion of a ceremonial axe. Take this to Neruga Chief Tantus.

3406.name: Ceremonial Axe
3406.description: The totem of the Neruga tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai.

3407.name: Marsh Spider's Feeler
3407.description: Key ingredient in making the Duda-Mara tribe totem. Gather 10 of these and take them to Duda-Mara Chief Takuna.

3408.name: Marsh Spider's Feet
3408.description: Key ingredient in making the Duda-Mara tribe totem. Gather 10 of these and take them to Duda-Mara Chief Takuna.

3409.name: Handiwork Spider Brooch
3409.description: The totem of the Duda-Mara tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai.

3410.name: Reinforced Monster Cornea
3410.description: Key ingredient in making the Gandi tribe totem. Gather 20 of these and take them to Gandi Chief Chianta in Dion.

3411.name: Monster Eye Woodcarving
3411.description: The totem of the Gandi tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai at the House of the King in Orc Village.

3412.name: Bear Fang Necklace
3412.description: The totem of the Hestui tribe. Take this and go to the Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials.

3413.name: Martankus' Charm
3413.description: The talisman of the Ancestor Martankus. Go back to him after completing this task.

3414.name: Ragna Orc Head
3414.description: The head of a slain Ragna Orc. Take this to the Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials.

3415.name: Ragna Chief Notice
3415.description: He who destroys the Lord of Flame shall be appointed Chief. Take this to Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials.

3416.name: Immortal Flame
