3681.name: 2nd Potion Recipe
3681.description: Silenos Horn, Ant Soldier Aphid, Tyrant's Chitin, and Horror Ectoplasm of Mist Horror Ripper.

3682.name: Matild's Orb
3682.description: Certificate of Friendship from Alchemist Matild.

3683.name: Forbidden Love Scroll
3683.description: The secrets of depraved but rapturous love are written. May be sold at a high price to an interested person...

3684.name: Amber Basilisk Scale
3684.description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingredients to Alchemist Matild.

3685.name: Wind Soulstone
3685.description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingredients to Alchemist Matild.

3686.name: Glass Eye
3686.description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingredients to Alchemist Matild.

3687.name: Horror Ectoplasm
3687.description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingredients to Alchemist Matild.

3688.name: Silenos Horn
3688.description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingredients to Alchemist Matild.

3689.name: Ant Soldier Aphid
3689.description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingredients to Alchemist Matild.

3690.name: Tyrant's Chitin
3690.description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingredients to Alchemist Matild.

3691.name: Bugbear Blood
3691.description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingredients to Alchemist Matild.

3692.name: 1st Circle Hunter License
3692.description: Certificate that proves eligibility as a 1st Circle Hunter. You must have this to be able to carry out orders given by the Hunter Guild.

3693.name: 2nd Circle Hunter License
3693.description: Certificate that proves eligibility as a 2nd Circle Hunter. You must have this to be able to carry out orders given by the Hunter Guild.

3694.name: Laurel Leaf Pin
3694.description: Mark given to hunters that successfully carry out requests of the guild. The more experienced a hunter is, the more of these he or she Has.

3695.name: 1st Test Instructions
3695.description: Instructions for the 1st Circle Hunter Certificate test. Says to complete at least three of the six tasks presented by Grey.

3696.name: 2nd Test Instructions
3696.description: Instructions for the 2nd Circle Hunter Certificate test. Says to complete at least three of the six tasks presented by Grey.

3697.name: Cybellin's Request
3697.description: Asks you to raise the purity of blood crystal by killing Leto Lizardmen or Harit lizardmen with cybellin dagger.

3698.name: Blood Crystal: Purity 1
3698.description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 1. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

3699.name: Blood Crystal: Purity 2
3699.description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 2. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

3700.name: Blood Crystal: Purity 3
3700.description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 3. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

3701.name: Blood Crystal: Purity 4
3701.description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 4. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

3702.name: Blood Crystal: Purity 5
3702.description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 5. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

3703.name: Blood Crystal: Purity 6
3703.description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 6. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

3704.name: Blood Crystal: Purity 7
3704.description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 7. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

3705.name: Blood Crystal: Purity 8
3705.description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 8. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

3706.name: Blood Crystal: Purity 9
3706.description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 9. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

3707.name: Blood Crystal: Purity 10
3707.description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 10. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

3708.name: Broken Blood Crystal
3708.description: Blood crystal broken by magical inequality.

3709.name: Guardian Basilisk Scale
3709.description: Scale that was peeled off the corpse of Guardian Basilisk. Collect 40 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

3710.name: Karut Weed
3710.description: Blade of grass that Leto lizardman shamans use for medication. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

3711.name: Haka's Head
3711.description: Certificate proving that Breka overlord Haka was killed. Take it together with heads of Jaka and Marka to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

3712.name: Jakas' Head
3712.description: Certificate proving that breka overlord jaka was killed. Take it together with heads of haka and marka to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

3713.name: Marka's Head
3713.description: Certificate demonstrating that breka overlord marka was killed. Take it together with heads of haka and jaka to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

3714.name: Windsus Aleph Skin
3714.description: Skin peeled off after killing Windsus Aleph. Take it to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

3715.name: Indigo Spirit Ore
3715.description: Spirit Ore obtained from killing manashen or Reinforced Stone Golem. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

3716.name: Spore of the Sea of Spores
3716.description: Spore that comes out of the body of Giant Fungus. Collect 30 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

3717.name: Timak Orc Totem
3717.description: Small statue that Timak orc fighters carry on themselves. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

3718.name: Trisalim Silk
3718.description: Strong spider web that comes out of the body of trisalim. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

3719.name: Ambrosius Fruit
3719.description: Tree fruit obtained from killing valley treants. Collect 30 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

3720.name: Balefire Crystal
3720.description: Crystal of ill will obtained from killing tairim. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

3721.name: Imperial Arrowhead
3721.description: Arrowhead used by archers of the ancient Elmoreden empire. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

3722.name: Athu's Head
3722.description: Certificate proving that talk raider Athu was killed. Collect heads of five raiders and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

3723.name: Lanka's Head
3723.description: Certificate proving that talk raider Lanka was killed. Collect heads of five raiders and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

3724.name: Triska's Head
3724.description: Certificate proving that talk raider Triska was killed. Collect heads of five raiders and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

3725.name: Motura's Head
3725.description: Certificate proving that talk raider Motura was killed. Collect heads of five raiders and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

3726.name: Kalath' Head
3726.description: Certificate proving that talk raider Kalath was killed. Collect heads of five raiders and take them to Hunter Guild Member Greay.

3727.name: 1st Circle Request: 1C
3727.description: Kill Leto lizardman archer or soldier and get 40 totems of War Hero Kadesh.

3728.name: 1st Circle Request: 2C
3728.description: Kill timak orc warrior or overlord and get 50 timak jade necklaces.

3729.name: 1st Circle Request: 3C
3729.description: Kill Reinforced Stone Golems, collect and bring back 50 of the fragments.

3730.name: 1st Circle Request: 4C
3730.description: Get 30 pieces of giant floating eye.

3731.name: 1st Circle Request: 5C
3731.description: Kill dire Wyrms and collect and bring 40 eggs.

3732.name: 1st Circle Request: 6C
3732.description: Collect and bring 100 claws of Guardian Basilisk.

3733.name: 1st Circle Request: 7C
3733.description: Kill Fettered Souls and get 50 Deadman's Chains.

3734.name: 1st Circle Request: 8C
3734.description: Collect and bring 30 tusks of Windsus.

3735.name: 1st Circle Request: 9C
3735.description: Collect and bring 100 skulls of grandis.

3736.name: 1st Circle Request: 10C
3736.description: Kill taik orc archer or warrior and collect and bring 50 taik obsidian necklaces.

3738.name: 1st Circle Request: 12C
3738.description: Kill Tamlin Orc or Tamlin Orc Archer and collect and bring 40 tamlin ivory amulets.

3739.name: 1st Circle Request: 1B
3739.description: Kill leto chief Narak and bring the head.

3740.name: 1st Circle Request: 2B
3740.description: Collect and bring 50 Reinforced Gargoyle's horns.

3741.name: 1st Circle Request: 3B
3741.description: Kill breka orc warrior or shaman and get 50 coiled serpent totems.

3742.name: 1st Circle Request: 4B
3742.description: Kill leto shaman Ketz and get demon kadesh totem.

3743.name: 1st Circle Request: 5B
3743.description: Kill timak raider kaikee and bring the head.

3744.name: 1st Circle Request: 6B
3744.description: Get and bring 30 kronbe venom sacs.

3745.name: 1st Circle Request: 1A
3745.description: Kill spore zombie in the Spore Sea and bring 30 amulets of Eva.

3746.name: 1st Circle Request: 2A
3746.description: Kill grandis chief gok magok and bring back the Lesser Giant's Tablet.

3747.name: 1st Circle Request: 3A
3747.description: Kill Karul Chief Orooto and bring back the Book of Shunaiman.

3748.name: 2nd Circle Request: 1C
3748.description: Kill rot tree in the Sea of Spores and gather and bring 40 seeds.

3749.name: 2nd Circle Request 2C
3749.description: Gather and bring 40 trisalim venom sacs.

3750.name: 2nd Circle Request 3C
3750.description: Kill taik orc shaman or captain and get 50 taik orc totems.

3751.name: 2nd Circle Request: 4C
3751.description: Kill Harit Lizardman Soldier, Archer and Warrior and collect and bring 40 Harit Barbed Necklaces.

3752.name: 2nd Circle Request: 5C
3752.description: Kill the Harat Ratmen who dwell on the War-Torn Plains and collect 20 coins from the ancient empire and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3754.name: 2nd Circle Request: 7C
3754.description: Kill flines in the Enchanted Valley, collect and bring back 40 tempest shards.

3755.name: 2nd Circle Request: 8C
3755.description: Kill lieles in the Enchanted Valley, collect and bring back 40 tsunami shards.

3756.name: 2nd Circle Request: 9C
3756.description: Kill satyr or satyr elder and collect and bring 40 manes that were obtained.

3757.name: 2nd Circle Request: 10C
3757.description: Kill forest runner and collect and bring 40 hamadryadesung shards.

3758.name: 2nd Circle Request: 11C
3758.description: Kill vanor silenos soldier, scout or warrior and collect and bring 30 of their manes.

3759.name: 2nd Circle Request: 12C
3759.description: Kill taik bugbear warriors and collect and bring 30 Tarlk Bugbear totems.

3760.name: 2nd Circle Request: 1B
3760.description: Kill timak overlord okun and bring the head.

3761.name: 2nd Circle Request: 2B
3761.description: Kill taik overlord kakran and bring the head.

3762.name: 2nd Circle Request: 3B
3762.description: Destroy mirrors of the Forest of Mirrors and collect and bring 40 narcissus soulstones.

3765.name: 2nd Circle Request: 6B
3765.description: Kill vanor chief kerunos and remove and bring the mane.

3766.name: 2nd Circle Request: 1A
3766.description: Kill grave wanderers and collect and bring 20 skulls of executed persons.

3767.name: 2nd Circle Request: 2A
3767.description: Kill Harit Chieftain Kubel, recover the bust of King Travis and bring it.

3768.name: 2nd Circle Request: 3A
3768.description: Kill judges of marsh and collect and bring 10 swords of bodyguards of King Cadmus.

3769.name: Charm of Kadesh
3769.description: Totem obtained from killing Leto lizardman archers or soldiers. Collect 40 and take them to Hunter Guild.

3770.name: Timak Jade Necklace
3770.description: Necklace obtained from killing Timak orc warriors or warlords. Collect 50 and take them to Hunter Guild.

3771.name: Reinforced Stone Golem Shard
3771.description: Fragment of destroyed Reinforced Stone Golem. Collect 50 and take them to Hunter Guild.

3772.name: Giant Monster Eye Meat
3772.description: Piece cut for food from the corpse of a giant monster eye. Collect 30 and take them to Hunter Guild.

3773.name: Dire Wyrm Egg
3773.description: Egg obtained from female dire Wyrm. Collect 40 and take them to Hunter Guild.

3774.name: Guardian Basilisk Talon
3774.description: Claw removed from Guardian Basilisk corpse. Collect 100 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3775.name: Deadman's Chains
3775.description: Chain wrapped around the body of a fettered soul. Collect 50 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3776.name: Windsus Tusk
3776.description: Giant tooth of a Windsus. Collect 30 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3777.name: Grandis' Skull
3777.description: Skull obtained from killing grandis. Collect 100 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3778.name: Taik Obsidian Amulet
3778.description: Amulet obtained from killing Taik orc archers or warriors. Collect 50 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3779.name: Karul Bugbear Head
3779.description: Head cut off after killing Karul bugbears. Collect 30 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3780.name: Tamlin Ivory Charm
3780.description: Charm obtained from killing Tamlin Orcs or Tamlin Orc Archers. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3781.name: Fang of Narak
3781.description: Certificate of having killed Leto elder Narak. Take it to Guild Member Tor.

3782.name: Reinforced Gargoyle's Horn
3782.description: Horn obtained from destroyed Reinforced Gargoyle body. Collect 50 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3783.name: Coiled Serpent Totem
3783.description: Statue obtained from killing Breka orc warriors or shamen. Collect 50 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3784.name: Totem of Kadesh
3784.description: Statue of demon Kadesh obtained from killing Leto shaman Ketz. Take it to Guild Member Tor.

3785.name: Kaiki's Head
3785.description: Certificate of having killed Timak raider Kaikee. Take it to Guild Member Tor.

3786.name: Kronbe Venom Sac
3786.description: Venom sac obtained from killing kronbe. Collect 30 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3787.name: Eva's Charm
3787.description: Charm carried on the bodies of ancient Elven warriors. Collect 30 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3788.name: Lesser Giant's Tablet
3788.description: Ancient stone tablet recovered from grandis chief Gok Magok. Take it to Guild Member Tor.

3789.name: Book of Shunaiman
3789.description: Ancient document recovered from Karul Chief Orooto. Take it to Guild Member Tor.

3790.name: Rotting Tree Spores
3790.description: Seed collected from rot tree trunks. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3791.name: Trisalim Venom Sac
3791.description: Venom sac removed from trisalim corpse. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3792.name: Taik Orc Totem
3792.description: Statue obtained from killing Taik orc shamen or captains. Collect 50 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3793.name: Harit Barbed Necklace
3793.description: Necklace obtained from killing Harit lizardman soldiers, archers or warriors. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3794.name: Ancient Empire's Coin
3794.description: Coin used during the time of the ancient Elmoreden Empire. Collect 20 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3795.name: Skin of Farcran
3795.description: Skin removed after killing farcran. Collect 30 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3796.name: Tempest Shard
3796.description: Spirit ore obtained by killing a fline. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3797.name: Tsunami Shard
3797.description: Spirit ore obtained by killing a liele. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3798.name: Satyr Mane
3798.description: Mane obtained from killing satyr or satyr elders. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3799.name: Hamadryad Shard
3799.description: Spirit Ore obtained from killing forest runner. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3800.name: Vanor Silenos Mane
3800.description: Mane of vanor silenos soldiers, scouts or warriors. Collect 30 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3801.name: Tarlk Bugbear Totem
3801.description: Small statue that Tarlk Bugbear warriors carry around on their bodies. Collect 30 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3802.name: Okun's Head
3802.description: Certificate of having killed timak overlord okun. Take it to Guild Member Tor.

3803.name: Kakran's Head
3803.description: Certificate of having killed taik overlord kakran. Take it to Guild Member Tor.

3804.name: Narcissus' Soulstone
3804.description: Fragment of destroyed mirror. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3805.name: Deprive Eye
3805.description: Eye obtained from deprive corpse. Collect 20 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3806.name: Unicorn's Horn
3806.description: Horn obtained from killing unicorn or unicorn elder. Collect 20 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3807.name: Kerunos' Gold Mane
3807.description: Mane removed after killing vanor chief kerunos. Take it to Guild Member Tor.

3808.name: Skull of Executed
3808.description: Skull obtained from killing grave wanderer. Collect 20 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3809.name: Bust of Travis
3809.description: Bust of King Travis recovered from hatar chieftain kubel. Take it to Guild Member Tor.

3810.name: Sword of Cadmus
3810.description: Sword of bodyguard of King Cadmus recovered from judge of marsh. Collect 10 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

3811.name: Coin Diagram
3811.description: Illustration of the coin that Warehouse Keeper Sorint wants you to retrieve. Meet with Hunter Guild President Bernard who will instruct you on what to do next.

3812.name: Kaldis Gold Dragon
3812.description: Coin that is the same as that which Hunter Guild President Bernard Has. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Sorint.

3813.name: Coin Collector Membership 1
3813.description: Lv. 1 coin collector club membership card. You must have this to exchange coins with members of other places.

3814.name: Coin Collector Membership 2
3814.description: Lv. 2 coin collector club membership card. You must have this to exchange coins with level 2 or level 3 members of other places.

3815.name: Coin Collector Membership 3
3815.description: Lv. 3 coin collector club membership card. You must have this to exchange coins with level 3 members of other places.

3816.name: Fairy Stone
3816.description: Jewel required to meet and talk with fairy Mimyu.

3817.name: Deluxe Fairy Stone
3817.description: Jewel required to meet and talk with fairy Mimyu. Be careful because creatures living in Enchanted Valley disappear when killed.

3818.name: Fairy Stone List
3818.description: 4 Accessory Gems (Low-grade), 2 Armor Fragments (Low-grade), 1 Gemstone (D-grade), 10 pieces of Toad Lord Back Skin and 1 Cokes

3819.name: Deluxe Fairy Stone List
3819.description: 5 Accessory Gems (Low-grade), 2 Armor Fragments (Low-grade), 1 Gemstone (C-grade), 10 pieces of Toad Lord Back Skin and 1 Cokes

3820.name: Toad Lord Back Skin
3820.description: Haggard backskin of a toad lord. Ingredient used for removing impurities from fairy stone.

3821.name: Juice of Monkshood
3821.description: Medicine needed to talk with drakes or Wyrms.

3822.name: Scale of Drake Exarion
3822.description: Scale of drake exarion. Take this and recover 20 eggs from leto lizardman warriors near Oren Castle.

3823.name: Egg of Drake Exarion
3823.description: Egg of drake exarion recovered from leto lizardman warriors.

3824.name: Scale of Drake Zwov
3824.description: Scale of drake zwov. Take this and recover 20 eggs from marsh spiders of Cruma Marshlands.

3825.name: Egg of Drake Zwov
3825.description: Egg of drake zwov recovered from marsh spiders.

3826.name: Scale of Drake Kalibran
3826.description: Scale of Drake Kalibran. Take this and recover 20 Eggs from Road Scavengers near Death Pass.

3827.name: Egg of Drake Kalibran
3827.description: Drake Kalibran Egg recovered from Road Scavengers.

3828.name: Scale of Wyvern Suzet
3828.description: Scale of Wyvern Suzet. Take this and recover 20 eggs from Breka Orc Overlords in northern Giran.

3829.name: Egg of Wyvern Suzet
3829.description: Egg of Wyvern Suzet recovered from Breka Orc Overlords.

3830.name: Scale of Wyvern Shamhai
3830.description: Scale of wyvern shamhai. Take this and recover 20 eggs from deadseekers of the Execution Grounds.

3831.name: Egg of Wyvern Shamhai
3831.description: Egg of wyvern shamhai recovered from deadseekers.

3832.name: Herb of Harit
3832.description: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time.

3833.name: Herb of Vanor
3833.description: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time.

3834.name: Herb of Oel Mahum
3834.description: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time.

3835.name: Blood of Eva
3835.description: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time.

3836.name: Ritasha's Coin
3836.description: If you collect three Ritasha's coins and take them to Sorceress Ritasha, you will be able to obtain Blood of Eva.

3837.name: Symbol of Loyalty
3837.description: Certificate acquired in exchange for the life of a clan member. Take this to the clan leader.

3838.name: Recipe: Giant's Powerstone (25%)
3838.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for Quest. Required to make a Giant's Powerstone. Requires Create Item - Skill Lv. 2. The success rate is 25%.

3839.name: Mist Drake's Egg
3839.description: Egg of mist drake. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martien.

3840.name: Blitz Wyrm Egg
3840.description: Egg of blitz Wyrm. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martien.

3841.name: Drake's Egg
3841.description: Egg of drake. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martien.

3842.name: Thunder Wyrm Egg
3842.description: Thunder Wyrm Egg. The clan leader must collect ten of each of the four kinds of eggs and take them to Martien.

3843.name: Brooch of the Magpie
3843.description: This brooch that was left by a dying Dwarf to be delivered to Head Blacksmith Kusto, his younger brother in Town of Giran.

3844.name: Nebulite Crystals
3844.description: Soulshot of unknown identity. The clan leader must collect ten each of this and Giant's Powerstones and take it all to Balthazar.

3845.name: Giant's Broken Powerstone
3845.description: Giant's Powerstone. It is broken and useless.

3846.name: Giant's Powerstone
3846.description: Giant's Powerstone. The clan leader must collect ten of these and also, ten Nebulite Crystals and take them all to Balthazar.

3847.name: Imperial Key
3847.description: Key used when opening imperial coffer. Must have all six to open the coffer.

3848.name: Undead Ash
3848.description: Ash dust remaining after an undead of the Execution Grounds is destroyed. Collect this and take it to Mercenary Sophya.

3849.name: Bloody Axe Insignia
3849.description: Insignia obtained from killing Ol Mahums in the Fortress of Resistance. Collect these and take them to Mercenary Sophya.

3850.name: Delu Lizardman Fang
3850.description: Tooth removed after killing a Delu Lizardman. Collect these and take them to Mercenary Sophya.

3851.name: Stakato Talon
3851.description: Claw cut off after killing Marsh Stakatos of the Cruma Marshlands. Collect this and take it to Mercenary Sophya.

3852.name: Gabrielle's Feather
3852.description: Mark given by Seal Guardian Gabrielle. Receive recognition for your abilities after taking this and meeting the other guardians.

3853.name: Marsh Stalker Horn
3853.description: The horn that was cut off of a marsh stalker after it was killed. Take it to Magister Kaiena, the Watchman of the Seal.

3854.name: Marsh Drake Talons
3854.description: The talons that were removed from a marsh drake after it was killed. Take them to Magister Kaiena, the Watchman of the Seal.

3855.name: Kranrot Skin
3855.description: The skin that was removed from a Kranrot after it was killed. Take it to Prefect Chakiris, the Watchman of the Seal.

3856.name: Hamrut Leg
3856.description: The leg that was removed from a Hamrut and skinned after it was killed. Take it to Prefect Chakiris, the Watchman of the Seal.

3857.name: Remains of Sacrifice
3857.description: The remains of a sacrificed soul. Take them to High Priest Orven, the Watchman of the Seal.

3858.name: Totem of Earth Dragon
3858.description: The totem created by Harit lizardmen who worship Antharas. Take it to Master Kendra the Watchman of the Seal.

3859.name: 1st Fragment of Abyssal Jewel
3859.description: Fragment obtained by destroying an Abyssal Jewel in Gludio. Take it to Warehouse Chief Moke, the Watchman of the Seal.

3860.name: 2nd Fragment of Abyssal Jewel
3860.description: Fragment obtained by destroying an Abyssal Jewel in Oren. Take it to Blacksmith Helton, the Watchman of the Seal.

3861.name: 3rd Fragment of Abyssal Jewel
3861.description: Fragment obtained from destroying Abyssal Jewel. Take this to Antharas Watchman Theodric at the entrance to Antharas' Lair.

3862.name: Mara Fang
3862.description: The proof obtained after killing jewel guardian Mara. Take it to Warehouse Chief Moke, the Watchman of the Seal.

3863.name: Musfel Fang
3863.description: The proof obtained after killing jewel guardian Musfel. Take it to Blacksmith Helton, the Watchman of the Seal.

3864.name: Guardian's Mark
3864.description: Certificate of having been recognized by seal guardian. Return to Gabrielle after receiving certificates from guardians of each region.

3865.name: Portal Stone
3865.description: Item needed to activate the teleport crystal that teleports to Antharas' Lair.

3866.name: Gustav's 1st Letter
3866.description: Secret letter sent by Sir Gustav Athebaldt to his aides. Get a hold of it and take it to Martien of the Town of Giran.

3867.name: Gustav's 2nd Letter
3867.description: Letter sent by Sir Gustav Athebaldt to those supporting him. Take it to Balthazar of Hunter Village.

3868.name: Gustav's 3rd Letter
3868.description: Letter sent by Sir Gustav Athebaldt to those supporting him. Take it to Sir Eric Rodemai of the Town of Aden.

3869.name: Scepter of Judgment
3869.description: Scepter bestowed on Founding Emperor Shunaiman of the ancient Elmoreden Empire by the god of light. Certificate representing the emperor's authority.

3870.name: Proof of Aspiration
3870.description: Item needed for a clan leader to raise the clan to level 5.

3871.name: Black Anvil Coin
3871.description: Commemorative coin given as an expression of gratitude by the Black Anvil Guild.

3872.name: Antidote Ingredients List
3872.description: Herb of Vanor, Herb of Oel Mahum, Herb of Harit and Blood of Eva.

3873.name: Voucher of Faith
3873.description: If you take this document to Sir Kristof Rodemai, you will receive the Proof of Alliance.

3874.name: Proof of Alliance
3874.description: Item needed for a clan leader to raise the clan to level 4.

3875.name: Letter - A
3875.description: Combine with other letters to create a special word and bring it to Angel Cat to receive a great gift!

3876.name: Letter - C
3876.description: Combine with other letters to create a special word and bring it to Angel Cat to receive a great gift!

3877.name: Letter - E
3877.description: Combine with other letters to create a special word and bring it to Angel Cat to receive a great gift!

3878.name: Letter - F
3878.description: Combine with other letters to create a special word and bring it to Angel Cat to receive a great gift!

3889.name: Potion of Recovery
3889.description: Remedy that can neutralize the Poison of Witch Kalis. If the clan leader uses this, the Poisoning is healed.

3890.name: Badge of Slayer
3890.description: Certificate showing eligibility to participate in the group to conquer Antharas. Take this and go meet Antharas Watchman Gilmore.

3936.description: Magic scroll that resurrects a dead character and restores his or her XP completely.

3947.name: Blessed Spiritshot (No-grade)
3947.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing its magic significantly. Used with No-grade weapons.

3948.name: Blessed Spiritshot (D-grade)
3948.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing its magic significantly. Used with D-grade weapons.

3949.name: Blessed Spiritshot (C-grade)
3949.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing its magic significantly. Used with C-grade weapons.

3950.name: Blessed Spiritshot (B-grade)
3950.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing its magic significantly. Used with B-grade weapons.

3951.name: Blessed Spiritshot (A-grade)
3951.description: The power of a Spiritshot is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing its magical power. Used with A-grade weapons.

3952.name: Blessed Spiritshot (S-grade)
3952.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, spontaneously increasing its M. Atk. significantly. Used with an S-grade weapon.

3964.description: Cannot be used. Can be sold at an NPC’s store.

3969.name: Mercenary Posting Ticket (Wizard/Mobile)
3969.description: Cannot be used. Can be sold at an NPC’s store.

3983.name: Mercenary Posting Ticket (Teleporter1)
3983.description: Placed in Dion, at the Teleporter or inside the castle, this ticket allows teleportation to the inner castle or the guardian's location.

3984.name: Mercenary Posting Ticket (Teleporter2)
3984.description: Placed in Dion, at the Teleporter or inside the castle, this ticket allows teleportation to the outer castle or the guardian's location.

3985.name: Mercenary Posting Ticket (Teleporter3)
3985.description: Placed in Dion, at the Teleporter or inside the castle, this ticket allows teleportation to the inner or outer castle.

3996.name: Mercenary Posting Ticket (Teleporter1)
3996.description: Placed in Giran, at the Teleporter or inside the castle, this ticket allows teleportation to the inner castle or the guardian's location.

3997.name: Mercenary Posting Ticket (Teleporter2)
3997.description: Placed in Giran, at the Teleporter or inside the castle, this ticket allows teleportation to the outer castle or the guardian's location.

4009.name: Mercenary Posting Ticket (Teleporter1)
4009.description: Placed in Oren, at the Teleporter or inside the castle, this ticket allows teleportation to the inner castle or the guardian's location.

4010.name: Mercenary Posting Ticket (Teleporter2)
4010.description: Placed in Oren, at the Teleporter or inside the castle, this ticket allows teleportation to the outer castle or the guardian's location.

4011.name: Mercenary Posting Ticket (Teleporter3)
4011.description: Placed in Oren, at the Teleporter or inside the castle, this ticket allows teleportation to the inner or outer castle.

4022.name: Mercenary Posting Ticket (Teleporter1)
4022.description: Placed in Aden, at the Teleporter or inside the castle, this ticket allows teleportation to the East or West Gate of the inner castle, the halls or the guardian's location.

4023.name: Mercenary Posting Ticket (Teleporter2)
4023.description: Placed in Aden, at the Teleporter or inside the castle, this ticket allows teleportation to the outer castle, the East Gate of the inner castle, the halls or the guardian's location.

4024.name: Mercenary Posting Ticket (Teleporter3)
4024.description: Placed in Aden, at the Teleporter or inside the castle, this ticket allows teleportation to the outer castle, the West Gate of the inner castle, the halls or the guardian's location.

4025.name: Mercenary Posting Ticket (Teleporter4)
4025.description: Placed in Aden, at the Teleporter or inside the castle, this ticket allows teleportation to the outer castle, the East or West Gate of the inner castle, or the guardian's location.

4026.name: Mercenary Posting Ticket (Teleporter5)
4026.description: Placed in Aden, at the Teleporter or inside the castle, this ticket allows teleportation to the outer castle, the East or West Gate of the inner castle, or the halls.

4200.name: Spellbook: Restore Life
4200.description: Spellbook needed to learn Restore Life. Used by Bishops.\nRequired level: 44

4201.name: Spellbook: Stun Resistance
4201.description: Spellbook needed to learn Stun Resistance. Used by Elven Elders.\nRequired level: 40

4203.name: Spellbook: Life Leech
4203.description: Spellbook needed to learn Life Leech. Used by Shillien Knights.\nRequired level: 40

4204.name: Amulet: Pa'agrio's Tact
4204.description: Amulet required for the Pa'agrio's Tact spell. Used by Overlords.\nRequired level: 40

4205.name: Amulet: Pa'agrio's Rage
4205.description: Amulet required for the Pa'agrio's Rage spell. Used by Overlords.\nRequired level: 44

4206.name: Spellbook: Transfer Pain
4206.description: Spellbook needed to learn Transfer Pain. Used by Necromancers, Warlocks, Elemental Summoners and Phantom Summoners.\nRequired level: 40

4207.name: Spellbook: Mana Regeneration
4207.description: Spellbook needed to learn Mana Regeneration. Used by Spellsingers.\nRequired level: 40

4208.name: Spellbook: Curse Gloom
4208.description: Spellbook needed to learn Curse Gloom. Used by Necromancers.\nRequired level: 44

4209.name: Change of Heart - Piece 1
4209.description: Used only during the Change of Heart event. Complete a heart and take it to Puss the Cat to claim your prize.

4210.name: Change of Heart - Piece 2
4210.description: Used only during the Change of Heart event. Complete a heart and take it to Puss the Cat to claim your prize.

4211.name: Change of Heart - Piece 3
4211.description: Used only during the Change of Heart event. Complete a heart and take it to Puss the Cat to claim your prize.

4212.name: Change of Heart - Piece 4
4212.description: Used only during the Change of Heart event. Complete a heart and take it to Puss the Cat to claim your prize.

4213.name: Change of Heart - Piece 5
4213.description: Used only during the Change of Heart event. Complete a heart and take it to Puss the Cat to claim your prize.

4214.name: Change of Heart - Piece 6
4214.description: Used only during the Change of Heart event. Complete a heart and take it to Puss the Cat to claim your prize.

4215.name: Change of Heart - Piece 7
4215.description: Used only during the Change of Heart event. Complete a heart and take it to Puss the Cat to claim your prize.

4216.name: Change of Heart - Piece 8
4216.description: Used only during the Change of Heart event. Complete a heart and take it to Puss the Cat to claim your prize.

4217.name: Change of Heart - Piece 9
4217.description: Used only during the Change of Heart event. Complete a heart and take it to Puss the Cat to claim your prize.

4239.name: Blade Mold
4239.description: Cargo that Trader Arodin needs to send to the Dark Elves. Find all 20 of them and take them to Trader Tyra.

4240.name: Tyra's Bill
4240.description: Note from Trader Tyra. Take it to Trader Arodin in Gludin Village.

4241.name: Ranger's Report - Part 1
4241.description: First piece of a ranger's report. Find all 4 pieces and take them to Guard Alvah.

4242.name: Ranger's Report - Part 2
4242.description: Second piece of a ranger's report. Find all 4 pieces and take them to Guard Alvah.

4243.name: Ranger's Report - Part 3
4243.description: Third piece of a ranger's report. Find all 4 pieces and take them to Guard Alvah.

4244.name: Ranger's Report - Part 4
4244.description: Fourth piece of a ranger's report. Find all 4 pieces and take them to Guard Alvah.

4245.name: Weapons Trade Contract
4245.description: The contract that was carried by an Ol Mahum General. It is engraved with the Mark of the Dwarves. Take it to Guard Alvah.

4246.name: Attack Directives
4246.description: Operation order that was carried by an Ol Mahum General. Take it to Guard Alvah.

4247.name: Certificate of the Silver Scale Guild
4247.description: Certificate that verifies one's membership to the Silver Scale Guild.

4248.name: Rolento's Cargobox
4248.description: The war supplies that the Dwarven trader Rolento promised to send to Turek orcs. First, show it to Guard Alvah.

4249.name: Ol Mahum Captain's Head
4249.description: Severed head of an Ol Mahum Captain. Collect 30 of them and take them to Turek Chief Burai.

4250.name: Jade Crystal
4250.description: Jade gemstone from the Enchanted Valley. Collect them and take them to Bentley of Hunter's Village.

4251.name: Ancient Goddess Statue
4251.description: Statue of a goddess from an old empire that has been discovered in the cemetery. Take it to Priestess Flownia of Town of Aden.

4252.name: GalfRedo Romer's Bust
4252.description: Statue created by the ancient sculptor Berona. Take it to Trader Galibredo of the Town of Oren.

4253.name: Eye of the Shadow
4253.description: Collect 50 eyes of the Shadow and take them to Warehouse Keeper Sorint.

4254.name: Certificate of Participation: Battle Royal
4254.description: The certificate that allows one to participate in a Battle Royal. This game is played by grade 1 members of the Coin Collectors Club.

4255.name: Trade Cargo
4255.description: The cargo boxes that have been robbed from the wagon of the Trade Guild. Collect 30 of them and take them to Guard Weisz.

4256.name: Agnes' Holy Symbol
4256.description: The Crucifix of the goddess of Einhasad. This article was left by Priestess Agnes after her death. Take it along with Agnes' Rosary to Priest Adonius.

4257.name: Agnes' Rosary
4257.description: Rosary used while praying. It was left by Priestess Agnes after her death. Take it along with the Crucifix of the goddess of Einhasad to Priest Adonius.

4258.name: Sinister Totem
4258.description: Black totem that exudes an evil aura. Take it to High Priestess Levian.

4259.name: Bear Skin
4259.description: The pelts obtained by hunting bears. Collect 20 of them and take them to Grocer Pano of Floran Village.

4260.name: Enku Orc's Head
4260.description: Beheaded head of an Enku Orc. Collect 100 of them and take them to Orc Lady Jennifer.

4261.name: Orc Heads Bouquet - 1
4261.description: Bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to High Prefect Drikus.

4262.name: Orc Heads Bouquet - 2
4262.description: Bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Priest Manuel.

4263.name: Orc Heads Bouquet - 3
4263.description: Bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Vuku Chief Driko.

4264.name: Orc Heads Bouquet - 4
4264.description: Bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Seer Somak.

4265.name: Orc Heads Bouquet - 5
4265.description: Bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Prefect Dowki.

4266.name: Orc Heads Bouquet - 6
4266.description: Bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Watchman Endrigo.

4267.name: Orc Heads Bouquet -7
4267.description: Bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Captain Lucas.

4268.name: Jennifer's Box
4268.description: The box that a man who is smitten by Orc Lady Jennifer asked this to be delivered to her. What do you think is in the box...?

4269.name: Articles of Dead Heroes
4269.description: The articles of dead soldiers who were sent as an expeditionary force 1,000 years ago. These articles have been collected by hunting cave servants. Take them to Antharas Watchman Gilmore.

4270.name: Old Key
4270.description: Article left by a dead soldier. His descendent Sir Kristof Rodemai is living in Town of Giran. Take it to him.

4271.name: Old Hilt
4271.description: Article left by a dead soldier. His descendant Duelist Kaien is living in the Town of Oren. Take it to him.

4272.name: Totem Necklace
4272.description: Article left by a dead soldier. His descendent, High Prefect Garvarentz, is living in Hunter's Village. Take it to him.

4273.name: Einhasad's Crucifix
4273.description: Article left by a dead soldier. Take it to High Priest Orven of Einhasad Temple in Town of Aden where the dead soldier used to be stationed.

4274.name: Victim's Arm Bone
4274.description: The arm bone of a victim who has been eaten by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia.

4275.name: Victim's Thigh Bone
4275.description: The thigh bone of a victim who has been eaten by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia.

4276.name: Victim's Skull
4276.description: The skull of a victim who has been eaten alive by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia.

4277.name: Victim's Rib Bone
4277.description: The rib bone of a victim who has been eaten by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia.

4278.name: Victim's Spine
4278.description: The spine of a victim who has been eaten by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia.

4279.name: Jar of Bones
4279.description: Urn that contains the bones of all the victims. Ask Mad Doctor Orpheus to resurrect the victims.

4280.name: Useless Bone Pieces
4280.description: Useless bone pieces obtained after hunting Crokians. If you take them to Orpheus, perhaps something good will happen...?

4281.name: Powder to Summon Dead Souls
4281.description: The magic powder bought from Magister Xenovia. Throw it along with the victims' bones into a the Psychic Medium's Urn.

4282.name: Sack of the Dead
4282.description: Sack containing victim's soul. Urn was possessed by the victim's soul. Take it to Locksmith Dorothy.

4283.name: Frog Prince
4283.description: What are you waiting for? You promised to help me! Release me from this curse immediately! I want to turn back to normal as soon as possible!!!

4284.name: Fly Powder
4284.description: Powder made by grinding dried flies. Use it when you fail in your attempt to transform a frog.

4285.name: Calculator
4285.description: The latest model of calculator. Take it to Blacksmith Brunon.

4286.name: Gemstone Beast's Crystal
4286.description: Crystal obtained by slaying a gemstone beast. Collect 10 of these and take them to Blacksmith Silvera.

4289.name: Hanellin's Letter
4289.description: Give this letter to Claudia Athebaldt in Aden.

4292.name: Key of Ark
4292.description: The key you got after killing Elberoth, the Ark Guardian. Use it to open the ark and obtain the sacred item.

4294.name: White Cloth
4294.description: A reward for eliminating enemies in the Platinum Tribe. Collect 100 pcs. and bring them to Magister Hanellin.

4295.name: Blood-stained Cloth
4295.description: A cloth soaked in the blood of Angels and Platinum Tribe. According to Hanellin, you must wrap it around your body to challenge Baium.

4296.name: Order of Gosta
4296.description: The order states that you should hunt Tasaba Lizardmen and Tasaba Lizardman Shaman and bring back their fangs as proof.

4297.name: Lizardman's Fang
4297.description: The fangs that have been collected as proofs that Tasaba Lizardmen and Tasaba Lizardman Shaman have been hunted.

4298.name: Barrel of League
4298.description: This seems to be the cargo that was stolen from Iason Heine's wagon by Tasaba Lizardmen.

4315.name: Gandi Tribe's Relic
4315.description: The sacred object of the Gandi Tribe that has been recovered from Bugbears. Take it to Gandi Chief Chianta in the Town of Dion.

4316.name: Swan's Flute
4316.description: Flute that Troubadour Swan had obtained as a gift for Musician Nanarin.

4317.name: Swan's Letter
4317.description: Love letter that Troubadour Swan wants to send to Musician Nanarin along with the flute. Take them to Musician Nanarin.

4318.name: Event Clothes
4318.description: Gift that Musician Nanarin is sending to Musician Barbado. Take it to Barbado.

4319.name: Nanarin's Flute
4319.description: Gift that Musician Nanarin is sending to Musician Barbado. Take it to Barbado.

4320.name: Sabrin's Black Beer
4320.description: Gift that Musician Nanarin is sending to Musician Barbado. Take it to Barbado.

4321.name: Stolen Black Beer
4321.description: Black beer that was stolen from Jonas. Take it to Trader Sabrin.

4322.name: Stolen Event Clothes
4322.description: Event clothes that were stolen from Trader Sonia. Take them to Guard Xaber.

4323.name: Clothes Chest Key
4323.description: The key given by Bard Swan. Use this key to open the clothes chest and retrieve the event clothes.

4324.name: Beer Chest Key
4324.description: The key given by Bard Swan. Use this key to open the beer chest and get the black beer out of it.

4325.name: Fairy Leaf
4325.description: Leaf given by Fairy Mimyu to put on the fairy's neck wound that was inflicted by a Hatchling.

4326.name: Ratman Scavenger's Skull
4326.description: Heads of Ratman Scavengers that you hunted after receiving a request from Katari. Collect 10 of them and take them to Katari.

4327.name: Turek War Hound's Tail
4327.description: The tails of Turek war Hounds that Piotur asks you to catch. Collect 10 of them and take them to Piotur.

4328.name: Tyrant Kingpin's Heart
4328.description: Tyrant Kingpin's Heart. Take it to Elder Casian.

4329.name: Trisalim Tarantula's Venom Sac
4329.description: The venom sacs of Trisalim Tarantulas that Magister Joan asked you to hunt. Collect three and take them to Magister Joan.

4332.name: Tarlk Amulet
4332.description: Mark that can be obtained by catching a Tarlk Bugbear or a Tarlk Basilisk. Collect 30 and take them to a Clan Hall Herald.

4333.name: Contest Certificate
4333.description: Certificate that one can present to participate in the hunt for Tarlk Basilisks, a preliminary contest for a Clan Hall Siege War.

4334.name: Ant Fluids
4334.description: Bodily fluids extracted from ants or Ant Captains. Collect 20 and take them to Elder Casian.

4335.name: Noble Ant's Nerve Tissue
4335.description: The nerve tissue harvested from a Noble Ant's head. Take it to Elder Casian along with the Ant Fluids.

4336.name: Casian's Enzyme
4336.description: Enzyme created by Elder Casian. Find the Ant Larvae Sleeping within the Ant Nest Dungeon and administer the enzyme to them.

4342.name: Water Crystal
4342.description: Lump of crystal that contains the energy of water. You should find the Stone Statue of Water and dedicate it to the statue.

4343.name: Fire Crystal
4343.description: Lump of crystal that contains the energy of fire. You should find the Stone Statue of Fire and dedicate it to the statue.

4344.name: Wind Crystal
4344.description: Lump of crystal that contains the energy of wind. You should find the Stone Statue of Wind and dedicate it to the statue.

4345.name: Earth Crystal
4345.description: Lump of crystal that contains the energy of earth. You should find the Stone Statue of Earth and dedicate it to the statue.

4346.name: Dark Crystal
4346.description: Lump of crystal that contains the energy of darkness. You should find the Stone Statue of Darkness and dedicate it to the statue.

4347.name: Crystal of Light
4347.description: Lump of crystal that contains the energy of light. You should find the Stone Statue of Light and dedicate it to the statue.

4348.name: Jade Crystal
4348.description: Jade crystals that had been gathered from the Enchanted Valley. Collect them and take them to Bentley of Hunter's Village.

4349.name: Ancient Bust
4349.description: Statue of a goddess that was created by the ancient sculptor Berona in ancient times.

4350.name: Ancient Goddess Statue: ?
4350.description: Statue created by the ancient sculptor Berona. It Has not been evaluated by antique experts yet.

4351.name: Ancient Goddess Statue: Prototype
4351.description: Statue created by Berona, an ancient sculptor. - Prototype

4352.name: Ancient Goddess Statue: Original
4352.description: Statue created by Berona, a sculptor in ancient times. - Original

4353.name: Ancient Goddess Statue: Replica
4353.description: Replicated statues that have been created by present day sculptors who imitated Berona's works.

4354.name: Ancient Goddess Statue: Forgery
4354.description: Forgeries that have been created in imitation of the ancient sculptor Berona's works.

4359.name: Barrel of Liquor
4359.description: Barrel that is filled to the brim with delicious and fragrant liquor. The barrel is very heavy.

4360.name: Precious Scarab
4360.description: Scarab that is transparent and shines like a precious stone. Among hustlers it is traded at a high price.

4361.name: Simbelmyne
4361.description: Type of flower that is believed to have the power to heal sickness. It is a favorite of elves.

4362.name: Odd Doll
4362.description: It is a strange looking statue of a living creature that looks like an imp. It is an orc's favorite item.

4363.name: Scarlet Dress
4363.description: Very attractive scarlet Aden-style dress designed for a virtuous lady.

4364.name: Nebulite Orb
4364.description: It is made by cutting Nebulite into a spherical shape. Take this to Magic Trader Cema in Hardin's Academy.

4365.name: Ectoplasm Liqueur
4365.description: Exotic tasting liqueur made from ectoplasm. Very popular among connoisseurs.

4366.name: Prince's Trophy
4366.description: The winning trophy that Prince Malcom won in a dance competition. You can sell it at a store or keep it as a souvenir.

4367.name: Prince's Autobiography
4367.description: The autobiography of Prince Malcom that bears his hand-written signature. Sell it at a store.

4368.name: Prince's Bust
4368.description: Statue of Prince Malcom made of pure gold. Although quite ugly, it will fetch a handsome price.

4369.name: Silk Handkerchief
4369.description: Beautiful and elaborate handkerchief decorated with a flower pattern and lace. Its design could attract the attention of princes and princesses.

4370.name: Luxurious Goblet
4370.description: Luxuriously designed goblet. It seems to be an object made during the period of the Elmo Aden Empire.

4371.name: Scepter of Darkness
4371.description: Staff that gives off dark M. Atk. On its handle, the words "Great Demon King" are engraved.

4372.name: Succubus Perfume
4372.description: Perfume used by Succubus noblewomen. Very strong fragrance, not popular among Elves and Humans.

4373.name: Succubus Mirror
4373.description: Mirror used by Succubus noblewomen when they put on cosmetics. It is also said to be used occasionally by blood queens.

4374.name: Heart of Darkness
4374.description: Heart-shaped stone piece that gives off the aura of dark M. Atk. On its reverse, the words "I love you Merkenis!" are engraved.

4375.name: Royal Orc Totem
4375.description: Totem made by carving out a whole lump of red granite.

4376.name: Pearl Trodden/Trampled By A Wild Hog
4376.description: Walnut sized bead that is smeared with dirt. Perhaps, it is a pearl.

4377.name: Boar's Tusk
4377.description: The tusk of a boar that looks somewhat similar to the ivory of an elephant.

4378.name: Sweet Potato
4378.description: Large sized sweet potato that was just plucked out of the soil. You s it or roast it. It will make a delicious treat.

4379.name: Beast's Claws
4379.description: White lion's sharp claws. It is rumored that it is being traded among collectors at a high price.

4380.name: Beast's Mane
4380.description: White lion's luxuriant mane. It is rumored to be sold at a high price among collectors.

4381.name: Ginseng Root
4381.description: Rare medicine imported from the Orient.

4383.name: Bear's Gall
4383.description: The gall of a bear that is known to be highly effective in promoting one's health and well-being as well as having mysterious healing properties.

4384.name: Fresh Samon
4384.description: Fresh salmon that seems to have been just caught from a river.

4385.name: Sushi Riceball
4385.description: The Schuttgart type sushi rice ball. The delicious seasoning of well minced meat gets absorbed into a the rice and produces a wonderful taste.

4386.name: Avellan Spice
4386.description: Exotic spice that has been imported from Avella of the Orient.

4387.name: Lucky Rabbit Weed
4387.description: Rabbit weed that is supposed to bring luck. It is the favorite food of rabbits and elpys.

4388.name: Malcom's Check
4388.description: Check of tremendous face value signed by Prince Malcom. It can be cashed at a warehouse in Town of Giran.

4389.name: Deposit Box Key
4389.description: Key for a private deposit box located in a warehouse in Town of Giran.

4390.name: Dwarven Royal Seal
4390.description: Royal seal made of carved jade. It is engraved with the seal of the Dwarven royal family.

4391.name: Dwarven Royal Crown
4391.description: King's crown made of gold. It is engraved with the seal of the Dwarven royal family.

4392.name: Dwarven Dance Manual
4392.description: Dance manual that details ballroom dancing techniques. This book will make you a dancing hero!

4393.name: Calculator
4393.description: Allows one to perform a simple calculation.

4397.name: Book of Saint
4397.description: Holy Writ of Solina, which looks like an ordinary book. Take it to Magister Hanellin.

4400.name: White Cloth
4400.description: A reward for eliminating Angels. Collect 1,000 pcs. and bring them to Magister Hanellin.

4404.name: Green Dimensional Stone - Shard
4404.description: Broken shard of the green Dimensional Stone. Collect these and take them to Researcher Kaplan.

4405.name: Blue Dimensional Stone - Shard
4405.description: Broken shard of the blue Dimensional Stone. Collect these and take them to Researcher Euclie.

4406.name: Red Dimensional Stone - Shard
4406.description: Broken shard of the red Dimensional Stone. Collect these and take them to Researcher Pitagon.

4408.name: Musical Score - Theme of Love
4408.description: Posthumously released musical score of Gillian. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

4409.name: Musical Score - Theme of Battle
4409.description: The musical score for the Battle March of Flames. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

4410.name: Musical Score - Theme of Journey
4410.description: Musical score composed by Troubadour Swan. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

4411.name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Journey
4411.description: Echo crystal that plays the theme music of a journey. May only be used once.

4412.name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Battle
4412.description: Echo crystal that plays the theme music of a battle.

4413.name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Love
4413.description: Echo crystal that plays the theme music of love. May only be used once.

4414.name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Solitude
4414.description: Echo crystal that plays the theme music of solitude. May only be used once.

4415.name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Festival
4415.description: Echo crystal that plays the theme music of a feast. May only be used once.

4416.name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Celebration
4416.description: Echo crystal that plays the theme music of a celebration. May only be used once.

4417.name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Comedy
4417.description: Echo crystal that plays the theme music of a comedy. May only be used once.

4418.name: Musical Score - Theme of Celebration
4418.description: Musical score containing the theme music of a celebration. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

4419.name: Musical Score - Theme of Comedy
4419.description: Musical score containing the theme music of a comedy. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

4420.name: Musical Score - Theme of Solitude
4420.description: Musical score composed by Musician Nanarin. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

4421.name: Musical Score - Theme of Festival
4421.description: Musical score composed by Musician Barbado. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

4433.name: Elemental Stone Powder
4433.description: Elemental stone powder obtained from a stone statue in the Forgotten Temple. Can be sold at any store or taken to Magister Nell.

4434.name: Elemental Stone Shards
4434.description: The shards of Elemental stones obtained from stone statues in the Forgotten Temple. Can be sold at any store or taken to Magister Nell.

4435.name: Elemental Stone Lump
4435.description: The lumps of Elemental stone obtained from stone statues in the Forgotten Temple. Can be sold at any store or taken to Magister Nell.

4436.name: Bentley's Request
4436.description: Request to find and bring back jade crystals from creatures such as Fline, Liele, Satyr etc. that inhabit the Enchanted Valley.

4437.name: Carson's Request
4437.description: Request to recover the works of the ancient sculptor Berona from Hatar Ratmen and Vanor Silenos in the area near the Cemetery.

4438.name: Knuckle Duster Edge
4438.description: Essential ingredient needed by a Dwarf to make a Knuckle Duster. It can be bought from a regular store.

4439.name: Avadon Shield Fragment
4439.description: Essential ingredient needed by a Dwarf to make an Avadon Shield. It can be bought from a regular store.

4440.name: Recipe: Knuckle Duster
4440.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for a Knuckle Duster. Requires Create Item - Skill Lv. 5. The success rate is 100%.

4441.name: Recipe: Avadon Shield
4441.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for an Avadon Shield. Requires Create Item - Skill Lv. 6. The success rate is 100%.

5858.name: Blessed Scroll of Escape: Clan Hall

5859.name: Blessed Scroll of Escape: Castle
5859.description: Magical scroll that transports you to your castle. If you don't belong to a clan that controls a castle, this scroll will have no effect.

5860.name: Lienrik Egg
5860.description: Lienrik's egg. It's the item that Pet Manager Rood of Heine asked you to find for him.

5861.name: Lienrik Egg
5861.description: Lienrik's shiny red egg. Pet Manager Rood of Heine asked you to find it for him, but...?

5862.name: Stone of Contract
5862.description: In order to obtain the power of darkness, you will first need to secure this item. Take it to Trader Galman in Dragon Valley.

5863.name: Alligator Tooth
5863.description: Sharp canine tooth of the Alligator. Bring this to Morita near the entrance of Alligator Island.

5864.name: Mysterious Map Piece
5864.description: Faded piece of paper. Possibly part of a map.

5865.name: Carnivore Spores
5865.description: Tissue sample collected from a spore zombie from the Sea of Spores. It is used as research material by Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

5866.name: Herbivorous Spores
5866.description: Spore sample collected from a rotting tree from the Sea of Spores. It is used as research material by Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

5867.name: Jade Crystal
5867.description: Jade crystal collected from the Enchanted Valley. Take it to Warehouse Freightman Silva of Hunter's Village.

5868.name: Snake Scale
5868.description: Snake scale from the bodies of Palibati and Trives. Take it to Priest Luvard of Town of Aden.

5869.name: Remains of Aden Residents
5869.description: Remains of residents of Aden Castle who were killed during the Aden-Elmore war. Collect 60 of them and take them to High Priest Orven.

5870.name: Supply Receipt
5870.description: Document made from collected mysterious document pieces. Take it to Guard Coleman.

5871.name: Suspicious Document Piece
5871.description: Piece of document that seems to contain some suspicious contents. If you collect 5 of them, you may be able to decipher the information the document conveys.

5872.name: Supply Items
5872.description: Supply items for Taik Orcs. Take it to Guard Coleman and he will give you a reward.

5873.name: Pirate's Treasure Chest
5873.description: Treasure chest that was obtained by slaying Zaken's followers. Take it to Warehouse Keeper Randolf of Town of Giran.

5874.name: Sairon's Silver Hair
5874.description: Sairon's hair. Take it to Magister Dieter of Town of Giran.

5875.name: Lesser Giant's Lamp
5875.description: It is called a Lesser Giant's Lamp. It is not lit.

5876.name: Lesser Giant's Lamp
5876.description: It is called a Lesser Giant's Lamp. It is burning dimly.

5877.name: Lesser Giant's Lamp
5877.description: It is called a Lesser Giant's Lamp. It is lit.

5878.name: Lesser Giant's Lamp
5878.description: It is called a Lesser Giant's Lamp. It is lit.

5879.name: Lesser Giant's Lamp
5879.description: It is called a Lesser Giant's Lamp. It is shining brightly.

5880.name: Broken Lesser Giant's Lamp
5880.description: Broken Lesser Giant's Lamp. Take it to Lorain.

5881.name: Blade Stakato Fang
5881.description: Fang that was obtained from killing a blade stakato. Take it to Eva's Priestess Restina in Heine.

5882.name: Flare Shard
5882.description: Flare shard obtained from the Forgotten Temple. Take it to Magister Nell of Gludin Village.

5883.name: Freezing Shard
5883.description: Water Crystal obtained from the Forgotten Temple. Take it to Magister Nell of Gludin Village.

5884.name: Cave Beast Tooth
5884.description: Ingredient used by Orc Shamans during a ritual. Take it to Priest Vanutu.

5885.name: Death Wave Light
5885.description: Ingredient used by Orc Shamans during their ritual. Take it to Priest Vanutu.

5886.name: Sealed Mysterious Stone
5886.description: Pebble that radiates a strange aura. It sends out a dim light.

5887.name: Mysterious Stone
5887.description: Pebble that radiates a strange aura. It is shining brightly.

5888.name: Karik Horn
5888.description: Ingredient used by Orc Shamans during a ritual. Take it to Priest Vanutu.

5889.name: Limal Karinness Blood
5889.description: Ingredient used by Orc Shamans during a ritual. Take it to Priest Vanutu.

5890.name: Mysterious Book
5890.description: Book obtained from the Giant's Cave. Written in an ancient language, its contents cannot be deciphered.

5891.name: Ancient Language Dictionary: Basic Level
5891.description: Simple dictionary published by scholars of ancient times. By using this, you can interpret some of the texts of the Lesser Giants.

5892.name: Ancient Language Dictionary: Intermediate Level
5892.description: Dictionary published by scholars of ancient times. By using this, you can interpret the entire texts of the Lesser Giants.

5893.name: Leaf of Eucalyptus
5893.description: One of the ingredients used to make wine. Collect 80 of them and take them to Guard Harlan located in the Town of Dion.

5894.name: Stone of Icy Air
5894.description: Magical stone used by Enku Orc Shamans when they cast ice magic. Collect 100 of these and take them to Guard Harlan located in the Town of Dion.

5895.name: Ritron's Fruit
5895.description: Fruit with a tough, hard outer skin and a fragrant smell. Collect 4 of these and take them to Magister Rollant in the Town of Dion.

5896.name: Moon Face Flower
5896.description: Flower that is said to bloom only under moonlight. Collect 20 of these and take them to Magister Rollant in the Town of Dion.

5897.name: Leech Fluids
5897.description: The bodily fluids of a Leech that can be obtained from the Cruma Marshlands. Collect 10 of these and take them to Magister Rollant in the Town of Dion.

5898.name: Royal Membership
5898.description: It's a coin collectors' dream! Take it to Head Blacksmith Vergara.

5899.name: Kail's Coin
5899.description: Coin owned by Sorcerer Kail who used to be an aid of Beleth. Take it to Warehouse Keeper Sorint.

5900.name: Coin Collecting Album
5900.description: High-quality coin collecting album made of leather.

5901.name: Blood Offering
5901.description: Blood that can be obtained by killing a Monster of Offering. The number of this item will determine your score.

5902.name: Scroll of Ancient Magic
5902.description: Scroll that contains ancient magic. Take it to Gatekeeper Ziggurat.

5903.name: Ancient Ash Urn
5903.description: Ancient urn that was found in the Tower of Insolence. Take it to Seer Reva of Town of Aden.

5916.name: Spellbook Page
5916.description: Torn piece of paper that seems to have been ripped out of a spellbook. If you Double-click it, you can examine it closely.

5917.name: Kranvel's Scroll: Fire
5917.description: Great Magus Kranvel's Fire scroll. Collect the Fire, Water, Wind and Earth scrolls and take all of them to Elder Casian.

5918.name: Kranvel's Scroll: Water
5918.description: Great Magus Kranvel's Water scroll. Collect the Fire, Water, Wind and Earth scrolls and take all of them to Elder Casian.

5919.name: Kranvel's Scroll: Wind
5919.description: Great Magus Kranvel's Wind scroll. Collect the Fire, Water, Wind and Earth scrolls and take all of them to Elder Casian.

5920.name: Kranvel's Scroll: Earth
5920.description: Great Magus Kranvel's Earth scroll. Collect the Fire, Water, Wind and Earth scrolls and take all of them to Elder Casian.

5921.name: Worthless Piece of Paper
5921.description: Paper piece that has useless scribbles written on it.

5944.description: Piece of parchment from the Lesser Giant era. If you Double-click it, you can read the contents.

5957.name: 30-year-old Wine

5958.name: 60-year-old Wine
5958.description: Gift from Harlan as a token of gratitude. It is aged 60 years. Excellent quality wine.

5959.name: Ritron's Dessert Recipe
5959.description: Secret recipe for making dessert by using ritron fruit as its ingredient. It can to sold at a store.

5960.description: Delicious jelly made from ritron fruit. It can be sold at a store.

5964.name: Warehouse Keeper's Medal
5964.description: Medal that is issued by the Iron Gate Guild to Warehouse Keepers according to their productivity. If you collect them, you can use them to play bingo.

5971.name: Joke Book of Ancient Times
5971.description: Collection of jokes of Galfredo Romer, a Royal Clown.

5972.description: Ancient record regarding the Seven Seals. The first of seven chapters.

6002.name: Ancient Porcelain
6002.description: Porcelain from the era of an ancient empire found in the Tower of Insolence. It Has not been evaluated by antique experts yet.

6003.name: Ancient Porcelain: Excellent
6003.description: Porcelain from the era of an ancient empire. Judged to be of the highest grade "excellent" porcelain.

6004.name: Ancient Porcelain: High Quality
6004.description: Porcelain from the era of an ancient empire. Judged to be of "high grade" porcelain.

6005.name: Ancient Porcelain: Low Quality
6005.description: Porcelain from the era of an ancient empire. Judged to be of "low grade" porcelain.

6006.name: Ancient Porcelain: Lowest Quality
6006.description: Porcelain from the era of an ancient empire. Judged to be of the "lowest grade" porcelain.

6037.name: Scroll: Cancel Sleep
6037.description: If you use it on the target who is asleep, the target will wake up.

6042.name: Greater Mercenary Posting Ticket (Wizard/Stationary)
6042.description: Cannot be used. Can be sold at an NPC’s store.

6047.name: Greater Mercenary Posting Ticket (Wizard/Mobile)
6047.description: Cannot be used. Can be sold at an NPC’s store.

6309.name: Ultimate Sword
6309.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\nP. Atk. + 191 during a Critical Attack.

6312.name: Sword of Whispering Death
6312.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\nIncreases MP Recovery Rate by 16%.

6315.name: Homunkulus' Sword
6315.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\nIncreases MP Recovery Rate by 16%.

6317.name: Mixing Manual
6317.description: Manual received from Magic Trader Wesley, with instructions for using the material mixing urn located in the basement of the Ivory Tower.

6318.name: Blood Fire
6318.description: Dark flames from Purgatory. The only way to melt true gold.

6319.name: Mimir's Elixir
6319.description: Legendary elixir said to bestow ultimate wisdom. Take it to Magister Ladd.

6320.name: Pure Silver
6320.description: Essential ingredient of Mimir's Elixir. Take it to Magister Ladd.

6321.name: True Gold
6321.description: Essential ingredient of Mimir's Elixir. Take it to Magister Ladd.

6322.name: Philosopher's Stone
6322.description: Essential ingredient of Mimir's Elixir. Take it to Magister Joan.

6323.name: Sealed Phoenix Necklace
6323.description: The seal can be removed by a blacksmith in Aden. Once removed, M. Def. increases by 4 and the amount of MP grows by 26.

6324.name: Sealed Phoenix Earring
6324.description: The seal can be removed by a blacksmith in Aden. Once removed, M. Def. increases by 3 and the amount of MP grows by 20.

6325.name: Sealed Phoenix Ring
6325.description: The seal can be removed by a blacksmith in Aden. Once removed, M. Def. increases by 2 and the amount of MP grows by 13.

6326.name: Sealed Majestic Necklace
6326.description: The seal can be removed by a blacksmith in Aden. Once removed, M. Def. increases by 5 and the amount of MP grows by 33.

6327.name: Sealed Majestic Earring
6327.description: The seal can be removed by a blacksmith in Aden. Once removed, M. Def. increases by 3 and the amount of MP grows by 25.

6328.name: Sealed Majestic Ring
6328.description: The seal can be removed by a blacksmith in Aden. Once removed, M. Def. increases by 2 and the amount of MP grows by 17.

6329.name: Recipe: Sealed Phoenix Necklace (70%)
6329.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for Sealed Phoenix Necklace. Requires Create Item - Skill Lv. 7. The success rate is 70%.

6330.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for Sealed Phoenix Necklace. Requires Create Item - Skill Lv. 7. The success rate is 100%.

6341.description: An essential ingredient which is used to make Sealed Phoenix Necklace. Can be sold.

6342.name: Sealed Majestic Earring Gemstone
6342.description: An essential ingredient which is used to make Sealed Majestic Earring. Can be sold.

6343.name: Sealed Phoenix Necklace Beads
