6346.description: An essential ingredient which is used to make Sealed Majestic Ring. Can be sold.

6349.name: Berserker Blade
6349.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\nP. Atk. + 242 during a Critical Attack.

6350.name: Amulet: Pa'agrio's Honor
6350.description: Amulet required for the Pa'agrio's Honor. Used by Overlords.\nRequired level: 56

6351.name: Amulet: Ritual of Life
6351.description: Amulet required for the Ritual of Life. Used by Overlords.\nRequired level: 48

6352.name: Spellbook: Prayer
6352.description: Spellbook needed to learn Prayer. Used by Bishops.\nRequired level: 66

6353.name: Blue Gemstone
6353.description: Gemstone obtained from gremlins. Take it to a Newbie Helper.

6358.name: Needle Wolverine
6358.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\nIncreases the success rate of the Vital Stab skills.

6359.name: Demon's Dagger
6359.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\nP. Atk. + 160 during a Critical Attack.

6363.name: Stolen Infernium Ore
6363.description: Infernium ore once owned by the Iron Gate Guild. Take it to Warehouse Keeper Romp of Town of Aden to play bingo.

6388.name: Lord's Certificate of Approval
6388.description: This certificate allows the bearer to join the Lords of Dawn without belonging to a castle-owning clan.

6389.name: Squash Seed
6389.description: Double-click to make a Young Squash appear.

6390.name: Large Squash Seed
6390.description: Double-click to make a Large Young Squash appear.

6391.name: Nectar
6391.description: Used to exchange with Puss the Cat for squash seeds or for growing squashes.

6392.name: Event - Medal
6392.description: L2 Medal Collection Event - If you take it to an Event Manager, he will trade it for a prize item of your choice.

6393.name: Event - Glittering Medal
6393.description: L2 Medal Collection Event - Used to raise the grade of a collector during the event.

6394.name: Red Party Mask
6394.description: Fashion item used to display a unique appearance.  Can be stored in a warehouse.

6395.name: Amulet: Chant of Predator
6395.description: Amulet required for the Chant of Predator spell. Used by Warcryers.\nRequired level: 48

6396.name: Amulet: Chant of Eagle
6396.description: Amulet needed to learn the Chant of Eagle incantation. Used by Warcryers.\nRequired level: 48

6397.name: Amulet: Chant of Vampire
6397.description: Amulet required for the Chant of Vampire spell. Used by Warcryers.\nRequired level: 44

6398.name: Spellbook: Body of Avatar
6398.description: Spellbook needed to learn Body of Avatar. Used by Bishops.\nRequired level: 48

6399.name: Rabbit Crest
6399.description: The crest that indicates that its bearer's event collector is "rabbit." Without this badge, one cannot prove one's grade .

6400.name: Hyena Crest
6400.description: The crest that indicates that its bearer's event collector is "hyena." Without this badge, one cannot prove one's grade .

6401.name: Fox Crest
6401.description: The crest that indicates that its bearer's event collector is "fox." Without this badge, one cannot prove one's grade .

6402.name: Wolf Crest
6402.description: The crest that indicates that its bearer's event collector is "wolf." Without this badge, one cannot prove one's grade .

6403.name: Star Shard
6403.description: Starlight Festival Event - Gift from the sky. When it is thrown, it creates a small explosion. Can be used as an ingredient to make other types of fireworks.

6404.name: Gunpowder
6404.description: Starlight Festival Event - Black powder. Ingredient used to make larger fireworks.

6405.name: Magnesium
6405.description: Starlight Festival Event - Chemical compound that generates a powerful flash when ignited. It is needed to make large fireworks.

6406.name: Firecracker
6406.description: Explosive device that brilliantly lights up the sky.

6407.name: Large Firecracker
6407.description: Large explosive device that ignites to light up the sky.

6408.name: Formal Wear
6408.description: Tuxedo for male characters, and a wedding dress for female characters. Equipping this disables armor. Hair accessories, weapons, and magic armor remain equipped.

6569.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-grade)
6569.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for A-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles. The item will not be crystallized even if enchantment fails, but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

6570.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (A-grade)
6570.description: P. Def. +1 for A-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. +3. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but full-body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. The item will not be crystallized even if enchantment fails, but the enchant value will be reset to 0. Starting at +4 armor, HP increases depending on the enchant value.

6571.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (B-grade)
6571.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for B-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles. The item will not be crystallized even if enchantment fails, but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

6572.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (B-grade)
6572.description: P. Def. +1 for B-grade armor and accessories. Starting from +4, P. Def. +3. Can be safely enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to +4. HP gradually increases with each enchant level starting from +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

6573.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-grade)
6573.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for C-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles. The item will not be crystallized even if enchantment fails,, but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

6574.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (C-grade)
6574.description: P. Def. +1 for C-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. +3. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but full-body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. The item will not be crystallized even if enchantment fails, but the enchant value will be reset to 0. Starting at +4 armor, HP increases depending on the enchant value.

6575.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (D-grade)
6575.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for D-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles. The item will not be crystallized even if enchantment fails,, but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

6576.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (D-grade)
6576.description: P. Def. +1 for D-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. +3. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but full-body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. The item will not be crystallized even if enchantment fails, but the enchant value will be reset to 0. Starting at +4 armor, HP increases depending on the enchant value.

6577.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (S-grade)
6577.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +5 for S-grade one-handed swords/blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +6 for two-handed swords/blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +10 for bows. M. Atk. +4 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus quadruples. The item will not be crystallized even if enchantment fails, but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

6578.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (S-grade)
6578.description: When enchanted, P. Def. +2 for S-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. +8. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but full-body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. The item will not be crystallized even if enchantment fails, but the enchant value will be reset to 0. Starting at +4 armor, HP increases depending on the enchant value.

6611.name: Infinity Sword
6611.description:
Divine hero's weapon. Gives a character special abilities, allows to use Infinity Power. Inflicts additional damage during PvP. The item cannot be transferred to another server.

Special Ability: Infinity Sword. Max HP +20%, Max MP +15%, Max CP +30%, P. Atk. +10%, Atk. Speed +5%, when equipped.
Infinity Power - Reflect: for 5 min. damage received +8%.

6612.name: Infinity Slasher
6612.description:
Divine hero's weapon. Gives a character special abilities, allows to use Infinity Power. Inflicts additional damage during PvP. The item cannot be transferred to another server.

Special Ability: Infinity Slasher. Max HP +20%, Max MP +15%, Max CP +30%, P. Atk. +10%, P. Critical Damage +10%, when equipped.
Infinity Power - Protection: for 2 min. makes you immune to debuffs 5 times.

6613.name: Infinity Axe
6613.description:
Divine hero's weapon. Gives a character special abilities, allows to use Infinity Power. Inflicts additional damage during PvP. The item cannot be transferred to another server.

Special Ability: Infinity Axe. Max HP +20%, Max MP +15%, Max CP +30%, P. Atk. +10%, Atk. Speed +5%, when equipped.
Infinity Power - Tenacity: for 2 min. returns 10% of the received damage back to the enemy. Recovers НР.

6614.name: Infinity Rod
6614.description:
Divine hero's weapon. Gives a character special abilities, allows to use Infinity Power. Inflicts additional damage during PvP. The item cannot be transferred to another server.

Special Ability: Infinity Rod. Max HP +10%, Max MP +25%, Max CP +30%, M. Critical Rate +20, Casting Spd. +5%, when equipped.
Infinity Power - Mana Limit: for 30 sec. magic skills don't consume MP.

6616.name: Infinity Scepter
6616.description:
Divine hero's weapon. Gives a character special abilities, allows to use Infinity Power. Inflicts additional damage during PvP. The item cannot be transferred to another server.

Special Ability: Infinity Scepter. Max HP +10%, Max MP +25%, Max CP +30%, M. Atk. +10%, P. Critical Damage +10%, when equipped.
Infinity Power - Vampiric Mana: for 5 min. recovers MP, equal to the certain percent of inflicted damage with a certain probability.

6617.name: Infinity Dagger
6617.description:
Divine hero's weapon. Gives a character special abilities, allows to use Infinity Power. Inflicts additional damage during PvP. The item cannot be transferred to another server.

Special Ability: Infinity Dagger. Max HP +15%, Max MP +25%, Max CP +30%, M. Critical Rate +20, P. Critical Damage +20%, when equipped.
Infinity Power - Immortal: for 5 min. increases the chance of deadly attack.

6618.name: Infinity Fighter

Infinity Power - Protection: for 2 min. makes you immune to debuffs 5 times.

6619.name: Infinity Bow
6619.description:

Special Ability: Infinity Bow. Max HP +15%, Max MP +25%, Max CP +30%, MP Consumption -5%, Atk. Spd. +10%, when equipped.
Infinity Power - Archery: for 5 min. increases Speed and the bow's range.

6620.name: Infinity Dual Sword
6620.description:
Divine hero's weapon. Gives a character special abilities, allows to use Infinity Power. Inflicts additional damage during PvP. The item cannot be transferred to another server.

Special Ability: Infinity Dual Sword. Max HP +20%, Max MP +15%, Max CP +30%, P. Atk. +5%, P. Critical Damage +5%, Atk. Spd. +5%, when equipped.
Infinity Power - Refresh: for 5 min. decreases cooldown by 10%.

6621.name: Infinity Spear

6645.name: Beast Soulshot
6645.description: The power of a Soulshot is bestowed upon a servitor, increasing their physical attack. The number of Soulshots required is given in the servitor’s info window. (Used from the master’s inventory.)

6646.description: The power of a Spiritshot is bestowed upon a servitor, increasing their magical attack. The number of Spiritshots required is given in the servitor’s info window. (Used from the master’s inventory.)

6647.name: Blessed Beast Spiritshot
6647.description: The power of a Blessed Spiritshot is bestowed upon a servitor, increasing their magical attack. The number of Spiritshots required is given in the servitor’s info window. (Used from the master’s inventory.)

8872.description: This specially processed gunpowder doesn't create smoke. It is consumed while using the Swoop Cannon skill.

8938.description: When enchanted with a two-handed sword, two-handed blunt, or fist weapon, P. Atk. of a dualsword increases more significantly than that of a normal one-handed sword.

9138.name: Santa Hat
9138.description: Santa Hat, which is made to celebrate the holy day. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

9140.name: Cupid’s Bow
9140.description: Special arrow created at the Magic Laboratory. Gives damage to Pig of Love or Golden Pigs. Buy from employees of the Magic Laboratory.

9589.name: Iron Bracelet
9589.description: When equipped, opens up 1 Talisman slot.

9590.name: Bronze Bracelet

9636.description: A steel bolt coated by mithril. For A-grade crossbows.

10250.name: Adventurer Hat (Event)
10250.description: Adventurer hat commemorating the 1st character creation. Uses 2 hair accessory slots.

10649.name: Blessed Feather
10649.description: Dimensional Item\nIf you have the Blessed Feather, you can resurrect immediately at the spot where you were killed.

10650.name: Scroll of Escape (Novice)
10650.description: Magic scroll that moves you to the nearest village. Item for beginner adventurers.

13015.name: My Teleport Book
13015.description: Dimensional Item\nAdds 3 slots to My Teleport, which can save specific locations. My Teleport can be expanded to up to 18 slots.

13016.name: My Teleport Scroll
13016.description: Dimensional Item\nThis item is consumed to teleport to a saved location.

13021.name: Color Title
13021.description: A dimensional item\nAn item which can be used to change the color of a character’s title. Upon leaving a clan, the color title disappears, just as the regular one does. However, upon joining a clan and obtaining a new title, the color reappears. After changing the title color, enter '/ resetname’ command in order to bring back the initial color.

13025.name: Agathion Bracelet - Joy
13025.description:
Enables to summon Agathion of Joy when equipped.

<Skill used>
1. Agathion's Escape: Allows to relocate to Giran, Gludio, Dion, Oren, Hunters Village. (Cooldown: 1 min)

<Item Skill>
1. Search for Evidence: Speed +66 for 15 sec. 

<Item Skill>
2. Hidden Search: monsters don't attack first.

13307.name: Color Title (Event)
13307.description: A dimensional item\nAn item which can be used to change the color of a character’s title. Upon leaving a clan, the color title disappears, just as the regular one does (for everyone except Noblesse); however, upon joining a clan and obtaining a new title, the color reappears. After changing the title color, enter '/ resetname’ command in order to bring back the initial color.

13340.name: Agathion - Love (Event)
13340.description: A bracelet that can summon an Love Agathion. A 7-day item.

13369.name: Love Agathion Pack (Event)
13369.description: Wrapped Pack containing Love Agathion Bracelet (7-day).

13417.name: Letter - Y
13417.description: Combine with other letters to create a special word and bring it to Angel Cat to receive a great gift!

13501.name: Refined Romantic Chapeau
13501.description: Refined Romantic Chapeau. Uses 2 hair accessory slots.

13519.name: Black Mask <Str+1 Int+1>
13519.description: Mask worn only by elegant fighters for the Truth. When equipped increases STR / INT by 1 and allows to use Blessed Teleport skill (Cooldown: 2 hours). Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

13520.name: Event - Jindo Dog Hat
13520.description: Hat of a Jindo Dog. Uses 2 hair accessory slots.

13521.name: Event - Shaggy Dog Hat
13521.description: Hat of a Shaggy Dog. Uses 2 hair accessory slots.

13752.name: Olympiad Warrior's Ring
13752.description: Olympiad Warrior's Ring. Can be used for 60 days. Provides MP +21 and increases Accuracy, Critical Damage, Hold Resistance by 30%, and Atk. Rate +30%. The effect does not stack if two identical rings are equipped.

13753.name: Olympiad Warrior's Necklace
13753.description: Olympiad Warrior's Necklace. Can be used for 60 days. Provides MP +42 and Sleep/Paralysis/Stun Resistance +15%, Sleep/Paralysis/Stun Atk. Rate +15%, and decreases Cooldown. Damage Shield effect.

13754.name: Olympiad Warrior's Earring
13754.description: Olympiad Warrior's Earring. Can be used for 60 days. Provides MP +31, Stun/MEN Attack Resistance +20% and Stun/Men Atk. Rate +20%. Vampiric Rage effect. The effect does not stack even if two identical earrings are equipped.

13894.name: Rag Belt
13894.description: Bestows one of the special functions after using a C-grade Clasp or Pouch.

13895.name: Leather Belt
13895.description: Bestows one of the special functions after using a B-grade Clasp or Pouch.

13896.name: Iron Belt
13896.description: Bestows one of the special functions after using an A-grade Clasp, Pouch, Magical Clasp, or Magic Ornament.

13897.name: Mithril Belt
13897.description: Bestows one of the special functions after using an S-grade Clasp, Pouch, Magical Clasp, or Magic Ornament.

14857.name: Shell of Monsters
14857.description: The shell you received when fighting with monsters near the Seal of Shilen. Give it to Magister Hanellin.

15366.name: Watermelon seed

15369.name: Copied Honey Watermelon Seed
15369.description: Giant Watermelon Event: double-click summons a Young Honey Watermelon.

15627.name: Clan Point
15627.description: You acquire clan points as a reward.

15628.name: Gamble Reward
15628.description: Reward based on a game of chance.

15630.name: Flexible Reward
15630.description: Reward is chosen based on your performance.

15631.name: Bonus Reward
15631.description: Little extra in addition to the current reward.

20021.description: A hat made from bulrush. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

20022.description: A mask which formerly belonged to Looters.

20023.description: A ribbon-like hair accessory, intended for female characters only.

20033.description: Dimensional Item\nItem consumed when saving a new My Teleport location.

20662.name: Agathion - Uthanka

20666.description: A hat endowed with Valkyrie power. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

20678.name: Gatekeeper Hat
20678.description: Hat worn by Gatekeepers. Uses 2 hair accessory slots.

20728.name: Summon Scroll: Lucky Lamp
20728.description: Summons Sky Lantern to offer to sky with a wish.

20792.name: Flavorful Cheese Hat
20792.description: A hat shaped like a mouth-watering piece of cheese. On closer examination, you can see an orange mouse on top of it.

20793.name: Sweet Cheese Hat
20793.description: A hat shaped like a mouth-watering piece of cheese. On closer examination, you can see a purple mouse on top of it.

20900.name: Santa Hat
20900.description: The Santa Hat made for celebrating Christmas.

20901.name: Santa Hat Set
20901.description: The Santa Hat and Rudolph's Nose are packaged together.

21162.name: Wedding Veil
21162.description: A shining white Wedding Veil, intended for female characters only. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.\nCannot be exchanged, dropped, sold. Can be stored in private warehouse.

21163.name: Wedding Bouquet
21163.description: A Wedding Bouquet composed of lovely flowers, intended for female characters only.\nCannot be exchanged, dropped, sold. Can be stored in private warehouse.

21165.name: Agathion - Zaken's Spirit Swords
21165.description: Zaken cannot be attacked, the skill will be removed. The bracelet is only issued by ID.

21468.name: Sheep Hat
21468.description:
A hat in the shape of a sheep. Can be used for up to 14 days. Occupies 2 hair accessory slots. Allows to use Sheep's Blessing and Sheep's Resurrection when equipped. Cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold. Can store in private warehouse.

<Attention>
In case the character dies or has no extra space in the inventory at the moment of receiving of the item, the item cannot be obtained.

21469.name: Sheep Hat
21469.description: A hat in the shape of a sheep takes two slots for headpieces. Cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Can be shared within account through Dimensional Merchant.

21566.name: Valkyrie Circlet
21566.description: A circlet holding Valkyrie's strength. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed, or sold. Can be stored in private warehouse.

21713.name: Zaken's Sealed Cloak
21713.description: Zaken's Sealed Cloak. Increases HP when the seal is released. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

21716.name: Zaken's Cloak
21716.description: Zaken's Cloak that makes you feel Zaken's sorrow. Increases Max HP by 5%. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

21754.name: Server Keeper's Magic Pencil
21754.description: Magic pencil with a sharp tip. Provided to and only used by Server Keepers.

21755.name: Manor Scholar's Hat
21755.description: Scholar's hat showing knowledge. Gold tassel is attached.

21973.name: Mardil's Fan
21973.description: This magical Mardil's Fan gives a special power to its owner. 1 ordinary Soul Crystal and 1 Special Soul Crystal can be applied.

21976.name: Mardil's Fan
21976.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\nIncreases MP Recovery Bonus by 12%.

22221.name: Stable Scroll: Enchant Weapon (S-grade)
22221.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +5 for S-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +6 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and fist weapons. P. Atk. +10 for bows. M. Atk. +4 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus quadruples. The item will not be crystallized and will retain the current enchant value even if enchantment fails. It cannot be used on weapons enchanted to +7 or above.

22222.name: Stable Scroll: Enchant Armor (S-grade)
22222.description: When enchanted, P. Def. +2 for S-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def +8. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but full-body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. The item will not be crystallized and will retain the current enchant value even if enchantment fails. Starting at +4 armor, HP increases depending on the enchant value. It cannot be used on armor enchanted to +6 or above.

22223.name: Solid Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-grade)
22223.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for A-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, and spears. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles. Enchanting is safe. Even if enchantment fails, the item is not crystallized and retains the current enchant value. It cannot be used on weapons enchanted to +7 or above.

22224.name: Solid Scroll: Enchant Armor (A-grade)
22224.description: When enchanted, P. Def. +1 for A-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. +3. Starting at +4 armor, HP increases depending on the enchant value.. Enchanting is safe. Even if enchantment fails, the item is not crystallized and retains the current enchant value. It cannot be used on armor enchanted to +6 or above.

22376.name: Brilliant Beach Sun Cap
22376.description: A bright beach cap protecting from the sunlight. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

22378.name: Stylish Straw Hat
22378.description: A straw hat. Occupies 3 Hair Accessory slots.

23173.name: Alluring Swimsuit
23173.description: Alluring Swimsuit with a fancy pattern.

23226.name: Seductive Swimsuit

23459.name: Maid Hair Accessory
23459.description: Maid Hair Accessory. Used as part of the costume, intended for female characters.

23767.name: Fortune Reading Ticket
23767.description: Ticket used in a Fortune Reading.

23768.name: Luxury Fortune Reading Ticket
23768.description: Ticket used in a Luxury Fortune Reading.

26326.name: Lineage II Baseball Uniform
26326.description: Lineage II baseball uniform. When equipped, armor is removed and cannot be used. Hair accessories, weapons, and magic armor are not removed.

26354.name: Gem
26354.description: Used as an ingredient to purchase items from the in-game shop.

29001.name: Daily Gift - VIP 1
29001.description: Double-click to obtain the following: 1 Scroll of Escape, 3 Healing Potions, and 5 VIP Coins.

29002.name: Daily Gift - VIP 2
29002.description: Double-click to obtain the following: 1 Scroll of Escape, 3 Healing Potions, and 10 VIP Coins.

29003.name: Daily Gift - VIP 3
29003.description: Double-click to obtain the following: 1 Scroll of Escape, 1 Scroll of Resurrection, 5 Healing Potions, and 15 VIP Coins.

29004.name: Daily Gift - VIP 4
29004.description: Double-click to obtain the following: 1 Scroll of Escape, 1 Scroll of Resurrection, 3 Major Healing Potions, and 25 VIP Coins.

29005.name: Daily Gift - VIP 5
29005.description: Double-click to obtain the following: 1 Blessed Scroll of Escape, 3 Major Healing Potions, and 40 VIP Coins.

29006.name: Daily Gift - VIP 6
29006.description: Double-click to obtain the following: 1 Blessed Scroll of Escape, 3 Major Healing Potions, and 100 VIP Coins.

29007.name: Daily Gift - VIP 7
29007.description: Double-click to obtain the following: 1 Blessed Scroll of Escape, 1 Blessed Scroll of Resurrection, 3 Major Healing Potions, and 150 VIP Coins.

29008.name: Scroll: Low-grade XP/SP Boost
29008.description: For 20 min., XP/SP gain + 30% when hunting. Effect remains even after death.

29009.name: Scroll: Regular XP/SP Boost
29009.description: For 20 min., XP/SP gain + 30% when hunting. Effect remains even after death.

29010.name: Scroll: High-grade XP/SP Boost
29010.description: For 20 min., XP/SP gain + 100% when hunting. Effect remains even after death.

29011.name: 1st Class Transfer Buff Scroll
29011.description: Bestows the following effects for 20 min.: Shield Lv. 2, Might Lv. 2, Concentration Lv. 2, Acumen Lv. 1, Wind Walk Lv. 1, Focus Lv. 1, Agility Lv. 1, Empower Lv. 1.

29012.name: 2nd Class Transfer Buff Scroll
29012.description: Bestows the following effects for 20 min.: Shield Lv. 3, Might Lv. 3, Acumen Lv. 2, Wind Walk Lv. 2, Focus Lv. 2, Regeneration Lv. 1, Guidance Lv. 1, Death Whisper Lv. 1, Magic Barrier Lv. 1, Blessed Body Lv. 1, Blessed Soul Lv. 1, Haste Lv. 1, Agility Lv. 2, Empower Lv. 2.

29013.name: Scroll: Hunter's Song
29013.description: Grants the effect of the Hunter's Song for 10 minutes.

29014.name: Scroll: Dance of Fire
29014.description: Grants the effect of the Dance of Fire for 10 minutes.

29015.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (D-grade)
29015.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for D-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles.

29016.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (D-grade)
29016.description: P. Def. + 1 for D-grade armor and accessories. Increases by 3 starting from + 4. It can safely be enchanted up to + 3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to + 4. HP gradually increases with each enchant level starting from + 4.

29017.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-grade)
29017.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for C-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles.

29018.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (C-grade)
29018.description: P. Def. + 1 for C-grade armor and accessories. Increases by 3 starting from + 4. It can safely be enchanted up to + 3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to + 4. HP gradually increases with each enchant level starting from + 4.

29019.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (D-grade)
29019.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for D-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles. The item will not be crystallized even if enchantment fails, but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

29020.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (D-grade)
29020.description: P. Def. +1 for D-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. +3. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but full-body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. The item will not be crystallized even if enchantment fails, but the enchant value will be reset to 0. Starting at +4 armor, HP increases depending on the enchant value.

29021.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-grade)
29021.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for C-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles. The item will not be crystallized even if enchantment fails, but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

29022.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (C-grade)
29022.description: P. Def. +1 for C-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. +3. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but full-body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. The item will not be crystallized even if enchantment fails, but the enchant value will be reset to 0. Starting at +4 armor, HP increases depending on the enchant value.

29023.name: Mysterious No-grade Soulshot
29023.description: Soulshot containing the light of Spirits; instantly inflicts a powerful attack on the enemy. Used with No-grade weapons.

29024.name: Mysterious Blessed No-grade Spiritshot
29024.description: Spiritshot containing the light of Spirits; it instantly and greatly increases the power of magic. Used with No-grade weapons.

29025.name: Mysterious Soulshot (D-grade)
29025.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a D-grade weapon.

29026.name: Mysterious Blessed Spiritshot (D-grade)
29026.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing its magic significantly. Used with D-grade weapons.

29027.name: Mysterious Soulshot (C-grade)
29027.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a C-grade weapon.

29028.name: Mysterious Blessed Spiritshot (C-grade)
29028.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing its magic significantly. Used with C-grade weapons.

29029.name: Blessed Scroll of Escape
29029.description: Magic scroll that moves you to the nearest village. Weight is 0.

29030.name: Blessed Scroll of Resurrection

29547.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (D-grade)
29547.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for D-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles.

29548.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (D-grade)
29548.description: P. Def. + 1 for D-grade armor and accessories. Increases by 3 starting from + 4. It can safely be enchanted up to + 3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to + 4. HP gradually increases with each enchant level starting from + 4.

29549.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-grade)
29549.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for C-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles.

29550.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (C-grade)
29550.description: P. Def. + 1 for C-grade armor and accessories. Increases by 3 starting from + 4. It can safely be enchanted up to + 3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to + 4. HP gradually increases with each enchant level starting from + 4.

29658.description: Double-click to get the following:  30 1st Class Transfer Buff Scrolls, and an Intermediate Pack - Stage 4. Lv. 28 or above.

29659.name: Intermediate Pack - Stage 4
29659.description: Double-click to get the following: 1 Chronicles Box, 4500 Mysterious Soulshots (D-grade), 1000 Mysterious Blessed Spiritshots (D-grade), and an Intermediate Pack - Stage 5. Lv. 30 or above.

29660.name: Intermediate Pack - Stage 5
29660.description: Double-click to get the following: 1 Chronicles Box, 4500 Mysterious Soulshots (D-grade), 1000 Mysterious Blessed Spiritshots (D-grade), 30 Scrolls of Escape, and an Intermediate Pack - Stage 6. Lv. 32 or above.

29661.name: Intermediate Pack - Stage 6
29661.description: Double-click to get the following: 1 Chronicles Box, 4500 Mysterious Soulshots (D-grade), 1000 Mysterious Blessed Spiritshots (D-grade), 50 Healing Potions, and an Intermediate Pack - Stage 7. Lv. 35 or above.

29662.name: Intermediate Pack - Stage 7
29662.description: Double-click to get the following: 20 XP/SP Boost Scrolls (Mid-grade), 4500 Mysterious Soulshots (D-grade), 1000 Mysterious Blessed Spiritshots (D-grade), and an Intermediate Pack - Stage 8. Lv. 38 or above.

29663.name: Intermediate Pack - Stage 8
29663.description: Double-click to obtain the following items: Mysterious Soulshot (C-grade) - 9000 pcs., Mysterious Blessed Spiritshot (C-grade) - 2000 pcs., C-grade Timed Weapon Coupon (1), Traveler's Package - Lvl 9. For characters of Lvl 40 and above. Cannot be traded/dropped/sold in a private store. Can be stored in a warehouse.

29664.name: Intermediate Pack - Stage 9
29664.description: Double-click to get the following:  3 Quick Healing Potions, 20 XP/SP Boost Scrolls (Mid-grade), 1 Chronicles Box, and an Intermediate Pack - Stage 10. Lv. 42 or above.

29665.name: Intermediate Pack - Stage 10
29665.description: Double-click to get the following: 20 XP/SP Boost Scrolls (Mid-grade), 9000 Mysterious Soulshots (C-grade), 2000 Mysterious Blessed Spiritshots (C-grade), and an Intermediate Pack - Stage 11. Lv. 45 or above.

29666.name: Intermediate Pack - Stage 11
29666.description: Double-click to obtain an Agathion - Griffin (30-day). Lv. 49 or above.

29667.name: Agathion - Griffin
29667.description: Can summon a Griffin Agathion. STR + 1, INT + 1.

29668.name: Castle Clan Coin
29668.description: A special coin only for clan members of clans who have acquired a castle. It can be exchanged for various items while they are occupying the castle.

29669.name: Castle Scroll: Regular XP/SP Boost
29669.description: For 20 min., XP/SP gain + 35%. Effect remains even after death.

29670.name: Castle Scroll: Mid-grade XP/SP Boost
29670.description: For 20 min., XP/SP gain + 45%. Effect remains even after death.

29671.name: Castle Quick Healing Potion
29671.description: Magic potion that instantly restores HP. Instant effect with no duration. Cannot be used when HP is full.

29672.name: Castle Greater Quick Healing Potion
29672.description: Magic potion that instantly restores HP. Instant effect with no duration. Cannot be used when HP is full.

29673.name: Castle Scroll: Berserker Spirit
29673.description: For 20 min., P. Atk. + 5%, M. Atk. + 10%, Atk. Spd. + 5%, Casting Spd. + 5%, and Speed + 5. P. Def. - 5%, M. Def. - 10%, and Evasion - 2.

29675.name: Castle Blessed Scroll of Escape
29675.description: Magical scroll that relocates user to the nearest village.

29676.name: Scroll: Blessing of Castle
29676.description: Maintain's target's buff/de-buff condition even following death. The Nobless Blessing and the Amulet of Luck disappear, however.

29677.name: Castle Ring (10-day)
29677.description: HP + 20, M. Atk. + 3, P. Atk. + 5. When equipped with two identical rings, the effect of only one ring will be applied. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse. 10-day.

29678.name: Castle Ring
29678.description: HP + 20, M. Atk. + 3, P. Atk. + 5. When equipped with two identical earrings, the effect of only one earring will be applied. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse. 15-day.

29679.name: Castle Earring (10-day)
29679.description: MP Recovery + 0.2, Received Heal Amount + 2%. MP + 10. When equipped with two identical earrings, the effect of only one earring will be applied. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse. 10-day.

29680.name: Castle Earring
29680.description: MP recovery rate + 0.2, received Heal Amount + 2%. When equipped with two identical earrings, the effect of only one earring will be applied. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse. 15-day.

29681.name: Castle Necklace (10-day)
29681.description: MP + 20, M. Def. + 3, P. Def. + 5. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse. 10-day.

29682.name: Castle Necklace
29682.description: MP + 20, M. Def. + 3, P. Def. + 5. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29684.name: Scroll: Shield
29684.description: Increases P. Def. by 12% for 20 minutes.

29685.name: Scroll: Might
29685.description: Increases P. Atk. By 12% for 20 minutes.

29686.name: Scroll: Concentration
29686.description: Decreases damage that is cancelled by magic by 25 for 20 minutes.

29687.name: Scroll: Agility
29687.description: Increases Evasion rate by 2 for 20 minutes.

29688.name: Scroll: Regeneration
29688.description: Increases HP Recovery Rate by 10% for 20 minutes.

29689.name: Scroll: Magic Barrier
29689.description: Increases M. Def. by 23% for 20 minutes.

29690.name: Scroll: Blessed Body
29690.description: Increases Max HP by 10% for 20 minutes.

29691.name: Scroll: Blessed Soul
29691.description: Increases Max MP by 10% for 20 minutes.

29692.name: LineageII Box
29692.description: Reward box for collecting all the Lineage II letters. You can get weapon recipes and ingredients.

29693.name: Chronicle Box
29693.description: Reward box for collecting all the Chronicle letters. You can get armor recipes or ingredients.\r\n

29694.name: Memories Box
29694.description: Reward box for collecting all the Memories letters. You can get Rice Cake of Fighting Spirit, Rice Cake of Flaming Fighting Spirit, Blessed Scroll of Escape, Blessed Scroll of Resurrection, Buff Scrolls, or crafting ingredients.

29695.name: Quick Healing Potion
29695.description: Magic potion that instantly restores a little HP. Instant effect with no duration. Cannot be used when HP is full.

29696.name: Greater Quick Healing Potion
29696.description: Magic potion that instantly restores a lot of HP. Instant effect with no duration. Cannot be used when HP is full.

29697.name: 1st Class Transfer Buff Scroll
29697.description: Bestows the following effects for 10 min.: Shield Lv. 2, Might Lv. 2, Concentration Lv. 2, Acumen Lv. 1, Wind Walk Lv. 1, Focus Lv. 1, Agility Lv. 1, Empower Lv. 1.

29698.name: 2nd Class Transfer Buff Scroll
29698.description: Bestows the following effects for 10 min.: Shield Lv. 3, Might Lv. 3, Acumen Lv. 2, Wind Walk Lv. 2, Focus Lv. 2, Regeneration Lv. 1, Guidance Lv. 1, Death Whisper Lv. 1, Magic Barrier Lv. 1, Blessed Body Lv. 1, Blessed Soul Lv. 1, Haste Lv. 1, Agility Lv. 2, Empower Lv. 2.

29699.name: A Little Blessed Scroll of Escape
29699.description: Magical scroll that relocates you to the nearest village. Short casting time.

29700.name: A Little Blessed Scroll of Resurrection
29700.description: Magical scroll that restores a little XP and resurrects you.

29701.name: Rare Accessory Pack
29701.description: Double0click to obtain 1 of the following: Queen Ant's Ring (30-day), Orfen's Earring (30-day),  Ring of Core (30-day).

29702.name: Chant of Vampire Amulet Box
29702.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Amulet-Chant of Vampire.

29703.name: Body of Avatar Spellbook Box
29703.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Amulet-Body of Avatar

29704.name: Fire Dragon's Pendant
29704.description: Pendant imbued with the power of the Fire Dragon. Can enchant up to +10 with Pendant Varnish/Shining Pendant Varnish, and can combine 2 pendants of the same level through the Dimensional Merchant. Various effects are added when combined, and the stats of the options increase when enchanted. Starting from +1, it disappears if it fails. Note: The enchant level of the material item is reset to 0 when combining, so make sure to not use an enchanted pendant.

29705.name: Fire Dragon's Pendant
29705.description: Pendant imbued with the power of the Fire Dragon. Can enchant up to +10 with Pendant Varnish/Shining Pendant Varnish, and can combine 2 pendants of the same level through the Dimensional Merchant. Various effects are added when combined, and the stats of the options increase when enchanted. Starting from +1, it disappears if it fails. Note: The enchant level of the material item is reset to 0 when combining, so make sure to not use an enchanted pendant.

Various effects are added when combined, and the stats of the options increase when enchanted. Starting from +1, it disappears if it fails. Note: The enchant level of the material item is reset to 0 when combining, so make sure to not use an enchanted pendant. Cannot be exchanged or dropped starting from Lv. 4 Pendants.

29707.name: Fire Dragon Pendant
29707.description: A pendant that contains the energy of Earth Dragon. With the help of Pendant Polish/Shiny Pendant Polish it can be enchanted up to +10. Dimensional Merchant can combine two semi-level pendants into one. That will add extra effects. Enchantment increases the number of effects. If an item already enchanted to +1 is unsuccessfully enchanted, it disappears. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a warehouse. Be careful, as the number of pendants that can be combined in the inventory is reset. You cannot combine pendants if there is one enhanced pendant in your inventory.

29724.name: Fire Dragon's Pendant Box
29724.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Fire Dragon's Pendant Lv. 1 and 10 Pendant Varnish.

29725.name: Water Dragon's Pendant Box
29725.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Water Dragon's Pendant Lv. 1 and 10 Pendant Varnish.

29726.name: Wind Dragon's Pendant Box
29726.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Wind Dragon's Pendant Lv. 1 and 10 Pendant Varnish.

29727.name: Earth Dragon's Pendant Box
29727.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Earth Dragon's Pendant Lv. 1 and 10 Pendant Varnish.

29728.name: Fire Dragon's Pendant Special Box
29728.description: Double-click to obtrain 10 Fire Dragon's Pendant Boxes.

29729.name: Water Dragon's Pendant Special Box
29729.description: Double-click to obtrain 10 Water Dragon's Pendant Boxes.

29730.name: Wind Dragon's Pendant Special Box
29730.description: Double-click to obtrain 10 Wind Dragon's Pendant Boxes.

29731.name: Earth Dragon's Pendant Special Box
29731.description: Double-click to obtrain 10 Earth Dragon's Pendant Boxes.

29732.name: Fire Dragon's Shining Pendant Varnish Package
29732.description: Double-click to obtain 30 Fire Dragon's Pendant Boxes and 1 Shining Pendant Varnish.

29733.name: Water Dragon's Shining Pendant Varnish Package
29733.description: Double-click to obtain 30 Water Dragon's Pendant Boxes and 1 Shining Pendant Varnish.

29734.name: Wind Dragon's Shining Pendant Varnish Package
29734.description: Double-click to obtain 30 Wind Dragon's Pendant Boxes and 1 Shining Pendant Varnish.

29735.name: Earth Dragon's Shining Pendant Varnish Package
29735.description: Double-click to obtain 30 Earth Dragon's Pendant Boxes and 1 Shining Pendant Varnish.

29736.name: Diana's Earring
29736.description: Diana's onyx earring. Take it to Diana in the Talking Island Village.

29737.name: Diana's Ring
29737.description: Diana's sapphire ring. Take it to Diana in the Talking Island Village.

29738.name: Diana's Necklace
29738.description: Diana's ruby necklace. Take it to Diana in the Talking Island Village.

29739.name: Diana's Recommendation
29739.description: Diana's recommendation. You can participate in the Miss/Mr. event.

29740.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (B-grade)
29740.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for B-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles.

29741.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (B-grade)
29741.description: P. Def. + 1 for B-grade armor and accessories. Starting from + 4, P. Def. + 3. Can be safely enchanted up to + 3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to + 4. HP gradually increases with each enchant level starting from + 4.

29742.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (B-grade)
29742.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for B-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles. The item will not be crystallized even if enchantment fails, but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

29743.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (B-grade)
29743.description: P. Def. + 1 for B-grade armor and accessories. Starting from + 4, P. Def. + 3. Can be safely enchanted up to + 3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to + 4. HP gradually increases with each enchant level starting from + 4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

29744.name: Earth Dragon Antharas' Treasure Pouch
29744.description: Double-click to obtain one of Earth Dragon Antharas' treasures.

29745.name: Premium Coin
29745.description: Coin received for purchasing promotional items. Exchange through the Dimensional Merchant for various items.

29746.name: Mysterious Soulshot (B-grade)
29746.description: Soulshot containing the light of Spirits; instantly inflicts a powerful attack on the enemy. Used with B-grade weapons.

29747.name: Mysterious Blessed Spiritshot (B-grade)
29747.description: Spiritshot containing the light of Spirits; it instantly and greatly increases the power of magic. Used with B-grade weapons.

29749.name: Mysterious Blessed Spiritshot (B-grade) x100 Pack
29749.description: Double-click to obtain 100 Mysterious Blessed Spiritshots (B-grade).

29750.name: Mysterious B-grade Hunter Hunting Pack
29750.description: Double-click to obtain 3000 Mysterious Soulshots (B-grade), 12  Scroll: XP/SP Boos (30%), and 12 2nd Class Transfer Buff Scrolls.

29751.name: Mysterious B-grade Wizard Hunting Pack
29751.description: Double-click to obtain 1000 Mysterious Blessed Spiritshots (B-grade), 12  Scroll: XP/SP Boos (30%), and 12 2nd Class Transfer Buff Scrolls.

29752.name: Halloween Suit
29752.description: When equipped, armor is unequipped and cannot be used. Weapons and magic armor remain equipped. Hair accessories also remain but the appearance won't be displayed. Cannot be dropped.

29753.name: Blue Talisman - P. Crit.
29753.description: A 1-hour item. P. Critical Rate +10. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29754.name: Blue Talisman - P. Atk.
29754.description: A 1-hour item. P. Atk. +3%. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29755.name: Blue Talisman - P. Def.
29755.description: A 1-hour item. P. Def. +3%. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29756.name: Blue Talisman - P. Skills Evasion
29756.description: A 1-hour item. P. Skills Evasion +10%. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29757.name: Blue Talisman - M. Crit.
29757.description: A 1-hour item. M. Critical +10. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29758.name: Blue Talisman - M. Atk.
29758.description: A 1-hour item. M. Atk. +3%. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29759.name: Blue Talisman - M. Def.
29759.description: A 1-hour item. M. Def. +3%. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29760.name: Blue Talisman - M. Skills Evasion
29760.description: A 1-hour item. M. Skills Evasion +10%. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29761.name: Blue Talisman - Max. HP
29761.description: A 1-hour item. Max. HP +3%. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29762.name: Blue Talisman - Max. MP
29762.description: A 1-hour item. Max. MP +3%. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29763.name: Grey Talisman - Guard
29763.description: A 1-hour item. Can protect from Debuffs 5 times for 10 sec. when used. Reuse Time is 5 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29764.name: Grey Talisman - Denial
29764.description: A 1-hour item. Removes a Debuff when used. Reuse Time is 5 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29765.name: Grey Talisman - Benefaction
29765.description: A 1-hour item. When used, P. Def. +1800 and M. Def. +1620, Buff-canceling Attack Resistance +80% for 10 seconds. Reuse Time is 15 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29766.name: Grey Talisman - Blocking
29766.description: A 1-hour item. Restricts enemy's HP recovery up to 70% for 15 sec. when used. Reuse Time is 3 minutes. Can only be used on a PC. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29767.name: Grey Talisman - Gravity
29767.description: A 1-hour item. Atk. Spd. and Casting Spd. -20% for 15 sec. when used. Reuse Time is 3 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29768.name: Grey Talisman - Bond
29768.description: A 1-hour item. Target's Speed -30% for 15 sec. when used. Reuse Time is 3 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29769.name: White Talisman - P. Crit.
29769.description: A 1-hour item. P. Critical Rate +20. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29770.name: White Talisman - P. Atk.

29779.name: Yellow Talisman - Guard
29779.description: A 1-hour item. Can protect from Debuffs 5 times for 10 sec. when used. Reuse Time is 4 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29780.name: Yellow Talisman - Denial
29780.description: A 1-hour item. Removes a Debuff when used. Reuse Time is 4 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29781.name: Yellow Talisman - Benefaction
29781.description: A 1-hour item. P. Def. +3600 and M. Def. +3240 for 10 sec. when used. Buff-canceling Attack Resistance +80%. Reuse Time is 15 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29782.name: Yellow Talisman - Blocking
29782.description: A 1-hour item. Restricts enemy's HP recovery up to 70% for 15 sec. when used. Reuse Time is 2 minutes. Can only be used on a PC. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29783.name: Yellow Talisman - Gravity
29783.description: A 1-hour item. Atk. Spd. and Casting Spd. -20% for 15 sec. when used. Reuse Time is 2 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29784.name: Yellow Talisman - Bond
29784.description: A 1-hour item. Target's Speed -30% for 15 sec. when used. Reuse Time is 2 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29817.description: For 20 minutes, P./M. Atk. +7%, P./M. Def. +10%, Max. HP/CP/MP +15%, HP/MP Regeneration +20%. At a certain chance absorbs 3% of the damage inflicted on target as HP. Increases XP/SP gain by +5%. Cooldown is 1 minute. Buff remains after death. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.
