29978.name: Bracelet of Duty - Lv. 1
29978.description: A special bracelet, which you can obtain for contribution to the Clan development. Opens up one Talisman slot. Can be enhanced up to Lv. 6 using Clan Coins at Grand Master’s in each town. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

29979.name: Bracelet of Duty - Lv. 2
29979.description: Opens up one Talisman slot. CON +1. Can be enhanced up to Lv. 6 using Clan Coins at Grand Master’s in each town. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed, or sold.

29980.name: Bracelet of Duty - Lv. 3
29980.description: Opens up two Talisman slots. CON +1, MEN +1. Can be enhanced up to Lv. 6 using Clan Coins at Grand Master’s in each town. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed, or sold.

29981.name: Bracelet of Duty - Lv. 4
29981.description: Opens up two Talisman slots. DEX +1, WIT +1, CON +1, MEN +1. Can be enhanced up to Lv. 6 using Clan Coins at Grand Master’s in each town. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed, or sold.

29982.name: Bracelet of Duty - Lv. 5
29982.description: Opens up three Talisman slots. STR +1, INT +1, DEX +1, WIT +1, CON +1, MEN +1. Can be enhanced up to Lv. 6 using Clan Coins at Grand Master’s in each town. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed, or sold.

29983.name: Silver Coin
29983.description: A special coin that can be obtained when hunting after reaching a certain VIP level. You can use them to buy certain items in the L2 Store. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, sold, or stored in a private warehouse.

29984.name: Gold Coin
29984.description: A very special coin that can be obtained when hunting after reaching a certain VIP level. You can use them to buy certain items in the L2 Store. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, sold, or stored in a private warehouse.

29986.name: Lineage II Chest
29986.description: A reward box given for collecting all the letters of the word “Lineage II”.

29987.name: Chronicle Chest
29987.description: A reward box given for collecting all the letters of the word “Chronicle”. There must be something interesting in there! Double-click to find out.

29988.name: Memories Chest
29988.description: A reward box given for collecting all the letters of the word “Memories”. There must be something interesting in there! Double-click to find out.

29989.name: Valentine Two-handed Blunt Weapon
29989.description: Modifies the appearance of a weapon. Valentine Two-handed Blunt Weapon form.

30372.name: Hero's Cloak
30372.description: Olympiad Hero's Cloak. Max. HP/MP/CP +10%, P. Def. +5%, M. Def. +10%, any Weapon Resistance +5, P./M. Critical Rate +20, Additional damage in PvP -10%. Returns additional +4% of inflicted damage to the enemy. Not available in a chaotic state. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in private warehouse.

30373.name: Glorious Cloak
30373.description: Olympiad Glorious Cloak. Max. HP/MP/CP +10%, P. Def. +5%, M. Def. +10%, any Weapon Resistance +5, P./M. Critical Rate +20, Additional damage in PVP -10%. Returns additional +4% of inflicted damage to the enemy. Not available in a chaotic state. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in private warehouse.

32249.name: Infinite Wooden Quiver
32249.description: Quiver containing arrows made of wood. Used with a No-grade bow.

32250.name: Infinite Bone Quiver
32250.description: Quiver containing arrows made of sharply ground bone. Used with a D-grade bow.

32251.name: Infinite Steel Quiver
32251.description: Quiver containing arrows made of steel. Used with a C-grade bow.

32252.name: Infinite Silver Quiver
32252.description: Quiver containing steel arrows plated in silver. Used with a B-grade bow.

32253.name: Infinite Mithril Quiver
32253.description: A quiver of arrows coated by mithril. For A-grade bows.

32254.name: Infinite Quiver of Light
32254.description: This quiver contains arrows made of unknown material. Used with an S-grade bow.

32256.name: Infinite Wooden Bolt Container
32256.description: Container with bolts made of wood. Used with a No-grade Crossbow.

32257.name: Infinite Bone Bolt Container
32257.description: Container with bolts made of sharply ground bone. Used with a D-grade Crossbow.

32258.name: Infinite Steel Bolt Container
32258.description: Container with bolts made of steel. Used with a C-grade Crossbow.

32259.name: Infinite Silver Bolt Container
32259.description: Container with steel bolts plated in silver. Used with a B-grade Crossbow.

32260.name: Infinite Mithril Bolt Container
32260.description: A container of bolts coated by mithril. For A-grade bows.

33806.name: Improved Scroll: Enchant Weapon (D-grade)
33806.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for D-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles. Randomly enchanted from +1 to +3.

33807.name: Improved Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-grade)
33807.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for C-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles. Randomly enchanted from +1 to +3.

33808.name: Improved Scroll: Enchant Weapon (B-grade)
33808.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for B-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles. Randomly enchanted from +1 to +3.

33809.name: Improved Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-grade)
33809.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for A-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles. Randomly enchanted from +1 to +3.

33810.name: Improved Scroll: Enchant Weapon (S-grade)
33810.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +5 for S-grade one-handed swords/blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +6 for two-handed swords/blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +10 for bows. M. Atk. +4 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus quadruples. Randomly enchanted from +1 to +3.

33812.name: Improved Scroll: Enchant Armor (D-grade)
33812.description: P. Def. +1 for D-grade armor and accessories. Increases by 3 starting from +4. It can be safely enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can be safely enchanted up to +4. Random enchantment from +1 to +3.

33813.name: Improved Scroll: Enchant Armor (C-grade)
33813.description: P. Def. +1 for C-grade armor and accessories. Increases by 3 starting from +4. It can be safely enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can be safely enchanted up to +4. Random enchantment from +1 to +3.

33814.name: Improved Scroll: Enchant Armor (B-grade)
33814.description: P. Def. +1 for B-grade armor and accessories. Increases by 3 starting from +4. It can be safely enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can be safely enchanted up to +4. Random enchantment from +1 to +3.

33815.name: Improved Scroll: Enchant Armor (A-grade)
33815.description: P. Def. for A-grade armor and accessories increases by 1, and by 3 starting from +4. Armor and accessories can be safely enchanted up to +3. One-piece armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. When armor is enchanted to +4 or above, HP also increases according to the enchant value. Armor and accessories are randomly enchanted between +1 and +3.

33816.name: Improved Scroll: Enchant Armor (S-grade)
33816.description: P. Def. +2 for S-grade armor and accessories. Staring at +4, P. Def. +8. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but full-body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. Starting at +4 armor, HP increases depending on the enchant value. Randomly enchanted from +1 to +3.

34070.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-grade)
34070.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for C-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

34072.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (D-grade)
34072.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for D-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dual swords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./ M. Atk. bonus double. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

34603.name: Mysterious No-grade Soulshot
34603.description: Soulshot containing the light of Spirits. Instantly inflicts a powerful attack on the enemy. Use on no-grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold in a private store or to an NPC.

34604.name: Mysterious Soulshot (D-grade)
34604.description: Soulshot containing the light of Spirits. Instantly inflicts a powerful attack on the enemy. Use on D-grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold in a private store or to an NPC.

34605.name: Mysterious Soulshot (C-grade)
34605.description: Soulshot containing the light of Spirits. Instantly inflicts a powerful attack on the enemy. Use on C-grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold in a private store or to an NPC.

34606.name: Mysterious Soulshot (B-grade)
34606.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a B-grade weapon.

34607.name: Mysterious Soulshot (A-grade)
34607.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon causing its M. Atk. to momentarily increase. Used with a B-grade weapon.

34610.name: Mysterious Blessed No-grade Spiritshot
34610.description: Spiritshot bestowed upon a weapon increases its magic power. Used with No-grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold.

34611.name: Mysterious Blessed Spiritshot (D-grade)
34611.description: Spiritshot containing the light of Spirits. Instantly and greatly increases the power of magic. Use on D-grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold in a private store or to an NPC.

34612.name: Mysterious Blessed Spiritshot (C-grade)
34612.description: Spiritshot containing the light of Spirits. Instantly and greatly increases the power of magic. Use on C-grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold in a private store or to an NPC.

34613.name: Mysterious Blessed Spiritshot (B-grade)
34613.description: The power of a Spiritshot is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing its magical power. Used with B-grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, sold in the grocery store, or stored in a private warehouse.

34614.name: Mysterious Blessed Spiritshot (A-grade)
34614.description: The power of a Spiritshot is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing its magical power. Used with A-grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, sold in the grocery store, or stored in a private warehouse.

34925.name: Cloak of Light
34925.description: Max. HP/MP/CP +5%, P. Def. +3%, M. Def. +5%, any Weapon Resistance +3%, P./M. Critical Rate +10, Reflect Damage +3%. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in private warehouse.

34926.name: Cloak of Darkness
34926.description: Max. HP/MP/CP +5%, P. Def. +3%, M. Def. +5%, any Weapon Resistance +3%, P./M. Critical Rate +10, Reflect Damage +3%. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in private warehouse.

34956.name: Letter - M
34956.description: Combine with other letters to create a special word and bring it to Angel Cat to receive a great gift!

35669.name: Angel Cat's Blessing
35669.description: For 60 minutes, Max. HP/MP + 5%, and XP/SP gain + 20% through hunting. Effect remains after death. Cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold in a private store or to an NPC.

35741.name: Amended Scroll
35741.description: Double-click to lower PK value by 1. It can only be used when PK is 1 or higher and Inclination is 0.

35752.name: Scroll: PK (Mid-grade)
35752.description: Double-click to lower PK value by 3. Must be in Floran Village to use. It can only be used when the PK value is greater than or equal to 1.

35753.name: Scroll: PK (High-grade)
35753.description: Double-click to lower PK value by 5. Must be in Floran Village to use. It can only be used when the PK value is greater than or equal to 1.

35754.name: Scroll: PK (Top-grade)
35754.description: Double-click to lower PK value by 10. Must be in Floran Village to use. It can only be used when the PK value is greater than or equal to 1.

36079.name: Yum Yum Candy
36079.description: Yum Yum Candy made of the peanuts grown by Maphr, the goddess of earth, for Valentine's Day. Acquired XP/ SP +15%. Stacks with Nom Nom Candy. Temporary event item.

36080.name: Nom Nom Candy
36080.description: Nom Nom Candy made of the peanuts grown by Maphr, the goddess of earth, for Valentine's Day. Acquired XP/ SP +15%. Stacks with Yum Yum Candy. Temporary event item.

36081.name: Yummy Gift Box
36081.description: You can get one box per account. Double-click to receive two Yum Yum Candies or two Nom Nom Candies. (The item will be removed after the event is over.)

37533.name: NC Messenger's Hat
37533.description: NC Messenger's Hat. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots. STR +1, DEX +1, INT +1, WIT +1.

37543.name: Snowy Squash Nectar
37543.description: Go to Santa to trade in for Snowy Squash Seed or Large Snowy Squash Seed. You can also use it to grow Snowy Squash and Large Snowy Squash.

37544.name: Snowball
37544.description: Obtained from Squash. They say it brings good luck. Can be sold in any store or given to Aden Reconstruction Society. Will be deleted after event.

37545.name: Large Snowball
37545.description: Obtained from Large Squash. They say it brings good luck. Can be sold in any store or given to Aden Reconstruction Society. Will be deleted after event.

37546.name: Rudolph's Gift 2015
37546.description: Santa's Reward. Inside there is Snowy Squash Nectar (10 pcs.). Will be removed after the event is over.

37547.name: Rudolph's Gift 2015
37547.description: Santa's Reward. Inside there is Snowy Squash Nectar (15 pcs.). Will be removed after the event is over.

37548.name: Rudolph's Gift 2015
37548.description: Santa's Reward. Inside there is Snowy Squash Nectar (25 pcs.). Will be removed after the event is over.

37549.name: Rudolph's Gift 2015
37549.description: Santa's Reward. Inside there is Snowy Squash Nectar (60 pcs.). Will be removed after the event is over.

37550.name: Snowman's Buff
37550.description: When in a peaceful zone, restores energy for 3 hours. Will be deleted after event.

37551.name: Christmas Present
37551.description: Double-click to obtain one of the following presents: Bottle of Orfen's Soul, Bottle of Frintezza's Soul, Bottle of Queen Ant's Soul, Bottle of Baium's Soul. Will be deleted after the event is over.

37552.name: Snowy Squash Seed
37552.description: Double-click to have a Young Snowy Squash appear.

37553.name: Large Snowy Squash Seed
37553.description: Double-click to have a Young Large Snowy Squash appear.

37662.name: Refined Romantic Chapeau: Gold
37662.description:
A Refined Romantic Chapeau: Gold (100-day). Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold in a private store or to an NPC.

<Skills>
1. Holy Chapeau: Resurrect a corpse by using 1 Spirit Ore. Restore 50% of the XP. Cooldown is 30 min.
2. Chapeau's Authority: For 20 min., acquired XP and SP + 5%. Cooldown is 60 min.
3. Chapeau's Side Effect: Increases the size of the head for 10 min. Cooldown is 30 min.

37665.name: Refined Romantic Chapeau: Yellow
37665.description:
A Refined Romantic Chapeau: Gold (33-day). Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold in a private store or to an NPC.

<Skills>
1. Holy Chapeau: Resurrect a corpse by using 1 Spirit Ore. Restore 50% of the XP. Cooldown is 30 min.
2. Chapeau's Authority: For 20 min., acquired XP and SP + 5%. Cooldown is 60 min.
3. Chapeau's Side Effect: Increases the size of the head for 10 min. Cooldown is 30 min.

37688.name: Valentine Dagger
37688.description: Modifies the appearance of a weapon to that of a Valentine Dagger.

37689.name: Valentine One-handed Sword
37689.description: Modifies the appearance of a weapon to that of a Valentine One-handed Sword.

37690.name: Valentine Warrior Two-handed Sword
37690.description: Modifies the appearance of a weapon to that of a Valentine Two-handed Sword.

37691.name: Valentine One-handed Blunt Weapon
37691.description: Modifies the appearance of a weapon to that of a Valentine One-handed Blunt Weapon.

37692.name: Valentine Fist Weapon
37692.description: Modifies the appearance of a weapon to that of a Valentine Fist Weapon.

37693.name: Valentine Spear
37693.description: Modifies the appearance of a weapon to that of a Valentine Spear.

37694.name: Valentine Bow
37694.description: Modifies the appearance of a weapon to that of a Valentine Bow.

37695.name: Valentine Crossbow
37695.description: Modifies the appearance of a weapon to that of a Valentine Crossbow.

37696.name: Valentine One-handed Magic Sword
37696.description: Modifies the appearance of a weapon to that of a Valentine One-handed Magic Sword.

37697.name: Valentine One-handed Magic Blunt Weapon
37697.description: Modifies the appearance of a weapon to that of a Valentine One-handed Magic Blunt Weapon.

37698.name: Valentine Two-handed Magic Blunt Weapon
37698.description: Modifies the appearance of a weapon to that of a Valentine Two-handed Magic Blunt Weapon.

37699.name: Valentine Dualsword
37699.description: Modifies the appearance of a weapon to that of a Valentine Dualsword.

37700.name: Valentine Dual Dagger
37700.description: Modifies the appearance of a weapon to that of a Valentine Dual Dagger.

37701.name: Valentine Warrior Dual Blunt Weapon
37701.description: Modifies the appearance of a weapon to that of a Valentine Dual Blunt Weapon.

37702.name: Valentine Shield
37702.description: Modifies the appearance of a weapon to that of a Valentine Shield.

37703.name: Valentine Sigil
37703.description: Modifies the appearance of a sigil to that of a Valentine Sigil.

37704.name: Love Potion
37704.description: Herb to change the appearance of a Valentine's Day weapon.

37705.name: Gold Fishing Shot
37705.description: Fishing consumables. Fishing success +100%. Cannot be sold in the grocery store.

37725.name: NC Dinos Uniform
37725.description: NC Dinos Uniform. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

38154.name: Fishing Shot
38154.description: Soulshot for fishing rods. Doubles the fishing success rate. Cannot be sold to an NPC.

38215.name: Sea Horse: Two-handed Magic Blunt Weapon

38750.name: Uldie’s Card Key
38750.description: This Card Key you got from Uldie, who became captain of the team, contains professional photos. You hust have it in iventory for receiving Buffs. The Card Key is required to receive a Buff from Uldie. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed, or sold in a private store. Will be removed after the event is over.

38751.name: Uldie’s Business Card
38751.description: A Business card you got from Uldie, who became captain of the team! With this card you can take part in a prize giveaway. This Business card can come in handy at any moment, so always have it with you. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed, or sold in a private store. Will be removed after the event is over.

38753.name: Uldie’s Elite Gift
38753.description: An elite Gift from Uldie, who became captain of the team. Double-click to receive various items. Will be removed after the event is over.

38923.name: Squash Seed
38923.description: Squash Seed for solo play. Double-click and a High Quality Squash or Defective Squash (Solo) will appear. Will be deleted during maintenance on Wednesday, February 28th, 2018.

38924.name: Large Squash Seed
38924.description: A Large Squash Seed for parties. Double-click and a High Quality Large Squash or Defective Large Squash (Party) will appear. Will be deleted during maintenance on Wednesday, February 28th, 2018.

45473.name: Blue Mackerel
45473.description: Trade for various items through a fishing guild member.

45481.name: Fresh Blue Mackerel
45481.description: Trade for various items through a fishing guild member.

45492.name: Fishing Rod
45492.description: A Fishing Rod for one day.  Consumes 1 Fishing Shot.

45493.name: Fishing Rod Chest (1-day)
45493.description: Use it to obtain a 1-day Fishing Rod.

45495.name: Normal Bait
45495.description: Bait for fishing. Use to catch fish.

45584.name: Mark of Battle
45584.description: A reward for the success in the Olympiad. Can be traded for a special gift with Olympiad Manager in any village.

46254.name: Dandy's Home Run Ball
46254.description: Golden Ball received from Dandy. For 1 hr., acquired XP/SP +100%. Cannot be stacked with Fish Stew - The Guild's Gratitude. Changes the appearance of your armor into that of a Lineage II Uniform. Buff remains after death.\n\n

46444.name: Kain's Soul Crystal - Stage 1
46444.description: A crystal filled with a monster’s soul. Adds special properties to a weapon. You can enhance the level of a crystal by combining.

46459.name: Mermoden's Soul Crystal - Stage 1
46459.description: A crystal filled with a monster’s soul. Adds special properties to a weapon. You can enhance the level of a crystal by combining.

46474.name: Leona's Soul Crystal - Stage 1
46474.description: A crystal filled with a monster’s soul. Adds special properties to a weapon. You can enhance the level of a crystal by combining.

46489.name: Pantheon's Soul Crystal - Stage 1
46489.description: A crystal filled with a monster’s soul. Adds special properties to a weapon. You can enhance the level of a crystal by combining.

46504.name: Lionel's Soul Crystal - Stage 1
46504.description: A crystal filled with a monster’s soul. Adds special properties to a weapon. You can enhance the level of a crystal by combining.

46642.name: Proof of Red
46642.description: Red Libra-only Item\nA reward certificate received for completing the Red Libra merchants' task. It is used to upgrade a weapon through Elder Black or exchange a weapon pack through Wealthy Merchant Red.

46644.name: Red Libra Supplies Lv. 1
46644.description: Red Libra-only Item\nA reward item received for helping Bodyguard Blue. Double-click to obtain one random item.

46645.name: Red Libra Supplies Lv. 2
46645.description: Red Libra-only Item\nA reward item received for helping Bodyguard Blue. Double-click to obtain one random item.

46646.name: Red Libra Supplies Lv. 3
46646.description: Red Libra-only Item\nA reward item received for helping Bodyguard Blue. Double-click to obtain one random item.

46647.name: Red Libra Supplies Lv. 4
46647.description: Red Libra-only Item\nA reward item received for helping Bodyguard Blue. Double-click to obtain one random item.

47579.name: Christmas Party Herb
47579.description: For 2 min, P. Atk./M. Atk. +15%, P./M. Def +15%, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +10%, HP/MP Recovery Bonus +30%, Movement Speed +10. Transforms your appearance to Santa. The effects disappear upon restart.

47826.name: Hanbok
47826.description: Items to make a Hanbok Outfit.

47927.name: Magic Fan - Blue
47927.description: This magic fan is given out to commemorate the 15th anniversary of Lineage 2.

47928.name: Magic Woodpile
47928.description: Double-click to use a Magic Woodpile for one player. If you have the Magic Fan equipped, you can use magic to set fire to the woodpile.

47929.name: Large Magic Woodpile
47929.description: Double-click to use a Large Magic Woodpile for party use. If you have the Magic Fan equipped, you can use magic to set fire to the woodpile.

47945.name: Magic Fan - Yellow
47945.description: This magic fan is given out to commemorate the 15th anniversary of Lineage 2.

48016.name: White Knight Suit
48016.description: N Shop Platinum exclusive item. A formal white knight suit. Previous armor is taken off and becomes unavailable when it's equipped. Hair accessories, weapon, and magic armor are not removed.

48022.name: Teddy Bear Wear
48022.description: Teddy Bear wear. Previous armor is taken off and becomes unavailable when it's equipped. Headpieces, weapon and magic armor are not removed.

48046.name: Agathion Enchant Scroll
48046.description: Only for Zodiac Agathion. Increases M. Def. when the Agathion grows. Can be safely strengthened up to +3 and can be enhanced up to +10. Starting from +1 enchanting special abilities increases step by step.

48047.name: High-grade Agathion Enchant Scroll
48047.description: Only for Zodiac Agathion. Increases M. Def. when the Agathion grows. Can be safely strengthened up to +3 and can be enhanced up to +10. Starting from +1 enchanting special abilities increases step by step.\nEnchant randomly from +1 to +3 on success.\nCan not use for items with enchant level more than +8.

48048.name: Agathion - Virgo
48048.description:
An item which can be used to obtain the power of the Virgo Agathion.

Summons Agathion from the main slot.
Activates Unique Ability.

<Unique Ability>
M. Def. increased.
Starting at +6, bonus to MEN attacks.

48049.name: Agathion - Capricorn
48049.description:
An item which can be used to obtain the power of the Capricorn Agathion.

Summons Agathion from the main slot.
Activates Unique Ability.

<Unique Ability>
M. Critical Rate increased.
Starting at +6, cooldown of M. Skills and songs/dances decreased.

48050.name: Agathion - Libra
48050.description:
An item which can be used to obtain the power of the Libra Agathion.

Summons Agathion from the main slot.
Activates Unique Ability.

<Unique Ability>
Casting Spd. increased.
Starting at +6, MP Consumption for magic and songs/dance skills decreased.

48052.name: Agathion - Taurus
48052.description:
An item which can be used to obtain the power of the Taurus Agathion.

Summons Agathion from the main slot.
Activates Unique Ability.

<Unique Ability>
P. Def. increased.
Starting at +6, bonus to stun attacks.

48053.name: Agathion - Leo
48053.description:
An item which can be used to obtain the power of the Leo Agathion.

Summons Agathion from the main slot.
Activates Unique Ability.

<Unique Ability>
P. Atk. increased.
Starting at +6, bonus to Paralysis Attacks.

48054.name: Agathion - Gemini
48054.description:
An item which can be used to obtain the power of the Gemini Agathion.

Summons Agathion from the main slot.
Activates Unique Ability.

<Unique Ability>
Effect of Sayha's Grace increased.
Starting at +6, Max HP/MP increased.

48055.name: Agathion - Scorpio
48055.description:
An item which can be used to obtain the power of the Scorpio Agathion.

Summons Agathion from the main slot.
Activates Unique Ability.

<Unique Ability>
P. Critical Rate increased.
Starting at +6, cooldown of P. Skills and songs/dances decreased.

48056.name: Agathion - Aquarius
48056.description:
An item which can be used to obtain the power of the Aquarius Agathion.

Summons Agathion from the main slot.
Activates Unique Ability.

<Unique Ability>
M. Atk. increased.
Starting at +6, bonus to Hold/Sleep.

48058.name: Agathion - Sagittarius
48058.description:
An item which can be used to obtain the power of the Sagittarius Agathion.

Summons Agathion from the main slot.
Activates Unique Ability.

<Unique Ability>
Atk. Spd. increased.
Starting at +6, MP Consumption for P. Skills and songs/dances decreased.

48066.name: Zodiac Agathion Box
48066.description: Double-click to get a random Zodiac Agathion.\n

48400.name: Items Seal Scroll
48400.description: Scroll used for sealing an item.\nThe sealed item cannot be used for any enchantment related systems and is restricted from functions such as exchange/drop/destroy/clan warehouse.\nThe item can be unsealed by using a ‘Item Unseal Scroll'.

48401.name: Item Unseal Scroll
48401.description: Use to unseal a sealed item.

48411.name: Item Unseal Scroll (15-min) Box
48411.description: Double-click to obtain 10 Item Unseal Scrolls (15-min).

49000.name: Agathion - Singer & Dancer
49000.description:
Summons Singer & Dancer Agathion when equipped. 30-day. 
<Active Skill>
1. Dance of Fury: increases Atk. Spd. by 5% for 20 minutes.

2. Dance of Concentration: increases Casting Spd. by 5% for 20 minutes.

3. Song of Wind: increases Speed by 20 for 5 minutes. Cooldown: 10 min.

<Note>
Dance of Fury, Dance of Concentration, and Song of Wind do not stack. Duration: 30 days.

49001.name: Agathion - Singer & Dancer Pack (30-day)
49001.description: Double-click to obtain a Singer & Dancer Agathion (30-day).

49002.name: Agathion - Singer & Dancer
49002.description:
Summons Singer & Dancer Agathion when equipped. 90-day. 
<Active Skill>
1. Dance of Fury: increases Atk. Spd. by 5% for 20 minutes.

2. Dance of Concentration: increases Casting Spd. by 5% for 20 minutes.

3. Song of Wind: increases Speed by 20 for 5 minutes. Cooldown: 10 min.

<Note>
Dance of Fury, Dance of Concentration, and Song of Wind do not stack. Duration: 90 days.

49003.name: Agathion - Singer & Dancer Pack (90-day)
49003.description: Double-click to obtain a Singer & Dancer Agathion (90-day).

49004.name: Ol Mahum Memo
49004.description: 10-year-old Memo from the Ol Mahum. Take 10 of these to the Turek Orc Elder for a Mahum Adena Bank. You can only get one, so the rest of the Memo is yours to do as you wish.

49005.name: Turek Orc Memo
49005.description: 10-year-old Memo from the Turek Orcs. Take 10 of these to the Turek Orc Elder for an Orc Adena Bank. You can only get one, so the rest of the Memo is yours to do as you wish. Deleted after event.

49006.name: Ol Mahum Adena Bank
49006.description: Shake and pour. Sometimes you get items, and sometimes you get money! Once a day only. 15-day.

49007.name: Turek Orc Adena Bank
49007.description: Shake and pour. Sometimes you get items, but rumor has it that the Gracian army's funds, which amounts to 100 million Adena, are sealed in this. Once a day only. 30-day.

49008.name: Soulshot (No-grade)
49008.description: The power of a spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a No-grade weapon.

49009.name: Spiritshot (No-grade)
49009.description: The power of a spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of magic. Used with a No-grade weapon.

49010.name: Soulshot (D-grade)
49010.description: The power of a spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a D-grade weapon.

49011.name: Spiritshot (D-grade)
49011.description: The power of a spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of magic. Used with a D-grade weapon.

49012.name: Healing Potion
49012.description: Magical potion that slowly restores HP. Lasts 15 sec.

49013.name: Major Healing Potion
49013.description: Magical potion that slowly restores HP. Lasts 15 sec.

49014.name: Facelifting Potion - A
49014.description: Beauty potion that changes one's facial appearance to Type A. Both genders. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen.

49015.name: Facelifting Potion - B
49015.description: Beauty potion that changes one's facial appearance to Type B. Both genders. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen.

49016.name: Facelifting Potion - C
49016.description: Beauty potion that changes one's facial appearance to Type C. Both genders. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen.

49017.name: Dye Potion - A
49017.description: Beauty potion that changes one's hair color to Type A. Both genders. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen.

49018.name: Dye Potion - B
49018.description: Beauty potion that changes one's hair color to Type B. Both genders. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen.

49019.name: Dye Potion - C
49019.description: Beauty potion that changes one's hair color to Type C. Both genders. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen.

49020.name: Dye Potion - D
49020.description: Beauty potion that changes one's hair color to Type D. Both genders. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen.

49021.name: Facelifting Potion Pack
49021.description: Wrapped Pack containing either Facelifting Potion A, B, or C.

49022.name: Dye Potion Pack
49022.description: Wrapped Pack containing either Dye Potion A, B, C, or D.

49023.name: Scroll: Empower
49023.description: Double click for a buff that increases your magic.

49024.name: Scroll: Might
49024.description: Double click for a buff that increases your P. Atk.

49025.name: Scroll: Shield
49025.description: Double click for a buff that increases your defenses.

49026.name: Scroll: PK (No-grade)
49026.description: Double-click to lower PK value by 1. It can only be used when the PK value is greater than or above 1, and reputation is 0. Intended for Lv. 1-19. Cannot be sold in the grocery store.

49027.name: Scroll: PK (D-grade)
49027.description: Double-click to lower PK value by 1. It can only be used when the PK value is greater than or above 1, and reputation is 0. Intended for Lv. 20-39. Cannot be sold in the grocery store.

49028.name: Scroll: PK (C-grade)
49028.description: Double-click to lower PK value by 1. It can only be used when the PK value is greater than or above 1, and reputation is 0. Intended for Lv. 40-51. Cannot be sold in the grocery store.

49029.name: Scroll: PK (B-grade)
49029.description: Double-click to lower PK value by 1. It can only be used when the PK value is greater than or above 1, and reputation is 0. Intended for Lv. 52-60. Cannot be sold in the grocery store.

49030.name: Scroll: PK (A-grade)
49030.description: Double-click to lower PK value by 1. It can only be used when the PK value is greater than or above 1, and reputation is 0. Intended for Lv. 61 and higher. Cannot be sold in the grocery store.

49031.name: Chronicle Ring
49031.description: HP Recovery Bonus + 5%, P./M. Accuracy + 1, Weight Limit + 5000. The bonuses from this item do not stack.

49032.name: Eva's Mark
49032.description: Celebrate the launch of the classic server! Equip and use the skill created to teleport to the nearest town. Cooldown is 60 min. 30-day.

49033.name: Classic Gift Box
49033.description: Celebrate the launch of the classic server! Double-click to obtain an Eva's Mark (30-day).

49034.name: Ol Mahum Adena Bank
49034.description: Shake and pour. Sometimes you get items, and sometimes you get money! One use only.

49035.name: Turek Orc Adena Bank
49035.description: Shake and pour. Sometimes you get items, but rumor has it that the Gracian army's funds, which amounts to 100 million Adena, are sealed in this. One-time use.

49036.name: Adventurer's Wind Walk Potion
49036.description: Magical potion that increases movement Speed.

49043.name: Sword of Solidarity (Novice)
49043.description: A mithril sword forged long ago to commemorate the alliance between Elves and Humans. Novice only.

49044.name: Wand of Adept (Novice)
49044.description: The wand presented to those who have finished their studies at the school of magic. Novice only.

49045.name: Red Sunset Staff (Novice)
49045.description: A staff used by warriors belonging to the Red Sunset clan.  Novice only.

49046.name: Red Sunset Sword (Novice)
49046.description: A sword used by warriors belonging to the Red Sunset clan. Novice only.

49047.name: Sword of Sentinel (Novice)
49047.description: A steel blade issued to those fighters that have been acknowledged as protectors of the woods. Novice only.

49048.name: Staff of Sentinel (Novice)
49048.description: A staff issued to wizards that have been acknowledged as protectors of the woods.  Novice only.

49049.name: Eldritch Dagger (Novice)
49049.description: A steel dagger engraved with the runes of Shilen and Gran Kain. Novice only.

49050.name: Blood Saber (Novice)
49050.description: An Oriharukon sword crafted in the Abella style of the east. Novice only.

49052.name: Butcher's Sword (Novice)
49052.description: A sword granted to young Orc Fighters who distinguished themselves at war. Novice only.

49053.name: Silversmith Hammer (Novice)
49053.description: A hammer silversmiths of the ancient Elmoreden used. Novice only.

49054.name: Forgotten Soulshot Shard
49054.description: Soulshot shard obtained from the Forgotten Temple. Take it to Magister Nell of Gludin Village.

49055.name: Boom Boom Shot
49055.description: A magical bomb that triples the amount of Soulshots/Spiritshots/Blessed Spiritshots when put together in Spirit Boom's Shotgun. You can get one each day from Spirit Boom, and it resets at 6:30 am.  Temporary event item.

49056.name: Lucky Soul Pack (No-grade)
49056.description: Pack randomly containing 100 to 10,000 Mysterious Soulshots (No-grade).  Temporary event item.

49057.name: Lucky Soul Pack (D-grade)
49057.description: Pack randomly containing 100 to 10,000 Mysterious Soulshots (D-grade).  Temporary event item.

49058.name: Lucky Soul Pack (C-grade)
49058.description: Pack randomly containing 50 to 5,000 Mysterious Soulshots (C-grade).  Temporary event item.

49059.name: Lucky Spirit Pack (No-grade)
49059.description: Pack randomly containing 50 to 1,000 Mysterious Spiritshots (No-grade).  Temporary event item.

49060.name: Lucky Spirit Pack (D-grade)
49060.description: Pack randomly containing 80 to 3,000 Mysterious Spiritshots (D-grade).  Temporary event item.

49061.name: Lucky Spirit Pack (C-grade)
49061.description: Pack randomly containing 30 to 1,000 Mysterious Spiritshots (C-grade).  Temporary event item.

49062.name: Mysterious Spiritshot (No-grade)
49062.description: Soulshot containing the light of Spirits. Instantly inflicts a powerful attack on the enemy. Use on no-grade weapons.

49063.name: Mysterious Spiritshot (D-grade)
49063.description: Soulshot containing the light of Spirits. Instantly inflicts a powerful attack on the enemy. Use on D-grade weapons.

49064.name: Mysterious Spiritshot (C-grade)
49064.description: Soulshot containing the light of Spirits. Instantly inflicts a powerful attack on the enemy. Use on C-grade weapons.

49065.name: Blessed Lucky Spirit Pack (No-grade)
49065.description: Pack randomly containing 20 to 1,000 Mysterious Blessed Spiritshots (No-grade).  Temporary event item.

49066.name: Blessed Lucky Spirit Pack (D-grade)
49066.description: Pack randomly containing 20 to 1,000 Mysterious Blessed Spiritshots (D-grade).  Temporary event item.

49067.name: Blessed Lucky Spirit Pack (C-grade)
49067.description: Pack randomly containing 10 to 1,000 Mysterious Blessed Spiritshots (C-grade).  Temporary event item.

49068.name: Quick Stone
49068.description: For 20 min., XP and SP + 10%, and Speed + 20. Cooldown is 10 min. Does not disappear upon death.  Temporary event item. \n<Note> When the Quick Step buff is applied, the effects of Wind Walk or potions that increase speed will not stack.

49069.name: Spirit Boom's Soulshot Pack (No-grade)
49069.description: Soulshot Pack augmented with a Boom Boom Shot. Contains 600 Mysterious Soulshots (No-grade) and a Lucky Soul Pack (No-grade).  Temporary event item.

49070.name: Spirit Boom's Soulshot Pack (D-grade)
49070.description: Soulshot Pack augmented with a Boom Boom Shot. Contains 1,350 Mysterious Soulshots (D-grade) and a Lucky Soul Pack (D-grade).  Temporary event item.

49071.name: Spirit Boom's Soulshot Pack (C-grade)
49071.description: Soulshot Pack augmented with a Boom Boom Shot. Contains 900 Mysterious Soulshots (C-grade) and a Lucky Soul Pack (C-grade).  Temporary event item.

49072.name: Spirit Boom's Spiritshot Pack (No-grade)
49072.description: Spiritshot Pack augmented with a Boom Boom Shot. Contains 270 Mysterious Spiritshots (No-grade) and a Lucky Spirit Pack (No-grade).  Temporary event item.

49073.name: Spirit Boom's Spiritshot Pack (D-grade)
49073.description: Spiritshot Pack augmented with a Boom Boom Shot. Contains 750 Mysterious Spiritshots (D-grade) and a Lucky Spirit Pack (D-grade).  Temporary event item.

49074.name: Spirit Boom's Spiritshot Pack (C-grade)
49074.description: Spiritshot Pack augmented with a Boom Boom Shot. Contains 390 Mysterious Spiritshots (C-grade) and a Lucky Spirit Pack (C-grade).  Temporary event item.

49075.name: Spirit Boom's Blessed Spiritshot Pack (No-grade)
49075.description: Blessed Spiritshot Pack augmented with a Boom Boom Shot. Contains 120 Mysterious Blessed Spiritshots (No-grade) and a Lucky Spirit Pack (No-grade).  Temporary event item.

49076.name: Spirit Boom's Blessed Spiritshot Pack (D-grade)
49076.description: Blessed Spiritshot Pack augmented with a Boom Boom Shot. Contains 300 Mysterious Blessed Spiritshots (D-grade) and a Lucky Spirit Pack (D-grade).  Temporary event item.

49077.name: Spirit Boom's Blessed Spiritshot Pack (C-grade)
49077.description: Blessed Spiritshot Pack augmented with a Boom Boom Shot. Contains 150 Mysterious Blessed Spiritshots (C-grade) and a Lucky Spirit Pack (C-grade).  Temporary event item.

49078.name: Chapeau 100-day Pack
49078.description: Pack containing a Refined Romantic Chapeau: Gold (100-day).

49079.name: Chapeau 33-day Pack
49079.description: Pack containing a Refined Romantic Chapeau: Yellow (33-day).

49080.name: Rice Cake of Fighting Spirit
49080.description: Increases XP and SP gain by 20% for 20 minutes. The effect remains after character's death. Cooldown is 1 minute. \n\n<Note> The effect changes to the effect of Rice Cake of Flaming Fighting Spirit, if it is used when Rice Cake of Fighting Spirit is in effect.

49081.name: Rice Cake of Flaming Fighting Spirit
49081.description: Increases XP and SP gain by 30% for 20 minutes. The effect remains after character's death. Cooldown is 1 minute. \n\n<Note> The effect does not change if Rice Cake of Fighting Spirit is when Rice Cake of Flaming Fighting Spirit is in effect.

49082.name: Get-Rich-Quick Supply Chest
49082.description: Double-click to get one of the following: Scroll: Enchant Weapon/Armor (D/C-grade), Magic Haste Potion, Greater Magic Haste Potion, Haste Potion, Greater Haste Potion, Greater Scroll of Resurrection, Scroll of Escape.

49083.name: Commander's Dagger
49083.description: A dagger, which is both a weapon and a symbol of power. This dagger was made by a blacksmith with the purest heart, and has the power to lead a force of 100,000 warriors. Can use the Power of Commander when equipped. Can be bought from Aden merchants.\n\n<Active Skill> 1. Power of Commander: deals 50 points of damage in PvP. Cooldown is 1 minute.

49084.name: Greater Scroll of Resurrection
49084.description: Magic scroll used to resurrect a dead character, restoring 50% of XP.

49085.name: Battle Support Chest
49085.description: Double-click to get 2 Rice Cakes of Fighting Spirit. Has a low chance to get a Get-Rich-Quick Supply Chest.

49086.name: Rice Cake of Fighting Spirit
49086.description: Increases XP and SP gain by 20% for 20 minutes. The effect remains after character's death. Cooldown is 10 minutes. \n\n<Note> The effect changes to the effect of Rice Cake of Flaming Fighting Spirit, if it is used when Rice Cake of Fighting Spirit is in effect. (inc. the one for XP).

49087.name: Greater Scroll of Escape
49087.description: Magic scroll used to quickly teleport the character to the nearest town.

49088.name: Gold Medal
49088.description: Shiny medal. Any trader will pay good money for a gold medal.

49089.name: Scroll of Escape: Entrance to Cruma Tower
49089.description: Magic scroll used to teleport the character to the Entrance to Cruma Tower.

49090.name: Scroll of Escape: Entrance to Dragon Valley

49091.name: Scroll of Escape: Dragon Valley Bridge

49092.name: Scroll of Escape: Talking Island Village

49108.name: Beauty Chest
49108.description: Double-click to get one of the following: Dye Potion Pack / Facelifting Potion Pack / Mysterious Potion.

49109.name: Buff Scrolls Chest
49109.description: Double-click to get one of the following: Scroll: Empower / Scroll: Might / Scroll: Shield.

49110.name: High-grade Dye Chest
49110.description: Double-click to get one of the following: Greater STR Dye / Greater CON Dye / Greater DEX Dye / Greater INT Dye / Greater WIT Dye / Greater MEN Dye.

49111.name: Dye Chest
49111.description: Double-click to get one of the following: STR Dye / CON Dye / DEX Dye / INT Dye / WIT Dye / MEN Dye.

49112.name: Staff Chest
49112.description: Double-click to get one of the following: Cursed Staff / Crystal Staff / Sage's Staff / Demon's Staff.

49113.description: Double-click to get one of the following: Knuckle Duster / Chakram / Fisted Blade / Great Pata.

49114.description: Double-click to get one of the following: Bec de Corbin / Orcish Glaive / Poleaxe / Orcish Poleaxe.

49115.description: Double-click to get one of the following: Dwarven War Hammer / Heavy Doom Hammer / War Axe / Yaksa Mace.

49116.description: Double-click to get one of the following: Stiletto / Cursed Dagger / Dark Screamer / Crystal Dagger.

49117.description: Double-click to get one of the following: Katana / StormBringer / Sword of Delusion / Samurai Long Sword.

49118.name: Bow Chest
49118.description: Double-click to get one of the following: Elemental Bow / Crystallized Ice Bow / Akat Longbow / Eminence Bow.

49119.name: Halloween Outfit (15-day)
49119.description: A 15-day item. When equipped, armor is unequipped and cannot be used. Weapons and magic armor remain equipped. Hair accessories also remain but the appearance won't be displayed.

49120.name: Halloween Outfit
49120.description: When equipped, armor is unequipped and cannot be used. Weapons and magic armor remain equipped. Hair accessories also remain but the appearance won't be displayed.

49121.name: Party Mask (15-day)
49121.description: Fashion item used to display a unique appearance.  15-day.

49122.name: Ring of Macken (15-day)
49122.description: When equipped, increases HP by 20, M. Atk. by 3, P. Atk. by 5. When equipped with two identical earrings, the effect of only one earring will be applied.  15-day.

49123.name: Ring of Macken
49123.description: When equipped, increases HP by 20, M. Atk. by 3, P. Atk. by 5. The effect does not stack, if two identical rings are equipped.

49124.name: Earring of Macken (15-day)
49124.description: When equipped, increases MP recovery rate by 0.2, and received Heal Amount by 2%. When equipped with two identical earrings, the effect of only one earring will be applied.  15-day.

49125.name: Earring of Macken
49125.description: When equipped, increases MP recovery rate by 0.2, and received Heal Amount by 2%. When equipped with two identical earrings, the effect of only one earring will be applied. Additionally increases MP by 10.

49126.name: Necklace of Macken (15-day)
49126.description: When equipped, increases MP by 20, M. Def. by 3, P. Def. by 5.

49127.name: Necklace of Macken
49127.description: When equipped, increases MP by 20, M. Def. by 3, P. Def. by 5. 15-day.

49128.name: Souvenir Box
49128.description: Reward for participating in the event. Double-click to receive one of the following: High-grade Dye Chest, Dye Chest, Beauty Chest, Buff Scrolls Chest, Greater Healing Potion.

49129.name: 1st Anniversary Coin
49129.description: Coin used to purchase special items during the Holiday Fair.  Can be shared within account.

49130.name: Scroll: Summon Piero
49130.description: Double-click the item to summon Piero. Summoned Piero names a random number from 1 to 6. If your number is bigger than Piero's, you can receive the Adena.

49131.name: Magic Number Cube
49131.description: A Magic Number Cube that will allow you to participate in the gift giveaway. Use it on Captive Tulio, which is summoned at 9 AM and 9 PM in the Elven Village and Dark Elf Village to participate in the gift giveaway.

49132.name: Membership Card
49132.description: Membership Card given to VIP members of the 11th Sale. When in inventory, you can receive the 11th Anniversary buffs and coins from the 11th NPC.

49133.name: Venetian Fleece - Low Level
49133.description: A 15-day item. When in inventory, your XP and SP gain is increased by 22%. Can be used only by characters whose level is less than 40. This item will be removed after the event is over.

49136.name: Venetian Fleece - High Level
49136.description: 15-day item. When in inventory, your XP and SP gain is increased by 11%.

49137.name: Venetian Fleece Chest (Low Level)
49137.description: Double-click the chest to receive 1 15-day Venetian Fleece (Low Level). The Fleece can be used only by characters whose level is less than 40.   This item will be removed after the event is over.

49138.name: Venetian Fleece Chest (High Level)
49138.description: Double-click the chest to receive 15-day Venetian Fleece Chest (High Level, 1 pc.).

49139.name: Dual Sword Gift Chest
49139.description: Double-click the chest to receive 15-day Dual Candle Sword.

49458.description:
Bracelet that can be used to summon Agathion - Pisces. 15-day item.

49467.name: Fire Dragon Pendant
49467.description: Pendant holding the sealed power of Fire Dragon. Can be enchanted up to +10 using Pendant Polish/ Shining Pendant Polish. Starting from +4 adds passive skills, when enchanted to +9 grants special skills.

49468.name: Earth Dragon Pendant
49468.description: Pendant holding the sealed power of Earth Dragon. Can be enchanted up to +10 using Pendant Polish/ Shining Pendant Polish. Starting from +4 adds passive skills, when enchanted to +9 grants special skills.

49469.name: Pendant Polish
49469.description: Polish that enhances characteristics of a Pendant. Maximum Enchant Level is +10. If the enchant fails, pendant disappears.

49470.name: Shiny Pendant Varnish
49470.description: Shiny varnish to enchant pendants. Can be used on Valaks'/Antharas' Pendants below + 8, and keeps the pendant and the existing enchant level intact even if it fails to enchant.

49471.name: Valakas' Pendant Box
49471.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Valakas' Pendant and 10 Pendant Varnish.

49472.name: Antharas' Pendant Box
49472.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Antharas' Pendant and 10 Pendant Varnish.

49473.name: Mr. K's Hand of God Gift Basket
49473.description: Gift Basket that contains the spirit of Mr. K's Hand of God. Open it to receive 1 Black Mask, 30 Rice Cakes of Flaming Fighting Spirit, and 50 Rice Cakes of Fighting Spirit (XP).

49474.name: Scroll Part: Enchant Weapon
49474.description: Unavailable item. Take it to an NPC merchant to obtain some Adena.

49481.name: Stable Armor Enchant Scroll (D grade)
49481.description: When enchanted, P. Def. +1 for D-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. +3. Starting at +4 armor, HP increases depending on the enchant value. Use the scroll to safely enchant the armor. Even if enchantment fails, the item is not crystallized and retains the current enchant value. It cannot be used on armor enchanted to +6 or above.

49482.name: Stable Weapon Enchant Scroll (D grade)
49482.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for D-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles Use the scroll to safely enchant the weapon. Even if enchantment fails, the item is not crystallized and retains the current enchant value. It cannot be used on weapons enchanted to +7 or above.

49483.name: Stable Armor Enchant Scroll (C grade)
49483.description: When enchanted, P. Def. +1 for C-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. +3. Starting at +4 armor, HP increases depending on the enchant value. Use the scroll to safely enchant the armor. Even if enchantment fails, the item is not crystallized and retains the current enchant value. It cannot be used on armor enchanted to +6 or above.

Use the scroll to safely enchant the weapon. Even if enchantment fails, the item is not crystallized and retains the current enchant value. It cannot be used on weapons enchanted to +7 or above.

Use the scroll to safely enchant the weapon. Even if enchantment fails, the item is not crystallized and retains the current enchant value. It cannot be used on weapons enchanted to +7 or above.

49487.description: Using Dimension Merchant, you can exchange it for a No-, D-, C- or B-grade Soulshot, Spiritshot, Blessed Soulshot, Blessed Spiritshot, Beast Spiritshot or Beast Soulshot.

49488.name: Major Warrior Healing Potion
49488.description: Magic potion that quickly restores HP. Duration: 15 sec.

49489.name: Parts of Enchantment Scrolls Chest
49489.description: Double-click to receive one Part of Enchantment Scrolls.

49490.name: Fishing kit
49490.description:
Double-click to receive 1 Fishing Rod (1-day), Bait (720 pcs), 1 Hero's Dual Swords, 1 Soulshot Ticket. 

<Note>
Be careful before opening the items as their relocation is restricted.

49491.name: Weapon Supply Box (D-grade)
49491.description: Double-click to get the highest quality D-grade weapon.

49492.name: Weapon Supply Box (C-grade)
49492.description: Double-click to get the highest quality C-grade weapon.

49493.name: Orfen's Earring
49493.description: 15-day item. MP +19, Mental Resistance and Atk. Rate +5%, Hold Resistance and Atk. Rate +10%, Healing Power +2%, Skill MP Consumption -2%. The effect doesn't stack if two identical earrings are worn. Cannot be enchanted.

49494.name: Buff Scrolls Chest
49494.description: Double-click to get one per each of the following Stage 1 scrolls: Acumen, Empower, Haste, Death Whisper, and Wind Walk.

49496.name: Luck Cube
49496.description: 7-day item. Available at level 20 or higher. Double-click the Cube to receive Soulshot Ticket, Buff Scrolls Chest, Major Healing Potion, Angel Cat's Blessing, Improved Scroll of Escape, Parts of Enchantment Scrolls Chest, Fishing kit chest, My Teleport Package, Weapon Supply Box (D-grade), Weapon Supply Box (C-grade). (Can be used only once per day.)

49497.name: Hero's Fishing kit
49497.description:
Double-click to receive 1 Fishing Rod (1-day), Bait (720 pcs), 1 Hero's Dual Swords (1-day), 1 Soulshot Ticket. 

<Note>
Be careful before opening the items as their relocation is restricted.

49498.name: My Teleport Scroll Package
49498.description: Double-click to get 1 My Teleport Book or 30 My Teleport Scrolls.

49499.name: Angel Cat's Energy
49499.description: Increases Max HP/MP by 5% for 30 min and XP and SP gain from hunting by 20%. Not removed on death.

49500.name: Advanced Return Scroll
49500.description: Magical scroll that quickly teleports you to the closest town.

49501.name: Fish Stew - Guildsman's Gratitude Lv. 1
49501.description: Increases XP and SP obtained from hunting by 10% for 20 min.

49502.name: Return: Giran Harbor
49502.description: Magic scroll that teleports you to Giran Harbor.

49503.name: Return: Gludin Harbor
49503.description: Magic scroll that teleports you to Gludin Harbor.

49504.name: Fish Report
49504.description: An investigation report of fish species in the area. Deliver it to Hydrologist Baikal.

49505.name: Sealed Glass Bottle
49505.description: A bottle containing the water pollutant. Deliver it to Fishing Manager Pierre.

49506.name: Fishing Rod
49506.description: A Fishing Rod for 10 days.  Consumes 1 Fishing Shot.

49507.name: Fishing Rod Chest (10-day)
49507.description: You can obtain a Fishing Rod for 10 days.

49509.name: Ring of Core
49509.description: 15-day item. MP +9, Mental Resistance and Atk. Rate +10%, P./M. Evasion +1, Received Damage -2%. The effect doesn't stack if two identical rings are worn. Cannot be enchanted.

49510.name: Pierre's Letter
49510.description: An urgent letter from Fishing Manager Pierre. Deliver it to Ferma.

49511.name: Sheep Gift
49511.description: You can obtain Spellbook Box, Rare Accessory Pack (15-day), Fishing kit, High Rank Scroll of Escape (Event), Quick Healing Potion, Warrior's Major Healing Potion.

49512.name: Amulet: Prosperity
49512.description: A 14-day item. When in inventory, you get STR +1, DEX +1, CON +1, INT +1, WIT +1, MEN +1.

49513.name: Shiny Pendant Varnish Box
49513.description:
Double-click to obtain 1 Shiny Varnish that strengthens a pendant’s ability.

<Note>
The items obtained from the box cannot be moved freely. Keep this in mind before opening the box.

49514.name: Agathion Bracelet - Aries
49514.description:
60-day item. Bracelet that can be used to summon Agathion - Aries. 

<Active Skill>
Agathion Teleport: grants the ability to teleport to Gludio/ Dion/ Giran/ Oren. (Cooldown: 30 minutes)

<Item Skill>
1. Aries Power: increases STR/ INT/ CON/ MEN by 1.

49515.name: Agathion Bracelet - Aries
49515.description:
Bracelet that can be used to summon Agathion - Aries.

<Active Skill>
Agathion Teleport: grants the ability to teleport to Gludio/ Dion/ Giran/ Oren. (Cooldown: 30 minutes)

<Item Skill>
1. Aries Power: increases STR/ INT/ CON/ MEN by 1.

49516.name: Blessed Agathion Bracelet - Aries
49516.description:
Bracelet that can be used to summon Agathion - Aries.

<Active Skill>
1. Agathion Teleport: Grants the ability to teleport to Town of Giran/Town of Gludio/Town of Dion/Town of Oren. (Cooldown: 30 minutes)

<Item Skill>
1. Aries' Power: STR/INT/CON/MEN +1.
2. Aries' Blessing: MEN/Stun/Sleep/Paralysis Resistance +5%.

49517.name: Pirate’s Island Treasure Chest
49517.description: Double-click to obtain 2 Special Fruit Buffs. If you’re lucky, you can obtain 1 Pirate King’s Treasure Chest.

49518.name: Pirate's Special Fruit
49518.description: For 20 min., P./M. Atk. + 7%, P./M. Def. + 10%, Max HP/CP/MP + 15%, HP/MP Recovery + 20%. Has a chance of recovering 3% of physical damage dealt to enemy as HP. Increase XP/SP gain by 5% when hunting. Cooldown is 1 minute. Effect remains even after death.

49519.name: Pirate King's Reward Box
49519.description: Double-click to obtain one of the treasures that the pirates stole.

49520.name: Aries Agathion Box
49520.description:
Double-click to obtain 1 Aries Agathion (60-day).

<Note>
The items obtained from the box cannot be moved freely. Keep this in mind before opening the box.

49521.name: Refined Romantic Chapeau <Str+1 Int+1>
49521.description: Refined Romantic Chapeau Grants STR +1, INT +1 when equipped. Enables to use Refined Romantic Chapeau Skill: Teleport (Cooldown: 2 hours). Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

49522.name: Pirate King Hat <Str+1 Int+1>
49522.description: Pirate Captain Hat. Grants STR +1, INT +1 when equipped. Enables to use Pirate Captain Hat Skill: Teleport (Cooldown: 2 hours). Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

49523.name: Demon's Circlet <Str+1 Int+1>
49523.description: Circlet of Devil. When equipped: STR +1, INT +1. Enables to use Circlet of Devil Skill: Teleport (Cooldown: 2 hours). Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

49524.name: Pirate King Hat Box
49524.description: Double-click to obtain one of the following: Refined Romantic Chapeau, Pirate King Hat, and Demon's Circlet.

49525.name: Rare Accessory Box
49525.description: Double-click to receive one of the following items: Queen Ant's Ring (15-day), Orfen's Earring (15-day), Ring of Core (15-day).

49526.name: Advanced Scroll of Resurrection
49526.description: Magic scroll that resurrects a dead character and restores their XP by 50%.

49527.name: My Teleport Box
49527.description: Double-click to obtain 1 My Teleport Book and 10 Scrolls of Escape.

49528.name: Pirate's Healing Potion
49528.description: Magic potion that instantly restores HP. Instant effect with no duration. Cannot be used when HP is full.

49529.name: Blue Dynasty- Heavy Armor
49529.description: An item exclusive for the L2 Assist App. A formal Blue Dynasty Heavy Armor. Any class can wear it. For some races and classes, the Blue Dynasty Heavy Armor, Light Armor, and Robe may have the same appearance. Equipping this armor removes the existing armor. Hair accessories, weapon, and magic armor are not removed.

49530.name: Blue Dynasty Circlet
49530.description: An item exclusive for the L2 Assist App. This Blue Dynasty Circlet occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

49531.name: Red Zubei- Heavy Armor
49531.description: An item exclusive for the L2 Assist App. A formal Red Zubei Heavy Armor. Any class can wear it. For some races and classes, the Red Zubei Heavy Armor, Light Armor, and Robe may have the same appearance. Equipping this armor removes the existing armor. Hair accessories, weapon, and magic armor are not removed.

49532.name: White Assassin Suit
49532.description: An item exclusive for the L2 Assist App. A formal White Assassin Suit. Wearing this suit removes the existing armor. Hair accessories, weapon, and magic armor are not removed.

49533.name: Quick Hero Healing Potion
49533.description: Magic potion that quickly restores HP. Instant cooldown. Cannot be used when HP is full.

49534.name: Hero Cube
49534.description: 7-day item. Available at level 20 or higher. Double-click the Cube to receive Soulshot Ticket, Buff Scrolls Chest, Major Healing Potion, Warrior's Quick Healing Potion, Warrior's Quick Healing Potion, Angel Cat's Blessing, Improved Scroll of Resurrection, Parts of Enchantment Scrolls Chest, Fishing kit chest, My Teleport to the Base Package, Blade Spirit, Spellbook Box. (Can be used only once per day.)

49535.name: Fishing kit of the Hero Who Came Back
49535.description:
Double-click to receive Fishing Rod (10-day), Bait (2160 pcs, Event), Hero's Dual Swords (15-day), 3 Soulshot Tickets. 

<Note>
Be careful before opening the items as their relocation is restricted.

49536.name: Box of Scroll of Escape to the Base
49536.description: Double-click to get 1 Scroll of Escape to Dragon Valley Bridge, to Antharas' Lair, to the Entrance of Cruma Tower, to the Entrance of Orc Barracks, to the Entrance of Magic Valley.

49537.name: Return: Dragon Valley Bridge
49537.description: Magic scroll that teleports you to the Dragon Valley Bridge.

49538.name: Return: Inside Antharas' Lair
49538.description: Magic scroll that teleports you into Antharas' Lair.

49539.name: Return: Cruma Tower Entrance
49539.description: Magic scroll that teleports you to the entrance of Cruma Tower.

49540.name: Return: Turek Orc Campsite Entrance
49540.description: Magic scroll that teleports you to the entrance of Turek Orc Campsite.

49541.name: Spellbook Chest
49541.description: Double-click the chest to receive one of the Spellbooks, used after the 2nd Class Transfer.

49542.name: Greater Scroll of Resurrection
49542.description: Magic scroll, restoring 50% of XP and resurrecting the character.

49550.name: Return: Enchanted Valley Entrance
49550.description: Magic scroll that teleports you to the entrance of Enchanted Valley.

49551.name: Blue Dynasty- Light Armor
49551.description: An item exclusive for the L2 Assist App. A formal Blue Dynasty Light Armor. Any class can wear it. For some races and classes, the Blue Dynasty Heavy Armor, Light Armor, and Robe may have the same appearance. Equipping this armor removes the existing armor. Hair accessories, weapon, and magic armor are not removed.

49552.name: Blue Dynasty- Robe
49552.description: An item exclusive for the L2 Assist App. A formal Blue Dynasty Robe. Any class can wear it. For some races and classes, Blue Dynasty Heavy Armor, Light Armor, and Robe may have the same appearance. Equipping this robe removes the existing armor. Hair accessories, weapon, and magic armor are not removed.

49553.name: Red Zubei- Light Armor
49553.description: An item exclusive for the L2 Assist App. A formal Red Zubei Light Armor. Any class can wear it. For some races and classes, Red Zubei Heavy Armor, Light Armor, and Robe may have the same appearance. Equipping this armor removes the existing armor. Hair accessories, weapon, and magic armor are not removed.

49554.name: Red Zubei- Robe
49554.description: An item exclusive for the L2 Assist App. A formal Red Zubei Robe. Any class can wear it. For some races and classes, Red Zubei Heavy Armor, Light Armor, and Robe may have the same appearance. Equipping this robe removes the existing armor. Hair accessories, weapon, and magic armor are not removed.

49555.name: Mold Design
49555.description: Trade items that Merchant Damion should send to the Gludio Castle. Deliver them to Amore near Fellmere Lake.

49556.name: Amore’s Certificate
49556.description: A certificate issued by Amore. Take it to Merchant Damion in Gludin Village.

49557.name: Armor Trade Contract
49557.description: A contract that was carried by a Turek Orc Commander. The Dwarf Mark is stamped on it. Take the certificate to Moonlight Knight Johnson.

49558.name: Operation Order
49558.description: An Operation Order that a Turek Orc Commander was holding. Take it to Moonlight Knight Johnson.

49559.name: Rolento's Bag
49559.description: A bag containing the supplies that Dwarf Merchant Rolento needs to send to Ol Mahum Elder Gus. Deliver it to Elder Gus.

49560.name: Iron Scale Certificate
49560.description: A certificate that confirms one's membership to the Iron Scale Guild.

49561.name: Turek Orc Invader’s Head
49561.description: Severed head of a Turek Orc Invader. Collect 10 heads and take them to Ol Mahum Elder Gus.

49562.name: Spellbook: Spirit Sharing
49562.description: Spellbook needed to learn Spirit Sharing. Used by Warlocks, Elemental Summoners, and Phantom Summoners.\nLevel: 44

49563.name: 1,000,000,000 Adena
49563.description: Aden look like adens, but they are rare and more valuable. The one who takes them to Misfety receives a gift and Buffs.

49564.name: 10,000,000,000 Adena
49564.description: Aden look like adens, but they are rare and more valuable. The one who takes them to Misfety receives a gift and Buffs.

49565.name: Misfety's Gift
49565.description:
Miss Patch's Gift. Double-click the chest to receive Successor's Ring, Sheep Hat (14-day) and The Rune of Hero's Experience (30-day). 

<Note>
Be careful before opening the items as their relocation is restricted.

49566.name: Roa's Gift
49566.description:
Roa's Gift. This is the gift she put her soul into. Double-click the chest to receive 1 Soulshot Ticket, Buff Scrolls Chest, Base Scroll of Escape Pack, Fishing Kit, Feather of Blessing, or Spellbook Box. 

<Note>
The items obtained from the box cannot be moved freely. Keep this in mind before opening the box.

49567.name: Something Roa lost
49567.description: Something Roa's Helper lost. Can be exchanged for a Roa's Gift through Roa NPC that appears at times. Exchange is available once a day.

49568.name: Spellbook: Sonic Move
49568.description: Spellbook needed to learn Sonic Move. Used by Gladiators.\nLevel: 56

49569.name: Spellbook: Sand Bomb
49569.description: Spellbook needed to learn Sand Bomb. Used by Treasure Hunters, Plains Walkers, and Abyss Walkers.\nLevel: 55

49570.name: Spellbook: Mass Curse Gloom
49570.description: Spellbook needed to learn Mass Curse Gloom. Used by Necromancers.\nLevel: 58

49571.name: Spellbook: Clear Mind
49571.description: Spellbook needed to learn Clear Mind. Used by Sorcerers, Spellsingers, and Spellhowlers.\nLevel: 40

49573.name: Samurai Black Long Sword
49573.description: 30-day item. Cannot be enchanted or endued with special characteristics.

49574.name: Reinforced Queen Ant's Ring
49574.description: MP + 15, Poison Atk. and Resistance + 15%, P./M. Accuracy + 2, P./M. Attack + 6%. When two identical rings are equipped, the effect of only one ring will be applied. Cannot enchant.

49575.name: Reinforced Orfen's Earring
49575.description: MP + 25, Mental Atk. and Resistance + 10%, Hold Atk. and Resistance + 15%, received Heal Amount + 4%, MP Consumption - 3%. When two identical rings are equipped, the effect of only one ring will be applied. Cannot enchant.

49576.name: Reinforced Ring of Core
49576.description: MP + 15, Mental Atk. and Resistance + 15%, P./M. Evasion + 2, received P./M. damage - 4%. When two identical rings are equipped, the effect of only one ring will be applied. Cannot enchant.

49577.name: Enhanced Queen Ant's Ring
49577.description: MP +21, Poison Attack and Resistance +20%, P./M. Accuracy +3, P./M. Atk. +7%, P. Critical Damage +10%, M. Critical Damage +5%. When two identical rings are equipped, the effect of only one ring will be applied. Cannot be enchanted. Give 2 Refined Queen Ant's Rings to Beggins to obtain the Queen Ant Essence.

49578.name: Enhanced Orfen's Earring
49578.description: MP +31, MEN Attack and Resistance +15%, Hold Attack and Resistance +20%, Heal Received +6%, Skill MP Consumption -5%. Adds a chance to recover MP as much as a certain portion of damage dealt. When two identical earrings are equipped, the effect of only one earring will be applied. Cannot be enchanted. Give 2 Refined Orfen's Earrings to Beggins to obtain the Orfen Essence.

49579.name: Enhanced Ring of Core
49579.description: MP +21, MEN Attack and Resistance +20%, P./M. Evasion +3, P./M. Damage Received -6%. Enables debuff removal skills. When two identical rings are equipped, the effect of only one ring will be applied. Cannot be enchanted. Give 2 Refined Rings of Core to Beggins to obtain the Core Essence.

49580.name: Baium's Ring
49580.description: MP +15, Stun Resistance and Stun Atk. Rate +10%, Bleed Atk. and Bleed Resistance +5%, P./M. Accuracy +2, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +3%, P./M. Skill Power +3%. The effect does not stack even if two identical rings are equipped. Cannot be enchanted.

49581.name: Reinforced Baium's Ring
49581.description: MP +21, Stun Resistance and Stun Atk. Rate +15%, Bleed Atk. and Bleed Resistance +10%, P./M. Accuracy +3, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +4%, P./M. Skill Power +6%. The effect does not stack even if two identical rings are equipped. Cannot be enchanted.

49582.name: Enhanced Baium's Ring
49582.description: MP +27, Stun Attack and Resistance +20%, Bleed Attack and Resistance +15%, P./M. Accuracy +4, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +5%, P./M. Skill Power +10%. P. Critical Damage +15%, M. Critical Damage +10%. When two identical rings are equipped, the effect of only one ring will be applied. Cannot be enchanted. Give 2 Refined Baium's Rings to Beggins to obtain the Baium Essence.

49583.name: Golden Mermaid's Fishing Box
49583.description: Double-click to obtain 180 Golden Bait, 180 Normal Fishing Shots, and 5 each of Giran and Gludin Harbor Scrolls of Escape.

49584.name: Golden Boots
49584.description: Double-click on the Golden Boot to get one of its treasures.

49585.name: Golden Mermaid's Tears
49585.description: 7-day item. Increases XP/SP gain by 50% for 1 hours. Effect remains after death.

49586.name: Golden Mermaid's Fishing Rod
49586.description: 30-day item. Golden Mermaid's Fishing Rod.  Bobber usage: 1\n\nEnables to teleport to Giran/Gludin. Cooldown: 1 min.

49587.name: Golden Mermaid's Fishing Rod
49587.description: Golden Mermaid's fishing rod.   Consumes 1 Fishing Shot.\n\nEquip to use skill that lets you telepot to Giran or Gludin Harbor. Cooldown is 1 min.

49588.name: Golden Mermaid's Fishing Rod Box
49588.description:
Use to obtain a 30-day Golden Mermaid's Fishing Rod. 

<Note>
The item in the box has movement limitations, so keep that in mind when opening the box.

49589.name: Golden Bait
49589.description: Fishing Bait. Can be used for fishing Whales.

49590.name: Enhanced Rare Accessory Box
49590.description: Double-click to obtain the following: Enhanced Queen Ant's Ring (30-day), Enhanced Orfen's Earring (30-day), Enhanced Ring of Core (30-day).

49591.name: Refined Queen Ant's Ring
49591.description: MP +21, Poison Resistance and Atk. Rate +20%, P./ M. Accuracy +3, P./ M. Atk. +7%, P. Critical Damage +10%, M. Critical Damage +10%. The effect doesn't stack if two identical rings are worn. Cannot be enchanted.

49592.name: Refined Orfen's Earring
49592.description: A 30-day item. MP +31, MEN Attack and Resistance +15%, Hold Attack and Resistance +20%, Heal Received +6%, Skill MP Consumption -5%. Activates MP Drain effect. When two identical earrings are equipped, the effect of only one earring will be applied. Cannot be enchanted.

49593.name: Refined Ring of Core
49593.description: MP +21, Mental Resistance and Atk. Rate +20%, P./ M. Evasion +3, Received Damage -6%. Enables to use a special ability to remove debuffs. The effect doesn't stack if two identical rings are worn. Cannot be enchanted.

49594.name: Whale
49594.description: Double-Click to obtain a Fishing Coin or, at a certain chance, Golden Boots.

49597.name: Golden Boot
49597.description: Double-click on the Golden Boot to get one of its treasures.

49662.name: Stylish Color Title
49662.description: A dimensional item\nAn item which can be used to change the color of a character’s title. Upon leaving a clan, the color title disappears, just as the regular one does (for everyone except Noblesse); however, upon joining a clan and obtaining a new title, the color reappears. After changing the title color, enter '/ resetname’ command in order to bring back the initial color.

49663.name: Melissa’s Recovery Potion
49663.description: Instant HP recovery. Provides HP +500 and uses the remaining points to recover CP.

49664.name: Weapon Supply Box (B-grade)
49664.description: Double-click to receive one of B-grade Weapons.

49665.name: B-grade Armor Supply Box
49665.description: Double-click to receive one of B-grade Armor.

49666.name: Ornament Supply Box (B-grade)
49666.description: Double-click to receive one of B-grade Accessories.

49674.name: Rice Cake of Flaming Fighting Spirit
49674.description: Increases XP/ SP gain by +30% for 20 minutes. The effect remains after character's death. Cooldown: 1 minute. \n\n<Note> The effect does not change if Rice Cake of Fighting Spirit is used throughout the duration time of Rice Cake of Flaming Fighting Spirit.

49675.name: Hero Cube Box
49675.description:
Double-click to receive Hero Cube (7-day).  Can be stored in a private warehouse or transferred to another character on the same account using Dimensional Merchant.

<Note>
Even if you have several of these Cubes, you can only use one.

49676.name: Talisman of Insolence I
49676.description: P. Atk. +14, M. Atk. +22. Blacksmith Baggins in Giran can help with enhancing the level of this Talisman. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.
