49677.description: P. Atk. +27, M. Atk. +44, Magic Attack Resistance +2%. Blacksmith Baggins in Giran can help with enhancing the level of this Talisman. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49678.name: Talisman of Insolence III
49678.description: P. Atk. +41, M. Atk. +66, Magic Attack Resistance +4%, Skill Power +1%, all kinds of Weapon Resistance +1%. Blacksmith Baggins in Giran can help with enhancing the level of this Talisman. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49679.name: Talisman of Insolence IV
49679.description: P. Atk. +68, M. Atk. +109, Magic Attack Resistance +6%, Skill Power +2%, all kinds of Weapon Resistance +2%, CON +1, MEN +1. Blacksmith Baggins in Giran can help with enhancing the level of this Talisman. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49680.name: Talisman of Insolence V
49680.description: P. Atk. +170, M. Atk. +235, Magic Attack Resistance +7%, Skill Power +2%, all kinds of Weapon Resistance +2%, CON +1, MEN +1, STR +1, INT +1. MP Consumption for skill use -2%. Blacksmith Baggins in Giran can help with enhancing the level of this Talisman. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49681.name: Talisman of Insolence VI
49681.description: P. Atk. +200, M. Atk. +275, Magic Attack Resistance +8%, Skill Power +3%, all kinds of Weapon Resistance +3%, CON +1, MEN +1, STR +1, INT +1. P./ M. Critical Rate +10. MP Consumption for skill use -4%. Available only for Lv. 60 and higher. Blacksmith Baggins in Giran can help exchange this Talisman and Baium’s Soul for Talisman of Baium. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49682.name: Baium’s Soul
49682.description: Blacksmith Baggins in Giran will trade Baium’s Soul and Talisman of Insolence VI for Talisman of Baium.

49683.name: Talisman of Baium
49683.description: P. Atk. +284, M. Atk. +392, Magic Attack Resistance +10%, Skill Power +5%, All Weapon Resistance +5%, CON +1, MEN +1, STR +1, INT +1, DEX +1, WIT +1. P./M. Critical Rate +20. MP Consumption for skill use -5%. Skill Cooldown -3%. Available only for level 60 and higher. When two or more Talismans of identical effects are equipped, the effect of only one Talisman will be applied.

49684.name: Talisman Crystal
49684.description: Required to create the Talisman of Insolence. If you take the Crystal along with an Elemental Stone/ Energy of Insolence to Baggins in Giran, you will receive the Talisman of Insolence.

49685.name: Energy of Insolence
49685.description: Required to create the Talisman of Insolence. If you take the Crystal along with an Elemental Stone/ Talisman Crystal to Baggins in Giran, you will receive the Talisman of Insolence.

49686.name: Chic Silver Chapeau <Str+1 Int+1>
49686.description: 30-day item. STR +1, INT +1, allows using the Refined Silver Chapeau skill: Teleport (Cooldown: 2 hours). Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

49687.name: Chic Silver Chapeau <Str+1 Int+1>
49687.description: STR +1, INT +1, allows using the Refined Silver Chapeau skill: Teleport (Cooldown: 2 hours). Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

49688.name: Refined Silver Chapeau Box
49688.description: Double-click to get Refined Silver Chapeau (30-day).

49689.name: Chapeau Box
49689.description: Double-click the box to get one of the following items: Refined Silver Chapeau (30-day)/ Refined Silver Chapeau/ Refined Romantic Chapeau.

49690.name: Blue Dynasty Transformation Potion
49690.description: Makes you armor look like it is of Blue Dynasty for one hour.

49691.name: Red Zubei Transformation Potion
49691.description: Makes you armor look like it is of Red Zubei for one hour.

49692.name: Samurai Black Long Sword
49692.description: 15-day item. Cannot be enchanted or endued with special characteristics.

49693.name: Magical Potion of Leaping
49693.description: Provides 1,200,000 XP/40,000 SP. Intended for level 20 and higher.

49694.name: Magical Potion of Leaping
49694.description: Provides 7,800,000 XP/240,000 SP. Intended for level 30 and higher.

49695.name: Magical Potion of Leaping
49695.description: Provides 34,200,000 XP/1,040,000 SP. Intended for level 40 and higher.

49696.name: Gift from a Returned Friend
49696.description: Provides 37 million XP/ 1.11 million SP. Intended for Lv. 45 and higher.

49697.name: Special Fruit Buff
49697.description: For 20 minutes, P./M. Atk. +7%, P./M. Def. +10%, Max. HP/CP/MP +15%, HP/MP Regeneration +20%. At a certain chance absorbs 3% of the damage inflicted on target as HP. Increases XP/SP gain by +5%. Cooldown is 1 minute. Buff remains after death.

49698.name: Class Transfer Coupon
49698.description: Take it to the Excalibur Expeditionary Force Leader for instant 2nd class transfer. Only for characters of at least level 40.

49699.name: Master's Book Skill
49699.description: Take it to the Excalibur Expeditionary Force Leader to learn all the skills for your level and class. Only for level 45 to level 60 characters.

49700.name: Scroll Box: Emperor Baium's Enchant
49700.description: Double-click to get one of the following items: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon/ Improved Scroll: Enchant Weapon (D-, C-, or B-grade).

49701.name: Steel Bracelet Fragment
49701.description: Used to create Steel Bracelet. Give this item to Baggins along with Bronze Bracelet, and you will receive Steel Bracelet.

49702.name: Bracelet of Border Fragment
49702.description: Used to create Bracelet of Border. Give this item to Baggins along with Steel Bracelet, and you will receive Bracelet of Border.

49703.name: Bracelet of Border
49703.description: When equipped, opens up 4 Talisman slots. HP/MP Recovery +7%, Accuracy +1, M. Accuracy +1, Weight Limit +7,000.

49704.name: Talisman of Border’s Fragment
49704.description: Used to create Talisman of Border. Give this item to Baggins along with a low-grade Talisman of Border, and you will receive a high-grade Talisman of Border.

49705.name: Forbidden Limit Chest
49705.description: A chest containing the power of Forbidden Limit. Double-click to receive Talisman of Border’s Fragment and, at a low probability, Talisman of Darkness Box.

49706.name: Talisman of Darkness Box
49706.description: Double-click to receive Talisman of Darkness for one hour.

49707.name: Talisman of Darkness - P. Atk.
49707.description: A 1-hour item. P. Atk. +5%. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49708.name: Talisman of Darkness - M. Atk.
49708.description: A 1-hour item. M. Atk. +5%. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49709.name: Talisman of Darkness - P. Def.
49709.description: A 1-hour item. P. Def. +6%. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49710.name: Talisman of Darkness - M. Def.
49710.description: A 1-hour item. M. Def. +6%. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49711.name: Talisman of Darkness - P. Skills Evasion
49711.description: A 1-hour item. P. Skills Evasion +18%. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49712.name: Talisman of Darkness - M. Skills Evasion
49712.description: A 1-hour item. M. Skills Evasion +18%. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49713.name: Talisman of Darkness - HP
49713.description: A 1-hour item. Max. HP +7%. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49714.name: Talisman of Darkness - MP
49714.description: A 1-hour item. Max. MP +7%. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49715.name: Talisman of Darkness - Healing Power
49715.description: A 1-hour item. Healing Effects +4%. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49716.name: Talisman of Darkness - Power of Healing Magic
49716.description: A 1-hour item. Power of Healing Magic +43. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49717.name: Talisman of Darkness Box - P. Atk.
49717.description:
By double-clicking it, you will get Talisman of Darkness - P. Atk. (for 1 hour). 

<Note>
For items obtained from a box, there are restrictions regarding movement.

49718.name: Talisman of Darkness Box - M. Atk.
49718.description:
By double-clicking it, you will get Talisman of Darkness - M. Atk. (for 1 hour). 

<Note>
For items obtained from a box, there are restrictions regarding movement.

49719.name: Talisman of Darkness Box - P. Def.
49719.description:
By double-clicking it, you will get Talisman of Darkness - P. Def. (for 1 hour). 

<Note>
For items obtained from a box, there are restrictions regarding movement.

49720.name: Talisman of Darkness Box - M. Def.
49720.description:
By double-clicking it, you will get Talisman of Darkness - M. Def. (for 1 hour). 

<Note>
For items obtained from a box, there are restrictions regarding movement.

49721.name: Talisman of Darkness Box - P. Skills Evasion
49721.description:

<Note>
For items obtained from a box, there are restrictions regarding movement.

49722.name: Talisman of Darkness Box - M. Skills Evasion
49722.description:
By double-clicking it, you will get Talisman of Darkness - M. Skills Evasion (for 1 hour). 

<Note>
For items obtained from a box, there are restrictions regarding movement.

49723.name: Talisman of Darkness Box - HP
49723.description:
By double-clicking it, you will get Talisman of Darkness - HP (for 1 hour). 

<Note>
For items obtained from a box, there are restrictions regarding movement.

49724.name: Talisman of Darkness Box - MP
49724.description:
By double-clicking it, you will get Talisman of Darkness - MP (for 1 hour). 

<Note>
For items obtained from a box, there are restrictions regarding movement.

49725.name: Talisman of Darkness Box - Healing Power
49725.description:
By double-clicking it, you will get Talisman of Darkness - Healing Power (for 1 hour). 

<Note>
For items obtained from a box, there are restrictions regarding movement.

49726.name: Talisman of Darkness Box - Power of Healing Magic
49726.description:
By double-clicking it, you will get Talisman of Darkness - Power of Healing Magic (for 1 hour). 

<Note>
For items obtained from a box, there are restrictions regarding movement.

49727.name: Limited Talisman of Border - Lv. 1
49727.description: P./M. Def. +12. Possesses limited power of Border, cannot be enchanted. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49728.name: Talisman of Border - Lv. 2
49728.description: P./M. Def. +14, P./M. Skills Evasion +1. Take it to Baggins in Giran to increase its level. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49729.name: Talisman of Border - Lv. 3
49729.description: P./M. Def. +17, P./M. Skills Evasion +1, HP/MP/CP +80, Speed +3, XP and SP gain +3%. Take it to Baggins in Giran to increase its level. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49730.name: Talisman of Border - Lv. 4
49730.description: P./M. Def. +19, P./M. Skills Evasion +1, HP/MP/CP +80, Speed +3, P./M. Atk. Spd. +7, XP and SP gain +3%. Take it to Baggins in Giran to increase its level. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49731.name: Talisman of Border - Lv. 5
49731.description: P./M. Def. +22, P./M. Skills Evasion +1, HP/MP/CP +120, Speed +5, P./M. Atk. Spd. +10, XP and SP gain +4%. Take it to Baggins in Giran to increase its level. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49732.name: Talisman of Border - Lv. 6
49732.description: P./M. Def. +24, P./M. Skills Evasion +2, HP/MP/CP +160, Speed +5, P./M. Atk. Spd. +15, XP and SP gain +4%. Allows using Border Purification (cancels Paralysis, Petrification, Poisoning, and Bleeding). Take it to Baggins in Giran to increase its level. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49733.name: Talisman of Border - Lv. 7
49733.description: P./M. Def. +29, P./M. Skills Evasion +2, HP/MP/CP +160, Speed +7, P./M. Atk. Spd. +15, XP and SP gain +5%. Allows using Border Power - Lv. 1 (at a certain probability, increases attack abilities) and Border Purification (cancels Paralysis, Petrification, Poisoning, and Bleeding). Take it to Baggins in Giran to increase its level. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49734.name: Talisman of Border - Lv. 8
49734.description: P./M. Def. +34, P./M. Skills Evasion +2, HP/MP/CP +200, Speed +7, P./M. Atk. Spd. +15, XP and SP gain +5%. Allows using Border Power - Lv. 2 (at a certain probability, increases attack abilities) and Border Purification (cancels Paralysis, Petrification, Poisoning, and Bleeding). Take it to Baggins in Giran to increase its level. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49735.name: Talisman of Border - Lv. 9
49735.description: P./M. Def. +38, P./M. Skills Evasion +2, HP/MP/CP +240, Speed +8, P./M. Atk. Spd. +15, XP and SP gain +5%, Reflect Damage +4%. Allows using Border Power - Lv. 2 (at a certain probability, increases attack abilities) and Border Purification (cancels Paralysis, Petrification, Poisoning, and Bleeding). Take it to Baggins in Giran to increase its level. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49736.name: Talisman of Border - Lv. 10
49736.description: P./M. Def. +43, P./M. Skills Evasion +2, HP/MP/CP +280, Speed +8, P./M. Atk. Spd. +20, XP and SP gain +5%, Reflect Damage +6%. Allows using Border Power - Lv. 3 (at a certain probability, increases attack abilities) and Border Purification (cancels Paralysis, Petrification, Poisoning, and Bleeding). Take it to Baggins in Giran to increase its level. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49737.name: Blessed Talisman of Border
49737.description: P./M. Def. +48, P./M. Skills Evasion +2, HP/MP/CP +320, Speed +8, P./M. Atk. Spd. +30, XP and SP gain +5%, Reflect Damage +8%. Allows using Border Power - Lv. 4 (at a certain probability, increases attack abilities) and Border Purification (cancels Paralysis, Petrification, Poisoning, and Bleeding). Take it to Baggins in Giran to increase its grade. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

49738.name: Sealed Blessed Talisman of Border
49738.description: Double-click to get Blessed Talisman of Border.

49739.name: Blessed Soulshot (No-grade)
49739.description: The power of a spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, increasing its power of attack significantly. Deals 15% more damage than regular Soulshots. Used with a No-grade weapon.

49740.name: Blessed Soulshot (D-grade)
49740.description: The power of a spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, increasing its power of attack significantly. Deals 15% more damage than regular Soulshots. Used with a D-grade weapon.

49741.name: Blessed Soulshot (C-grade)
49741.description: The power of a spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, increasing its power of attack significantly. Deals 15% more damage than regular Soulshots. Used with a C-grade weapon.

49742.name: Blessed Soulshot (B-grade)
49742.description: The power of a spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, increasing its power of attack significantly. Deals 15% more damage than regular Soulshots. Used with a B-grade weapon.

49743.name: Blessed Soulshot (A-grade)
49743.description: The power of a spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, increasing its power of attack significantly. Deals 15% more damage than regular Soulshots. Used with an A-grade weapon.

49744.name: Mysterious Blessed Soulshot (No-grade)
49744.description: The power of a Soulshot is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing the power of attack. For No-grade weapons.

49745.name: Mysterious Blessed Soulshot (D-grade)
49745.description: The power of a Soulshot is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing the power of attack. For D-grade weapons.

49746.name: Mysterious Blessed Soulshot (C-grade)
49746.description: The power of a Soulshot is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing the power of attack. For C-grade weapons.

49747.name: Mysterious Blessed Soulshot (B-grade)
49747.description: The power of a Soulshot is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing the power of attack. For B-grade weapons.

49748.name: Mysterious Blessed Soulshot (A-grade)
49748.description: The power of a Soulshot is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing the power of attack. For A-grade weapons.

49749.name: Mysterious Spiritshot (B-grade)
49749.description: The power of a Mysterious Spiritshot is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing the power of attack. For B-grade weapons.

49750.name: Mysterious Spiritshot (A-grade)
49750.description: The power of a Mysterious Spiritshot is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing the power of attack. For A-grade weapons.

49751.name: Recipe: Blessed Soulshot (D)
49751.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for creating a Blessed Soulshot (D). Requires Create Item - Skill Lv. 2. The success rate is 100%.

49752.name: Recipe: Blessed Soulshot (C)
49752.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for creating a Blessed Soulshot (C). Requires Create Item - Skill Lv. 4. The success rate is 100%.

49753.name: Recipe: Blessed Soulshot (B)
49753.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for creating a Blessed Soulshot (B). Requires Create Item - Skill Lv. 6. The success rate is 100%.

49754.name: Recipe: Blessed Soulshot (A)
49754.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for creating a Blessed Soulshot (A). Requires Create Item - Skill Lv. 7. The success rate is 100%.

49755.name: Talisman of Baium Box
49755.description: Double-click to receive one of the following items: Talisman of Baium, Baium’s Soul, Secret Book of Baggins’ Enchantments - IV, Secret Book of Baggins’ Enchantments - V, Energy of Insolence, Talisman Crystal, or Elemental Stone.

49756.name: Cloth Piece
49756.description: An intricately embroidered fragment. Required to remove the seal from A-grade and S-grade Armor.

49757.name: Sayha's Holy Water
49757.description: Sayha Grace points +20 thousand. Cooldown is 10 minutes.

49759.name: Celestial Shard
49759.description: The item required to enter Heavenly Rift.

49760.name: A-grade Armor Supply Box
49760.description: Double-click to receive an A-grade Armor.

49761.name: Ornament Supply Box (A-grade)
49761.description: Double-click to receive an A-grade Ornament.

49762.name: Armor Ingredient Box - A-grade
49762.description: Double-click to receive one of A-grade Armor Ingredients.

49763.name: Ornament Ingredient Box - A-grade
49763.description: Double-click to receive one of A-grade Ornament Ingredients.

49765.name: Life Control Tower's Scroll of Blessing
49765.description: When used, Max HP/MP +5%, Hunting XP/SP gain +30%, and MEN Attack/Paralysis Resistance for 60 minutes. Cooldown is 1 minute. \n<Note> The effect does not stack with Angel Cat's Blessing.

49766.name: Unidentified Stone
49766.description: Double-click to get one of the following items: Celestial Shard or Broken Celestial Shard.

49767.name: Broken Celestial Shard
49767.description: Broken Celestial Shard. Take it to the Dimensional Vortex at the 1st floor of the Tower of Insolence.

49768.name: Scroll of Heavenly Protection
49768.description: Activates Resistance to Paralysis/MEN Attacks for 20 minutes.

49769.name: Improved Scroll Box: Emperor Baium's Enchant
49769.description: Double-click to get one of the following scrolls: Solid Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C)/(B), Improved Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C)/(B), or Normal Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C)/(B). Cannot be sold in the grocery store.

49770.name: Sayha’s Energy
49770.description: Sayha Grace points +35,000. Cooldown is 60 minutes. Cannot be sold in the grocery store.

49771.name: Emperor Baium's Secret Treasures
49771.description: Double-click to receive 1 Emperor Baium's Enchant Scroll Pack. Also has a low chance of obtaining 5 Sayha’s Energies.

49772.name: Scroll of Mood Melody
49772.description: Activates the following effects: Might, Shield, Focus, Haste, Acumen, Empower, Wind Walk, Death Whisper, and Vampiric Rage. Duration: 20 minutes.

49773.name: Fighter Pirate Fruit - Attack
49773.description: P./M. Atk. +7%, P./M. Def. +10%, Max. HP/CP/MP +15%, HP/MP Recovery +20%. At a certain chance converts 3% of the damage dealt into HP. Damage dealt in PvP +5%. Duration is 20 minutes. Cooldown is 1 minute. The effect persists through death.  Can be stored in a warehouse.

49774.name: Fighter Pirate Fruit - Defense
49774.description: P./M. Atk. +7%, P./M. Def. +10%, Max. HP/CP/MP +15%, HP/MP Recovery +20%. At a certain chance converts 3% of the damage dealt into HP. Damage received in PvP -5%. Duration is +20 minutes. Cooldown is 1 minute. The effect persists through death.  Can be stored in a warehouse.

49775.name: Red Spinel
49775.description: A reward item.\nYou can receive it for helping Grocer Pink and use it to exchange for rare items with Pink.

49776.name: Green Spinel
49776.description: A reward item.\nYou can receive it for helping Grocer Pink and use it to exchange for rare items with Pink.

49782.name: Balthus Knights Supply
49782.description: Double-click to receive 3 Balthus Knight Marks. (Can be used only once a day).

49783.name: Sibi’s Coin
49783.description: You can exchange this coin with Balthus Knights’ Supply Officer Sibi for event items or materials.

49784.name: Balthus Knight Mark
49784.description: Acquired XP/SP +10% for 1 hour. Intended for Lv. 40 and higher.

49785.name: Weapon Supply Box (A-grade)
49785.description: Double-click to receive an A-grade Weapon.

49786.name: A-grade Armor Supply Box
49786.description: Double-click to receive an A-grade Armor.

49787.name: Solid Scroll: Enchant (A-grade) Box
49787.description: Double-click to obtain Solid Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-grade, 10 pcs.) and Solid Scroll: Enchant Armor (A-grade, 10 pcs.).

49788.name: Solid Scroll: Enchant (A-grade) Large Box
49788.description: Double-click to obtain Improved Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-grade, 10 pcs.) and Improved Scroll: Enchant Armor (A-grade, 10 pcs.).

49789.name: +8 Enchanted Weapon Supply Box (B-grade)
49789.description: Double-click to receive a +8 B-grade Weapon.

49790.name: +16 Enchanted Weapon Supply Box (C-grade)
49790.description: Double-click to receive a +16 C-grade Weapon.

49791.name: Cadmus Transformation Bracelet - Prophet
49791.description: A 1-day item. Transforms you into Prophet Cadmus. Can be used once a day. After the transformation, you can use the following skills for 4 hours: Might, Shield, Wind Walk, Return, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Haste, Acumen, and Heal.

49792.name: Cadmus Transformation Bracelet - Shillien Elder
49792.description: A 1-day item. Transforms you into Shillien Elder Cadmus. Can be used once a day. After the transformation, you can use the following skills for 4 hours: Might, Shield, Wind Walk, Return, Vampiric Rage, Empower, Death Whisper, Guidance, and Heal.

49793.name: Cadmus Transformation Bracelet - Elven Elder
49793.description: A 1-day item. Transforms you into Elven Elder Cadmus. Can be used once a day. After the transformation, you can use the following skills for 4 hours: Might, Shield, Wind Walk, Return, Clarity, Agility, Decrease Weight, Regeneration, and Greater Heal.

49794.name: Cadmus Transformation Bracelet - Prophet
49794.description: A 30-day item. Transforms you into Prophet Cadmus. Can be used once a day. After the transformation, you can use the following skills for 4 hours: Might, Shield, Wind Walk, Return, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Haste, Acumen, and Heal.

49795.name: Cadmus Transformation Bracelet - Shillien Elder
49795.description: A 30-day item. Transforms you into Shillien Elder Cadmus. Can be used once a day. After the transformation, you can use the following skills for 4 hours: Might, Shield, Wind Walk, Return, Vampiric Rage, Empower, Death Whisper, Guidance, and Heal.

49796.name: Cadmus Transformation Bracelet - Elven Elder
49796.description: A 30-day item. Transforms you into Elven Elder Cadmus. Can be used once a day. After the transformation, you can use the following skills for 4 hours: Might, Shield, Wind Walk, Return, Clarity, Agility, Decrease Weight, Regeneration, and Greater Heal.

49797.name: Gift of Sated Cadmus
49797.description: XP gain +37 million, SP gain +1.1 million (standard for Lv. 50 characters) Intended for Lv. 45 and higher.  Can be transferred between characters on the same account using Dimensional Merchant.

49798.name: Cheer Pom Poms
49798.description: An item commemorating the Classic Server launch.

49799.name: Express Bus Pass Card
49799.description: Provides 5 million XP and 16 thousand SP. Intended for Lv. 20 and higher.

49801.name: Dandy Pendant
49801.description: M. Def. +20, XP and SP gain +30%, P./M. Atk. +50, P./M. Critical Damage +5%. Allows using the Blessing of Fire Dragon skill.

49802.name: Dandy Shining Pendant
49802.description: M. Def. +21, XP and SP gain +30%, P./M. Atk. +60, P./M. Critical Damage +5%. Allows using the Blessing of Fire Dragon and Fire Dragon's Protection skills.

49803.name: Dandy’s Uniform
49803.description: Makes your armor look like Dandy’s Uniform. Allows using the Excellent Hit and Excellent Serve skills. When equipped, the armor you previously wore becomes unavailable. However, hair accessories, weapons, and magical armor are not taken off.

49804.description: A crystal which emits freezing energy.

49840.name: Rifken’s Recipe Book
49840.description: A book containing secret recipes of Rifken.

49841.name: Bitter Cold Vodka
49841.description: A legendary beverage produced by combining fire and ice. Cold in the mouth, it gives a burning sensation in your stomach.

49844.name: Sayha's Blessing Chest
49844.description: Double-click the chest to get one of the following items: Sayha's Silver Light Blessing/ Sayha's Golden Light Blessing.

49848.name: Fire Dragon Pendant Chest +10
49848.description: Double-click to get Fire Dragon Pendant +10.

49849.name: Earth Dragon Pendant +10
49849.description: Double-click to get Earth Dragon Pendant +10.

49850.name: Ornament Supply Box (A-grade)
49850.description: Double-click to get an A-grade Ornament.

49851.name: Sayha's Gust
49851.description: Sayha Grace points +100%, XP/SP gain +100%. This effect remains even after character's death. Duration: 10 minutes. Cooldown: 10 minutes. Available when more than one slot of the bar of Sayha’s Grace points is filled. Cannot be dropped or sold in the grocery store.

49852.name: Secret Book of Baggins’ Enchantments - IV
49852.description: Prevents the Talisman of Insolence from degrading to Lv. 2 in case of a failed enchantment to Lv. 4 using the Secret Method of Baggins.

49853.name: Secret Book of Baggins’ Enchantments - V
49853.description: Prevents the Talisman of Insolence from degrading to Lv. 3 in case of a failed enchantment to Lv. 5 using the Secret Method of Baggins.

49855.name: Sayha's Golden Gift
49855.description: Double-click to randomly receive one rare accessory or one rare item.

49856.name: Sayha's Silver Gift
49856.description: Double-click to randomly receive a A-/B-/C-grade Item Box, Enchant Scroll, or a Sayha's Golden Blessing.

49857.name: Sayha's Gift
49857.description: Double-click to randomly receive a Talisman of Insolence, an enchantment item, or a consumable.

49858.name: Wind Token
49858.description: Double-click to receive 1 Sayha's Blessing Box and 1 Sayha's Gust. If you're lucky, you can also get one of the following items: Sayha's Golden, Silver, or Average Gift.

49859.name: Weapon Exchange Coupon
49859.description: Using Dimensional Merchant, you can exchange it for a No-, D-, C-, or Top-grade item. A fee is required for exchange.

49860.name: Hero’s Wondrous Cubic
49860.description: A 1-day item. Available at level 20 or higher. Double-click the Cube to receive one of the following items: Ticket for Soulshot, Scroll of Mood Melody, Warrior's Major Healing Potion, Warrior's Quick Healing Potion, Angel Cat's Blessing, Greater Scroll of Resurrection, Parts of Enchantment Scrolls Chest, Fishing Kit Box, Box of Scroll of Escape to the Base, Blade Spirit, or Weapon Exchange Coupon (can be used only once a day).

49862.name: Bracelet of Border Chest
49862.description: Double-click the chest to get Bracelet of Border.

70101.name: Refined Romantic Chapeau: Gold
70101.description:
A 7-day item. Requires 2 hair accessory slots. 

<Active Skills>
1. Holiday Hat: resurrects a dead target and restores 50% XP. Consumes 1 Spirit Ore(s). Cooldown: 30 min.
2 Overwhelming Power of a Holiday Hat: increases XP and SP gain by 5% for 20 minutes. Cooldown: 60 min.
3. Side Effect: makes character's head bigger for 10 minutes. Cooldown: 30 min.

70102.name: Adventurer’s Potion - Atk. Spd.
70102.description: Increases Atk. Spd. for 20 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

70103.description: Increases Casting Spd. for 20 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

70104.description: Recovers 6% HP from the received physical damage for 20 minutes.

70105.description: Increases MP Recovery Rate for 20 minutes.

70106.description: A 7-day item. When in inventory, STR +1, INT +1, CON +1, MEN +1, DEX +1, WIT +1.

70107.description: When used, P. Def. -5%, M. Def. -10%, Evasion -2; P. Atk. +5%, M. Atk. +10%, Atk. Spd. +5%, Casting Spd. +5%, Speed +5. Duration: 20 minutes.

70114.name: Agathion - Singer & Dancer
70114.description:
A 7-day item. Summons Singer & Dancer Agathion when equipped. 
<Active Skills>
1. Dance of Fury: increases Atk. Spd. by 5% for 20 minutes.

2. Dance of Concentration: increases Casting Spd. by 5% for 20 minutes.

3. Song of Wind: increases Speed by 20 for 5 minutes. Cooldown: 10 min.

<Note>
Dance of Fury, Dance of Concentration, and Song of Wind effects do not stack. Only one effect can be applied at a time.

70294.name: Talisman of Border +1
70294.description:
By combining Talismans of the same level through Veruti in the Town of Giran, you can enhance them up to Lv. 5. With each level, new effects are added. Using an Enchant Scroll, you can make new, special effects appear. Effects do not stack if two identical Talismans are used.

<Note>
When combining with other Talismans, their enchantment is reset; therefore, if you have an enchanted Talisman in your inventory, be careful and do not combine it with another Talisman.

70299.description: An Enchant Scroll enhancing the properties of Talisman of Border. The maximum level of enchantment is +10; with each level, special effects are added. In case of a failed enchantment, the item does not disappear.

70300.name: Enchant Scroll of Forbidden Limit
70300.description: An Enchant Scroll enhancing the properties of Talisman of Border. Can be applied to Talisman enchanted up to +8. In case of a failed enchantment, the item does not disappear and the enchantment level is not reset.

70764.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-grade)
70764.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for A-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dual swords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./ M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. \n

70765.name: Shining Pendant Polish
70765.description: Shiny Polish, enhancing pendants characteristics. Can be used on a pendant enchanted up to +8. If an enchantment is failed, the pendent doesn't disappear and has the previous level of enchantment.\n

70766.name: Improved Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-grade)
70766.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for A-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dual swords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./ M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3.\n

70767.name: Golden Fruit Buff
70767.description: For 20 minutes, P./M. Atk. +12%, P./M. Def. +15%, Max. HP/CP/MP +25%, HP/MP Recovery Bonus +30%. P./M. Critical Rate +10, P./M. Critical Damage +5%.Vampiric Rage Effect +5%. XP and SP gained through hunting +10%. Cooldown is 1 minute. Buff remains after death.

70768.name: Vital Stone - Lv. 4
70768.description: XP/SP +8%, and allows to use Lv. 2 Vital Wind skill, while hunting. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

70769.name: Ruby - Lv. 4
70769.description: When equipped, increases Soulshot, Blessed Soulshot and Beast Soulshot damage +8%. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

70770.name: Sapphire - Lv. 4
70770.description: When equipped, increases Spiritshot, Blessed Spiritshot and Beast Spiritshot damage +8%. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

70771.name: Fire Dragon Pendant - Lv. 4
70771.description: A Pendant that carries sealed energy of a Fire Dragon. Its effect is the same as from the enchanted to +10 Fire Dragon Pendant - Lv. 5.

70772.name: Water Dragon Pendant - Lv. 4
70772.description: A Pendant that carries sealed energy of a Water Dragon. Its effect is the same as from the enchanted to +10 Water Dragon Pendant - Lv. 5.

70773.name: Refined Zaken's Earring
70773.description: MP +34, Bleed Resistance and Bleed Atk. Rate +20%, Stun Resistance and Stun Atk. Rate +15%, Mental Resistance and Atk. Rate +15% Healing Effects +10%, HP Recovery Bonus +20%, Vampiric Rage Effect +8%, Skill MP Cost Rate -4%. The effect does not stack if two identical earrings are worn. \n

70774.name: Refined Baium's Ring
70774.description: MP +27, Stun Resistance and Stun Atk. Rate +20%, Bleed Resistance and Bleed Atk. Rate +15%, P. Atk./M. Atk. +4, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +5%, P./M/ Skill Power +10%, P. Critical Damage +15%, M. Critical Damage +10%. The effect does not stack if two identical rings are equipped.

70775.name: Refined Queen Ant's Ring
70775.description: A 7-day item. MP +21, Poison Resistance and Atk. Rate +20%, P./M. Accuracy +3, P./M. Atk. +7%, P. Critical Damage +10%, M. Critical Damage +5%. The effect doesn't stack if two identical rings are worn.

70776.name: Refined Ring of Core
70776.description: When equipped, grants MP ++21, Mental Atk. Resistance/Chance +20%, P./ M. Evasion +3, decreases received damage by -6%. The effect does not stack, if two identical rings are equipped.

70777.name: Refined Orfen's Earring
70777.description: MP +31, Mental Attack Resistance/Chance +15%, Shackle Chance/Resistance +20%, Healing Effects +6%, MP cost for abilities -5%. Has a chance to transfer 3% of Damage dealt to the enemy into MP. The effect doesn't stack if two identical earrings are worn.

70778.name: Royal Tears
70778.description: The essence of Frintezza’s feelings. Gives a positive effect and modifies appearance of weapons for Valentine’s Day.

70779.name: Frintezza’s Amulet
70779.description: An amulet created by Frintezza to seal a part of his feelings. Carry it with you, and something good will definitely happen. Having the amulet in your inventory enables getting charming magic of confidence from Frintezza once a day.

70780.name: Red Candy of the Royal Family
70780.description: The candy created with secret methods of Frintezza’s dynasty specially for Valentine’s Day. Acquired XP/ SP +25%. Stacks with the Blue Candy. Temporary event item.

70781.name: Blue Candy of the Royal Family
70781.description: The candy created with secret methods of Frintezza’s dynasty specially for Valentine’s Day. Acquired XP/ SP +25%. Stacks with the Red Candy. Temporary event item.

70782.name: The Royal Confectionary Box
70782.description: You can get one box per account. Double-click to receive Frintezza’s Amulet and additionally two Red or two Blue Candies of the Royal Family. The item will be removed after the event is over.

70783.name: Pirates Treasure Chest
70783.description: Double-click to get one of Pirates Treasures случайное сокровище пиратов.

70784.name: Refined Zaken's Earring Box (7-day)
70784.description: Double-click to receive a Refined Zaken's Earring (7-day).

70798.description: Makes you armor look like Pirate one. P./ M. Atk. +2%, P./ M. Def. +2%, Atk. Spd. +2%, Max. HP/MP +3%, Speed +3, P./ M. Accuracy +1, M. Critical Rate +10. Duration: 60 minutes.

70802.description: Makes you armor look like Red Zubei one. P./ M. Atk. +2%, P./ M. Def. +2%, Atk. Spd. +3%, Max. HP/MP +5%, Speed +4, P./ M. Accuracy +1, M. Critical Rate +10. Duration: 60 minutes.

70803.name: Transformation Support Cube
70803.description: Double-click to get one of the Transformation Scrolls that remain active for one hour: Transformation Scroll: Pirate, Transformation Scroll: White Assassin, Transformation Scroll: Dark Assassin, Blue Dynasty Transformation Scroll, Red Zubei Transformation Scroll.\n<Note:> \nSupport Cube can be used only once a day. A new day starts every day at 6:30 a.m. Duration: 7 days.

If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

HP gradually increases with each enchant level starting from +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

70855.name: Rune of Feather
70855.description: 7-day item. If stored in the inventory, increases the weight limit by 20%. The remaining time decreases even when not playing.\n

70856.name: Package: Rune of Feather (7 days)
70856.description: Double-click to obtain Rune of Feather (7 days). Can be shared within account through Dimensional Merchant.

70857.name: Squeaking Shoes
70857.description: Makes a unique sound when walking and running in them. Occupies boots slot. No-grade item, impossible to enchant. Do not appears on charater when equipped.\n

70858.name: Irene' Hourglass - 1 Hour
70858.description: When used, provides 50% XP and SP bonus for 1 hour while hunting.\nIntended for Lv. 1 - 60 characters. Can be combined with XP/SP Runeeffect. Effect remains after death.\n

70859.name: Scroll: Summon Storm
70859.description: Fills you with Storm Energy, granting +50% XP and SP gain bonus for 2 hours. Cooldown: 2 hours. Intended for Lv. 40 - 51 characters. Storm Energy does not disappear after character's death. Can be combined with Irene' Hourglass and XP/SP Runeeffect.\n

70860.name: Name Change Ticket
70860.description: Put this item on the character that will receive the service, and send a support ticket on support.lineage2.com.

70861.name: Gender Change Ticket
70861.description: Put this item on the character that will receive the service, and send a support ticket on support.lineage2.com.

70862.name: Clan Name Change Ticket
70862.description: Put this item on the character that will receive the service, and send a support ticket on support.lineage2.com. Clan leaders only!

70863.name: Facelifting Potion - A
70863.description: Beauty potion that changes one's facial appearance to Type A. Both genders. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen.

70864.name: Facelifting Potion - B
70864.description: Beauty potion that changes one's facial appearance to Type B. Both genders. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen.

70865.name: Facelifting Potion - C

70866.name: Dye Potion - A
70866.description: Beauty potion that changes one's hair color to Type A. Both genders. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen.

70867.name: Dye Potion - B
70867.description: Beauty potion that changes one's hair color to Type B. Both genders. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen.

70870.description: Beauty potion that changes one's hair style to Type A. Both genders. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen.

70871.name: Hair Style Change Potion - B
70871.description: Beauty potion that changes one's hair style to Type B. Both genders. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen.

70875.description: Beauty potion that changes one's hair style to Type F. May be used only by female characters. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen.

70876.name: Hair Style Change Potion - G
70876.description: Beauty potion that changes one's hair style to Type G. May be used only by female characters. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen.

70877.name: Elmoreden Cloak
70877.description: Cloak with the crest of the ancient Elmoreden Kingdom.\nCan be enchanted up to +10 with the Scroll: Enchant Cloak, and different effects are applied depending on the level.\nUse Life Stone - Ancient Kingdom at +10 to bestow an additional effect.

70878.name: Aden Cloak
70878.description: Cloak with the crest of the ancient Aden Kingdom.\nCan be enchanted up to +10 with the Scroll: Enchant Cloak, and different effects are applied depending on the level.\nUse Life Stone - Ancient Kingdom at +10 to bestow an additional effect.

70879.name: Elmore Cloak
70879.description: Cloak with the crest of the ancient Elmore Kingdom.\nCan be enchanted up to +10 with the Scroll: Enchant Cloak, and different effects are applied depending on the level.\nUse Life Stone - Ancient Kingdom at +10 to bestow an additional effect.

70880.name: Ferios Cloak
70880.description: Cloak with the crest of the ancient Ferios Kingdom.\nCan be enchanted up to +10 with the Scroll: Enchant Cloak, and different effects are applied depending on the level.\nUse Life Stone - Ancient Empire at +10 to bestow an additional effect.

70881.name: Elmoreden Cloak - Legendary
70881.description: Legendary cloak with the crest of the ancient Elmoreden Kingdom.\nCan be enchanted up to +10 with the Scroll: Enchant Cloak and from +10 to +20 with the Scroll: Enchant Cloak - Legendary, and different effects are applied depending on the level\nUse Life Stone - Ancient Kingdom at +10 to bestow an additional effect, and use Spirit Stone - Elmoreden at +15 to add a second effect.

70882.name: Aden Cloak - Legendary
70882.description: Legendary cloak with the crest of the ancient Aden Kingdom.\nCan be enchanted up to +10 with the Scroll: Enchant Cloak and from +10 to +20 with the Scroll: Enchant Cloak - Legendary, and different effects are applied depending on the level\nUse Life Stone - Ancient Kingdom at +10 to bestow an additional effect, and use Life Stone - Aden at +15 to add a second effect.

70883.name: Elmore Cloak - Legendary
70883.description: Legendary cloak with the crest of the ancient Elmore Kingdom.\nCan be enchanted up to +10 with the Scroll: Enchant Cloak and from +10 to +20 with the Scroll: Enchant Cloak - Legendary, and different effects are applied depending on the level\nUse Life Stone - Ancient Kingdom at +10 to bestow an additional effect, and use Life Stone - Elmore at +15 to add a second effect.

70884.name: Ferios Cloak - Legendary
70884.description: Legendary cloak with the crest of the ancient Ferios Kingdom.\nCan be enchanted up to +10 with the Scroll: Enchant Cloak and from +10 to +20 with the Scroll: Enchant Cloak - Legendary, and different effects are applied depending on the level\nUse Life Stone - Ancient Kingdom at +10 to bestow an additional effect, and use Life Stone - Ferios at +15 to add a second effect.

70885.name: Scroll: Enchant Cloak
70885.description: Enchant scroll for the Ancient Kingdom's Cloak. Can be enchanted up to +10. Enchant level goes up by 1 when it succeeds, and if it fails, the item remains and the level goes down by 1.

70886.name: Scroll: Enchant Cloak - Legendary
70886.description: Enchant scroll for the Ancient Kingdom's Cloak. Can be used when the enchant level is at least +10, up to +20. Enchant level goes up by 1 when it succeeds, and if it fails, the item remains and the level goes down by 1.

70887.name: Scroll: Ancient Cloak - Legendary
70887.description: Enchant scroll for the Ancient Kingdom's Cloak. Can be used when the enchant level is at least +7, up to +20. Success rate is 10% better than normal Cloak Scrolls. Enchant level goes up by 1 when it succeeds, and if it fails, the item remains and the level goes down by 1.

70888.name: Legendary Scroll
70888.description: Exchange a Elmoreden/Aden/Elmore/Ferios Cloak for a legendary cloak through the Dimensional Merchant.

70889.name: Life Stone - Ancient Kingdom
70889.description: Life Stone for the Ancient Kingdom's Cloak. Can augment all ancient kingdom cloaks when they have been enchanted to +10, and a random effect will be added when augmented. Effects bestowed through augmentation will be applied when the enchant level is +10 or higher. Once augmented, it cannot be canceled, but it can be augmented again.

70890.name: Life Stone - Elmoreden
70890.description: Legendary Life Stone for the Elmoreden Cloak. Can augment Legendary Elmoreden kingdom cloaks when they have been enchanted to +15, and a random effect will be added when augmented. Effects bestowed through augmentation will be applied when the enchant level is +15 or higher. Once augmented, it cannot be canceled, but it can be augmented again.

70891.name: Life Stone - Aden
70891.description: Legendary Life Stone for the Aden Cloak. Can augment Legendary Aden kingdom cloaks when they have been enchanted to +15, and a random effect will be added when augmented. Effects bestowed through augmentation will be applied when the enchant level is +15 or higher. Once augmented, it cannot be canceled, but it can be augmented again.

70892.name: Life Stone - Elmore
70892.description: Legendary Life Stone for the Elmore Cloak. Can augment Legendary Elmore kingdom cloaks when they have been enchanted to +15, and a random effect will be added when augmented. Effects bestowed through augmentation will be applied when the enchant level is +15 or higher. Once augmented, it cannot be canceled, but it can be augmented again.

70893.name: Life Stone - Ferios
70893.description: Legendary Life Stone for the Ferios Cloak. Can augment Legendary Ferios kingdom cloaks when they have been enchanted to +15, and a random effect will be added when augmented. Effects bestowed through augmentation will be applied when the enchant level is +15 or higher. Once augmented, it cannot be canceled, but it can be augmented again.

70894.name: Life Stone Pack - Legendary
70894.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Life Stone - Elmoreden/Aden/Elmore/Ferios randomly.

70895.name: Chevalier Costume
70895.description: Chevalier costume with the grace of the ancient Kingdom.

70896.name: Valkyrie Costume
70896.description: Valkyrie costume that shows the splendor of the ancient kingdom.

70897.name: Iron Gate Guild Treasure Chest
70897.description: Double-click to obtain one Iron Gate Guild treasure item.

70898.name: Red Musketeer Garment
70898.description: Previous armor is taken off and becomes unavailable when it's equipped.\n

70899.name: Gatekeeper Hat
70899.description: Hat worn by Gatekeepers. Uses 2 hair accessory slots.\n

70903.name: Red Zubei - Heavy Armor
70903.description: Full Heavy Armor of Blue Dynasty It has no restrictions as to class, but for some races and classes heavy, light and magic armor look the same. Previous armor is taken off and becomes unavailable when it's equipped. Headpieces, weapon and magic armor are not removed.

70904.name: Red Zubei - Light Armor
70904.description: Full Light Armor of Blue Dynasty It has no restrictions as to class, but for some races and classes heavy, light and magic armor look the same. Previous armor is taken off and becomes unavailable when it's equipped. Headpieces, weapon and magic armor are not removed.

70905.name: Red Zubei - Robe
70905.description: Full Light Armor of Red Zubei. It has no restrictions as to class, but for some races and classes heavy, light and magic armor look the same. Previous armor is taken off and becomes unavailable when it's equipped. Headpieces, weapon and magic armor are not removed.

70906.name: Stable Cloak Enchantment Scroll - Legendary
70906.description: Enchant scroll for the Ancient Kingdom's Cloak. Can be enchanted between +11-+15. Enchant level goes up by 1 when it succeeds, and if it fails, the enchant level remains the same.

70907.name: Ancient Cloak (Legendary) Scroll Pack
70907.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Scroll: Enchant Cloak - Legendary or 1 Stable Cloak Enchantment Scroll - Legendary.

70908.name: Ancient Kingdom's Coin
70908.description: A coin imbued with the mysterious power of the Ancient Kingdom. Exchange it for a special gift through the Dimensional Merchant.

70909.name: +10 Elmoreden Cloak - Legendary Box

70961.name: Agathion - Singer & Dancer
70961.description:
7-day item. Equipping it in the main slot summons the Singer & Dancer Agathion and activates the Special Ability option. 

<Special Ability>
1. Dance of Fury: increases Atk. Spd. by 5% for 20 minutes.

2. Dance of Concentration: increases Casting Spd. by 5% for 20 minutes.

3. Song of Wind: increases Speed by 20 for 5 minutes. Cooldown: 10 min.

<Note>
Dance of Fury, Dance of Concentration, and Song of Wind do not stack.

71010.name: Halloween Gift
71010.description: Double-click to obtain one of the various items: Weapon Supply Box (B/C/D-grade), Armor Supply Box (B/C-grade), Scroll: Enchant Weapon (B/C/D-grade), Quick Healing Potion x20, Greater CP Potion x20, Warrior's MP Recovery Potion x20, Chef's Fish Stew Box, XP/SP Scroll - Normal/ Medium/ High, Special Dragon's Fruit, Rice Cake of Fighting Spirit, Rice Cake of Flaming Fighting Spirit, Golden Tears of Mermaid, Halloween Candy. Will be deleted after the event.

71021.name: Dragon's Miracle Potion
71021.description: Can be used after using Special Dragon's Fruit. For 20 min. XP and SP gain +50%, P./ M. Atk. +18%, P./ M. Def. +22%, Atk. Spd./ Casting Spd. +5%, P./ M. Crirical Rate +30, P./ M. Critical Damage +10%, HP/ MP/ CP +25%, HP/ MP Recovery +30%. At a certain chance absorbs 5% of the damage inflicted on target as HP. Buff remains after death. If you use Special Dragon's Fruit or Special Fruit Buff during the effect, these items will dissapear without an effect.

71023.description: Changes the appearance to that of a teddy bear for 15 min. During transformation HP/MP +20%, P./ M. Def. +3%, acquired XP/SP during hunt +5%. Effect remains after death.

71024.name: Transformation Scroll: Panda
71024.description: Changes the appearance to that of a panda for 15 min. During transformation HP/MP +20%, P./ M. Def. +3%, acquired XP/SP during hunt +5%. Effect remains after death.

71025.name: Transformation Scroll: Cat
71025.description: Changes the appearance to that of a cat for 15 min. During transformation HP/MP +20%, P./ M. Def. +3%, acquired XP/SP during hunt +5%. Effect remains after death.

71026.name: Matchstick
71026.description: Part of the matchsticks that the Match Girls are looking for. It looks like a monster has broken the matches. Combine with match heads to fix them. Will be deleted after the event.

71027.name: Match Head
71027.description: Part of the matchsticks that the Match Girls are looking for. It looks like a monster has broken the matches. Combine with matchsticks to fix them. Will be deleted after the event.

71028.name: Well-made Matchstick
71028.description: A well-made matchstick. Take it to the Older Sister. Will be deleted after the event.

71029.name: Powerful Matchstick
71029.description: A powerful matchstick. It's too strong to use regularly. Take it to the Younger Sister who will exchange it for a bonfire. Will be deleted after the event.

71030.name: Bonfire
71030.description: Bonfire made with a powerful matchstick. Use to have a bonfire for 30 seconds. Use cooking ingredients on the bonfire to cook a Regular Dish or a Very Delicious Dish. Will be deleted after the event.

71031.name: Regular Dish
71031.description: Regular dish. It looks edible. For 30 min., STR/ DEX/ CON/ INT/ WIT/ MEN +1. Additionally, acquired XP/SP +5%. Will be deleted after the event.

71032.name: Very Delicious Dish
71032.description: Very delicious dish. Take it to the Younger Sister. Will be deleted after the event.

71033.name: Match Girls' Gift
71033.description: A gift with various items from the Match Girls who are thankful for your help. Double-click to obtain Match Girls' Gratitude and a Regular Dish, and at a certain rate one of the following items:\nChristmas Talisman Pack​ (P. Skill Critical Damage/ M. Skill Critical Damage/ Ultimate Defense/ Debuff Resistance/ P. Atk./ M. Atk./ P. Def./ M. Def.), Santa's Hat (Permanent), Rudolph's Nose (Permanent), Santa's Cloak (Permanent), Santa's Suit (Permanent), Transformation Sealbook: Part-time Seller. Will be deleted after the event.

71034.name: Match Girls' Gratitude
71034.description: For 20 min., P./M. Atk. +12%, P./M. Def +15%, Max HP/MP/CP +25%, P./M. Critical Rate +10, P./M. Critical Damage +5%, HP/MP Recovery Bonus +30%. At a certain chance absorbs 5% of the melee damage inflicted on target as HP. \n\n<Note> When used simultaneously with Special Fruit Buff or Special Dragon's Fruit, effects do not stack.

71035.name: Cooking Ingredient
71035.description: Cooking ingredient of the Match Girls. Use it on the bonfire to cook food.\n\n<Note> If you use it on a bonfire made by someone else, the ingredient will disappear, and you will get nothing. Will be deleted after the event.

71036.name: Christmas Talisman: P. Skill Critical Damage
71036.description: Event item. P. Skill Critical Damage +2% when equipped. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type.

71037.name: Christmas Talisman: M. Skill Critical Damage

71038.name: Christmas Talisman: Ultimate Defense

71039.name: Christmas Talisman: Debuff Resistance
71039.description: Event item. For 15 sec., defends against debuffs 5 times. Cooldown is 10 min. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type.

71040.name: Christmas Talisman: P. Atk.

71041.name: Christmas Talisman: M. Atk.

71043.name: Christmas Talisman: M. Def.

71052.description: Sealbook for learning the skill of transforming yourself into an One-eyed ParaPara Cat.

71053.name: Transformation Sealbook: Part-time Seller
71053.description: Sealbook for learning the skill of transforming yourself into a Smiling ParaPara Cat.

71054.name: Transformation Sealbook: Part-time Seller

71059.name: Fishermen's Guild Support Certificate Lv 1
71059.description: Special certificate from Fishermen's Guild. For 1 hour, acquired XP/SP during fishing +20% when used. Effect remains after death.

71060.name: Fishermen's Guild Support Certificate Lv 2
71060.description: Special certificate from Fishermen's Guild. For 3 hours, acquired XP/SP during fishing +30% when used. Effect remains after death.

71061.description: Special certificate from Fishermen's Guild. For 6 hours, acquired XP/SP during fishing +50% when used. Effect remains after death.

71062.description: Double click to obtain a random item.

71063.name: Agathion Rudolph
71063.description:
A 7-days item. Equipping it in the Bracelet's main slot summons the Agathion Rudolph.


<Special Ability>
 - Rudolph's Blessing
 - Rudolph's Blessed Resurrection
 - Rudolph's Power
 - Agathion Teleport (Aden/ Giran/ Dion/ Gludio)

A 30-days item. Equipping it in the Bracelet's main slot summons the Agathion Rudolph.

 - Rudolph's Power

71067.name: Glittering Enchant Scroll of Border
71067.description: An Enchant Scroll enhancing the properties of Talisman of Border. Can be applied to Talisman enchanted up to +9. In case of a failed enchantment, the item does not disappear and the enchantment level is not reset.

71069.description: Double click to obtain random Talisman of Border Lv. from 2 to 4. Additionally can be obtained Enchant Scroll of Border.

71070.name: Fire Dragon Pendant Lucky Chest

71078.description: Material used to upgrade Talisman of Power. If an upgrade fails, Talisman`s level drops to Lv. 1. Talisman of Power can be obtained from Blacksmith Baggins.

71079.description: When equipped, opens up 5 Talisman slots. HP/MP Recovery +15%, Accuracy +2, M. Accuracy +2, Weight Limit +10,000.

71080.description: When equipped, P./ M. Def. +13, HP +6%, MP +2%, P./ M. Atk. +2%. With Talisman of Power Fragment you can enhance the level of this Talisman. If an upgrade fails, Talisman remains the same. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

71095.name: Stable Talisman of Power Fragment
71095.description: The material used to upgrade Talismans of Power. If an upgrade fails, Talisman remains the same. Onle for Talismans of Noble Power.

71096.name: Shining Couple Ring
71096.description: Ring for summoning another character. Target of summoning must be in your party and have same ring equipped.\n Cooldown is 24 hrs.

71097.name: Big Wedding Cake
71097.description: Summons Big Wedding Cake for wedding ceremony.

71098.name: Formal Wear
71098.description: Tuxedo for male characters, and a wedding dress for female characters. Equipping this disables armor. Hair accessories, weapons, and magic armor remain equipped.

71099.name: Wedding Veil
71099.description: A shining white Wedding Veil, intended for female characters only. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

71100.name: Wedding Bouquet
71100.description: A Wedding Bouquet composed of lovely flowers, intended for female characters only.

71101.name: XP/SP Rune - 50%
71101.description: 1-hour item. When in inventory, your XP and SP gain is increased by 50%. Intended for Lv. 1 - 75 characters. \n

71102.name: XP/SP Rune - 50% (1-hour) Pack
71102.description: Double-click to obtain XP/SP Rune - 50% (1 hour).\nIntended for Lv. 1 - 75 characters.

71103.name: XP/SP Rune - 50%
71103.description: 5-hour itemв. When in inventory, your XP and SP gain is increased by 50%. \nIntended for Lv. 1 - 75 characters.\n

71104.name: XP/SP Rune - 50% (5-hour) Pack
71104.description: Double-click to obtain XP/SP Rune - 50% (5 hours).\nIntended for Lv. 1 - 75 characters.

71105.name: XP/SP Rune - 50%
71105.description: 7-day item. When in inventory, your XP and SP gain is increased by 50%.\nIntended for Lv. 1 - 75 characters.\n

71106.name: XP/SP Rune - 50% (7-day) Pack
71106.description: Double-click to obtain XP/SP Rune - 50% (7 days).\nIntended for Lv. 1 - 75 characters.

71107.name: Irene' Hourglass - 1 Hour
71107.description: When used, provides 50% XP bonus for 1 hour.\nIntended for Lv. 1~19.

71108.name: Package: Irene' Hourglass (1 hour)
71108.description: Double-click to obtain Irene' Hourglass - 1 Hour.\nIntended for Lv. 1 - 75 characters.

71109.name: Golden Mermaid's Fishing Rod Pack (7-day)
71109.description: Double-click to obtain Golden Mermaid's Fishing Rod (7 days).

71110.name: Golden Mermaid's Fishing Rod Pack (30-day)
71110.description: Double-click to obtain Golden Mermaid's Fishing Rod (30 days).

71111.name: Ruthless Tribe Mask
71111.description: A mask which formerly belonged to Looters.

71112.name: Artisan's Goggles
71112.description: Large goggles used to protect eyes. Occupies 2 Accessory slots.

71113.name: Fairy Antennae
71113.description: A lovely hair accessory shaped as antennae with stars.

71114.name: Assassin's Bamboo Hat
71114.description: A bamboo hat made from bulrush. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

71115.name: Little Angel Wings
71115.description: A hair accessory in the shape of a wing.Can be shared within the account.

71116.name: Black Gem Mask
71116.description: A luxurious Black Gem Mask made of metal.Can be shared within the account.

71117.name: Circlet of Eva
71117.description: A circlet imbued with Eva's mysterious power. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.Can be shared within the account.

71118.name: Outlaw Eyepatch
71118.description: A purple colored eye patch accessory.Can be shared within the account.

71119.name: Monocle
71119.description: An monocle accessory with a ring attached.Can be shared within the account.

71120.name: Sing Of Adventurer - Recovery
71120.description: Endowed with a mysterious power, the song allows resurrecting a character and restoring their lost experience at the death of an NPC.

71121.name: Agathion - Bugbear
71121.description: Equipping it in the main slot summons the Agathion.\n

71122.name: Agathion - Dryad
71122.description: Equipping it in the main slot summons the Agathion.\n

71123.name: Agathion - Griffin
71123.description: Equipping it in the main slot summons the Agathion.\n

71124.name: Stable Cloak Enchantment Scroll - Legendary
71124.description: Enchant scroll for the Ancient Kingdom's Cloak. Can be enchanted between +1-+10. Enchant level goes up by 1 when it succeeds, and if it fails, the enchant level remains the same.

71125.name: Legendary Scroll (High-grade)
71125.description: Exchange a Elmoreden/Aden/Elmore/Ferios Cloak for a legendary cloak through the Dimensional Merchant.

71126.name: High-grade Life Stone - Ancient Kingdom
71126.description: High-grade Life Stone for the Ancient Kingdom Cloak. Can augment all Ancient Kingdom Cloaks enchanted to +10 or higher and add a random effect. The effect bestowed through augmentation applies to the cloak when its enchant level is +10 or higher. Once augmented, it cannot be canceled but can be augmented again.

71127.name: High-grade Life Stone - Elmoreden
71127.description: High-grade Life Stone for the Legendary Elmoreden Cloak. Can augment Legendary Elmoreden Cloaks enchanted to +15 or higher and add a random effect. The effect bestowed through augmentation applies to the cloak when its enchant level is +15 or higher. Once augmented, it cannot be canceled but can be augmented again.

71128.name: High-grade Life Stone - Aden
71128.description: High-grade Life Stone for the Legendary Aden Cloak. Can augment Legendary Aden Cloaks enchanted to +15 or higher and add a random effect. The effect bestowed through augmentation applies to the cloak when its enchant level is +15 or higher. Once augmented, it cannot be canceled but can be augmented again.

71129.name: High-grade Life Stone - Elmore
71129.description: High-grade Life Stone for the Legendary Elmore Cloak. Can augment Legendary Elmore Cloaks enchanted to +15 or higher and add a random effect. The effect bestowed through augmentation applies to the cloak when its enchant level is +15 or higher. Once augmented, it cannot be canceled but can be augmented again.

71130.name: High-grade Life Stone - Ferios
71130.description: High-grade Life Stone for the Legendary Ferios Cloak. Can augment Legendary Ferios Cloaks enchanted to +15 or higher and add a random effect. The effect bestowed through augmentation applies to the cloak when its enchant level is +15 or higher. Once augmented, it cannot be canceled but can be augmented again.

71131.name: High-grade Life Stone Pack - Legendary
71131.description: Double-click to obtain 1 High-grade Life Stone - Ancient Kingdom/Elmoreden/Aden/Elmore/Ferios randomly.

71132.name: High-grade Life Stone Pack - Cloak
71132.description: Double-click to obtain 1 High-grade Life Stone - Ancient Kingdom/Elmoreden/Aden/Elmore/Ferios randomly.

71133.name: Mermaid Agathion
71133.description: Equip it to summon a Mermaid Agathion.

71134.name: Master's Fishing Coin
71134.description: A coin obtainable from Master Fishing. Take the coin to a Dimensional Merchant to exchange for a Fishing XP Box.

71135.name: Mermaid Agathion Enchant Scroll
71135.description: An enchant scroll for mermaid Agathion. Increases the Agathion's magic resistance and also adds a special ability from +4 enchantment. Can enchant a mermaid Agathion safely to +3 and up to a max of +10. Increases unique abilities gradually from +1.

71136.name: Mermaid's Trace
71136.description: Gather 20 Mermaid's Traces and take them to a Dimensional Merchant to get the Mermaid Agathion Charm.

71137.name: Master's Fishing Potion
71137.description: Increases XP/SP gain for successful fishing by 50% for 1 hour when used.\nApplies to all bait.\nCan be used together with the Fishing Guild's Support Certificate.

71139.name: Fishing XP Box
71139.description: Contains a Scroll: Fishing XP. A chance to get a Shining Fishing Box additionally.

71140.name: Shining Fishing Box
71140.description: Shining Fishing Box. Use it to obtain an item.

71141.name: Scroll: Fishing XP
71141.description: A fishing XP scroll rewarded for hard fishing. Cannot be used on chaotic characters.

71142.name: Full Load Support Pack
71142.description: Double-click to get one of the items in the Full Load Support Pack Box.

71143.name: Cloak of Light of the Chosen
71143.description: A cloak for a few chosen ones who have proven themselves as Lineage 2 Game Testers. Increases Max. HP/MP/CP by 5%, P. Def. by 3%, Magic Resistance by 5% and Speed by 10 when equipped.

71144.name: Cloak of Darkness of the Chosen
71144.description: A cloak for a few chosen ones who have proven themselves as Lineage 2 Game Testers. Increases Max. HP/MP/CP by 5%, P. Def. by 3%, Magic Resistance by 5% and Speed by 10 when equipped.

71145.name: Greater Blessing of Castle Scroll - Party
71145.description: Gives the Blessing of Castle effect to all party members. Buffs and debuffs do not disappear upon death, but Noblesse Blessing and Lucky Charm disappear.

71146.name: Castle Enchant Buff Scroll - Party
71146.description: Bestows all party members with the effects of Might Lv. 2, Empower Lv. 2, Acumen Lv. 1, and Haste Lv. 1.

71147.name: Castle Wind Walk Scroll - Party
71147.description: Increases Speed of all party members by 33.

71148.name: Enchanted Castle Ring - 10-day
71148.description: 10-day item. HP +25, M. Atk. +3%, and P. Atk. +3%. The effects do not stack even if two identical earrings are equipped.

71149.name: Enchanted Castle Earrings - 10-day
71149.description: 10-day item. MP +15, MP Recovery +0.2, Healing Effect +2%, Skill MP Cost -1%. The effect does not stack if two identical earrings are worn.

71150.name: Enchanted Castle Necklace - 10-day
71150.description: 10-day item. MP +25, M. Def +3, P. Def. +5, MEN Attack and Resistance +3%, Skill MP Cost -1%.

71151.name: Agathion Bracelet - Stage 3
71151.description: 60-day item. Opens 1 main Agathion slot and 2 subslots when equipped. STR/INT/CON/MEN +1.

71152.name: Agathion Bracelet - Stage 5
71152.description: Opens 1 main Agathion slot and 4 subslots when equipped. STR/INT/CON/MEN/DEX/WIT +1, MEN/Stun/Sleep/Paralysis Resistance +8%.

71153.name: +7 Elmoreden Cloak Box
71153.description: Double-click to obtain a +7 Elmoreden Cloak.

71154.name: +7 Aden Cloak Box
71154.description: Double-click to obtain a +7 Aden Cloak.

71155.name: +7 Elmore Cloak Box
71155.description: Double-click to obtain a +7 Elmore Cloak.

71156.name: +7 Ferios Cloak Box
71156.description: Double-click to obtain a +7 Ferios Cloak.

71157.name: Agathion Charm - Ball Trapping Gnosian
71157.description: Bracelet that summons a ball trapping Gnosian. It wears a red uniform.

71158.name: Agathion Charm - Ball Trapping Orodriel
71158.description: Bracelet that summons a ball trapping Orodriel. It wears a red uniform.

71159.name: Agathion Charm - Penalty Kick
71159.description: Bracelet that summons a Gnosian and Orodriel who are practicing penalty kicks. All are wearing red uniforms.

71160.name: Seven Signs Miracle Box
71160.description: Double-click to obtain a random item.

71177.name: Daily Gift - VIP 1
71177.description: Double-click to obtain the following: 1 Scroll of Escape, 3 Healing Potions.

71178.name: Daily Gift - VIP 2

71295.name: Artisan's Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-grade)
71295.description: When enchanted, increases P. Atk. by 4 for A-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. Increases P. Atk. by 5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dual swords, and fist weapons. Increases P. Atk. by 8 for bow weapons. Increases M. Atk. by 3 for all weapons. P. Atk./M. Atk doubles starting at +4. Failure to enchant does not crystallize the item and the enchantment level is retained thanks to Goddess of Destruction's power. Can be used on weapons enchanted up to +20.

71296.name: Master's Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-grade)
71296.description: When enchanted, increases P. Atk. by 4 for A-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. Increases P. Atk. by 5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dual swords, and fist weapons. Increases P. Atk. by 8 for bow weapons. Increases M. Atk. by 3 for all weapons. P. Atk./M. Atk doubles starting at +4. If enchantment succeeds, it may increase +1 - +3. Failure to enchant does not crystallize the item and the enchantment level is retained thanks to Goddess of Destruction's power. Can be used on weapons enchanted up to +20.

71297.name: Holy Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-grade)
71297.description: When enchanted, increases P. Atk. by 4 for A-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. Increases P. Atk. by 5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dual swords, and fist weapons. Increases P. Atk. by 8 for bow weapons. Increases M. Atk. by 3 for all weapons. P. Atk./M. Atk doubles starting at +4. Has 100% to succeed in enchantment if used. Can be used on weapons enchanted up to +12.

71701.name: Fire Dragon's Pendant
71701.description: Pendant imbued with the power of the Fire Dragon. Can enchant up to +10 with Pendant Varnish/Shining Pendant Varnish, and can combine 2 pendants of the same level through the Dimensional Merchant. Various effects are added when combined, and the stats of the options increase when enchanted. Starting from +1, it disappears if it fails. Note: The enchant level of the material item is reset to 0 when combining, so make sure to not use an enchanted pendant.

Various effects are added when combined, and the stats of the options increase when enchanted. Starting from +1, it disappears if it fails. Note: The enchant level of the material item is reset to 0 when combining, so make sure to not use an enchanted pendant.

Various effects are added when combined, and the stats of the options increase when enchanted. Starting from +1, it disappears if it fails. Note: The enchant level of the material item is reset to 0 when combining, so make sure to not use an enchanted pendant.

71704.name: Earth Dragon's Pendant
71704.description: Pendant imbued with the power of the Earth Dragon. Can enchant up to +10 with Pendant Varnish/Shining Pendant Varnish, and can combine 2 pendants of the same level through the Dimensional Merchant. Various effects are added when combined, and the stats of the options increase when enchanted. Starting from +1, it disappears if it fails. Note: The enchant level of the material item is reset to 0 when combining, so make sure to not use an enchanted pendant.

71741.name: Dragon Scroll
71741.description: For 20 min., P./M. Atk. +150, P./M. Critical Rate +30, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +50, P./M. Def. +200, Max HP/MP/CP +500. The effect remains active even after death. Cooldown 1 minute.

71742.name: Dimensional Talisman Lv.1
71742.description: When equipped, P./M. Def. +25, P./M. Evasion +1, Max HP/MP/CP +150, Speed +5, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +10, XP/SP Gain +5%. Allows use of Dimension Guard - Lv. 1 (temporarily decreases the chance of getting hit by Deadly Stabs). Can be upgraded to a higher-grade Talisman through Veruti in the Town of Giran. When both the Dimensional Power and the Talisman of Border are equipped, only the Dimensional Power is applied.

71743.name: Dimensional Talisman Lv. 2
71743.description: When equipped, P./M. Def. +30, P./M. Evasion +2, Max HP/MP/CP +200, Speed +7, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +15, XP/SP Gain +7%. Applies the Dimensional Power of Border - Lv. 1 (has a chance to increase Attack Abilities on attack) and allows using the Dimension Guard - Lv. 2 (temporarily decreases the chance of getting hit by Deadly Stabs). Can be upgraded to a higher-grade Talisman through Veruti in the Town of Giran. When both the Dimensional Power and the Talisman of Border are equipped, only the Dimensional Power is applied.

Critical Damage Received). Can be upgraded to a higher-grade Talisman through Veruti in the Town of Giran. Critical Damage Received, and increases M. Def). Can be upgraded to a higher-grade Talisman through Veruti in the Town of Giran. When both the Dimensional Power and the Talisman of Border are equipped, only the Dimensional Power is applied.

71752.name: Dimensional Soul
71752.description: Material to craft and upgrade Dimensional Talismans. Enchant a Dimensional Talisman through Veruti in the Town of Giran, or go to Ferris of Aden to upgrade a Talisman of Border to a Dimensional Talisman.

71753.name: Talisman of Border Box
71753.description: The power of the Border is sealed within the box. Double-click to obtain a Talisman of Border Lv. 1.

71754.name: Box Full of Blessing
71754.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Sayha's Blessing and 1 out of various items.

71767.name: Samurai Black Long Sword
71767.description: 30-day. Cannot be enchanted or bestow special characteristics. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

71768.name: Samurai Black Long Sword (30-day) Box
71768.description: Double-click to obtain a Samurai Black Long Sword (30-day). Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse. The Samurai Black Long Sword obtained from the box cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store.

71769.name: Timed Weapon Exchange Coupon (B-grade)
71769.description: Exchange for a 30-day B-grade weapon through the Dimensional Merchant. Exchanged weapons cannot be enchanted, exchanged, or dropped.

71770.name: Newbie Pack
71770.description: Obtain Samurai Black Long Sword (30-day), 5000 Mysterious No-grade Soulshots, and 15 Special Hero's Fruits. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

71771.name: Hunting Support Pack
71771.description: Obtain 10 Dandy's Home Run Balls, 10 Hero's XP/SP Scrolls, 1 Newbie Amulet (30-day). Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

71772.name: Royal Equipment Pack
71772.description: Obtain 2 B-grade Weapon Exchange Coupons (15-day), Timed Armor Set Boxes (30-day), and Timed Rare Accessories (30-day). Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

71773.name: Newbie Amulet
71773.description: 30-day. Increases XP and SP gain by +50% while hunting. Can only be used by characters Lv. 39 or below. \nCannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

71774.name: Aden Supply Box
71774.description: Double-click to obtain one of the following: Baium's Talisman, Zaken's Earring, Queen Ant's Ring, Top-grade Jewel Box, Rice Cake of Flaming Fighting Spirit, Dragon Scroll, Sayha's Buff Scroll.

71777.name: Baium's Mystery Box
71777.description: Obtain 1 reward item at random. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Can be shared within account through Dimensional Merchant.

90000.name: Superior Dye of DEX <DEX +4 CON -2>
90000.description: Dye of DEX. Take 10 units of this magical dye to the symbol maker in town and you will receive a symbol that boosts your abilities. Can be used after 3rd class transfer. All classes.

90001.name: Superior Dye of INT <INT +4 MEN -2>
90001.description: Dye of INT. Take 10 units of this magical dye to the symbol maker in town and you will receive a symbol that boosts your abilities. Can be used after 3rd class transfer. All classes.

90002.name: Superior Dye of INT <INT +4 WIT -2>
90002.description: Dye of INT. Take 10 units of this magical dye to the symbol maker in town and you will receive a symbol that boosts your abilities. Can be used by Warriors and Wizards after 1st class transfer, before 2nd class transfer.

90003.name: Superior Dye of MEN <MEN +4 INT -2>
90003.description: Dye of MEN. Take 10 units of this magical dye to the symbol maker in town and you will receive a symbol that boosts your abilities. Can be used by Wizards after 3rd Class Transfer.

90004.name: Superior Dye of MEN <MEN +4 WIT -2>
90004.description: Dye of MEN. Take 10 units of this magical dye to the symbol maker in town and you will receive a symbol that boosts your abilities. Can be used by Wizards and Healers after 3rd Class Transfer.

90005.name: Superior Dye of WIT <WIT +4 INT -2>
90005.description: Dye of WIT. Take 10 units of this magical dye to the symbol maker in town and you will receive a symbol that boosts your abilities. Can be used by Warriors and Wizards after 3rd Class Transfer.

90006.name: Superior Dye of WIT <WIT +4 MEN -2>
90006.description: Dye of WIT. Take 10 units of this magical dye to the symbol maker in town and you will receive a symbol that boosts your abilities. Can be used by Wizards and Healers after 3rd Class Transfer.

90007.name: Common Life Stone
90007.description: Standard mineral formed inside a monster by Physical and Magic hits. Serves as a material for weapon augmentation. To use it for augmentation, go to Giran/Aden and give it to Blacksmiths Jeris and Zelos.\n\nAugmentation requires 100 Gemstones (D-grade).

90008.name: Remnant Ashes
90008.description: An item you got from a prisoner of the Dungeon of Abyss.

90009.name: Image of Evil
90009.description: An item you got from an especially dangerous prisoner of the Dungeon of Abyss.

90010.name: Key to the West Wing of the Dungeon of Abyss
90010.description: Key to the door in the West Wing of the Dungeon of Abyss.

90011.name: Key to the East Wing of the Dungeon of Abyss
90011.description: Key to the door in the East Wing of the Dungeon of Abyss.

90019.description: A mark granted to those who have showed great valor in the Monster Arena. Can be traded for a special item with Arena Manager Lau.

90020.name: Box of Superior Dye

90023.description: Inventory Slots +2/ Weight Limit +1,000. Use a Magic Rune Clip to upgrade it to Rag Belt.

90024.name: Rag Belt
90024.description: Inventory Slots +2/ Weight Limit +2,000/ HP Recovery +1.24/ MP Recovery +0.83/ CP Recovery +1.66. Use a mid-grade Magic Rune Clip to upgrade it to Leather Belt.

90025.name: Leather Belt
90025.description: Inventory Slots +3/ Weight Limit +3,000/ HP Recovery +1.47/ MP Recovery +0.98/ CP Recovery +1.96/ Max. HP/MP/CP +100. Use a high-grade Magic Rune Clip to upgrade it to Iron Belt.

90026.name: Iron Belt
90026.description: Inventory Slots +4/ Weight Limit +4,000/ HP Recovery +1.70/ MP Recovery +1.13/ CP Recovery +2.26/ Max. HP/MP/CP +150. Use a top-grade Magic Rune Clip to upgrade it to Mithril Belt.

90027.name: Mithril Belt
90027.description: Inventory Slots +5/ Weight Limit +5,000/ HP Recovery +1.92/ MP Recovery +1.28/ CP Recovery +2.56/ Max. HP/MP/CP +200.

90028.name: Clasp
90028.description: A magic clasp which improves Belt's properties. Arena Manager Lau can enhance the Belt.

90029.name: Mid-grade Clasp
90029.description: A magic clasp which improves Belt's properties. Arena Manager Lau can enhance the Belt.

90030.name: High-grade Clasp
90030.description: A magic clasp which improves Belt's properties. Arena Manager Lau can enhance the Belt.

90031.name: Top-grade Clasp

90033.description: Restores a large amount of MP. Cooldown: 3 minutes.

90117.description: Scroll needed to learn the Victories of Pa’agrio skill. Available to Dominator.\nLevel required to obtain the scroll: 76

90123.description: Scroll needed to learn the Cleanse skill. Available to Cardinal.\nLevel required to obtain the scroll: 77

90124.description: Scroll needed to learn the Chain Heal skill. Available to Cardinal.\nLevel required to obtain the scroll: 78
