90127.description: Scroll needed to learn the Warrior Servitor skill. Available to Arcana Lord.\nLevel required to obtain the scroll: 78

90128.name: Codex - Wizard Servitor
90128.description: A secret scroll needed to learn Wizard Servitor. Used by Elemental Masters.\nRequired level: 78

90129.name: Scroll: Assassin Servitor
90129.description: Scroll needed to learn the Assassin Servitor skill. Available to Spectral Master.\nLevel required to obtain the scroll: 78

90130.name: Scroll: Final Servitor
90130.description: Scroll needed to learn the Final Servitor skill. Available to Arcana Lord, Elemental Master, and Spectral Master.\nLevel required to obtain the scroll: 79

90131.name: Scroll: Servitor Share
90131.description: A secret scroll needed to learn Servitor Share. Used by Arcana Lords, Elemental Masters, and Spectral Masters.\nRequired level: 76

90132.name: Monster Arena Belt
90132.description: CON +1, MEN +1, HP Recovery +2.31, MP Recovery +1.54, CP Recovery +3.07, Max. HP/MP/CP +10%, Received damage -3%. Duration: 7 days.

90133.name: Scroll: Exciting Adventure
90133.description: Scroll needed to learn the Exciting Adventure skill. Available to Adventurer.\nLevel required to obtain the scroll: 80

90134.name: Scroll: Wind Riding
90134.description: Scroll needed to learn the Wind Riding skill. Available to Wind Rider.\nLevel required to obtain the scroll: 80

90135.name: Scroll: Ghost Walking
90135.description: Scroll needed to learn the Ghost Walking skill. Available to Ghost Hunter.\nLevel required to obtain the scroll: 80

90136.name: Dimensional Gift
90136.description: Double-click to receive one of the following items: Scroll of Mood Melody, Scroll: Enchant Armor/Weapon (C), Accessory/Weapon/Armor Box (C), Spellbook Chest, Angel Cat's Blessing, Dark Assassin Transformation Potion, or Dimensional Blessing.

90137.name: Pendant Matte Varnish
90137.description: Varnish that enhances effects of a Pendant. For a Pendant enchanted up to +6. If an enchantment is failed, the pendant doesn't disappear and has the previous level of enchantment.

90138.name: Pendant Glittering Varnish
90138.description: Varnish that enhances effects of a Pendant. For a Pendant enchanted up to +9. If an enchantment is failed, the pendant doesn't disappear and has the previous level of enchantment.

90139.name: Silver Bait
90139.description: A fishing bait enabling to catch a Whale. At a low probability, you may get Golden Mermaid's Tears.

90140.name: Cadmus Transformation Bracelet - Prophet
90140.description: A 7-day item. Transforms you into Prophet Cadmus. Can be used once a day. After the transformation, you can use the following skills for 4 hours: Might, Shield, Wind Walk, Return, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Haste, Acumen, and Heal.

90141.name: Cadmus Transformation Bracelet - Shillien Elder
90141.description: A 7-day item. Transforms you into Shillien Elder Cadmus. Can be used once a day. After the transformation, you can use the following skills for 4 hours: Might, Shield, Wind Walk, Return, Vampiric Rage, Empower, Death Whisper, Guidance, and Heal.

90142.name: Cadmus Transformation Bracelet - Elven Elder
90142.description: A 7-day item. Transforms you into Elven Elder Cadmus. Can be used once a day. After the transformation, you can use the following skills for 4 hours: Might, Shield, Wind Walk, Return, Clarity, Agility, Decrease Weight, Regeneration, and Greater Heal.

90143.name: Einsahad’s Protection
90143.description: Increases XP/SP gain by 100% for 1 hour. Cooldown: 1 hour. The effect persists through death.

90144.name: Transformation Scroll: White Assassin
90144.description: For 15 minutes transforms you into White Assassin. Will not be deleted upon death. \nTransformation into White Assassin: Max HP/MP +7%, P./M. Accuracy +2, P./M. Atk. +3%, P./M. Def. +3%, Atk. Spd. +5%, M. Critical Rate +20, Speed +5.

90145.name: Ring of Savior
90145.description: Stun Resistance +5%, HP Recovery Bonus +1.8 and MP Recovery Bonus +1.1 when running. When two identical rings are equipped, the effect of only one ring will be applied. Cannot be enchanted.

90146.name: Savior’s Cube
90146.description: A 30-day item. Double-click to get one Enchant Savior’s Weapon Scroll and one Savior' Growth Scroll (can be used only once a day).

90147.name: Mark of Savior
90147.description: Using Dimensional Merchant, you can trade it for a Savior’s weapon (30-day).  Can be transferred between characters on one account and be stored in a private warehouse.

90148.name: Savior' Growth Scroll
90148.description: XP/SP gain +50% for 2 hours. Cooldown: 2 hours. The effects persists through death.

90149.name: Savior Scroll: Enchant Weapon
90149.description: Only for Savior's weapons. The item is not destroyed and will retain the current enchant value even if enchantment fails.

90152.name: Savior’s Bow
90152.description: A 30-day item.\n<Soul Crystal Enhancement>\nP. Crit. Rate. +52.

90153.name: Savior’s Dagger
90153.description: A 30-day item.\n<Soul Crystal Enhancement>\nP. Crit. Rate. +66.

90154.name: Savior's Spear
90154.description: A 30-day item.\n<Soul Crystal Enhancement>\n25% chance to stun the target by Crit. Atk.

90155.name: Savior’s Herald
90155.description: Double-click to get one Talisman of Border - Lv. +6 (30-day) and one Fire Dragon Pendant +6 (30-day).

90156.name: Talisman of Border - Lv. 6
90156.description: A 30-day item. P./M. Def. +24, P./M. Evasion +2, HP/MP/CP +160, Movement Speed +5, P./M. Atk. Spd. +15, XP and SP gain +4%. Allows using Border Purification (cancels Paralysis, Petrification, Poisoning, and Bleeding). When two or more Talismans of identical effects are equipped, the effect of only one Talisman will be applied.

90157.name: Warrior’s Talisman - Attack
90157.description: PvE Damage +3%, P./M. Critical Damage +20, P./M. Skill Power +2%, P./M. Accuracy +1. Duration: 7 days.

90158.name: Fire Dragon Pendant +6
90158.description: M. Def. +16, XP/SP gain +10%, P./M. Atk. +20.

90159.name: Talisman of Battle - Liberate
90159.description: Clears all abnormal states and debuffs. Cooldown is 10 minutes.

90160.name: Warrior’s Talisman - Defense
90160.description: Received PvE damage -3%, Magic Attack Resistance +2%, P./M. Skill Evasion +4%, Debuff Resistance +3%, Pull Resistance +10%.  Duration: 7 days.

90161.name: Chest of Glory
90161.description: Double-click to receive one Monster Arena Belt (7-day).\n<Note> After you open the chest, you cannot move the item.

90162.name: Warrior’s Talisman Pack - Attack
90162.description: Double-click to receive one Warrior’s Talisman - Attack (7-day).

90163.name: Warrior’s Talisman Pack - Defense
90163.description: Double-click to receive one Warrior’s Talisman - Defense (7-day).

90164.name: Battle Cure
90164.description: HP/MP +1. Cooldown: 10 minutes. Intended for use only at the Monster Arena.

90165.name: Ticket for Monster Arena
90165.description: An additional ticket of admission to a daily dungeon. Double-click to reset the Arena Monster attendance counter. This item can be used only once a day.

90166.name: Elite Ticket for Monster Arena
90166.description: An additional ticket of admission to a daily dungeon. Double-click to reset the Arena Monster attendance counter. This item can be used only once a day.

90167.name: Bunch of Bananas
90167.description: For 5 minutes, XP and SP gained through hunting +10%, P./M. Atk. +15%, P./M. Def. +15%, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +10%, Speed +10. Deleted when entering the Olympiad. Deleted upon logout. Can be stacked with all XP/SP bonuses.

90168.name: Strawberry Banana Cocktail
90168.description: Activates Strawberry Banana Cocktail effect for 5 minutes (Scroll: Prophecy of Fire - Lv. 1).\n<Note>Effects do not stack if two cocktails are used.

90169.name: Mango Banana Cocktail
90169.description: Activates Mango Banana Cocktail effect for 5 minutes (Scroll: Prophecy of Water - Lv. 1).\n<Note>Effects do not stack if two cocktails are used.

90170.name: Cherry Banana Cocktail
90170.description: Activates Cherry Banana Cocktail effect for 5 minutes (Scroll: Prophecy of Wind - Lv. 1).\n<Note>Effects do not stack if two cocktails are used.

90171.name: Monkey Bait
90171.description:
Fishing Time: 20 seconds
Fishing Standby Time: 10 seconds

Fish bait bought from Chef Monkey. Fish using this bait to catch Tuna.

90172.name: Gemstone of Border
90172.description:
For enchanting Talisman of Border above Lv. 4. Give this item, along with a low-level Talisman of Border, to Baggins, and you will get a higher-level Talisman of Border.

<Note>
Cannot be used to enchant Talisman of Border Lv. 10 and Blessed Talisman of Border.

90173.name: Tuna
90173.description: Double-click to recover a small amount of SP. You can exchange it for a scroll that replenishes SP through a Fishing Guild Member.

90174.name: Silver Bait Box
90174.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Fishing Rod Pack (10-day) and 1080 Silver Bait.

90175.name: Golden Bait Box
90175.description: Double-click to obtain 180 Golden Bait, 180 Fishing Shots.

90176.name: Golden Fishing kit Lv. 1
90176.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Golden Mermaid's Fishing Rod Pack (30-day) and 2160 Silver Bait.

90177.name: Golden Fishing kit Lv. 2
90177.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Golden Mermaid's Fishing Rod Pack (30-day), 2160 Silver Bait, and 2 Einhasad's Protections.

90178.name: Golden Fishing kit Lv. 3
90178.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Golden Mermaid's Fishing Rod Pack (30-day), 6480 Silver Bait, and 4 Einhasad's Protections.

90179.name: Golden Fishing kit Lv. 4
90179.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Golden Mermaid's Fishing Rod Pack (30-day), 6480 Silver Bait, 10 Einhasad's Protections, and 1 Refined Romantic Chapeau (Special Ability).

90180.name: Golden Fishing kit Lv. 5
90180.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Golden Mermaid's Fishing Rod Pack (30-day), 12960 Silver Bait, 15 Einhasad's Protections, 1 Refined Romantic Chapeau (Special Ability), and 1 Refined Rare Accessory Pack (30-day).

90181.name: Shiny Coin
90181.description: Coins can be exchanged for the following items with a Fishing Guild Member: Fishing Rod Pack (10-day), Silver Bait Box, Golden Fishing kit Lv. 1~5, Shining Fishing kit Lv. 1~2. Exact item depends on the number of coins.  Can be stored in a private warehouse or shared within account through Dimensional Merchant.

90182.name: Shining Golden Bait
90182.description: Fishing Bait. Can be used for fishing a Glowing Whale with a low probability of getting a Shiny Coin.

90183.name: Chef's Fish Stew - Victory
90183.description: For 10 min. activates Chant of Victory Lv. 1. \n<Attention> Cannot be stacked with Prophecy-type buffs. Effect remains after death.

90184.name: Chef's Fish Stew - Fire
90184.description: For 10 min. activates Prophecy of Fire Lv. 1. \n<Attention> Cannot be stacked with Prophecy-type buffs. Effect remains after death.

90185.name: Chef's Fish Stew - Water
90185.description: For 10 min. activates Prophecy of Water Lv. 1. \n<Attention> Cannot be stacked with Prophecy-type buffs. Effect remains after death.

90186.name: Chef's Fish Stew - Wind
90186.description: For 10 min. activates Prophecy of Wind Lv. 1. \n<Attention> Cannot be stacked with Prophecy-type buffs. Effect remains after death.

90187.name: Gold Urn
90187.description: Double-click on the Gold Urn to get one of its treasures.

90188.name: Glowing  Whale
90188.description: Double-click to restore a small amount of SP. You can exchange it for a scroll that replenishes SP through a Fishing Guild Member.

90189.name: Blue Spinel
90189.description: A reward item.\nYou can receive it for helping Grocer Pink and use it to exchange for rare items with Pink.

90190.name: Dandy Pendant
90190.description: M. Def. +20, XP and SP gain +30%, P./M. Atk. +50, P./M. Critical Damage +5%. Allows using the Blessing of Fire Dragon skill.

90191.name: Dandy Shining Pendant
90191.description: M. Def. +21, XP and SP gain +30%, P./M. Atk. +60, P./M. Critical Damage +5%. Allows using the Blessing of Fire Dragon and Fire Dragon's Protection skills.

90192.name: Giant's Enchant Scroll Pack
90192.description: Double-click to receive one Average, Improved, Solid, or Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C/B).

90193.name: Low-grade Arena Loot
90193.description: Arena Reward\nDouble-click to receive one of the following items: Dandy's Home Run Ball, Angel Cat's Blessing, Sayha's Holy Water, Soulshot Ticket, Warrior’s Major Healing Potion.

90194.name: Intermediate Arena Loot
90194.description: Arena Reward\nDouble-click to receive one of the following items: Spellbook Box - 3rd Class Transfer, Magic Tablet, Spellbook Box, Common Life Stone, Scroll of Mood Melody.

90195.name: High-grade Arena Loot
90195.description: Arena Reward\nDouble-click to receive one of the following items: Refined Rare Accessory Pack (30-day), Rare Accessory Pack (15-day), Unidentified Stone, Dandy's Shining Pendant (7-day), Dandy's Shining Pendant (1-day), Dandy's Pendant (7-day), Dandy Pendant (1-day).

90196.name: Dandy Pendant
90196.description: M. Def. +20, XP and SP gain +30%, P./M. Atk. +50, P./M. Critical Damage +5%. Allows using the Blessing of Fire Dragon skill.

90197.name: Dandy Shining Pendant
90197.description: M. Def. +21, XP and SP gain +30%, P./M. Atk. +60, P./M. Critical Damage +5%. Allows using the Blessing of Fire Dragon and Fire Dragon's Protection skills.

90198.name: MOPP Combat Ration
90198.description: MOPP Combat Ration. XP and SP gain by +10%, P./M. Atk. +15%, P./M. Def. +15%, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +10%, Speed +10. Sayha Grace points +30% Duration: 5 minutes. The effect is removed if the game is reloaded.

90199.name: Hunter's Memo
90199.description: Altran asked you to kill monsters who raided tombs of his family graveyard. Slay monsters from the list.

90200.name: Wolf Pelt
90200.description: Pelt of the Wolf who used to loiter on the outskirts of the village and raid tombs.

90201.name: Orc Amulet
90201.description: Amulets that Orcs wear on their necks or hands. Despite looking like simple trinkets, they mean a lot to Orcs.

90203.name: Broken Sword
90203.description: A sword taken from an Orc Warrior who wandered near the village. The sword is in a very bad condition and is not suitable for use.

90204.name: Inventory Book
90204.description: List of materials requested by Harry.\nWooden pole, wooden door panels, Stone Powder

90205.name: Wooden pole
90205.description: A wooden pole stolen by an Orc Captain and his Lieutenant.\nHow about we put this pole on fire?

90206.name: Wooden door panel
90206.description: All what's left of a door taken by a Werewolf.\nJust what did he need it for?

90207.name: Stone Powder
90207.description: Stone powder taken from Stone Golems and Destroyers.\nUsed for building stone walls.

90208.name: Lector's Notes
90208.description: List of materials requested by Lector.\nEssence of Water, Spider's Silk.

90209.name: Cobweb
90209.description: Spider's Silk made by Giant Spiders. Light and shiny.

90210.name: Essence of Water
90210.description: Essence of Water obtained from Undine. Used for coloring Silk of Giant Spiders.

90211.name: Lector's Notes
90211.description: List of materials requested by Lector.\nEssence of Water, Spider's Silk.

90212.name: Cobweb
90212.description: Spider's Silk made by Giant Spiders. Light and shiny.

90213.name: Essence of Water
90213.description: Essence of Water obtained from Undine. Used for coloring Silk of Giant Spiders.

90214.name: Lector's Note
90214.description: List of materials requested by Lector.\nEssence of Water, Spider's Silk.

90215.name: Cobweb
90215.description: Spider's Silk made by Giant Spiders. Light and shiny.

90216.name: Essence of Water
90216.description: Essence of Water obtained from Undine. Used for coloring Silk of Giant Spiders.

90217.name: Mark of Security
90217.description: Document of Sentinel Kendell listing tasks that need to be done to restore forest's balance.

90218.name: Tail of a Gray Wolf
90218.description: Tail taken from a Gray Wolf as a hunting trophy. The fur is good but it's not usable because of a foul smell.

90219.name: Goblin's Pack of Knickknacks
90219.description: A belt Pack of Knickknacks of a Goblin Raider. Contains various trash, but for Goblins it would be treasures.

90220.name: Kaboo Orc Sturdy Amulet
90220.description: One of Amulets that Kaboo Orcs wear round their necks. Looks splendid.

90221.name: Mushroom Spore Powder
90221.description: Mushroom Spore Powder obtained from a Spore Fungus. Necessary for checking on spore ripening before harvest.

90222.name: Note about Required Ingredients
90222.description: Note that states the item needed for the entrance to the underground fortress.

90223.name: Orcs' Bandage
90223.description: Bandage of a Kaboo Orc Warrior. More elastic than an Elven bandage, created specifically for a close combat.

90224.name: Dryad's Crimson Herb
90224.description: Crimson Herb from the head of a Dryad. Put it onto your eyes to be able to see in the dark.

90225.name: Spider Venom
90225.description: Venom of a spider dwelling in the Elven Forest. Highly poisonous for Orcs.

90226.name: Lv. 1 Brooch
90226.description: Lv. 1 Brooch. 30-day. Activates 2 jewel slots when equipped.

90227.name: Lv. 5 Jade
90227.description: Lv. 5 Jade. 3-day. Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +14%, when equipped. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90228.name: Medications Research
90228.description: Herbiel's research of a method of instant suppression of bleeding.\nThese notes list necessary ingredients and various information, but the handwriting is really unreadable.

90229.name: Spider Ichor
90229.description: Scavenger Spider Ichor. Obtained from spider guts in a very small quantity, hardens fast.

90230.name: Moonstone Beast's Scales
90230.description: Scales taken from the snout of Moonstone Beast. Has a yellowish iridescent glow and a peculiar smell that Elves find intolerable.

90231.name: Medications Research
90231.description: Herbiel's research of a method of instant suppression of bleeding.\nThese notes list necessary ingredients and various information, but the handwriting is really unreadable.

90232.name: Spider Ichor
90232.description: Scavenger Spider Ichor. Obtained from spider guts in a very small quantity, hardens fast.

90233.name: Moonstone Beast's Scales
90233.description: Scales taken from the snout of Moonstone Beast. Has a yellowish iridescent glow and a peculiar smell that Elves find intolerable.

90234.name: Medications Research
90234.description: Herbiel's research of a method of instant suppression of bleeding.\nThese notes list necessary ingredients and various information, but the handwriting is really unreadable.

90235.name: Antidote
90235.description: Antidote from Gludio. So effective that it put Gludio on a par with the Ivory Tower in the business of making magical potions.

90236.name: Arachnid Tracker Thorn
90236.description: A Thorn from the paw of an Arachnid Tracker. Contains venom, that's why Goblins use it as a poisonous dart. Herbiel wants to make a syringe from it.

90237.name: Hunting Plan
90237.description: List of Hierarch Talos that specifies materials needed for organizing a Hunting Festival. The event is called Shilen's Hunt and is intended to be festive, rather than formal.

90238.name: Wolf Tail
90238.description: Adornments made from colorful tails symbolize various trophies caught by hunters. During the festival tails are used to tally up the scores.

90239.name: Goblin Poisonous Dart
90239.description: When Dark Elves go on a hunt, Goblins try to hamper them. They paralyze animals by throwing spears with poisonous darts at them to ruin the party.

90240.name: Imp Wing
90240.description: Imps chase after Goblins, and Goblins steal the trophies. Imp Wings are the marks left by Imps.

90241.name: Fungus Juice
90241.description: Despite the name, Green Fungus is brown-colored. And the juice of that walking fungus is red. Dark Elves use it to color wolf tails.

90242.name: Balor Orc Fang
90242.description: Balor Orc paint their fangs black by custom. You need to slay Balor Orcs who are impeding the hunt and gather their fangs.

90243.name: Armor Design
90243.description: Payne's documents that contain designs of a new armor and lists of required materials.\nThat armor is absolutely new, and nobody knows what kind of look it's going to have.

90244.name: Zombie Forest Elf Tooth
90244.description: Zombie Forest Elf Tooth. Filled with dark energy and the power of a Zombie spirit.

90245.name: Bat Skin
90245.description: Red-tinted black Bat Skin. Very popular among Dark Elf traders due to its unusual shine.

90246.name: Stone Giant's Shiny Rock
90246.description: Shiny rock fragment obtained while hunting Stone Giants. It will look great as a belt adornment.

90247.name: Old Bone Fragment
90247.description: A small Bone Fragment that drops from a slain Dark Horror. Emits dark energy that increases magical abilities.

90248.name: Vital Stone Lv. 5
90248.description: Vital Stone Lv. 5. A 3-day item. XP/SP gain +15% and Sayha's Grace Consumption Rate -30%, while hunting during Sayha's Grace effect. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90249.name: Supplies Certificate
90249.description: List of materials needed for the shield that Vollodos wants to make. An urgent order.

90250.name: Stone Giant Guardian's Core
90250.description: A Core that drops from a Stone Giant Guardian. Since it's light and durable, it is often placed as an adornment in the center of a shield.

90251.name: Crystalline Beast's Shinedust
90251.description: Dust made from the skin of Crystalline Beasts. It can repel magic and is often used for treating materials that require an additional protection from magic.

90252.name: Giant Spider Skin Fragment
90252.description: Spider Skin Fragment. Spider skins are very smooth and strong. It is often used for joining together armor parts.

90253.name: Supplies Certificate
90253.description: List of materials needed for the shield that Vollodos wants to make. An urgent order.

90254.name: Stone Giant Guardian's Core
90254.description: A Core that drops from a Stone Giant Guardian. Since it's light and durable, it is often placed as an adornment in the center of a shield.

90255.name: Crystalline Beast's Shinedust
90255.description: Dust made from the skin of Crystalline Beasts or scales of Moonstone Beasts. It can repel magic and is often used for treating materials that require an additional protection from magic.

90256.name: Giant Spider Skin Fragment
90256.description: Spider Skin Fragment. Spider skins are very smooth and strong. It is often used for joining together armor parts.

90257.name: Supplies Certificate
90257.description: List of materials needed for the shield that Vollodos wants to make. An urgent order.

90258.name: Stone Giant Guardian's Core
90258.description: A Core that drops from a Stone Giant Guardian. Since it's light and durable, it is often placed as an adornment in the center of a shield.

90259.name: Crystalline Beast's Shinedust
90259.description: Dust made from the skin of Crystalline Beasts or scales of Moonstone Beasts. It can repel magic and is often used for treating materials that require an additional protection from magic.

90260.name: Giant Spider Skin Fragment
90260.description: Spider Skin Fragment. Spider skins are very smooth and strong. It is often used for joining together armor parts.

90261.name: Tribal Chronicle
90261.description: Tiku's list that has all important tasks for his tribe. Not easily readable because of his bad handwriting.

90262.name: Kasha Wolf Fur
90262.description: Fur of a Kasha Wolf. Much more valuable than its skin.

90263.name: Ashes of Ancestors
90263.description: Remains that were dug up by Goblin Tomb Raider on ancestors' graveyard.

90264.name: Imp Necklace
90264.description: Necklaces of Rakeclaw Imp Hunter who follow Goblin Tomb Raiders and team up with them so they can feed on small animals or insects that appear out of raided tombs.

90265.name: Mountain Fungus Spores
90265.description: A Green Spore from Mountain Fungus. Orcs use it as one of ingredients for making poison for their traps.

90266.name: Maraku Werewolf Claw
90266.description: Maraku Werewolf Claw. Werewolves kidnapped Orc kids who went out for a walk near the Village. They need to be punished for it.

90267.name: Eye of Seer Tears
90267.description: Clear liquid from the pupil of the Eye of Seer. Heals wounds, speeds up recovery.

90268.name: Required Materials
90268.description: Sumari's list specifying materials that gear requires. Looks like it was written by someone other than Sumari.

90269.name: Blackwing Bat Wing
90269.description: Membrane of a Blackwing Bat Wing. Very smooth and elastic. It will be a good material for a cloak or armor lining.

90270.name: Grave Robber's Belt
90270.description: The Belt of Goblin Tomb Raider Leader. It has various digging equipment attached. Can be altered to make a sword belt.

90271.name: Golem Ore
90271.description: Ore that dropped from a Greystone Golem. Melts well, and thus often used for making various weapons.

90272.name: Evil Eye Patrol Hide
90272.description: Thick hide of an Evil Eye Patrol. After a proper treatment, turns into a very smooth and strong leather, suitable for coating armor.

90273.name: Magical Potion of Leaping
90273.description: Provides 37,000,000 XP/1,110,000 SP. Intended for level 45 and higher.

90274.name: List of materials
90274.description: Document listing materials needed for making a drill and an Exquisite Hammer.

90275.name: Bear's Shin bone
90275.description: Kasha Bear's Shin bone. Used for making an Exquisite Hammer.

90276.name: Sharp Spider Leg
90276.description: Sharp Leg of Kasha Spider. Suitable for making a drill because of its hardness and an exceptionally sharp tip.

90277.name: List of materials
90277.description: Document listing materials needed for making a drill and an Exquisite Hammer.

90278.name: Bear's Shin bone
90278.description: Kasha Bear's Shin bone. Used for making an Exquisite Hammer.

90279.name: Sharp Spider Leg
90279.description: Sharp Leg of Kasha Spider. Suitable for making a drill because of its hardness and an exceptionally sharp tip.

90280.name: Necklace Materials Ticket
90280.description: Note listing necessary materials, as well as Uska's belongings that were stolen by Imps.

90281.name: Red Stone
90281.description: Sumari asked Uska to use that gorgeous sparkling red jewel to adorn a necklace.

90282.name: Hard Lens
90282.description: Lens of Evil Eye Seer. Becomes very hard when dried. Ground Lens is used as a polisher for gems.

90283.name: Bounty Poster
90283.description: Bounty Poster with a reward for catching monsters who stole items from the shipping that was delivered by Weapon Merchant Reep.

90284.name: Black Wolf Tooth
90284.description: Black Wolf Tooth. Goblins use it for defense against wolves.

90285.name: Goblin's Navigation Device
90285.description: A Navigation Device that Goblins used for scouting.

90286.name: Feather-adorned Utuku Orc Amulet
90286.description: Utuku Orcs like to wear seal-shaped Amulets on their belts.

90288.name: Garum Werewolf Tail
90288.description: A Tail chopped off a Garum Werewolf.

90289.name: Goblin Brigand Lieutenant's Necklace
90289.description: A Necklace that belongs to the Goblin Brigand Leader or his Lieutenant. Adorned with a plain pendant. It shows the commanding status of its owner.

90290.name: Temple Reconstruction Request
90290.description: List of things for repairs of an inner room of Maphr's Temple

90291.name: Barbed Bat Wing Sac
90291.description: A beautiful Sparkling Barbed Bat Wing Sac. Often used by dwarves to adorn weapons or as curtains at their homes.

90292.name: Puma Fur
90292.description: Fur of Northern Highlands Puma. Usually serves as a decoration of a house interior, but can be used as a cape material as well.

90293.name: Goblin Jewel
90293.description: Shiny small shard of a rock found among Goblin Brigand's junk. Goblins consider it a jewel and steal it from each other in a heartbeat if they can.

90294.name: Golem Ore
90294.description: Ore that can be found in the bodies of Golems or other magical creatures similar to them. This ore is used for producing a gleaming silver-like metal which is very malleable and easy to work with, and thus is used for making jewelry.

90296.name: Maintenance Request
90296.description: Materials required for the restoration of the broken Maphr's statue.

90297.name: Hunter Tarantula's Venom
90297.description: Though lethal, Hunter Tarantula's Venom is used as glue thanks to its ability to harden instantly.

90298.name: Plunder Tarantula's Kidney Stone
90298.description: A transparent stone that can be found in a body of Plunder Tarantula. Very smooth and shiny, used as an adornment.

90299.name: Maintenance Request
90299.description: Completed order for materials required for the restoration of the broken Maphr's statue.

90300.name: Hunter Tarantula's Venom
90300.description: Though lethal, Hunter Tarantula's Venom is used as glue thanks to its ability to harden instantly.

90301.name: Plunder Tarantula's Kidney Stone
90301.description: A transparent stone that can be found in a body of Plunder Tarantula. Very smooth and shiny, used as an adornment.

90302.name: New Cleaning Tool's Supply List
90302.description: Priest Gerald tries to make tools for decorating the inner parts of the Temple that is currently under repairs. This is the list of materials that he needs.

90303.name: Bat Bristle
90303.description: Bristles from the neck of a Barbed Bat. Very soft, used for making brushes.

90304.name: Trimden Web
90304.description: Trimden Web. When its sticky enzyme is removed, it becomes very smooth and gleaming. Used as a fiber for making expensive fabric.

90311.name: Brooch
90311.description: Activates 2 jewel slots when equipped. Inventory Slot +5.

90312.name: Brooch
90312.description: Activates 3 jewel slots when equipped. Inventory Slot +9.

90313.name: Topaz
90313.description: Disrupts the target's skill casting when used. Inflicts fixed damage of 475 Power in PvP. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90314.name: Topaz
90314.description: Disrupts the target's skill casting when used. Inflicts fixed damage of 633 Power in PvP. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90315.description: Disrupts the target's skill casting when used. Inflicts fixed damage of 950 Power in PvP. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90316.name: Topaz
90316.description: Disrupts the target's skill casting when used. Inflicts fixed damage of 1357 Power in PvP. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90317.name: Topaz
90317.description: Disrupts the target's skill casting when used. Inflicts fixed damage of 2375 Power in PvP. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied. Returns a Greater Gem when combined with the Gem Energy.

90318.name: Garnet
90318.description: Stun/Pull/Silence/Paralysis/Fear Resistance +3% when equipped. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90319.name: Garnet
90319.description: Stun/Pull/Silence/Paralysis/Fear Resistance +5% when equipped. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90321.name: Garnet
90321.description: Stun/Pull/Silence/Paralysis/Fear Resistance +11% when equipped. Becomes invincible against debuffs for 5 seconds upon using the skill. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90322.name: Garnet
90322.description: Stun/Pull/Silence/Paralysis/Fear Resistance +20% when equipped. Invincible against debuffs for 15 sec when skill is used. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied. Returns a Greater Gem when combined with the Gem Energy.

90323.description: Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +1% when equipped. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90327.name: Jade

90328.name: Ruby
90328.description: Soulshot, Blessed Soulshot, and Beast Soulshot damage +2% when equipped If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90329.name: Ruby
90329.description: Soulshot, Blessed Soulshot, and Beast Soulshot damage +3% when equipped If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90333.name: Sapphire
90333.description: Spiritshot, Blessed Spiritshot, and Beast Spiritshot +2% when equipped. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90334.name: Sapphire
90334.description: Spiritshot, Blessed Spiritshot, and Beast Spiritshot +3% when equipped. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90335.name: Sapphire
90335.description: Spiritshot, Blessed Spiritshot, and Beast Spiritshot +5% when equipped. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90336.name: Sapphire

90337.name: Sapphire

90338.name: Diamond
90338.description: P. Def. +11 when equipped. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90339.name: Diamond
90339.description: P. Def. +25 when equipped. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90340.name: Diamond

90347.name: Pearl

90353.name: Vital Stone
90353.description: XP/SP gain +3% while hunting during Sayha's Grace effect. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90354.name: Vital Stone
90354.description: XP/SP gain +4% while hunting during Sayha's Grace effect. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90355.name: Vital Stone
90355.description: XP/SP gain +6% while hunting during Sayha's Grace effect. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90356.name: Vital Stone
90356.description: XP/SP gain +8% while hunting during Sayha's Grace effect and Sayha's Grace Consumption Rate -10%. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90357.name: Vital Stone
90357.description: XP/SP gain +15% while hunting during Sayha's Grace effect and Sayha's Grace Consumption Rate -30% If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied. Returns a Greater Gem when combined with the Gem Energy.

90358.name: Shine Ore
90358.description: You can exchange some amount of Ore for Lv. 1 Brooch, Lv. 3-5 jewels or Jewelry Box through Dimensional Merchant.

90359.name: Fortune Brooch
90359.description: Double-click to obtain Fortune Jewelry Chest.

90367.name: Fortune Vital Stone Chest
90367.description: Double-click to obtain Lv. 1-5 Vital Stone.

90368.name: Shiny Jewelry Box
90368.description: Double-click to obtain Shiny Jewelry Box.

90376.name: Vital Stone Chest
90376.description: Double-click to obtain Lv. 1 Vital Stone.

90398.name: Lv. 3 Vital Stone Jewelry Box
90398.description: Double-click to obtain Lv. 3 Vital Stone.

90399.name: Lv. 4 Vital Stone Jewelry Box
90399.description: Double-click to obtain Lv. 4 Vital Stone.

90400.name: Lv. 5 Vital Stone Jewelry Box
90400.description: Double-click to obtain Lv. 5 Vital Stone.

90401.name: Melodys Luck Cube
90401.description: 30-day item. Double-click to receive various rewards at random. (Can be used only once per day.)  For characters of level 20 or higher.

90402.name: Fire Dragon Pendant +6
90402.description: M. Def. +16, XP/SP gain +10%, P./M. Atk. +20. Duration: 15 days.

90403.name: Melodys Teleport Pouch
90403.description: Double-click to get 1 My Teleport Book or 10 My Teleport Scrolls.

90404.name: My Teleport Book
90404.description: Increases the number of return points to save by 1. Maximum number - 18.

90405.name: My Teleport Scroll
90405.description: Item that is consumed when moving to the remembered location.

90406.name: Melodys Fish Stew Pouch
90406.description: Double-click to receive the following items: Chef's Fish Stew (Victory/Fire/Water/Wind), 2 Special Fruit Buffs, 2 Scrolls of Mood Melody.

90407.name: Chef's Fish Stew - Victory
90407.description: For 10 min. activates Chant of Victory Lv. 1. \n<Attention> Cannot be stacked with Prophecy-type buffs. Effect remains after death.

90408.name: Chef's Fish Stew - Fire
90408.description: For 10 min. activates Prophecy of Fire Lv. 1.  \n<Attention> Cannot be stacked with Prophecy-type buffs. Effect remains after death.

90409.name: Chef's Fish Stew - Water
90409.description: For 10 min. activates Prophecy of Water Lv. 1.  \n<Attention> Cannot be stacked with Prophecy-type buffs. Effect remains after death.

90410.name: Chef's Fish Stew - Wind
90410.description: For 10 min. activates Prophecy of Wind Lv. 1.  \n<Attention> Cannot be stacked with Prophecy-type buffs. Effect remains after death.

90411.name: Melodys Scroll Pouch
90411.description: Double-click to receive 3 Improved Scrolls of Escape, Improved Scroll of Resurrection, 2 Scrolls of Mood Melody.

90412.name: Melodys Enhance Pouch
90412.description: Double-click to receive 2 Blade Spirits, Common Life Stone, 2 Scrolls of Mood Melody.

90413.name: Melodys Rice Cake Pouch
90413.description: Double-click to receive 2 Rice Cakes of Fighting Spirit, Angel Cat's Blessing, 2 Scrolls of Mood Melody.

90414.name: Melodys Potion Pouch
90414.description: Double-click to receive 30 Major Warrior Healing Potions, 30 Warrior MP Recovery Potion, 2 Scrolls of Mood Melody.

90416.name: Melodys Growth Pouch
90416.description: Double-click to receive Hero's Dual Swords (15-day) Fishing Rod (10-day), 2160 Normal Baits, 2160 Fishing Shots, 3 Teleports: Giran Harbor, 20 Soulshot Tickets.

90417.name: Melodys Fishing Pouch
90417.description: Double-click to receive 2160 Silver Baits, Golden Mermaid's Tears (7-day), Savior's Experience Box.

90418.name: Savior's Experience Box
90418.description: Double-click to receive one of the following items: Low-grade/Mid-grade/High-grade/Top-grade XP Scroll.

90419.name: Hero's Shining Dual Sword
90419.description: 30-day item. Atk. Spd. +5%.  Enchantment, soul storing and augmenting are impossible.

90420.name: Hero's Shining Staff
90420.description: 30-day item. Casting Spd. +12%.  Enchantment, soul storing and augmenting are impossible.

90421.name: Hero's Shining Bow
90421.description: 30-day item. P. Critical +52.  Enchantment, soul storing and augmenting are impossible.

90422.name: Hero's Shining Dagger
90422.description: 30-day item. P. Critical +66.  Enchantment, soul storing and augmenting are impossible.

90423.name: Hero's Shining Spear
90423.description: 30-day item. Stun Attack Success Rate +25%.  Enchantment, soul storing and augmenting are impossible.

90437.name: Aden Warrior Hat
90437.description: Hat for a returned hero. A 60-day item. When equipped, increases P. Atk. and M. Atk. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

90445.name: Fish Stew - Vampiric Rage Lv. 2
90445.description: For 20 min. recovers as HP 7% of the physical damage inflicted on the enemy with a certain probability.

90446.name: Fish Stew - Vampiric Rage Lv. 3
90446.description: For 20 min. recovers as HP 8% of the physical damage inflicted on the enemy with a certain probability.

90450.name: Fish Stew - Berserker Spirit Lv. 1
90450.description: For 20 min. P. Def. -5%, M. Def. -10%, P. Evasion -2; P. Atk. +5%, M. Atk. +10%, Atk. Spd. +5%, Casting Spd. +5%, Speed +5.

90451.name: Fish Stew - Berserker Spirit Lv. 2
90451.description: For 20 min. P. Def. -8%, M. Def. -16%, P. Evasion -4; P. Atk. +8%, M. Atk. +16%, Atk. Spd. +8%, Casting Spd. +8%, Speed +8.

90480.name: Lucky Enchant Stone: Save Armor (D-grade)
90480.description: Enchant success rate +10% for standard armor (D-grade) when using an Enchant Scroll. Only for items enchanted between +3 and +8. For full-body armor, enchant must be between +4 and +8. The item will not be crystallized even if enchantment fails, but the enchant value will be reset to 0.

90493.name: Blessed Lucky Enchant Stone (A-grade)
90493.description: Enchant success rate +10% for armor (A-grade) when using a blessed scroll. Only for items enchanted between +3 and +8. For full-body armor, enchant must be between +4 and +8.

90494.name: Eva's Scroll: Enchant Hair Accessory
90494.description: Hair Accessory M. Def. +2. Starting from +5, an additional effect is activated and HP/MP/CP are increased. Can be safely enchanted up to +3.

90495.name: Scroll of Mood Melody
90495.description: For 20 minutes, grants the following effects: Might, Shield, Focus, Haste, Acumen, Empower, Wind Walk, Death Whisper, and Vampiric Rage. Will not be deleted upon death.

90496.name: Earth Dragon Belt
90496.description: CON +1, MEN +1, HP Recovery Bonus +2.31, Max MP Recovery Bonus +1.54, CP Recovery Bonus +3.07, Max HP/MP/CP +15%, Inventory Slots +6, Weight Gauge +7,000, Healing Potions Effect +100, Incoming Damage -6%. (Can be applied to Melisa's Recovery Potion, Warrior's Quick Healing Potion).

90497.name: Fire Dragon Belt
90497.description: STR +1, INT +1, HP Recovery Bonus +2.31, Max MP Recovery Bonus +1.54, CP Recovery Bonus +3.07, Max HP/MP/CP +10%, Inventory Slots +6, Weight Gauge +7,000, M. Critical Damage +4%, Healing Potions Effect +100. (Can be applied to Melisa's Recovery Potion, Warrior's Quick Healing Potion).

90498.name: Mysterious Jewelry Box
90498.description: Double-click to obtain Shiny Jewelry Box level 5.

90499.name: Golden Fruit Buff
90499.description: For 20 minutes, P./M. Atk. +12%, P./M. Def. +12%, Max. HP/CP/MP +15%, HP/MP Recovery Bonus +25%, P./M. Critical Rate +10, P./M. Critical Damage +5%, HP/MP Recovery +30%. At a certain chance absorbs 5% of the damage inflicted on target as HP. XP and SP gained through hunting +10%. Cooldown is 1 minute. Buff remains after death.

90500.name: Dragon's Treasure Chest
90500.description: Double-click to randomly receive a rare item such as one of Enchant Scroll.

90501.name: Dragon's Shining Treasure Chest
90501.description: Double-click to randomly receive one of the following items: Rare Belt, Lv. 5 Gem, Armor Enchant Stone, any other rare item.

90502.name: Lucky Enchant Stone: Armor (D-grade)
90502.description: Enchant success rate +10% for standard armor (D-grade) when using an Enchant Scroll. Only for items enchanted between +3 and +8. For full-body armor, enchant must be between +4 and +8. Can be stored in private warehouse.

90503.name: Lucky Enchant Stone: Armor (C-grade)
90503.description: Enchant success rate +10% for standard armor (C-grade) when using an Enchant Scroll. Only for items enchanted between +3 and +8. For full-body armor, enchant must be between +4 and +8. Can be stored in private warehouse.

90504.name: Lucky Enchant Stone: Armor (B-grade)
90504.description: Enchant success rate +10% for standard armor (B-grade) when using an Enchant Scroll. Only for items enchanted between +3 and +8. For full-body armor, enchant must be between +4 and +8. Can be stored in private warehouse.

90505.name: Lucky Enchant Stone: Armor (A-grade)
90505.description: Enchant success rate +10% for standard armor (A-grade) when using an Enchant Scroll. Only for items enchanted between +3 and +8. For full-body armor, enchant must be between +4 and +8. Can be stored in private warehouse.

90506.name: Valuable Mark of Balthus Knights
90506.description: XP/SP gain ++20% and a chance to get Special Supplies for 2 hour. Intended for Lv. 20 and higher.

90507.name: Dragon's Balthus Chest
90507.description: Double-click to receive 30 Dragon's Treasure Chests that can contain random rare accessories or various Enchant Scrolls.

90508.name: Golden Fruit Buff
90508.description: For 20 minutes, P./M. Atk. +12%, P./M. Def. +15%, Max. HP/CP/MP +25%, P./M. Critical Rate +10, P./M. Critical Damage +5%, HP/MP Recovery +30%. At a certain chance absorbs 5% of the damage inflicted on target as HP. XP and SP gained through hunting +10%. Cooldown is 1 minute. Buff remains after death. Can be stored in private warehouse.

90509.name: Dragon’s Gold Key
90509.description: Take 1 Gold Key and 15 Melissa's Recovery Potions to the Dimensional Merchant to exchange them for Shining Dragon's Treasure Chest.  The item will be removed after the event is over on Jule 6, 2016.

90510.name: Talisman of Border Pack +5
90510.description: Double-click to obtain Talisman of Border - Lv. 5. \n\nNote: cannot be returned once opened.

90511.name: Talisman of Border Pack +6
90511.description: Double-click to obtain Talisman of Border - Lv. 6. \n\nNote: cannot be returned once opened.

90512.name: Talisman of Border Pack +7
90512.description: Double-click to obtain Talisman of Border - Lv. 7. \n\nNote: cannot be returned once opened.

90513.name: Talisman of Border Pack Lv. 8
90513.description: Double-click to obtain Talisman of Border - Lv. 8. \n\nNote: cannot be returned once opened.

90514.name: Talisman of Border Pack Lv. 9
90514.description: Double-click to obtain Talisman of Border - Lv. 9. \n\nNote: cannot be returned once opened.

90515.name: Talisman of Border Pack Lv. 10
90515.description: Double-click to obtain Talisman of Border - Lv. 10. \n\nNote: cannot be returned once opened.

90516.name: Lesser GM's Blessing Chest
90516.description: Double-click to receive one of the following items: Dandy's Home Run Ball, Angel Cat's Blessing, Sayha's Holy Water, Soulshot Ticket, Warrior's Major Healing Potion.

90517.name: Greater GM's Blessing Chest
90517.description: Double-click to receive one of the following items: Spellbook Box - 3rd Class Transfer, Magic Tablet, Spellbook Box, Common Life Stone, Scroll of Mood Melody.

90518.name: Greatest GM's Blessing Chest
90518.description: Double-click to receive one of the following items: Refined Rare Accessory Pack (30-day), Rare Accessory Pack (15-day), Unidentified Stone, Dandy's Shining Pendant (7-day), Dandy's Shining Pendant (1-day), Dandy's Pendant (7-day), Dandy's Pendant (1-day).

90519.name: Shining Scroll of Mood Melody
90519.description: For 20 minutes activates the following effects: Might, Shield, Haste, Empower, Acumen, Wind Walk, Vampiric Rage, Berserker Spirit, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Purity, Wild Magic, Concentration. Cannot be used together with Scroll of Mood Melody. This effect will not be removed after death.

90520.name: Fire Dragon's Blessing Scroll
90520.description: For 20 minutes.\n\nBlessing Of Fire Dragon: Buff/ debuff effects remain after death, but Blessing of Fire Dragon is consumed.

90521.name: Golden Fishing Rod Pouch
90521.description: Double-click to obtain 180 Golden Bait, 180 Fishing Shots.

90522.name: Golden Treasure Chest
90522.description: Double-click on the Golden Treasure Chest to obtain one of its treasures.

90523.name: Shining Fishing kit Lv. 1
90523.description: Double-click to obtain 2 Golden Mermaid's Fishing Rod Packs (30-day), 25920 Silver Bait, 20 Einhasad's Protections, 1 Talisman of Baium Pack (30-day), and 1 Shining Jewel Box (30-day).

90524.name: Lucky Enchant Stone Chest - A-grade
90524.description: Double-click to randomly receive one of the following items: Lucky Enchant Stone: Armor (A-grade), Lucky Enchant Stone: Save Armor (A-grade), Lucky Enchant Stone: Protect Armor (A-grade).

90525.name: Lucky Enchant Stone Chest - B-grade
90525.description: Double-click to randomly receive one of the following items: Lucky Enchant Stone: Armor (B-grade), Lucky Enchant Stone: Save Armor (B-grade), Lucky Enchant Stone: Protect Armor (B-grade).

90526.name: Talisman of Baium Box
90526.description: Double-click to obtain a Talisman of Baium Pack (30-day).

90527.name: Talisman of Baium
90527.description: A 30-day item. P. Atk. +284, M. Atk. +392, Magic Attack Resistance +10%, Skill Power +5%, all kinds of Weapon Resistance +5%, CON +1, MEN +1, STR +1, INT +1, DEX +1, WIT +1. P./ M. Critical Rate +20. MP Consumption for skill use -5%. Skill Reuse Time -3%. Available only for Lv. 60 and higher. Effects from two such Talismans do not stack.

90528.name: Shining Jewel Box
90528.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Jade Lv. 5 (30-day), 1 Vital Stone Lv. 5 (30-day), and 1 Garnet Lv. 5 (30-day).

90529.name: Jade Lv. 5
90529.description: 30-day item. Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +14%, when equipped. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90530.name: Vital Stone Lv. 5
90530.description: A 30-day item. XP/SP gain +15% and Sayha's Grace Consumption Rate -30% while hunting during Sayha's Grace effect. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90531.name: Garnet Lv. 5
90531.description: 30-day item. Stun/Pulling/Silence/Paralysis/Fear Resistance +20% when equipped. Invincibility with Debuff effective for 15 sec when skill is used. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90532.name: Refined Rare Accessory Pack
90532.description: Double-click to randomly receive one of the following items: Refined Queen Ant's Ring, Refined Orfen's Earring, Refined Ring of Core, Refined Baium's Ring.

90533.name: Rare Accessory Box
90533.description: Double-click to randomly receive one of the following items: Queen Ant's Ring, Orfen's Earring, Ring of Core, Baium's Ring.
