90727.name: Banana Sweets
90727.description: Banana Moon Cake Party Herb. For 5 min., XP and SP gained through hunting +50%, P. Atk. +15%, M. Atk. + 23%, P./M. Def. +15%, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +10%, Speed +10, Sayha Grace Consumption -30% while hunting. Deleted upon logout.

90728.name: Fresh Monkey Bait
90728.description: Fish using this bait to catch Tuna, with an additional small chance to get Flower Sweets and Pumpkin Sweets.

90729.name: Flower Sweets
90729.description: For 20 minutes Max HP/MP +5%, XP and SP gained through hunting +20%.  \n<Note>When used simultaneously with Life Control Tower's Scroll of Blessing, effects do not stack. If Angel Cat's Blessing is used at the same time, only Flower Sweets will produce an effect.

90730.name: Pumpkin Sweets
90730.description: For 20 minutes, P./M. Atk. +12%, P./M. Def. +15%, Max. HP/CP/MP +25%, P./M. Crit. Rate +10, P./M. Critical Damage +5%, HP/MP Recovery +30%. At a certain chance absorbs 5% of the damage inflicted on target as HP. \n<Note>When used simultaneously with Special Fruit Buff or Special Dragon's Fruit, effects do not stack.

90731.name: Hanbok
90731.description: Changes armor appearance to that of a Hanbok. When equipped, armor is removed and cannot be used. Hair accessories, weapons, and magic armor are not removed. Can use Rally Dreamland and First Moon Firecracker.

90733.name: Eigis Ein Orders
90733.description: Orders received from Eigis Ein of the Warrior Guild of Giran. Meet Agent of the Devil's Isle Fethin in Giran Harbor, and he will tell you your next task.

90734.name: Spiteful Soul Skull
90734.description: Skull found while exploring the Heap of Bones of the Devil's Isle. Take it, along with other remains, to Pirate Spirit who can be found near the entrance to the Devil's Isle.

90735.name: Spiteful Soul Rib Bone
90735.description: Rib Bone found while exploring the Heap of Bones of the Devil's Isle. Take it, along with other remains, to Pirate Spirit who can be found near the entrance to the Devil's Isle.

90736.name: Spiteful Soul Arm Bone
90736.description: Arm Bone found while exploring the Heap of Bones of the Devil's Isle. Take it, along with other remains, to Pirate Spirit who can be found near the entrance to the Devil's Isle.

90737.name: Spiteful Soul Thigh Bone
90737.description: Thigh Bone found while exploring the Heap of Bones of the Devil's Isle. Take it, along with other remains, to Pirate Spirit who can be found near the entrance to the Devil's Isle.

90738.name: Vengeful Spirit's Note
90738.description: Letter, shrouded in the mystery of the Devil's Isle. It was given to you by Pirate Spirit as his thanks for gathering all what's left of his mortal body. Take the letter to Nikia, an Agent of the Devil's Isle. You can find him at the entrance to the Devil's Isle.

90739.name: Vengeful Spirit's Note
90739.description: Letter, shrouded in the mystery of the Devil's Isle. It was given to you by Pirate Spirit as his thanks for gathering all what's left of his mortal body. Take the letter to Eigis Ein of the Warrior Guild of Giran.

90740.name: Eigis Ein Orders
90740.description: Orders of Eigis Ein. Take it to Nikia, an Agent of the Devil's Isle. You can find him at the entrance to the Devil's Isle.

90741.name: Eigis Ein Orders
90741.description: Orders of Eigis Ein. Take it to Garom, an Agent of the Devil's Isle. You can find him at the entrance to the Devil's Isle.

90742.name: Sombrie's Proof
90742.description: Proof of Sombrie, Zaken's Minion that you have met on the Devil's Isle. Take it, along with other Subordinates' proofs, to Agent of Devil's Isle Garom.

90743.name: Lithus Token
90743.description: Proof of Rissuos, Zaken's Minion that you have met on the Devil's Isle. Take it, along with other Subordinates' proofs, to Agent of the Devil's Isle Garom.

90744.name: Gallu's Proof
90744.description: Proof of Gallu, Zaken's Minion that you have met on the Devil's Isle. Take it, along with other Subordinates' proofs, to Agent of the Devil's Isle Garom.

90745.name: Kukoni Token
90745.description: Proof of Kukoni, Zaken's Minion that you have met on the Devil's Isle. Take it, along with other Subordinates' proofs, to Agent of the Devil's Isle Garom.

90746.name: Zaken's Relic
90746.description: A Chest with Zaken's Relic received for your help to Zaken's Minions that you have met on the Devil's Isle. It might prove to be useful to Agent of the Devil's Isle Garom. Go to him.

90747.name: Zaken's Relic - original
90747.description: The true Zaken's Relic received from Zaken's Minions. It might shed some light on the mystery of his whereabouts.

90748.name: Zaken's Relic - imitation
90748.description: A false Zaken's Relic received from Zaken's Minions. It won't shed any light on the mystery of his whereabouts, but it might prove to be useful for something else.

90749.name: Unfinished Zaken Tracking Device
90749.description: Zaken Tracking Device. Doesn't work. To understand the cause, take it Eigis Ein at the Warrior Guild of Giran.

90750.name: Vanor Silenos Totem
90750.description: A Totem obtained after slaying Vanor Silenos on the Plains of Glory. Take it to Magister Kaiena of Dark Elf Guild of the Ivory Tower.

90751.name: Monster Blood
90751.description: Blood obtained after slaying monsters on the War-Torn Plains. Take it to Magister Kaiena of Dark Elf Guild of the Ivory Tower.

90752.name: Zaken Tracking Device
90752.description: Finished Zaken Tracking Device. Take it to Eigis Ein of the Warrior Guild of Giran.

90753.name: Zaken Tracking Device
90753.description: Zaken Tracking Device. Take it and kill Zaken.

90754.name: Zaken's Blood
90754.description: Blood obtained after killing the Pirate King Zaken. Take it to Eigis Ein of the Warrior Guild of Giran.

90755.name: Pirate's Treasure Map Piece
90755.description: A piece of map obtained from killed pirates of the Devil's Isle. It's quite possible that pieces like this form a whole map. Collect 25 of such pieces and take them to Agent of the Devil's Isle Garom to get a complete Pirate Map.

90756.name: Pirate's Treasure Map
90756.description: A Treasure Map that leads into the depths of the Devil's Isle. Double-click to view.

90757.name: Map with a Mark
90757.description: This Map marks the place on the Devil's Isle where treasures are hidden.

90758.name: Pirate Potion
90758.description: A Potion that cheered up Pirates on long voyages. Fuddles the mind. Bring it to Zaken's Minion Sombrie.

90759.name: Pirate Steak
90759.description: Steaks that Pirates carried around with them. It might serve as a long-awaited meal for someone. Bring Steaks to Zaken's Minion Rissuos.

90760.name: Energy of Frost
90760.description: An item that emits icy energy. Collected from the killed Pirates who were put under an excruciating curse. Bring it to Zaken's Minion Gallu.

90761.name: Pirate Skull
90761.description: A Skull obtained after the death of a Pirate. It's not yet clear how it might be useful, but bring it to Zaken's Minion Kukoni still.

90762.name: Pirate's Treasure Chest
90762.description: Pirate's Treasure Chest received as a reward for helping Zaken's Subordinates who you met on the Devil's Isle.

90763.name: Zaken's Earring
90763.description: MP +22, Bleed Attack and Resistance +10%, Stun/MEN Attack and Resistance +5%, Heal Received +4%, HP Recovery+10%, Skill MP Consumption -2%. When two identical earrings are equipped, the effect of only one earring will be applied. Cannot be enchanted.

90764.name: Reinforced Zaken's Earring
90764.description: MP +28, Bleed Attack and Resistance +15%, Stun/MEN Attack and Resistance +10%, Heal Received +6%, HP Recovery+15%, Skill MP Consumption -3%. When two identical earrings are equipped, the effect of only one earring will be applied. Cannot be enchanted.

90765.name: Enhanced Zaken's Earring
90765.description: MP +34, Bleed Attack and Resistance +20%, Stun/MEN Attack and Resistance +15%, Heal Received +10%, HP Recovery +20%, Vampiric Rage +8%, Skill MP Consumption -4%. When two identical earrings are equipped, the effect of only one earring will be applied. Cannot be enchanted. Give 2 Refined Zaken's Earrings to Beggins to obtain Zaken Essence.

90766.name: Scroll of Escape: Entrance to the Devil's Isle
90766.description: A scroll that relocates you to the entrance to the Devil's Isle.

90767.name: Zaken's Earring
90767.description: A 7-day item. MP +22, Bleed Attack and Resistance +10%, Stun/MEN Attack and Resistance +5%, Heal Received +4%, HP Recovery +10%, Skill MP Consumption -2%. When two identical earrings are equipped, the effect of only one earring will be applied. Cannot be enchanted.

90768.name: Hair Accessory Coupon
90768.description: A Coupon for a clan's Hair Accessory. Can be exchanged for an animal-shaped Hair Accessory at High Priest Orven's.

90769.name: Teddy Bear Hat
90769.description: Fun, bear-shaped hair accessory. Can teleport to the Clan Hall. (Cooldown: 1 hour) Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

90770.name: Piggy Hat
90770.description: Fun, pig-shaped hair accessory. Can teleport to the Clan Hall. (Cooldown: 1 hour) Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

90771.name: Frog Hat
90771.description: Fun, frog-shaped hair accessory. Can teleport to the Clan Hall. (Cooldown: 1 hour) Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

90772.name: Fish Hat
90772.description: Fun, fish-shaped hair accessory. Can teleport to the Clan Hall. (Cooldown: 1 hour) Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

90773.name: Chicken Hat
90773.description: Fun, chicken-shaped hair accessory. Can teleport to the Clan Hall. (Cooldown: 1 hour) Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

90775.name: Talisman of Border - Lv. 3
90775.description: A 7-day item. P./M. Def. +17, P./M. Evasion +1, HP/MP/CP +80, Movement Speed +3, XP and SP gain +3%. When two or more Talismans of identical effects are equipped, the effect of only one Talisman will be applied.

90776.name: Fire Dragon Pendant +4
90776.description: M. Def. +14. Increases XP and SP gain by +2%.

90777.name: Talisman of Border - Lv. 4
90777.description: A 7-day item. P./M. Def. +19, P./M. Evasion +1, HP/MP/CP +80, Movement Speed +3, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +7, XP and SP gain +3%. When two or more Talismans of identical effects are equipped, the effect of only one Talisman will be applied.

90778.name: Fire Dragon Pendant +5
90778.description: M. Def. +15, XP/SP gain +5%, P./M. Atk. +10.

90779.name: Talisman of Border - Lv. 5
90779.description: A 7-day item. P./M. Def. +22, P./M. Evasion +1, HP/MP/CP +120, Movement Speed +5, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +10, XP and SP gain +4%. When two or more Talismans of identical effects are equipped, the effect of only one Talisman will be applied.

90780.name: Fire Dragon Pendant +6
90780.description: M. Def. +16, XP/SP gain +10%, P./M. Atk. +20.

90781.name: Talisman of Border - Lv. 6
90781.description: A 7-day item. P./M. Def. +24, P./M. Evasion +2, HP/MP/CP +160, Movement Speed +5, P./M. Atk. Spd. +15, XP and SP gain +4%. Allows using Border Purification (cancels Paralysis, Petrification, Poisoning, and Bleeding). When two or more Talismans of identical effects are equipped, the effect of only one Talisman will be applied.

90782.name: Fire Dragon Pendant +7
90782.description: M. Def. +17, XP/SP gain +20%, P./M. Atk. +30.

90783.name: Talisman of Border - Lv. 7
90783.description: A 7-day item. P./M. Def. +29, P./M. Evasion +2, HP/MP/CP +160, Movement Speed +7, P./M. Atk. Spd. +15, XP and SP gain +5%. Applies Power of Border - Lv. 1 (has a chance to increase attack abilities) and enables Border Purification (cancels Paralysis, Petrification, Poisoning, and Bleeding). When two or more Talismans of identical effects are equipped, the effect of only one Talisman will be applied.

90784.name: Lv. 4 Vital Stone
90784.description: A 15-day item. XP/SP gain +8% and Sayha's Grace Consumption Rate -10% while hunting during Sayha's Grace effect. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90785.name: Diamond - Lv. 4
90785.description: 15-day item. P. Def. +81, Received P. Critical Damage -4%, when equipped. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90786.name: Pearl - Lv. 4
90786.description: 30-day item. M. Def. +46, Received M. Critical Damage -4%, when equipped. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90787.name: Lv. 4 Jade
90787.description: 15-day item. Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +7%, when equipped. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90788.name: Fire Dragon's Belt
90788.description: 7-day item. STR +1, INT +1, HP Recovery Bonus +2.31, Max MP Recovery +1.54, CP Recovery +3.07, Max HP/MP/CP +10%, Inventory Slot 6, Weight Gauge +7,000, M. Critical Damage +4%, Healing Potions Effect +100. (Can be applied to Melisa's High-grade Recovery Potion, Melisa's Recovery Potion, Warrior's Quick Healing Potion).

90789.name: Garnet - Lv. 4
90789.description: 15-day item. Stun/ Pulling/ Silence/ Petrification/ Fear Resistance +11%, when equipped. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90790.name: Fire Dragon Pendant +8
90790.description: M. Def. +18, XP and SP gain +25%, P./M. Atk. +40, P./M. Critical Damage +5%.

90791.name: Talisman of Border - Lv. 8
90791.description: A 7-day item. P./M. Def. +34, P./M. Evasion +2, HP/MP/CP +200, Movement Speed +7, P./M. Atk. Spd. +15, XP and SP gain +5%. Applies Power of Border - Lv. 2 (has a chance to increase attack abilities) and enables Border Purification (cancels Paralysis, Petrification, Poisoning, and Bleeding). When two or more Talismans of identical effects are equipped, the effect of only one Talisman will be applied.

90792.name: Topaz - Lv. 4
90792.description: 15-day item. Disrupts the target's skill casting when used. Inflicts 1357 damage in PvP. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90793.name: Chef's Fish Stew Box
90793.description: Double-click to receive one of each of the following items: Chef's Fish Stew - Victory/Fire/Wind/Water.

90794.name: Shining Scroll of Mood Melody
90794.description: For 20 minutes activates the following effects: Might, Shield, Haste, Empower, Acumen, Wind Walk, Vampiric Rage, Berserker Spirit, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Purity, Wild Magic, Concentration. Cannot be used together with Scroll of Mood Melody.

90795.name: Zaken's Earring Box
90795.description: Double-click to receive one Zaken's Earring (7-day).

90796.name: Fire Dragon Pendant Chest +3
90796.description: Double-click to receive one Fire Dragon Pendant +3 (7-day).

90797.name: Talisman of Border Pack +3
90797.description: Double-click to receive one Talisman of Border - Lv. 3 (7-day).

90798.name: Fire Dragon Pendant Chest +4
90798.description: Double-click to receive one Fire Dragon Pendant +4 (7-day).

90799.name: Talisman of Border Pack +4
90799.description: Double-click to receive one Talisman of Border - Lv. 4 (7-day).

90800.name: Fire Dragon Pendant Chest +5
90800.description: Double-click to receive one Fire Dragon Pendant +5 (7-day).

90801.name: Talisman of Border Pack +5
90801.description: Double-click to receive one Talisman of Border - Lv. 5 (7-day).

90802.name: Fire Dragon Pendant Chest +6
90802.description: Double-click to receive one Fire Dragon Pendant +6 (7-day).

90803.name: Talisman of Border Pack +6
90803.description: Double-click to receive one Talisman of Border - Lv. 6 (7-day).

90804.name: Fire Dragon Pendant Chest +7
90804.description: Double-click to receive one Fire Dragon Pendant +7 (7-day).

90805.name: Talisman of Border Pack +7
90805.description: Double-click to receive one Talisman of Border - Lv. 7 (7-day).

90806.name: Lv. 4 Vital Stone Chest
90806.description: Double-click to receive one Vital Stone - Lv. 4 (15-day).

90807.name: Lv. 4 Diamond Chest
90807.description: Double-click to receive one Diamond - Lv. 4 (15-day).

90808.name: Lv. 4 Pearl Box
90808.description: Double-click to receive one Pearl - Lv. 4 (15-day).

90809.name: Lv. 4 Jade Chest
90809.description: Double-click to receive one Jade - Lv. 4 (15-day).

90810.name: Fire Dragon Belt Chest
90810.description: Double-click to receive one Fire Dragon Belt (7-day).

90811.name: Lv. 4 Garnet Box
90811.description: Double-click to receive one Garnet - Lv. 4 (15-day).

90812.name: Fire Dragon Pendant Chest +8
90812.description: Double-click to receive one Fire Dragon Pendant +8 (7-day).

90813.name: Talisman of Border Pack Lv. 8
90813.description: Double-click to receive one Talisman of Border - Lv. 8 (7-day).

90814.name: Lv. 4 Topaz Chest
90814.description: Double-click to receive one Topaz - Lv. 4 (15-day).

90815.name: Pirate's Treasure Chest Key
90815.description: A Key that can open Pirate's Treasure Chest. Covered in a thick layer of rust, might break at any moment.

90816.name: Cube of Forgotten Island
90816.description: A 15-day item. Double-click to get Grace Rice Cake (available only once a day).

90818.name: Refined Zaken's Earring
90818.description: A 7-day item. MP +34, Bleed Attack and Resistance +20%, Stun/MEN Attack and Resistance +15%, Heal Received +10%, HP Recovery +20%, Vampiric Rage +8%, Skill MP Consumption -4%. When two identical earrings are equipped, the effect of only one earring will be applied. Cannot be enchanted.

90819.name: Refined Zaken's Earring
90819.description: A 15-day item. MP +34, Bleed Attack and Resistance +20%, Stun/MEN Attack and Resistance +15%, Heal Received +10%, HP Recovery +20%. Vampiric Rage Effect +8%, Skill MP Consumption -4%. When two identical earrings are equipped, the effect of only one earring will be applied. Cannot be enchanted.

90820.name: Refined Zaken's Earring
90820.description: A 30-day item. MP +34, Bleed Attack and Resistance +20%, Stun/MEN Attack and Resistance +15%, Heal Received +10%, HP Recovery +20%, Vampiric Rage +8%, Skill MP Consumption -4%. When two identical earrings are equipped, the effect of only one earring will be applied. Cannot be enchanted.

90821.name: My Teleport Book - 1 slot
90821.description: A dimensional item\n Increases the number of return points to save by 1. The maximum number is 18.

90822.name: Sealed Doll of Border - Baium
90822.description: Double-click to obtain Doll of Border - Baium (30-day). Can be upgraded to Lv. 1 or 2 through Veruti in the Town of Giran.

90823.name: Sealed Doll of Border - Queen Ant
90823.description: Double-click to obtain Doll of Border - Queen Ant (30-day). Can be upgraded to Lv. 1 or 2 through Veruti in the Town of Giran.

90824.name: Sealed Doll of Border - Orfen
90824.description: Double-click to obtain Doll of Border - Orfen (30-day). Can be upgraded to Lv. 1 or 2 through Veruti in the Town of Giran.

90825.name: Doll of Border - Baium
90825.description:
A 30-day item. Boosts abilities with the Baium Doll's Spell if stored in the inventory. 

<Baium Doll's Spell>
MEN Resistance +40%, Paralysis/Knock Down/Pull Resistance +20%, P./M. Def. +12%, Skill Cooldown -3%

90826.name: Sealed Doll of Border - Queen Ant
90826.description:
A 30-day item. Boosts abilities with Queen Ant Doll's Spell if stored in the inventory. 

<Queen Ant Doll's Spell>
P. Atk./P. Critical Damage +8%, Max HP +12%.

90827.name: Doll of Border - Orfen
90827.description:
A 30-day item. Boosts abilities with Orfen Doll's Spell if stored in the inventory. 

<Orfen Doll's Spell>
M. Atk./M. Critical Damage +8%, Max MP +12%.

90828.name: Transformation Scroll: Dark Knight Lv. 3
90828.description: Transforms into a Dark Knight for 15 minutes. Will not be deleted upon death. \nTransformation into a Dark Knight: Max HP/MP +10%, P. Atk. in PvP +10%, P. Def. in PvP +10%, Stun/Paralysis/Mental Resistance +10%.

90829.name: Transformation Scroll: Dark Knight Lv. 2
90829.description: Transforms into a Dark Knight for 15 minutes. Will not be deleted upon death. \nTransformation into a Dark Knight: Max HP/MP  +10%, P. Atk. in PvP +7%, P. Def. in PvP +7%, Stun/Paralysis/Mental Resistance +7%.

90830.name: Transformation Scroll: Dark Knight Lv. 1
90830.description: Transforms into a Dark Knight for 15 minutes. Will not be deleted upon death. \nTransformation into a Dark Knight: Max HP/MP +10%, P. Atk. in PvP +5%, P. Def. in PvP +5%, Stun/Paralysis/Mental Resistance +5%.

90831.name: Transformation Scroll: White Assassin
90831.description: For 15 minutes transforms you into White Assassin. Will not be deleted upon death. \nTransformation into White Assassin: Max HP/MP +7%, P./M. Accuracy +2, P./M. Atk. +3%, P./M. Def. +3%, Atk. Spd. +5%, M. Critical Rate +20, Speed +5.

90832.name: Glorious Amulet
90832.description: A 7-day item. When in inventory, you get STR +1, DEX +1, CON ++1, INT +1, WIT +1, MEN +1.

90833.name: Agathion Bracelet - Joy
90833.description:
A 7-day item. Enables to summon Agathion of Joy when equipped.

<Skill used>
1. Agathion's Escape: Allows to relocate to Giran, Gludio, Dion, Oren, Hunters Village. (Cooldown: 1 min)

<Item Skill>
1. Search for Evidence: Speed +66 for 15 sec. 

<Item Skill>
2. Hidden Search: monsters don't attack first.

90834.name: Warrior Experience Amulet
90834.description: 7-day item. Increases XP and SP gain by +50%.

90835.name: Life Control Tower's Scroll of Blessing
90835.description: Max HP/MP +5%, Hunting XP/SP Gain +30%, and grants MEN Attack/Paralysis Resistance for 60 minutes. Cooldown is 30 minutes.\n<Note> The effect does not stack with Angel Cat's Blessing.

90836.name: Warrior Experience Amulet
90836.description: 7-day item. Increases XP and SP gain by +20%.

90837.name: White Uniform Hat <STR+1 INT+1>
90837.description: White uniform hat that makes you feel the energy of a man of the sea. STR+1, INT+1. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots. Cannot be dropped or sold in a store.

90838.name: White Uniform Hat <DEX+1 WIT+1>
90838.description: White uniform hat that makes you feel the energy of a man of the sea. DEX+1, WIT+1. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots. Cannot be dropped or sold in a store.

90839.name: White Uniform Hat <CON+1 MEN+1>
90839.description: White uniform hat that makes you feel the energy of a man of the sea. CON+1, MEN+1. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots. Cannot be dropped or sold in a store.

90840.name: Napoleon Hat <STR+1 INT+1>
90840.description: A Napoleon Hat bursting with enough energy to conquer the world. STR+1, INT+1. Cannot be dropped or sold in a store.

90841.name: Napoleon Hat <DEX+1 WIT+1>
90841.description: A Napoleon Hat bursting with enough energy to conquer the world. DEX+1, WIT+1. Cannot be dropped or sold in a store.

90842.name: Napoleon Hat <CON+1 MEN+1>
90842.description: A Napoleon Hat bursting with enough energy to conquer the world. CON+1, MEN+1. Cannot be dropped or sold in a store.

90843.name: Ninja Hair Accessory <STR+1 INT+1>
90843.description: Ninja Hair Accessory. Mask form. STR+1, INT+1. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots. Cannot be dropped or sold in a store.

90844.name: Ninja Hair Accessory <DEX+1 WIT+1>
90844.description: Ninja Hair Accessory. Mask form. DEX+1, WIT+1. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots. Cannot be dropped or sold in a store.

90845.name: Ninja Hair Accessory <CON+1 MEN+1>
90845.description: Ninja Hair Accessory. Mask form. CON+1, MEN+1. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots. Cannot be dropped or sold in a store.

90846.name: Warrior's Helmet <STR+1 INT+1>
90846.description: Helmet of a brave ancient warrior. STR+1, INT+1. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots. Cannot be dropped or sold in a store.

90847.name: Warrior's Helmet <DEX+1 WIT+1>
90847.description: Helmet of a brave ancient warrior. DEX+1, WIT+1. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots. Cannot be dropped or sold in a store.

90848.name: Warrior's Helmet <CON+1 MEN+1>
90848.description: Helmet of a brave ancient warrior. CON+1, MEN+1. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots. Cannot be dropped or sold in a store.

90849.name: First Mate Hat <STR+1 INT+1>
90849.description: First Mate Hat. STR+1, INT+1. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots. Cannot be dropped or sold in a store.

90850.name: First Mate Hat <DEX+1 WIT+1>
90850.description: First Mate Hat. DEX+1, WIT+1. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots. Cannot be dropped or sold in a store.

90851.name: First Mate Hat <CON+1 MEN+1>
90851.description: First Mate Hat. CON+1, MEN+1. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots. Cannot be dropped or sold in a store.

90852.name: Artisan's Goggles <STR+1 INT+1>
90852.description: Large goggles that protect the eyes. STR+1, INT+1. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots. Cannot be dropped or sold in a store.

90853.name: Artisan's Goggles <DEX+1 WIT+1>
90853.description: Large goggles that protect the eyes. DEX+1, WIT+1. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots. Cannot be dropped or sold in a store.

90854.name: Artisan's Goggles <CON+1 MEN+1>
90854.description: Large goggles that protect the eyes. CON+1, MEN+1. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots. Cannot be dropped or sold in a store.

90855.name: Stabilized Eva's Scroll: Enchant Hair Accessory
90855.description: Hair Accessory M./ P. Def. +2. Starting from +5, additional special effects are activated and HP/MP/CP are increased. Can be safely enchanted up to +3.  From +6, enchantment level stays the same in case of failed enchantment.

90856.name: Eva's Life Stone - Hair Accessory
90856.description: Bring it to Augmenting Blacksmiths Jeris and Jeros in Giran or Aden, to use it for augmentation.\n\nAugmentation requires C-grade Gemstones (30 pcs.).

90857.name: Shiny Eva's Life Stone - Hair Accessory
90857.description: Bring it to Augmenting Blacksmiths Jeris and Jeros in Giran or Aden, to use it for augmentation.\n\nAugmentation requires C-grade Gemstones (100 pcs.).

90858.name: Eva's Enhancement Pack - Hair Accessory
90858.description: Double-click to obtain one of the following items: 2 Scrolls: Enchant Hair Accessory, 1 High-grade Scroll: Enchant Hair Accessory, 1 Life Stone: Hair Accessory, 1 Life Stone: Giant's Hair Accessory.

90859.name: Eva's Hair Accessory Pack
90859.description: Double-click to obtain one of the following items: White Uniform Hat, Napoleon Hat, Ninja Hair Accessory, Warrior's Helmet, First Mate Hat, Artisan's Goggles.

90860.name: Lucky Hat
90860.description: A 30-day item. Leather hat. Allows to use Blessing of Luck skill. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

90861.name: Valakas' Belt
90861.description: 30-day item. STR +1, INT +1, HP Recovery Bonus +2.31, Max MP Recovery +1.54, CP Recovery +3.07, Max HP/MP/CP +10%, Inventory Slots 6, Weight Gauge +7,000, Heal/M. Critical Damage +4%, Healing Potions Effect +100. (Can be applied to Melisa's High-grade Recovery Potion, Melisa's Recovery Potion, Warrior's Quick Healing Potion).

90862.name: Brooch Lv. 2
90862.description: A 30-day item. Occupies 3 Hair Accessory slots.

90863.name: Diamond Lv. 3
90863.description: A 30-day item. Физ. Защ. +50. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90864.name: Pearl Lv. 3
90864.description: A 30-day item. Маг. Защ. +28. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90865.name: Jade Lv. 3
90865.description: A 30-day item. Casting Spd./ Atk. Spd. +4%. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90866.name: Master's Skill Book
90866.description: Take it to the Excalibur Expeditionary Force Leader to learn all skills for your level and class. Only for level 76 to level 80 characters.

90869.name: Savior’s Bow
90869.description: A 120-day item.\n<Soul Crystal Enhancement>\nP. Critical Damage +52.

90870.name: Savior’s Dagger
90870.description: A 120-day item.\n<Soul Crystal Enhancement>\nP. Critical Damage +66.

90871.name: Savior's Spear
90871.description: A 120-day item.\n<Soul Crystal Enhancement>\nHas about a 25% chance to stun the target during a Critical Attack.

90872.name: Piece of Wood
90872.description: Give it to Bliss to receive a woodpile. Will be deleted during maintenance on Wednesday, December 7th, 2016.

90874.name: Sayha's Storm Lv. 2
90874.description: Sayha's Grace Consumption +100%, XP/SP gain +150% while hunting monsters. Remains active after death. Duration and Cooldown are both 10 minutes. Available when more than one slot of the Sayha’s Grace gauge is filled. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

90875.name: Sayha's Storm Lv. 2
90875.description: For 10 min. Sayha Grace points +100%, XP/SP gain +150%. Cooldown: 10 minutes. This effect remains even after character's death. Available when more than one slot of the bar of Sayha’s Grace points is filled. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

90876.name: Sayha Grace Box
90876.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Sayha's Blessing Box and 1 Sayha's Storm Lv. 1. If you're lucky, you can also get a Sayha's Golden Treasure or a Sayha's Silver Treasure.

90878.name: Sayha's Silver Treasure
90878.description: Double-click to randomly obtain 1 of the following: Rare Accessory, Enchant Scroll, A/B-grade Item Box or Sayha's Golden/Silver Blessing.

90879.name: Sayha Grace Maintaining Potion
90879.description: For 10 min. activates Sayha Grace effect. Cooldown: 10 min.

90880.name: Sayha's XP Amulet Box
90880.description: Double-click to obtain Sayha's XP Amulet (10 days).

90881.name: Sayha's XP Amulet
90881.description: A 10-day item. When in inventory, XP/SP gain +20%, Sayha Grace points -10%.

90882.name: Stable Eva's Enhancement Scroll: Hair Accessories (Low Grade)
90882.description: Increases M. Def of hair accessory by 2. Upon enchantment, additional effect and HP/MP/CP increases starting from +5. Can be safely enchanted up to +5.

90883.name: Talisman of Border - Lv. 10
90883.description: A 7-day item. P./M. Def. +43, P./M. Evasion +2, HP/MP/CP +280, Movement Speed +8, P./M. Atk. Spd. +20, XP and SP gain +5%, Damage Reflection +6% when equipped. Applies Power of Border - Lv. 3 (has a chance to increase attack abilities) and enables Border Purification (cancels Paralysis, Petrification, Poisoning, and Bleeding). When two or more Talismans of identical effects are equipped, the effect of only one Talisman will be applied.

90884.name: Talisman of Border - Lv. 10
90884.description: A 1-day item. P./M. Def. +43, P./M. Evasion +2, HP/MP/CP +280, Movement Speed +8, P./M. Atk. Spd. +20, XP and SP gain +5%, Damage Reflection +6% when equipped. Applies Power of Border - Lv. 3 (has a chance to increase attack abilities) and enables Border Purification (cancels Paralysis, Petrification, Poisoning, and Bleeding). When two or more Talismans of identical effects are equipped, the effect of only one Talisman will be applied.

90885.name: Agathion Bracelet - Singer & Dancer
90885.description:
A 30-day item. When worn, 2 Agathion slots are activated. 
<Active Skill>
1. Dance of Fury: Atk. Spd. +5% for 20 minutes.

2. Dance of Concentration: Casting Spd. +5% for 20 minutes.

3. Song of Wind: Speed +20 for 5 minutes. Cooldown: 10 min.

<Note>
Dance of Fury, Dance of Concentration, and Song of Wind do not stack. Duration: 30 days.

90886.name: Agathion Bracelet - Singer & Dancer
90886.description:
A 90-day item. When worn, 2 Agathion slots are activated. 
<Active Skill>
1. Dance of Fury: Atk. Spd. +5% for 20 minutes.

2. Dance of Concentration: Casting Spd. +5% for 20 minutes.

3. Song of Wind: Speed +20 for 5 minutes. Cooldown: 10 min.

<Note>
Dance of Fury, Dance of Concentration, and Song of Wind do not stack. Duration: 30 days.

90887.name: Agathion Bracelet - Lv. 3
90887.description: A 90-day item. When worn, 3 Agathion slots are activated., STR/ INT/ CON/ MEN +1.

90888.name: Agathion Bracelet - Lv. 1
90888.description: When worn, 2 Agathion slots are activated.

90889.name: Agathion Bracelet - Lv. 2
90889.description: When worn, 3 Agathion slots are activated.

90890.name: Agathion Bracelet - Lv. 3
90890.description: When worn, 3 Agathion slots are activated. STR/ INT/ CON/ MEN +1.

90891.name: Agathion Bracelet - Lv. 4

90892.name: Agathion Bracelet - Joy
90892.description:
When worn, 2 Agathion slots are activated. 

<Item Skill>
1. Evidence Chase: for 15 min. Speed +66.
<Item Skill>
2. Hidden Search: monsters don't attack first.

90893.name: Agathion Bracelet - Joy
90893.description:
A 7-day item. When worn, 2 Agathion slots are activated. 

<Item Skill>
1. Evidence Chase: for 15 min. Speed +66.
<Item Skill>
2. Hidden Search: monsters don't attack first.

90898.description: Agathion enchancement material. If you take this item along with an Agathion Bracelet - Lv. 2  to Blacksmith Baggins in Giran, you can enchance Agathion Bracelet.

90899.name: Blessed Agathion's Soul
90899.description: Agathion enchancement material. If you take this item along with an Agathion Bracelet - Lv. 3  to Blacksmith Baggins in Giran, you can enchance Agathion Bracelet.

90900.name: Shining Agathion's Soul
90900.description: Agathion enchancement material. If you take this item along with an Agathion Bracelet - Lv. 4  to Blacksmith Baggins in Giran, you can enchance Agathion Bracelet.

90901.name: Agathion Bracelet - Lv. 1
90901.description: A 15-day item. When worn, 2 Agathion slots are activated.

90902.name: Agathion Pisces
90902.description: A 15-day item. Equipping it in the Bracelet's main slot summons the Agathion Pisces and activates the Special Ability option.

90903.name: Agathion Cancer
90903.description: A 15-day item. Equipping it in the Bracelet's main slot summons the Agathion Cancer and activates the Special Ability option.

90904.name: Agathion Box: Aries
90904.description:
Double-click to obtain 1 Agathion Bracelet - Stage 3 (60 days) and 1 Aries Agathion (60 days).

<Note>
The items obtained from the box cannot be moved freely. Keep this in mind before opening the box.

90905.name: Singer & Dancer Pack
90905.description: Double-click to obtain Agathion Bracelet - Singer & Dancer (30 days).

90906.name: Singer & Dancer Pack
90906.description: Double-click to obtain Agathion Bracelet - Singer & Dancer (90 days).

90907.name: Soulshot Ticket
90907.description: Using Dimensional Merchant, you can exchange it for a No-, D-, C-, B-grade Soulshot, Spiritshot, Blessed Spiritshot, Blessed Soulshot, Beast Soulshot, Beast Spiritshot.

90908.name: Agathion Box: Rudolph
90908.description:
Double-click to obtain 1 Rudolph Agathion (2 hours).

<Note>
The items obtained from the box cannot be moved freely. Keep this in mind before opening the box.

90909.name: Agathion Rudolph
90909.description: A 2-hours item. Equipping it in the Bracelet's main slot summons the Agathion Rudolph. Casting Spd./ Atk. Spd. +5%, during the hunt XP/SP gain +10%.

90910.name: Christmas Red Sox
90910.description: Can be exchanged through the Fishermen's Guild for Rice Cake of Flaming Fighting Spirit (Event), Angel Cat's Energy (30 days), Special Fruit Buff (Event).

90911.name: Battle Box Lv. 1
90911.description: Reward for clan members. Double-click to obtain various items.

90912.name: Battle Box Lv. 2
90912.description: Reward for clan members. Double-click to obtain various items.

90913.name: Battle Box Lv. 3
90913.description: Reward for clan members. Double-click to obtain various items.

90914.name: Battle Box Lv. 4
90914.description: Reward for clan members. Double-click to obtain various items.

90915.name: Valor Box
90915.description: Reward for valor warriors. Double-click to obtain various items.

90916.name: Rice-cake Soup
90916.description: XP and SP gain +10%, P./M. Atk. +15%, P./M. Def. +15%, P./M. Atk. Spd. +10%, Speed +10. Duration: 5 minutes. The effect is removed if the game is reloaded.

90920.name: Jade Lv. 5
90920.description: A 7-day item. Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +10%, when equipped. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90921.name: Vital Stone Lv. 5
90921.description: Vital Stone Lv. 5. A 7-day item. XP/SP gain +15% and Sayha's Grace Consumption Rate -30% while hunting during Sayha's Grace effect. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90922.name: Shining Jewelry Box
90922.description: Double-click to obtain a Lv. 1 chest with one of these items: Vital Stone, Pearl, Diamond, Ruby, Sapphire, Jade, Garnet, Topaz, Aquamarine, Cat's Eye.

90923.name: Shining Ore
90923.description: Bring some amount of Shining Ore and a Lv. 3-5 Jewel to a Dimensional Merchant to receive a Lv. 3-5 Jewelry Box.

90924.name: Aquamarine
90924.description: When using a skill after equipping, there is a chance of recovering 12 MP. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90925.name: Aquamarine
90925.description: When using a skill after equipping, there is a chance of recovering 16 MP. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90926.name: Aquamarine
90926.description: When using a skill after equipping, there is a chance of recovering 20 MP. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90927.name: Aquamarine
90927.description: When using a skill after equipping, there is a chance of recovering 30 MP. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90928.name: Aquamarine
90928.description: Has a chance to recover 50 MP if a skill is used after it is equipped. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied. Returns a Greater Gem when combined with the Gem Energy.

90929.name: Cat's Eye
90929.description: P./M. Critical Damage +2%. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90930.name: Cat's Eye
90930.description: P./M. Critical Damage +4%. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90931.name: Cat's Eye
90931.description: P./M. Critical Damage +6%. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90932.name: Cat's Eye
90932.description: P./M. Critical Damage +8%. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90933.name: Cat's Eye
90933.description: When equipped, P./M. Critical Damage +15%. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied. Returns a Greater Gem when combined with the Gem Energy.

90934.name: Brooch
90934.description: Activates 4 jewel slots when equipped. Inventory Slot +12.

90935.name: Greater Jewel Box
90935.description: Double-click to obtain one Jewelry Box Lv4 containing a Vital Stone, Diamond, Pearl, Aquamarine, Sapphire, Ruby, Jade, Garnet, Topaz or Cat's Eye.

90940.name: Cat's Eye Chest
90940.description: Double-click to obtain a Lv. 1 Cat's Eye.

90941.description: Double-click to obtain a Lv. 3 Cat's Eye.

90942.name: Lv. 4 Cat's Eye Jewelry Box
90942.description: Double-click to obtain a Lv. 4 Cat's Eye.

90943.name: Lv. 5 Cat's Eye Jewelry Box
90943.description: Double-click to obtain a Lv. 5 Cat's Eye.

90944.name: Shining Brooch Fragment
90944.description:
Take the brooch and brooch fragments to the Dimensional Merchant to exchange them for a higher-grade brooch. 

<Brooch Exchange Materials>
Brooch Lv. 3: 1 Brooch Lv. 2 and 2 Shining Brooch Fragments
Brooch Lv. 4: 1 Brooch Lv. 3 and 3 Shining Brooch Fragments

90945.name: Low-grade XP Scroll Ticket
90945.description: If you take this item to Leo and Rush, you can get 10,000,000 XP.

90946.name: Mid-grade XP Scroll Ticket
90946.description: If you take this item to Leo and Rush, you can get 50,000,000 XP.

90947.name: High-grade XP Scroll Ticket
90947.description: If you take this item to Leo and Rush, you can get 100,000,000 XP.

90948.name: Lucky Charm

90949.name: Transformation Scroll: White Knight
90949.description: Transforms you into a White Knight for 20 minutes. Effect remains even after death. \nDuring White Knight Transformation: Max HP/MP +10%, PvE P. Atk. +5%, PvE P. Def +5%, Stun/Paralysis/MEN Attack Resistance +5%.

90950.name: Refined Baium's Ring
90950.description: A 30-day item. MP +27, Stun P. Atk. and Resistance +20%, Bleed P. Atk. and Resistance +15%, P./M. Accuracy +4, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +5%, P./M. Skill Power +10%, P. Critical Damage +15%, M. Critical Damage +10%. When two identical rings are equipped, the effect of only one ring will be applied. Cannot be enchanted.

90951.name: Angler's Fishing Box
90951.description: Double-click to obtain 30 Shining Golden Bait. If you're lucky, you can also get an Angler's Gold Box or Angler's Silver Box.

90953.name: Angler's Silver Box
90953.description: Double-click to randomly obtain 1 Rare Accessory, Enchant Scroll, Item Box A-/B-grade, Fishing Enchant Scroll, or Angler's Blessing.

90954.name: Angler's Blessing (2 hours)
90954.description: For 2 h. during fishing XP and SP gain +100%. Effect remains after death.

90955.name: Angler's Blessing (4 hours)
90955.description: For 4 h. during fishing XP and SP gain +100%. Effect remains after death.

90956.name: Angler's Blessing (8 hours)
90956.description: For 8 h. during fishing XP and SP gain +100%. Effect remains after death.

90957.name: Blue Mackerel Chest: Dual Sword (Event)
90957.description: Open the chest to receive 1 Blue Mackerel: Dual Sword. This is grear reward! The item will be removed after the event is over.

90958.name: Scroll: Enchant Fishing Weapon
90958.description: Scroll for enchanting Event weapon Blue Mackerel: Dual Sword, than can be obtainned through the Fishermen's Guild. The item will be removed after the event is over.

90959.name: Improved Scroll: Enchant Fishing Weapon
90959.description: For Event weapon Blue Mackerel: Dual Sword. Enchants the weapon randomly from +1 to +3. Unable to enchant more than +17. Blue Mackerel: Dual Sword can be obtainned through the Fishermen's Guild. The item will be removed after the event is over.

90960.name: Transformation Scroll: Teddy Bear
90960.description:
Transforms you into Teddy Bear for 15 min. Effect remains after death. 
 Teddy Bear Transform: Max HP/MP +20%. Sayha's Grace Hunting XP/SP +20%. Effect remains after death. 
<Warning>
 If used when Blue Dynasty/Cat the Cat/Cat/Panda Buff is applied, existing buff will be replaced. Cooldown 1 min.

90961.name: Weapon Supply Box +15 (A-grade)
90961.description: Double-click to receive an A-grade Weapon +15.

90962.name: Chronicle Pencil
90962.description: Pencil for the 1000th day after Lineage 2 Classic version start.

90963.name: Solid Scroll: Enchant Agathion
90963.description: Only for Zodiac Agathion. Increases M. Def. when the Agathion grows. Can be safely strengthened up to +3 and can be enhanced up to +10. Starting from +1 enchanting special abilities increases step by step. If enchanting fails, the enchanl level is maintained.

90964.name: Sealed Doll of Border Box
90964.description: You can obtain one of the 30-days items: Sealed Doll of Border - Baium, Sealed Doll of Border - Orfen, Doll of Border - Queen Ant.\n

90965.name: Raid Lucky Charm
90965.description: A 7-day item. When stored in the inventory, XP/item drop chance -50% upon death. Cannot be used by chaotic characters.

90966.name: Raid Lucky Charm Box
90966.description: You can obtain Raid Lucky Charm (7 days).

90968.name: GM Repi Gift Box
90968.description: Double-click to randomly obtain a Dandy's Home Run Ball, 3 Morale Bean Cakes (Event), 3 White Assassin Transformation Scrolls (Event), or 5 Sayha's Storm (Event).

90969.name: Blessed Fire Dragon Pendant
90969.description: When equipped, M. Def. +24, XP/SP +30%, P./M. Atk. +80, P./M. Critical Damage +10%, Damage Reflect Resistance +10%. Activates Fire Dragon's Blessing and Fire Dragon's Protection skills.

90970.name: Blessed Earth Dragon Pendant
90970.description: P./ M. Def. +24, HP +600, MP +300, CP +600, Speed +7, Received Damage -20%, Reflect Damage Resistance +10%, when equipped. Allows using the Earth Dragon's Breath and Earth Dragon's Protection skills.

90971.name: High-grade Shining Pendant Polish Box
90971.description: Double-click to randomly obtain 1 Matte Pendant Varnish, Shiny Pendant Varnish Box, or Brilliant Pendant Varnish.

90972.name: Weapon Supply Box +8 (A-grade)
90972.description: Double-click to receive an A-grade Weapon +8 exept high-level weapons.

90973.name: Zaken's Cloak
90973.description: Zaken's Cloak that makes you feel Zaken's sorrow. Increases Max HP by 5%.

90974.name: Sealed Doll of Border - Baium
90974.description: Double-click to obtain Doll of Border - Baium (7-day).

90975.name: Sealed Doll of Border - Queen Ant
90975.description: Double-click to obtain Doll of Border - Queen Ant (7-day).

90976.name: Sealed Doll of Border - Orfen
90976.description: Double-click to obtain Doll of Border - Orfen (7-day).

90977.name: Doll of Border - Baium
90977.description:
A 7-day item. Boosts abilities if stored in the inventory. 

<Baium's Doll Spell>
Mental Resistance +40%, Paralysis/Knockdown/Pulling Resistance +20%, P./M. Def. +12%, Cooldown -3%.

90978.name: Doll of Border - Queen Ant
90978.description:
A 7-day item. Boosts abilities if stored in the inventory. 

<Queen Ant's Doll Spell>
P. Atk. and Critical Damage +8%, Max HP +12%.

90979.name: Doll of Border - Orfen
90979.description:
A 7-day item. Boosts abilities if stored in the inventory. 

<Orfen's Doll Spell>
M. Atk./M. Critical Damage +8%, Max MP +12%.

90980.name: Pearl Lv. 4
90980.description: A 30-day item. P. Def. +46, M. Critical Damage Received -4%, when equipped. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90981.name: Diamond Lv. 4
90981.description: A 30-day item. P. Def. +81, P. Critical Damage Received -4%, when equipped. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90982.name: Jade Lv. 4
90982.description: A 30-day item. Atk. Spd./ Casting Spd. +7%, when equipped. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90983.name: Garnet Lv. 4
90983.description: A 30-day item. Stun/ Pull/ Silence/ Paralysis/ Fear Resistance +11%, when equipped. When using a skill, character becomes invulnerable to debuff for 5 seconds. Effect does not stack with additional jewels of the same type.

90984.name: Vital Stone Lv. 4
90984.description: A 30-day item. XP/SP gain +8% and Sayha's Grace Consumption Rate -10% while hunting during Sayha's Grace effect. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

90985.name: Earth Dragon's Belt
90985.description: 30-day item. CON +1, MEN +1, HP Recovery Bonus +2.31, Max MP Recovery +1.54, CP Recovery +3.07, Max HP/MP/CP +15%, Inventory Slots +6, Weight Gauge +7,000, Healing Potions Effect +100, Damage Taken -6%. (Can be applied to Melisa's Top-grade Recovery Potion, Melisa's Recovery Potion, Warrior's Quick Healing Potion).

90986.name: Lucky Cube of Growth
90986.description: A 30-day item. Double-click to obtain 900 Silver Bait and Savior's Scroll of Growth (can be used only once a day). Intended for level 20 or higher.

90987.name: Savior's Earring
90987.description: XP and SP gain +2%, Max MP +20, when equipped. The effect does not stack if two identical earrings are equipped.

90988.name: Shining Savior's Earring
90988.description: When equipped, XP/SP gain +2%, Max MP +30, Max HP +50, MEN/Stun Attack Resistance +4%. Vampiric Rage effect. When two identical earrings are equipped, the effect of only one earring will be applied.

90989.name: Savior's Earring Box
90989.description: Double-click to obtain Shining Savior's Earring with a low probability or Savior's Earring +3 with a high probability.

90990.name: Scroll: Enchant Savior's Earring
90990.description: Only for Savior's Earring. Increases M. Def. Can be safely strengthened up to +3 and can be enhanced up to +7. If enchanting fails, the enchant level is maintained.

90991.name: Lucky Hat
90991.description: A 30-day item. Leather hat. Allows the use of Blessing of Luck and Lucky Fortune skills when equipped. Occupies 2 Hair Accessory slots.

90992.name: Antharas' Earring
90992.description: MP +28, Bleed Attack and Resistance +10%, Stun Attack and Resistance +5%, MEN Attack and Resistance +5%, Heal Received +6%, Vampiric Rage +2%, Skill MP Consumption -3%. When two identical earrings are equipped, the effect of only one earring will be applied. Cannot be enchanted.

90993.name: Damaged Antharas' Earring
90993.description: Severly Damaged Antharas' Earring. With the help of Balthus Knights Varnish, Balthus Knights Matte Varnish, Balthus Knights Shining Varnish it can be enchanted up to +10. Starting from +4 adds passive skills. Damaged Antharas' Earring +10 can be exchanged for Antharas' Earring.

90994.name: Damaged Baium's Ring
90994.description: Severly Damaged Baium's Ring. With the help of Balthus Knights Varnish, Balthus Knights Matte Varnish, Balthus Knights Shining Varnish it can be enchanted up to +10. Starting from +4 adds passive skills. Damaged Baium's Ring +10 can be exchanged for Baium's Ring.

90995.name: Balthus Knights Varnish
90995.description: Enhances characteristics of damaged rare accessories. The maximum level of enchantment is +10, from +3 level chance of enchantig is 100%. Depending on the item type, activates special options from level +4 and higher.

90996.name: Balthus Knights Matte Varnish
90996.description: Enhances characteristics of damaged rare accessories. Can be used on a item enchanted up to +6. If an enchantment is failed, the item doesn't disappear and keep the previous level of enchantment. Depending on the item type, activates special options from level +4 and higher.

90997.name: Balthus Knights Shining Varnish
90997.description: Enhances characteristics of damaged rare accessories. Can be used on a item enchanted up to +8. If an enchantment is failed, the item doesn't disappear and keep the previous level of enchantment. Depending on the item type, activates special options from level +4 and higher.

90998.name: Balthus Knights Glittering Varnish
90998.description: Enhances characteristics of damaged rare accessories. Can be used on a item enchanted up to +9. If an enchantment is failed, the item doesn't disappear and keep the previous level of enchantment. Depending on the item type, activates special options from level +4 and higher.

90999.name: Rash's Supplies - Antharas
90999.description: Reward for defeating Antharas. Contains Damaged Antharas' Earring. Additionally can be obtained 1 random item: Portal Stone, Balthus Knights Varnish, Balthus Knights Shining Varnish, Balthus Knights Glittering Varnish.

91000.name: Rash's Supplies - Baium
91000.description: Reward for defeating Baium. Contains Damaged Baium's Ring. Can also randomly obtain a Balthus Knight's Varnish, Shining Balthus Knight's Varnish, or Brilliant Balthus Knight's Varnish.

91001.name: Box with 3 Jewels Lv. 3
91001.description: Double-click to obtain 1 each of Pearl Lv. 3 (30-day), Diamond Lv. 3 (30-day), and Jade Lv. 3 (30-day).

91002.name: Box with 5 Jewels Lv. 4
91002.description: Double-click to obtain 1 each of Pearl Lv. 4 (30-day), Diamond Lv. 4 (30-day), Jade Lv. 4 (30-day), Garnet Lv. 4 (30-day), and Vital Stone Lv. 4 (30-day).

91003.name: Agathion Bracelet - Lv. 1
91003.description: 1-day item. When worn, 2 Agathion slots are activated.

91004.name: Agathion - Sin Eater
91004.description: Equipping it in the Bracelet's main slot summons the Agathion Sin Eater and activates the Special Ability option.

91005.name: Crumbs of Penitence
91005.description: Evidence of the atonement obtained after the time of suffering for evil deeds. Take it to the Dark Judge to lower the PK count.

91006.name: Damaged Zaken's Earring
91006.description: Severly Damaged Zaken's Earring. With the help of Balthus Knights Varnish, Balthus Knights Matte Varnish, Balthus Knights Shining Varnish it can be enchanted up to +10. Starting from +4 adds passive skills. Damaged Zaken's Earring +10 can be exchanged for Zaken's Earring.

91007.name: Rash's Supplies - Zaken
91007.description: Reward for defeating Zaken. Contains Damaged Zaken's Earring. Can also randomly obtain a Balthus Knight's Varnish, Shining Balthus Knight's Varnish, or Brilliant Balthus Knight's Varnish.

91008.name: Dragon's Relic Chest
91008.description: Double-click to obtain a Special Dragon's Fruit. If you're lucky, you can also get 1 Fire Dragon's Relic Chest, Earth Dragon's Relic Chest, or Dragon Heart.

91009.name: Fire Dragon's Relic Chest
91009.description: Double-click to randomly obtain 1 Top-grade item or material (A-grade), Sealed Rune, or Enchant Scroll.

91010.name: Earth Dragon's Relic Chest
91010.description: Double-click to randomly obtain 1 Rare Accessory or Dragon's Dye Box.

91011.name: Dragon's Dye Box
91011.description: Double-click to obtain 1 item for character after 3rd Class Transfer: Superior Dye of STR, Superior Dye of CON, Superior Dye of DEX, Superior Dye of INT, Superior Dye of MEN, Superior Dye of WIT.

91013.name: Weapon Ingredient/Recipe Box (Best A-grade)
91013.description: Double-click to obtain Weapon Ingredient or Recipe A-Grade best quality.

91014.name: Weapon Recipe Box (Best A-grade)
91014.description: Double-click to obtain Weapon Recipe A-Grade best quality.

91015.name: Sirra's Blade Ingredient/Recipe Box
91015.description: Double-click to obtain 20 Sirra's Blade Edges and Recipe: Sirra's Blade (60%).

91016.name: Sword of Ipos Ingredient/Recipe Box
91016.description: Double-click to obtain 20 Sword of Ipos Blades and Recipe: Sword of Ipos (60%).

91017.name: Barakiel's Axe Ingredient/Recipe Box
91017.description: Double-click to obtain 20 Barakiel's Axe Pieces and Recipe: Barakiel's Axe (60%).

91018.name: Behemoth' Tuning Fork Ingredient/Recipe Box
91018.description: Double-click to obtain 20 Behemoth' Tuning Fork Pieces and Recipe: Behemoth' Tuning Fork (60%).

91019.name: Naga Storm Ingredient/Recipe Box
91019.description: Double-click to obtain 20 Naga Storm Pieces and Recipe: Naga Storm (60%).

91020.name: Tiphon's Spear Ingredient/Recipe Box
91020.description: Double-click to obtain 20 Tiphon's Spear Edges and Recipe: Tiphon's Spear (60%).

91021.name: Shyeed's Bow Ingredient/Recipe Box
91021.description: Double-click to obtain 20 Shyeed's Bow Shafts and Recipe: Shyeed's Bow (60%).

91101.name: Golden Fishery Fishing Supply Items
91101.description: Double-click to obtain 60 Golden Bait. If you're lucky, you can also get 1 Gold Big Catch Box, Silver Big Catch Box or Einhasad's Protection.

91102.name: Gold Big Catch Box
91102.description: Double-click to randomly obtain 1 Top-grade item or material (A-grade), Sealed Rune, or Luxury Lucky Enchant Stone: Armor.

91103.name: Silver Big Catch Box
91103.description: Double-click to randomly obtain 1 Rare Accessory or Sayha's Golden Blessing.

91104.name: Luxury Flanchard Enhancement Stone - A-grade
91104.description: Improved Scroll: Enchant Armor chance +20% when enchanting A-grade armor. Only for items enchanted between +3 and +9. For full-body armor, enchant must be between +4 and +9.

91105.name: Luxury Flanchard Enhancement Stone - B-grade
91105.description: Improved Scroll: Enchant Armor chance +20% when enchanting B-grade armor. Only for items enchanted between +3 and +9. For full-body armor, enchant must be between +4 and +9.

91106.name: Abundance Wind Cube
91106.description: 30-day item. Double-click to get Dandy's Home Run Ball, Morale Bean Cake (Event), Saviour's Weapon Enchant Scroll. (Can be used 1 time in 1 day.)

91107.name: Abundance Wind Cube
91107.description: 90-day item. Double-click to get Dandy's Home Run Ball, Morale Bean Cake (Event), Saviour's Weapon Enchant Scroll. (Can be used 1 time in 1 day.)

91108.name: Wind Amulet
91108.description: 90-day item. With inventory, CON/MEN/DEX/WIT/STR/INT +1. Hunting XP/SP +20%, Fishing XP/SP +50%.

91109.name: Blue Dynasty Scroll
91109.description:
Transforms you into Blue Dynasty for 15 min. Effect remains after death. 
 Blue Dynasty's Power: Max HP/MP +20%. When Sayha's Grace applies, XP/ SP gain +20%. Effect remains after death. 
<Warning>
 If used when Teddy Bear/Cat the Cat/Cat/Panda Buff is applied, existing buff will be replaced. Cooldown 1 min.

91110.name: Cat the Cat Scroll
91110.description:
Transforms you into Kat the Cat for 15 minutes. Effect remains even after death. Cannot be dropped or sold at an NCP's store. 
Kat the Cat's Energy: Max HP/MP +20%. XP/SP gain +20% during Sayha's Grace. Effect remains even after death. 
<Warning>
If used during Teddy Bear/Blue Dynasty/Cat/Panda Buff, the existing buff will be replaced. Cooldown is 1 minute.

91383.description: MP +50, CON +2, MEN +2, Bleed Attack and Resistance +40%, Stun Attack and Resistance +30%, MEN Attack and Resistance +30%, Damage Reflect Resistance +20%, Heal Received +20%, Vampiric Rage +6%, Skill MP Consumption -15%. Enables skills that prevent using physical and magic skills. When two identical earrings are equipped, the effect of only one earring will be applied. Cannot be enchanted.

91384.name: Queen Ant Essence
91384.description: Take the essence and a +10 to +12 Phoenix Ring to Head Blacksmith Ferris in the Town of Aden to obtain the Immortal Queen Ant's Ring through upgrade.

91385.name: Orfen Essence
91385.description: Take the essence and a +10 to +12 Black Ore Earring to Head Blacksmith Ferris in the Town of Aden to obtain the Immortal Orfen's Earring via upgrade.

91386.name: Core Essence
91386.description: Take the essence and a +10 to +12 Black Ore Ring to Head Blacksmith Ferris in the Town of Aden to obtain the Immortal Core's Ring via upgrade.

91387.name: Baium Essence
91387.description: Take the essence and a +10 to +12 Majestic Ring to Head Blacksmith Ferris in the Town of Aden to obtain the Immortal Baium's Ring via upgrade.

91388.name: Zaken Essence
91388.description: Take the essence and a +10 to +12 Phoenix Earring to Head Blacksmith Ferris in the Town of Aden to obtain the Blessed Zaken's Earring via upgrade.

91389.name: Antharas Essence
91389.description: Take the essence and a +10 to +12 Majestic Earring to Head Blacksmith Ferris in the Town of Aden to obtain the Immortal Antharas' Earring via upgrade.

91390.name: Topaz Lv. 5
91390.description: A 15-day item. Disrupts the target's skill casting when used. Inflicts fixed damage of 2375 Power in PvP. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

91391.name: Fish Stew - Guildsman's Gratitude Lv. 2
91391.description: XP/SP gain +30% while hunting for 20 minutes when used.

91392.name: Night Goblin Liquor
91392.description: P. Atk. +15%, M. Atk. +23%, P./M. Def. +15%, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +15%, HP/MP Recovery Bonus +30% for 5 minutes.

91393.name: Forgotten Codex - Chapter 1
91393.description: A book that contains the record of a forgotten skill. Gather the Forgotten Codex Chapters 1 to 4 and take them to Spellbook Trader Lorenzo in the Town of Aden to exchange them for the codex.

91394.name: Forgotten Codex - Chapter 2
91394.description: A book that contains the record of a forgotten skill. Gather the Forgotten Codex Chapters 1 to 4 and take them to Spellbook Trader Lorenzo in the Town of Aden to exchange them for the codex.

91395.name: Forgotten Codex - Chapter 3
91395.description: A book that contains the record of a forgotten skill. Gather the Forgotten Codex Chapters 1 to 4 and take them to Spellbook Trader Lorenzo in the Town of Aden to exchange them for the codex.

91396.name: Forgotten Codex - Chapter 4
91396.description: A book that contains the record of a forgotten skill. Gather the Forgotten Codex Chapters 1 to 4 and take them to Spellbook Trader Lorenzo in the Town of Aden to exchange them for the codex.

91397.name: Codex Piece - Chapter 1
91397.description: A piece of the codex that contains the record of a forgotten skill. Gather 100 and take them to Spellbook Trader Lorenzo in the Town of Aden to exchange them for the Forgotten Codex Chapter 1.

91398.name: Codex Piece - Chapter 2
91398.description: A piece of the codex that contains the record of a forgotten skill. Has a low chance to return the Forgotten Codex Chapter 2 when combined with the Tablet of Magic. When the combination fails, it returns 2 Codex Fragments.

91399.name: Codex Fragment - Chapter 2
91399.description: Codex fragment. Gather 50 fragments and take them to Spellbook Trader Lorenzo in the Town of Aden to exchange them for the Forgotten Codex Chapter 2. The exchange costs 3 million Adena.

91400.name: Codex - Armor Breaker
91400.description: A book containing a secret skill. Double-click to learn Armor Breaker. Available for all classes (must be at least level 80).

91401.name: Codex - Disarm
91401.description: A book containing a secret skill. Double-click to learn Disarm. Available for all classes (must be at least level 80).

91402.name: Codex - Spell Break
91402.description: A book containing a secret skill. Double-click to learn Spell Break. Available for all classes (must be at least level 80).

91403.name: Codex - Flash
91403.description: A book containing a secret skill. Double-click to learn Flash. Available for all classes (must be at least level 80).

91404.name: Codex - Warp
91404.description: A book containing a secret skill. Double-click to learn Warp. Available for all classes (must be at least level 80).

91405.name: Codex - Berserker Mode
91405.description: A book containing a secret skill. Double-click to learn Berserker Mode. Available for all classes (must be at least level 80).

91406.name: Entrance Pass to the Sepulcher
91406.description: A pass required to enter the Four Sepulchers at the Imperial Tomb. Ask the Nameless Spirit at the entrance of the 4th sepulcher for directions.

91407.name: Elmoreden Treasure Chest
91407.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Elmoreden Coin. If you're lucky, you can also get 1 Elmoreden Golden Box or Elmoreden Silver Box.

91408.name: Elmoreden Coin
91408.description: Can be exchanged for a variety of items through the Dimensional Merchant.

91409.name: Elmoreden Relic Pouch
91409.description: Double-click to randomly obtain 1 Refined Rare Accessory, Enchant Scroll or Enchant Stone.

91410.name: Elmoreden Golden Box
91410.description: Double-click to randomly obtain 1 High-grade Enchant Weapon Pack (A, B, C), Brilliant Talisman of Power Lv. 5, or Blessed Dragon Pendant.

91411.name: Elmoreden Silver Box
91411.description: Double-click to randomly obtain 1 consumable item such as an Attribute Necklace or Sayha's Blessing.

91412.name: Scroll: Elmoreden XP
91412.description: Recharges 500,000 XP. Give 8 Scrolls: Elmoreden XP and 2 Elmoreden Coins to the Dimensional Merchant to exchange them for 1 High-grade Scroll: Elmoreden XP.

91414.name: +5 Dragon Pendant Lv. 2
91414.description: A 30-day item. M. Def +25, P./M. Damage Received -15%, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +3%, P./M. Critical Damage +5%, XP/SP gain +20%.

91415.name: Bracelet of Power
91415.description: A 30-day item. When equipped, opens up 5 Talisman slots. HP/MP Recovery +15%, P. Accuracy +2, M. Accuracy +2, Weight Limit +10000.

91416.name: Talisman of Border Lv. 8
91416.description: A 30-day item. When equipped, P./M. Def +34, P./M. Evasion +2, HP/MP/CP +200, Movement Speed +7, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +15, XP/SP gain +5%. Applies Power of Border - Lv. 2 (has a chance to increase attack abilities) and enables Border Purification (removes Paralysis, Petrification, Poison, and Bleed).

91417.name: Brooch Lv. 4
91417.description: A 30-day item. When equipped, opens up 5 Gem slots and adds 12 slots to the inventory.

91418.name: Ruby Lv. 5
91418.description: A 30-day item. When equipped, Soulshot/Blessed Soulshot/Beast Soulshot damage +16%. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

91419.name: Sapphire Lv. 5
91419.description: A 30-day item. When equipped, Spiritshot/Blessed Spiritshot/Beast Spiritshot damage +16%. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

91420.name: Diamond Lv. 5
91420.description: A 30-day item. When equipped, P. Def +130 and P. Critical Damage Received -10%. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

91421.name: Pearl Lv. 5
91421.description: A 30-day item. When equipped, M. Def +74 and M. Critical Damage Received -10%. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

91422.name: Queen Ant Doll
91422.description:
Boosts abilities with the Queen Ant Doll's Spell when stored in the inventory. 

<Queen Ant Doll's Spell Lv. 2>
P. Atk. +12%, P. Critical Damage +10%, MAX HP +15%

91423.name: Baium Doll
91423.description:
Boosts abilities with the Baium Doll's Spell when stored in the inventory.  

<Baium Doll's Spell Lv. 2>
Mental Attack Resistance +45%, Paralysis/Knock Down/Pull Resistance +25%, P. Def./M. Def. +15%, Skill Cooldown -4%.

91424.name: Orfen Doll
91424.description:
Boosts abilities with the Orfen Doll's Spell when stored in the inventory. 

<Orfen Doll's Spell Lv. 2>
M. Atk. +15%, M. Critical Damage +10%, MAX MP +15%

91425.name: Greater Vital Stone Lv. 5
91425.description: A 30-day item. XP/SP gain +30% and Attribute XP +50% for hunting attribute NPCs while hunting during Sayha's Grace effect. Sayha's Grace Consumption Rate -35%. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

91426.name: Greater Aquamarine Lv. 5
91426.description: A 30-day item. When equipped, Max MP +20% and has a chance to recover 200 MP upon using a skill. Instantly recovers 10% MP when a Special Ability is used. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

91427.name: Greater Diamond Lv. 5
91427.description: A 30-day item. When equipped, P. Def +400, P. Critical Damage Received -20%, and P. Critical Attack Receival Rate -10%. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

91428.name: Greater Pearl Lv. 5
91428.description: A 30-day item. When equipped, M. Def +250, M. Critical Damage Received -20%, M. Critical Attack Receival Rate -10%. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

91429.name: Greater Topaz Lv. 5
91429.description: A 30-day item. Disrupts the target's skill casting when used. Inflicts fixed damage of 6000 Power in PvP. Removes up to 3 buffs from the enemy when a Special Ability is used. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

91430.name: Greater Garnet Lv. 5
91430.description: A 30-day item. When equipped, Stun/Pull/Silence/Paralysis/Fear Resistance +40%, Sleep/Poison Resistance +10%. Invincible against debuffs for 25 seconds upon using a skill. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

91431.name: Greater Ruby Lv. 5
91431.description: A 30-day item. When equipped, Soulshot/Blessed Soulshot/Beast Soulshot damage +20%, P. Atk. +7%, P. Critical Rate +5%. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

91432.name: Greater Sapphire Lv. 5
91432.description: A 30-day item. When equipped, Spiritshot/Blessed Spiritshot/Beast Spiritshot damage +20%, M. Atk. +14%, M. Critical Rate +10%. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

91433.name: Greater Jade Lv. 5
91433.description: A 30-day item. When equipped, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +20%, Movement Speed +7%, Resistance to Melee Weapon Attack +10%. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

91434.name: Greater Cat's Eye Lv. 5
91434.description: A 30-day item. When equipped, P./M. Critical Damage +20%, P./M. Skill Power +7%, Buff Removal Resistance +40%. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

91435.name: Greater Emerald Lv. 5
91435.description: A 30-day item. When equipped, CON/MEN/DEX/WIT/STR/INT +2. Damage Reflect Resistance +20%. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

91436.name: Blessed Dragon Pendant
91436.description: A 30-day item. Pendant imbued with Dragon’s power. When equipped, M. Def. +50, XP/SP +30%, P. Atk./M. Atk. Spd. 10%, P./M. Critical Damage +15%, P. Atk./M. Atk. +20%, Damage Reflect Resistance +20%, P. Atk./M. Atk. Damage -30%. Enables Dragon Invocation, Dragon Barrier, Dragon Evasion skills.

91437.name: +10 Sayha's Cloak - White
91437.description: A 30-day item. When equipped, Max HP/MP +15%, XP/SP gain +30%, P. Def +10%, P./M. Critical Damage +15%, M. Def +6%, Critical Damage Received -10%. Allows using Sayha Blink skill.

91438.name: Shining Golden Bait Box
91438.description: Double-click to obtain 1080 Shining Golden Bait.

91439.name: Greater Vital Stone Lv. 5 Box
91439.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Greater Vital Stone Lv. 5 (30-day).

91440.name: Greater Aquamarine Lv. 5 Box
91440.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Greater Aquamarine Lv. 5 (30-day).

91453.name: +10 Sayha's Cloak Box
91453.description: Double-click to obtain 1 +10 Sayha's Cloak - White (30-day).

91454.name: +10 Sayha's Cloak Box - White
91454.description: Double-click to obtain 1 +10 Sayha's Cloak - White.

91455.name: +10 Sayha's Cloak Box - Black
91455.description: Double-click to obtain 1 +10 Sayha's Cloak - Black.

91456.name: +10 Sayha's Cloak Box - Red
91456.description: Double-click to obtain 1 +10 Sayha's Cloak - Red.

91457.name: Soccer Ball Herb of Victory
91457.description: A soccer ball herb to wish for victory. P. Atk. +15%, M. Atk. +23%, P./M. Def +15%, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +15%, HP/MP Recovery Bonus +30% for 5 minutes.

91458.name: Red Mask of Victory
91458.description: A mask to wish for victory.

91460.name: Soccer Ball Afro Hair - Red
91460.description: When equipped, changes your hair style to Afro Hair dyed as a red soccer ball.

91461.name: Balloon Stick of Cheers - Red
91461.description: A red balloon stick of cheering spirit.

91462.name: Weapon Enhancement Stone
91462.description: Can be exchanged for an Advanced Stable Scroll: Enchant Weapon (D-/C-/B-/A-grade) through Galladucci at the Town of Giran Luxury Shop.

91463.name: Armor Enhancement Stone
91463.description: Can be exchanged for an Advanced Stable Scroll: Enchant Armor (D/C/B/A-grade) through Alexandria at the Town of Giran Luxury Shop.

91464.name: Advanced Stable Scroll: Enchant Weapon (D-grade)
91464.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for D-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles Use the scroll to safely enchant the weapon. Even if enchantment fails, the item is not crystallized and retains the current enchant value. Can only be used on items enchanted to +7 to +15.

91465.name: Advanced Stable Scroll: Enchant Armor (D-grade)
91465.description: When enchanted, P. Def. +1 for D-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. +3. Starting at +4 armor, HP increases depending on the enchant value. Use the scroll to safely enchant the armor. Even if enchantment fails, the item is not crystallized and retains the current enchant value. Can only be used on items enchanted to +6 to +9.

91466.name: Advanced Stable Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-grade)
91466.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. +4 for C-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles Use the scroll to safely enchant the weapon. Even if enchantment fails, the item is not crystallized and retains the current enchant value. Can only be used on items enchanted to +7 to +15.

Use the scroll to safely enchant the armor. Even if enchantment fails, the item is not crystallized and retains the current enchant value. Can only be used on items enchanted to +6 to +9.

Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles Use the scroll to safely enchant the weapon. Even if enchantment fails, the item is not crystallized and retains the current enchant value. Can only be used on items enchanted to +7 to +15.

Use the scroll to safely enchant the armor. Even if enchantment fails, the item is not crystallized and retains the current enchant value. Can only be used on items enchanted to +6 to +9.

91470.name: Advanced Stable Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-grade)

Atk. +5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +8 for bows. M. Atk. +3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles Use the scroll to safely enchant the weapon. Even if enchantment fails, the item is not crystallized and retains the current enchant value. Can only be used on items enchanted to +7 to +15.

Use the scroll to safely enchant the armor. Even if enchantment fails, the item is not crystallized and retains the current enchant value. Can only be used on items enchanted to +6 to +9.

91472.name: +5 Sealed Agathion - Virgo
91472.description: Double-click to obtain +5 Enchanted Virgo Agathion.

91473.name: +5 Sealed Agathion - Capricorn
91473.description: Double-click to obtain +5 Enchanted Capricorn Agathion.

91474.name: +5 Sealed Agathion - Libra
91474.description: Double-click to obtain +5 Enchanted Libra Agathion.

91478.name: +5 Sealed Agathion - Scorpio
91478.description: Double-click to obtain +5 Enchanted Scorpio Agathion.

91479.name: +5 Sealed Agathion - Aquarius
91479.description: Double-click to obtain +5 Enchanted Aquarius Agathion.

91480.name: +5 Sealed Agathion - Sagittarius
91480.description: Double-click to obtain +5 Enchanted Sagittarius Agathion.

91481.name: Crystal of Soul
91481.description: A crystal created with the concentrated wills of heroes. Take it to Lorenzo in the Town of Aden to learn a certification skill.

91482.name: Codex - Detect Darkness
91482.description: A secret scroll needed to learn Detect Darkness. Used by Sagittarius, Moonlight Sentinels, and Ghost Sentinels.\nRequired level: 76

91483.name: Codex - Bind
91483.description: A secret scroll needed to learn Bind. Used by Archmages, Soul Takers, Mystic Muses, and Storm Screamers.\nRequired level: 76

91484.name: Codex - Mass Chain Strike
91484.description: A secret scroll needed to learn Mass Chain Strike. Used by Phoenix Knights, Hell Knights, Eva's Templar, and Shillien Templar.\nRequired level: 78

91485.name: Codex - Reduce Crisis
91485.description: A secret scroll needed to learn Reduce Crisis. Used by Phoenix Knights, Hell Knights, Eva's Templars, and Shillien Templars.\nRequired level: 76

91486.name: Codex - Full Swing
91486.description: A secret scroll needed to learn used to learn Full Swing. Used by Titans.\nLearning Level: 76

91487.name: Codex - Seal of Blockade
91487.description: A secret scroll needed to learn Seal of Blockade. Used by Dominators.\nRequired level: 79

91488.name: Blessed Soulshot (S-grade)
91488.description: Bestows the Spirit Light on the weapon to spontaneously launch a powerful attack on the enemy. Used with an S-grade weapon.

91489.name: Recipe: Blessed Soulshot (S-grade)
91489.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for a Blessed Soulshot (S-grade). Create Item skill must be level 8. The success rate is 100%.

91490.name: Mysterious Soulshot (S-grade)
91490.description: Bestows the high-grade Spirit Light on the weapon to spontaneously inflict a powerful attack on the enemy. Used with an S-grade weapon.

91491.name: Mysterious Blessed Soulshot (S-grade)
91491.description: Bestows the Spirit Light on the weapon to spontaneously inflict a powerful attack on the enemy. Used with an S-grade weapon.

91492.name: Mysterious Spiritshot (S-grade)
91492.description: Bestows the high-grade Spirit Light on the weapon to spontaneously increase M. Atk. Used with an S-grade weapon.

91493.name: Mysterious Blessed Spiritshot (S-grade)
91493.description: Bestows the high-grade Spirit Light on the weapon to spontaneously increase M. Atk significantly. Used with an S-grade weapon.

91494.name: Codex - Create Critical
91494.description: A secret scroll needed to learn Create Critical Lv. 3. Used by Maestros. \nRequired level: 84

91495.name: Codex - Create Master

91498.name: Tallum Blade + Dark Legion's Edge Box
91498.description: Double-click to obtain 1 +0 Tallum Blade and +0 Dark Legion's Edge.

91550.name: Frintezza's Necklace
91550.description: MP +29, Sleep Attack and Resistance +10%, Paralysis Attack and Resistance +5%, Skill Cooldown -2%, Damage Reflect Resistance +2%, P./M. Skill Power +5%. Cannot be enchanted.

91551.name: Reinforced Frintezza's Necklace
91551.description: MP +36, Sleep Attack and Resistance +15%, Paralysis Attack and Resistance +10%, Skill Cooldown -3%, Damage Reflect Resistance +3%, P./M. Skill Power +10%. Cannot be enchanted.

91552.name: Enhanced Frintezza's Necklace

91553.name: Immortal Frintezza's Necklace
91553.description: MP +65, Sleep Attack and Resistance +30%, Paralysis Attack and Resistance +20%, Skill Cooldown -10%, Damage Reflect Resistance +10%, Buff-canceling Attack Resistance +20%, P./M. Skill Power +20%. Allows using delay increase debuffs. Cannot be enchanted.

91554.name: Frintezza Essence
91554.description: Take the essence and a +10 to +12 Majestic Necklace to Head Blacksmith Ferris in the Town of Aden to obtain the Immortal Frintezza's Necklace via upgrade.

91555.name: Special Summer Box
91555.description: Double-click to randomly obtain 1 Anakim/Lilith Rune Stage 9, Earth Dragon Belt/Fire Dragon Belt - Venir's Blessing Lv. 4, or +10 Agathion Pack.

91556.name: Enchanted Warrior's Shiny Dualsword
91556.description: A 30-day item. When equipped, Atk. Spd. +5%. Cannot be enchanted or augmented, and has no Soul Crystal option.

91574.name: Sacred Sword Excalibur
91574.description: Sacred Sword Excalibur. Enchant the sword and give it to the Excalibur Expeditionary Force Leader to receive various rewards. Will be deleted during maintenance on Wednesday, August 29th, 2018.

91575.name: Scroll: Enchant Excalibur
91575.description: A weapon enchant scroll that can be used on the Sacred Sword Excalibur. Up to enchant level +3, P. Atk. +5 and M. Atk. +3. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus doubles. Can only be used up to +20. Will be deleted during maintenance on Wednesday, August 29th, 2018.

91576.name: Gemstone Box
91576.description: Double-click to randomly obtain 1 D- to S-grade Gemstone.

91577.name: Life Stone Pack
91577.description: Double-click to randomly obtain 1 Standard, Intermediate, High-grade, or Top-grade Shining Life Stone.

91578.name: Stable Enchant Scroll Pack
91578.description: Double-click to randomly obtain 1 Stable Scroll: Enchant Armor/Weapon (D- to S-grade).

91579.name: Greater Enchant Scroll Pack
91579.description: Double-click to randomly obtain 1 Advanced Scroll: Enchant Armor/Weapon (D- to S-grade).
