91586.name: Gran Kain's Treasure Chest
91586.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Einhasad's Protection or Dragon's Miracle Potion. If you're lucky, you can also get 1 Gran Kain's Golden Box or Gran Kain's Silver Box.

91587.name: Gran Kain's Silver Box
91587.description: Double-click to obtain a Refined Rare Accessory, Stable/Improved Scroll: Enchant Armor (A-/B-grade), or a consumable.

91588.name: Gran Kain's Golden Box
91588.description: Double-click to obtain a Frintezza's Necklace, Codex Box, Stable/Improved Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-/B-/C-grade) or other rare item.

91589.name: Gran Kain's Special Box
91589.description: Double-click to obtain a high-grade item obtainable from Gran Kain's Golden/Silver Box, enhancement item, or consumable.

91590.name: Codex Box
91590.description: Double-click to obtain Codex Chapters 1 to 4.

91591.name: Dimensional Soul
91591.description: A material used to craft and upgrade Dimensional Talismans. Take it to Veruti in the Town of Giran to use it.

91592.name: Dimensional Talisman Lv. 1
91592.description: When equipped, P. Def/M. Def +25, P./M. Evasion +1, Max HP/MP/CP +150, Movement Speed +5, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +10, XP/SP gain +3%. Allows use of Dimension Guard - Lv. 1 (temporarily decreases the chance of getting hit by Deadly Stabs). Can be upgraded to a higher-grade Talisman through Veruti in the Town of Giran. When both the Dimensional Power and the Talisman of Border are equipped, only the Dimensional Power is applied.

91593.name: Dimensional Talisman Lv. 2
91593.description: When equipped, P. Def/M. Def +30, P./M. Evasion +2, Max HP/MP/CP +200, Movement Speed +7, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +15, XP/SP gain +5%. Applies the Dimensional Power of Border - Lv. 1 (has a chance to increase Attack Abilities on attack) and allows using the Dimension Guard - Lv. 2 (temporarily decreases the chance of getting hit by Deadly Stabs). Can be upgraded to a higher-grade Talisman through Veruti in the Town of Giran. When both the Dimensional Power and the Talisman of Border are equipped, only the Dimensional Power is applied.

91594.name: Dimensional Talisman Lv. 3
91594.description: When equipped, P. Def/M. Def +35, P./M. Evasion +2, Max HP/MP/CP +250, Movement Speed +7, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +15, XP/SP gain +6%. Applies the Dimensional Power of Border - Lv. 2 (has a chance to increase Attack Abilities on attack) and allows use of Dimension Guard - Lv. 3 (temporarily decreases the chance of getting hit by Deadly Stabs). Can be upgraded to a higher-grade Talisman through Veruti in the Town of Giran. When both the Dimensional Power and the Talisman of Border are equipped, only the Dimensional Power is applied.

91595.name: Dimensional Talisman Lv. 4

91596.name: Dimensional Talisman Lv. 5

Critical Damage Received). Can be upgraded to a higher-grade Talisman through Veruti in the Town of Giran. When both the Dimensional Power and the Talisman of Border are equipped, only the Dimensional Power is applied.

91597.description: When equipped, P. Def/M. Def +50, P./M. Evasion +3, Max HP/MP/CP +500, Movement Speed +8, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +30, XP/SP gain +10%. Critical Damage Received). Can be upgraded to a higher-grade Talisman through Veruti in the Town of Giran. When both the Dimensional Power and the Talisman of Border are equipped, only the Dimensional Power is applied.

91598.name: Dimensional Talisman Lv. 7
91598.description: When equipped, P. Def/M. Def +70, P./M. Evasion +4, Max HP/MP/CP +1000, Movement Speed +9, Atk. Spd. +40, Casting Spd. +50, XP/SP gain +12%. Applies the Dimensional Power of Border - Lv. 6 (has a chance to increase Attack Abilities on attack) and allows use of Dimension Guard - Lv. 7 (temporarily decreases the chance of getting hit by Deadly Stabs and P./M. Critical Damage Received). Can be upgraded to a higher-grade Talisman through Veruti in the Town of Giran. When both the Dimensional Power and the Talisman of Border are equipped, only the Dimensional Power is applied.

91599.description: When equipped, P. Def/M. Def +80, P./M. Evasion +4, Max HP/MP/CP +1300, Movement Speed +9, Atk. Spd. +40, Casting Spd. +65, XP/SP gain +15%. Applies the Dimensional Power of Border - Lv. 7 (has a chance to increase Attack Abilities on attack) and allows use of Dimension Guard - Lv. 8 (temporarily decreases the chance of getting hit by Deadly Stabs and P./M. Critical Damage Received, and increases M. Def). Can be upgraded to a higher-grade Talisman through Veruti in the Town of Giran. When both the Dimensional Power and the Talisman of Border are equipped, only the Dimensional Power is applied.

91600.name: Dimensional Talisman Lv. 9
91600.description: When equipped, P. Def/M. Def +90, P./M. Evasion +4, Max HP/MP/CP +1600, Movement Speed +9, Atk. Spd. +50, Casting Spd. +80, XP/SP gain +20%. 91601.name: Dimensional Talisman Lv. 10
91601.description: When equipped, P. Def/M. Def +100, P./M. Evasion +5, Max HP/MP/CP +2000, Movement Speed +10, Atk. Spd. +50, Casting Spd. +100, XP/SP gain +30%. Applies the Dimensional Power of Border - Lv. 9 (has a chance to increase Attack Abilities on attack) and allows se of Dimension Guard - Lv. 10 (temporarily decreases the chance of getting hit by Deadly Stabs and P./M. Critical Damage Received, and increases M. Def). and the Dimensional Barrier (defending enemy attacks 10 times for 15 sec). When both the Dimensional Power and the Talisman of Border are equipped, only the Dimensional Power is applied.

91602.name: Sealed Doll of Border - Frintezza
91602.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Doll of Border - Frintezza (30-day). Can be upgraded to Lv. 1 or Lv. 2 through Veruti in the Town of Giran.

91603.name: Doll of Border - Frintezza
91603.description:
A 30-day item. Boosts abilities with Frintezza Doll's Spell when stored in the inventory. 

<Frintezza Doll's Spell Lv. 1>
CON +1, MEN +1, WIT +1, DEX +1, STR +1, INT +1, Stun and Paralysis Atk. Rate +10%

91604.name: Frintezza Doll
91604.description:
Boosts abilities with Frintezza Doll's Spell when stored in the inventory. Can be upgraded to Lv. 1 or 2 through Veruti in the Town of Giran. 

<Frintezza Doll's Spell Lv. 1>
CON +1, MEN +1, WIT +1, DEX +1, STR +1, INT +1, Stun and Paralysis Atk. Rate +10%

91606.name: Advanced Virgo Agathion
91606.description:
Virgo Agathion imbued with Fire Dragon’s soul.

Can be summoned when equipped in the main slot.
Activates its unique ability when equipped.
<Unique Ability>
Increases M. Def. and Mental Atk. Rate. Activates Fire Dragon Power from +6.

Can be changed to Advanced Virgo Agathion (Earth Dragon) through NPC Pona.

91607.description:

Can be summoned when equipped in the main slot.
Activates its unique ability when equipped.
<Unique Ability>

Increases P. Def. and Stun Atk. Rate. Activates Earth Dragon Power from +6.

Can be changed to Advanced Taurus Agathion (Fire Dragon) through NPC Pona.

91618.name: Advanced Leo Agathion
91618.description:
Leo Agathion imbued with Earth Dragon’s soul.

Can be summoned when equipped in the main slot.
Activates its unique ability when equipped.
<Unique Ability>
Increases P. Atk. and Paralysis Atk. Rate. Activates Earth Dragon Power from +6.

Can be changed to Advanced Leo Agathion (Fire Dragon) through NPC Pona.

91619.name: Advanced Scorpio Agathion
91619.description:
Scorpio Agathion imbued with Earth Dragon’s soul.

Can be summoned when equipped in the main slot.
Activates its unique ability when equipped.
<Unique Ability>
Increases P. Critical Rate and decreases cooldown of physical, song, and dance skills. Activates Earth Dragon Power from +6.

Can be changed to Advanced Scorpio Agathion (Fire Dragon) through NPC Pona.

91620.name: Advanced Aquarius Agathion
91620.description:
Aquarius Agathion imbued with Earth Dragon’s soul.

Can be summoned when equipped in the main slot.
Activates its unique ability when equipped.
<Unique Ability>
Increases M. Atk. and Hold/Sleep Atk. Rate. Activates Earth Dragon Power from +6.

Can be changed to Advanced Aquarius Agathion (Fire Dragon) through NPC Pona.

91621.name: Advanced Sagittarius Agathion
91621.description:
Sagittarius Agathion imbued with Earth Dragon’s soul.

Can be summoned when equipped in the main slot.
Activates its unique ability when equipped.
<Unique Ability>
Increases Atk. Spd. and decreases MP Consumption of physical, song, and dance skills. Activates Earth Dragon Power from +6.

Can be changed to Advanced Sagittarius Agathion (Fire Dragon) through NPC Pona.

91622.name: Advanced Gemini Agathion
91622.description:
Gemini Agathion imbued with Agathion’s soul.

Can be summoned when equipped in the main slot.
Activates its unique ability when equipped.
<Unique Ability>
Increases Sayha's Grace effect and Max HP/MP. Increases Max CP from +6.

91623.name: Advanced Stable Agathion Enchant Scroll
91623.description: An enchant scroll exclusive to Advanced Zodiac Agathion. Enchanting Agathion increases M. Def. Can enchant up to +10. Increases unique abilities gradually from +1. Even if enchantment fails, Agathion will not be destroyed and will retain the current enchant value.

91624.name: Agathion Gift Box
91624.description: Double-click to obtain a S-grade item box, special item, consumable, Agathion enchantment material, or exchange coupon. Will be deleted when the event ends.

91625.name: S-grade Weapon Pack
91625.description: Double-click to obtain one of the S-grade weapons.

91626.name: S-grade Armor Pack
91626.description: Double-click to obtain one S-grade armor or accessory.

91627.name: +10 A-grade Armor Pack
91627.description: Double-click to obtain a +10 enchanted A-grade armor.

91628.name: +10 B-grade Armor Pack
91628.description: Double-click to obtain a +10 enchanted B-grade armor.

91629.name: +10 A-grade Accessory Pack
91629.description: Double-click to obtain +10 enchanted A-grade accessory.

91630.name: +10 B-grade Accessory Pack
91630.description: Double-click to obtain a +10 enchanted B-grade accessory.

91631.name: Material Coupon
91631.description: Can be exchanged to a high-grade material through Dimensional Merchant.\n<Exchange Fee> Adena 2,500,000.

91632.name: Fire Dragon Soulstone
91632.description: Used to upgrade an Agathion to Advanced Zodiac Agathion imbued with Fire Dragon’s soul or to a Fire Dragon option. Can be used through NPC Pona in Town of Giran.

91633.name: Earth Dragon Soulstone
91633.description: Used to upgrade an Agathion to Advanced Zodiac Agathion imbued with Earth Dragon’s soul or to a Earth Dragon option. Can be used through NPC Pona in Town of Giran.

91634.name: Agathion Soulstone
91634.description: Used to upgrade Gemini Agathion to Advanced Zodiac Agathion. Can be used through NPC Pona in Town of Giran.

91635.name: Angler's Treasure Chest
91635.description: Double-click to obtain one of the following items at random: Fishing Shot, Soulshot Ticket, Weapon Exchange Ticket, and Shining Coin.

91636.name: Goldberg’s Room Key
91636.description: A shining key dropped by Goldberg’s steward. Take it to Sora in the Town of Aden to enter Goldberg’s Room.

91637.name: 15th Anniversary Talisman
91637.description: A talisman that commemorates the 15th Anniversary. Increases Hunting XP/SP by 15% when equipped. Enables Transformation Skills. Will be deleted when the event ends.

91638.name: Chronicle Cube
91638.description: Can be used up to 15 times. Rewards 1 Gift when used. (Can be used only once a day)

91639.name: Refined Rare Accessory Pack
91639.description: Double-click to obtain Refined Queen Ant's Ring (30-day), Refined Orfen's Earring (30-day), and Refined Ring of Core (30-day), one for each.

91640.name: Refined Romantic Chapeau: Gold
91640.description:
Refined Romantic Chapeau: Gold. Occupies 2 hair accessory slots. 

<Active Skill>
1. Chapeau’s Escape: Quickly returns to a near village. Cooldown 20 minutes.
2. Mysterious Aura: Enlarges your head for 10 minutes. Cooldown 20 minutes.

91642.name: 15th Anniversary Gift Box
91642.description: Double-click to obtain one Codex Box, Dragon's Dye Box, Transformation Scroll (Song Dance), White Assassin Transformation Scroll, or Morale Bean Cake at random. Will be deleted when the event ends.

91643.name: Chronicle Box
91643.description: Double-click to obtain one consumable or refined rare accessory (30-day).

91644.name: Chronicle Cube’s Gift
91644.description: Double-click to obtain 1 Dandy's Home Run Ball and 1 Chronicle Box.

91645.name: 15th Anniversary Mysterious Fork
91645.description: Summons one number from 1 to 6 at random when used on the 15th Anniversary Cake. Used in the Cake Raid Events that take place everyday at 11:00 and 20:00. Will be deleted when the event ends.

91646.name: Escape - Loud Wolves
91646.description: A magic scroll that teleports you to Jackson in Talking Island Village.

91647.name: Escape - Troublemaker of Forest
91647.description: A magic scroll that teleports you to Herbiel in Elven Village.

91648.name: Escape - Clean the Yard
91648.description: A magic scroll that teleports you to Vollodos in Dark Elf Village.

91649.name: Escape - Suspicious Men
91649.description: A magic scroll that teleports you to Uska in Orc Village.

91650.name: Escape - Disruptors
91650.description: A magic scroll that teleports you to Gerald in Dwarven Village.

91651.name: Escape - Captain Bathis
91651.description: A magic scroll that teleports you to Captain Bathis in the Town of Gludio.

91652.name: Big Spiderweb
91652.description: Spiderweb made by big spiders. It is light and glossy.

91654.name: Mark of Journey I
91654.description: A mark awarded only to those adventurers who complete Adventurer’s Journey Mission. It increases HP Recovery Bonus by 5% and MP Recovery Bonus by 10% when stored in the inventory. If several marks are in the inventory, only the effect of the highest one is applied. Double-click to see recommended hunting grounds for each level.

91655.name: Mark of Journey II
91655.description: A mark awarded only to those adventurers who complete Adventurer’s Journey Mission. It increases HP Recovery Bonus by 10% and MP Recovery Bonus by 15% when stored in the inventory. If several marks are in the inventory, only the effect of the highest one is applied. Double-click to see recommended hunting grounds for each level.

91656.name: Mark of Journey III
91656.description: A mark awarded only to those adventurers who complete Adventurer’s Journey Mission. It increases HP Recovery Bonus by 20% and MP Recovery Bonus by 15% when stored in the inventory. If several marks are in the inventory, only the effect of the highest one is applied. Double-click to see recommended hunting grounds for each level.

91657.name: Mark of Journey IV
91657.description: A mark awarded only to those adventurers who complete Adventurer’s Journey Mission. It increases HP Recovery Bonus by 20% and MP Recovery Bonus by 25% when stored in the inventory. Double-click to see recommended hunting grounds for each level.

91658.name: Chicken Lucky Box
91658.description: Chicken Lucky Box that can be obtained only in the Mysterious Aden Server. Double-click to obtain Shining Scroll of Mood Melody or Delicious Chicken. Will be deleted when the event ends.

91659.name: Delicious Chicken
91659.description: Delicious Chicken obtained from Chicken Lucky Box. It is a gifticon that can be exchanged for real chicken when sold to GM Store. However, only first 1,000 are accepted. If you get a Delicious Chicken item, sell it to GM Store as quickly as possible. GM Store is open in the Monster Race Track until 1,000 Delicious Chickens are exchanged. Delicious Chicken can be also sold to NPC Store for Adena. Will be deleted when the event ends.

91660.name: Shining Scroll of Mood Melody
91660.description:
Activates Might, Shield, Haste, Empower, Acumen, Wind Walk, Vampiric Rage, Berserker Spirit, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Clarity, Wild Magic, and Concentration effects for 1 hour. The buff effect doesn't disappear upon death

<Note>
1. Shining Scroll of Mood Melody cannot be stacked with Scroll of Mood Melody.

2. Its duration is equal to that of the last used item.

91661.name: Shining Scroll of Mood Melody
91661.description:
Activates Might, Shield, Haste, Empower, Acumen, Wind Walk, Vampiric Rage, Berserker Spirit, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Clarity, Wild Magic, and Concentration effects for 4 hours. The buff effect doesn't disappear upon death

<Note>
1. Shining Scroll of Mood Melody cannot be stacked with Scroll of Mood Melody.

2. Its duration is equal to that of the last used item.

91662.name: Shining Scroll of Mood Melody
91662.description:
Activates Might, Shield, Haste, Empower, Acumen, Wind Walk, Vampiric Rage, Berserker Spirit, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Clarity, Wild Magic, and Concentration effects for 8 hours. The buff effect doesn't disappear upon death

<Note>
1. Shining Scroll of Mood Melody cannot be stacked with Scroll of Mood Melody.

2. Its duration is equal to that of the last used item.

91663.name: L2 Coin
91663.description: Used to buy various items at the L2 Coin Shop.

91666.name: Sayha's Storm Lv. 1
91666.description: Sayha's Grace Consumption +100% and XP/SP Gain +100% while hunting monsters. The effect remains active even after death. Duration 20 minutes. Cooldown 1 minute. Available only when Sayha's Grace is 35,000 or higher.

91667.name: +7 Sayha's Cloak - White
91667.description: 30-day item. When equipped, Max HP/MP +15%, XP/SP Gain +20%, P. Def. +8%, P. Critical/M. Critical Damage +5%.

91668.name: Red Arc
91668.description: <Magic Lamp 1st Place Reward>\nRecharges 100,000,000 XP and 2,700,000 SP.

91669.name: Purple Arc
91669.description: <Magic Lamp 2nd Place Reward>\nRecharges 30,000,000 XP and 810,000 SP.

91670.name: Blue Arc
91670.description: <Magic Lamp 3rd Place Reward>\nRecharges 10,000,000 XP and 270,000 SP.

91671.name: Green Arc
91671.description: <Magic Lamp 4th Place Reward>\nRecharges 5,000,000 XP and 135,000 SP.

91672.name: Lucky Adena Box
91672.description: Double-click to obtain a certain amount of Adena at random.

91673.name: Enchanted Great Spear
91673.description: Enchanted Great Spear. Cannot be enchanted, augmented, or equipped with a rune.

91674.name: Enchanted Falchion
91674.description: Enchanted Falchion. Cannot be enchanted, augmented, or equipped with a rune.

91675.name: Enchanted Iron Hammer
91675.description: Enchanted Iron Hammer. Cannot be enchanted, augmented, or equipped with a rune.

91676.name: Enchanted Voodoo Doll
91676.description: Enchanted Voodoo Doll. Cannot be enchanted, augmented, or equipped with a rune.

91677.name: Enchanted Flanged Mace
91677.description: Enchanted Flanged Mace. Cannot be enchanted, augmented, or equipped with a rune.

91678.name: Enchanted Sword Breaker
91678.description: Enchanted Sword Breaker. Cannot be enchanted, augmented, or equipped with a rune.

91679.name: Enchanted Viper Fang
91679.description: Enchanted Viper Fang. Cannot be enchanted, augmented, or equipped with a rune.

91680.name: Enchanted Compound Bow
91680.description: Enchanted Compound Bow. Cannot be enchanted, augmented, or equipped with a rune.

91681.name: Great Spear Charm
91681.description:
30-day item. A charm imbued with Enchanted Great Spear Power.

<Active Skill> Enchanted Great Spear Power: Double-click to obtain Top-grade +8 to +16 Enchanted Glaive (D-grade) with a certain chance.

Item cost: 1 Weapon Summoning Coupon, which can be bought at L2 Coin Shop.
This skill can be used only once a day.

91682.name: Falchion Charm
91682.description:
30-day item. A charm imbued with Enchanted Falchion Power.

<Active Skill> Enchanted Falchion Power I: Double-click to obtain Top-grade +8 to +16 Enchanted Elven Long Sword (D-grade) with a certain chance.

Item cost: 1 Weapon Summoning Coupon, which can be bought at L2 Coin Shop.
 Enchanted Falchion Power II: Double-click to obtain Top-grade +8 to +16 Enchanted Bastard*Crimson Sword (D-grade) with a certain chance.

Item cost: 1 Weapon Summoning Coupon, which can be bought at L2 Coin Shop.
This skill can be used only once a day.

91683.name: Iron Hammer Charm
91683.description:
30-day item. A charm imbued with Enchanted Iron Hammer Power.

<Active Skill> Enchanted Iron Hammer Power: Double-click to obtain Top-grade +8 to +16 Enchanted Bonebreaker (D-grade) with a certain chance.

Item cost: 1 Weapon Summoning Coupon, which can be bought at L2 Coin Shop.
This skill can be used only once a day.

91684.name: Voodoo Doll Charm
91684.description:
30-day item. A charm imbued with Enchanted Voodoo Doll Power.

<Active Skill> Enchanted Voodoo Doll Power: Double-click to obtain Top-grade +8 to +16 Enchanted Staff of Life (D-grade) with a certain chance.

Item cost: 1 Weapon Summoning Coupon, which can be bought at L2 Coin Shop.
This skill can be used only once a day.

91685.name: Flanged Mace Charm
91685.description:
30-day item. A charm imbued with Enchanted Flanged Mace Power.

<Active Skill> Enchanted Flanged Mace Power: Double-click to obtain Top-grade +8 to +16 Enchanted Claymore (D-grade) with a certain chance.

Item cost: 1 Weapon Summoning Coupon, which can be bought at L2 Coin Shop.
This skill can be used only once a day.

91686.name: Sword Breaker Charm
91686.description:
30-day item. A charm imbued with Enchanted Sword Breaker Power.

<Active Skill> Enchanted Sword Breaker Power: Double-click to obtain Top-grade +8 to +16 Enchanted Mithril Dagger (D-grade) with a certain chance.

Item cost: 1 Weapon Summoning Coupon, which can be bought at L2 Coin Shop.
This skill can be used only once a day.

91687.name: Viper Fang Charm
91687.description:
30-day item. A talisman imbued with Enchanted Viper Fang Power.

<Active Skill> Enchanted Viper Fang Power: Double-click to obtain Top-grade +8 to +16 Enchanted Scallop Jamadhr (D-grade) with a certain chance.

Item cost: 1 Weapon Summoning Coupon, which can be bought at L2 Coin Shop.
This skill can be used only once a day.

91688.name: Compound Bow Charm
91688.description:
30-day item. A talisman imbued with Enchanted Compound Bow Power.

<Active Skill> Enchanted Compound Bow Power: Double-click to obtain Top-grade +8 to +16 Enchanted Light Crossbow (D-grade) with a certain chance.

Item cost: 1 Weapon Summoning Coupon, which can be bought at L2 Coin Shop.
This skill can be used only once a day.

91689.name: Advanced Scroll of Escape
91689.description: A magic scroll that quickly teleports you to the nearest village.

91690.name: Maliss's Recovery Potion
91690.description: An item that instantly recovers 500 HP and then recovers CP as much as the remaining value.

91691.name: Maliss's MP Recovery Potion
91691.description: An item that instantly recovers MP.

91692.name: Blessing of Abundance - 100% (Event)
91692.description: 3-day item. L2 Coin Gain +100% during hunting.

91693.name: Blessing of Abundance - 100%
91693.description: 1-day item. L2 Coin Gain +100% during hunting, XP/SP Gain +10%, Sayha's Grace Consumption -20%.

91694.name: Blessing of Abundance - 100%
91694.description: 30-day item. L2 Coin Gain +100% during hunting, XP/SP Gain +10%, Sayha's Grace Consumption -20%.

91695.name: Aden Warrior's Mark
91695.description: Aden Warrior's Mark. Take it to Store NPC to receive fund.

91696.name: Abundant Treasure Chest
91696.description: Double-click to obtain one of the following items with a certain chance: enchant scrolls, consumables, or rare items, such as +16 B-grade Weapon Pack, Queen Ant's Ring, Orfen's Earring, Ring of Core, or Baium's Ring. Will be deleted when the event ends.

91697.name: +7 Samurai Long Sword
91697.description: Double-click to obtain +7 Enchanted Samurai Long Sword.

91698.name: +7 Demon's Staff
91698.description: Double-click to obtain +7 Enchanted Demon's Staff.

91699.name: +7 Mace of Underworld
91699.description: Double-click to obtain +7 Enchanted Mace of Underworld.

91700.name: +7 Crystal Dagger
91700.description: Double-click to obtain +7 Enchanted Crystal Dagger.

91701.name: +7 Eminence Bow
91701.description: Double-click to obtain +7 Enchanted Eminence Bow.

91702.name: +7 Orcish Poleaxe
91702.description: Double-click to obtain +7 Enchanted Orcish Poleaxe.

91704.name: +7 Yaksa Mace
91704.description: Double-click to obtain +7 Enchanted Yaksa Mace.

91705.name: +7 Berserker Blade
91705.description: Double-click to obtain +7 Enchanted Berserker Blade.

91706.name: +7 Great Pata
91706.description: Double-click to obtain +7 Enchanted Great Pata.

91707.name: +4 C-grade Top-grade Armor Set Pack
91707.description: Double-click to obtain +4 Enchanted Full Plate Helmet, Full Plate Armor, Full Plate Gauntlets, and Full Plate Boots.

91708.name: +4 C-grade Top-grade Armor Set Pack
91708.description: Double-click to obtain +4 Enchanted Full Plate Helmet, Drake Leather Armor, Drake Leather Gloves, and Drake Leather Boots

91709.name: +4 C-grade Top-grade Armor Set Pack
91709.description: Double-click to obtain +4 Enchanted Full Plate Helmet, Karmian Tunic, Karmian Stockings, Karmian Gloves, and Karmian Boots.

91710.name: Weapon Summoning Coupon
91710.description: A materials required to use Great Spear, Falchion, Iron Hammer, Voodoo Doll, Flanged Mace, Sword Breaker, Viper Fang, and Compound Bow Charm skills. Top-grade enchanted weapon (D-grade).

91711.name: Sayha's Mark
91711.description: Double-click to obtain one Blessing of Wind Box and one Sayha's Storm Lv. 3. If you’re lucky, you can also gain one Sayha's Treasure or Shining Sayha's Treasure. Will be deleted when the event ends.\n\nYou have a chance to gain Sayha's Summoning Stick that summons various monsters until the event ends.

91712.name: Sayha's Storm Lv. 3
91712.description: Sayha's Grace Consumption +100% and XP/SP Gain +200% while hunting monsters. The effect remains active even after death. Duration 20 minutes. Cooldown 1 minute. Available only when Sayha's Grace is 35,000 points or higher.

91713.name: Sayha's Storm Lv. 3
91713.description: Sayha's Grace Consumption +100% and XP/SP Gain +200% while hunting monsters. The effect remains active even after death. Duration 20 minutes. Cooldown 1 minute. Available only when Sayha's Grace is 35,000 points or higher.

91714.name: Sayha's Summoning Stick
91714.description: Double-click to spawn one of the six types of Wind Monsters. If the monster is hunted, the summoner gains certain XP. No XP bonus effect is applied. Cooldown 10 seconds. Will be deleted when the event ends.

91715.name: Sayha's Treasure
91715.description: Double-click to obtain one Rare Necklace, +10 Sayha's Cloak, or consumable at random. Will be deleted when the event ends.

91716.name: Shining Sayha's Treasure
91716.description: Double-click to obtain one S-grade Weapon/Armor Pack, Item Box enchanted to high level, Codex Box, or rare item at random. Will be deleted when the event ends.

91717.name: Advanced Stable Scroll: Enchant Weapon (S-grade)
91717.description: Upon enchantment, P. Atk. +5 for S-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. +6 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed fist weapons. P. Atk. +10 for bows. M. Atk. +4 for all weapons. From +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. bonus effect quadruples. Even if enchantment fails, the item will not be crystallized and will retain its enchant level. It can be used only on +7 to +15 enchanted items.

91718.name: Advanced Stable Scroll: Enchant Armor (S-grade)
91718.description: Upon enchantment, P. Def. +2 for S-grade armor or accessory. From +4, P. Def. +8. Even if enchantment fails, the item will not be crystallized and will retain its enchant level. Starting at +4 armor, HP increases depending on the enchant value. It can be used only on +6 to +9 enchanted items.

91719.name: Sayha's Supreme Cloak - Black
91719.description: A cloak imbued with Supreme Sayha's Energy. Can be enchanted only by Sayha’s Supreme Scroll: Enchant Cloak. Various options are added to the cloak depending on enchant level.

91720.name: Sayha's Supreme Cloak - White
91720.description: A cloak imbued with Supreme Sayha's Energy. Can be enchanted only by Sayha’s Supreme Scroll: Enchant Cloak. Various options are added to the cloak depending on enchant level.

91721.name: Sayha's Supreme Cloak - Red
91721.description: A cloak imbued with Supreme Sayha's Energy. Can be enchanted only by Sayha’s Supreme Scroll: Enchant Cloak. Various options are added to the cloak depending on enchant level.

91722.name: Sayha's Supreme Scroll: Enchant Cloak
91722.description: A varnish that enhances Sayha's Supreme Cloak. Can be used only on Sayha's Supreme Cloak. Even if enchantment fails, Sayha's Cloak will not disappear and will retain its enchant level.

91723.name: Iron Bracelet
91723.description: 15-day. Activates one talisman slot when equipped.

91724.name: Iron Bracelet Box
91724.description: Double-click to obtain one Iron Bracelet (15-day).

91725.name: Escape - Abandoned Camp
91725.description: A magic scroll that teleports you to Abandoned Camp.

91726.name: Escape - Windmill Hill
91726.description: A magic scroll that automatically teleports to Windmill Hill.

91727.name: Escape - Ruins of Agony
91727.description: A magic scroll that teleports you to Ruins of Agony.

91728.name: Enchanted Great Spear Box
91728.description: Double-click to obtain +16 Enchanted Great Spear.

91730.name: Enchanted Iron Hammer Box
91730.description: Double-click to obtain +16 Enchanted Iron Hammer.

91731.name: Enchanted Voodoo Doll Box
91731.description: Double-click to obtain +16 Enchanted Voodoo Doll.

91732.name: Enchanted Flanged Mace Box
91732.description: Double-click to obtain +16 Enchanted Flanged Mace.

91733.name: Enchanted Sword Breaker
91733.description: Double-click to obtain +16 Enchanted Sword Breaker.

91734.name: Enchanted Viper Fang Box
91734.description: Double-click to obtain +16 Enchanted Viper Fang.

91735.name: Enchanted Compound Bow Box
91735.description: Double-click to obtain +16 Enchanted Compound Bow.

91736.name: Escape - High Priest Raymond
91736.description: A magic scroll that teleports you to High Priest Raymond in the Town of Gludio.

91737.name: Brooch Lv. 1
91737.description: Brooch Lv. 1, 15-day. When equipped, it opens up 2 Gem slots.

91738.name: Brooch Lv. 1 Box
91738.description: Double-click to obtain one Lv. 1 brooch (15-day).

91739.name: Abundance Charm
91739.description: 30-day item. When stored in the inventory, CON/MEN/DEX/WIT/STR/INT +1. Hunting XP/SP Gain +20%.

91740.name: Special Blessing Box
91740.description: Double-click to obtain Sayha's Blessing (Event). There is also a chance to obtain L2 Coins and a rare item such as Talisman of Baium, Earth Dragon Belt, or Fire Dragon Belt. Will be deleted when the event ends.

91741.name: Einhasad's Protection
91741.description: When used, Hunting XP/SP Gain +100% for 1 hour. Cooldown 1 minute. The effect remains active even after death.

91742.name: Angler's Box
91742.description: Double-click to obtain one of the following items at random: Fishing Shot, Soulshot Ticket, and Weapon Exchange Ticket.

91743.name: Apiga
91743.description: A special coin that the Magic Research Institute imprints with magic on the Pig of Love or Golden Pig. Take a certain quantity of this coin to the Employee of Magic Research Institute to exchange for a reward item. Will be deleted when the Pig Event ends.

91744.name: Crafting Package of Insolence
91744.description: A package used to craft Talisman of Insolence. Double-click to obtain 10 Aura of Insolence, 120 Talisman Crystals, and 250 Elemental Stones.

91745.name: Aden Talisman
91745.description: A talisman imbued with the energy of the royal family of Aden. Can be enchanted up to +10 with the Wish of Aden. Combination adds various effects, and enchantment increases stats of these option effects. If +1 or higher level enchantment fails, the talisman will disappear. The effect does not stack with additional talismans of the same type.

91746.name: Rudolph Outfit
91746.description: Rudolph outfit. It doesn’t remove hair accessories, weapons, and magic armor.

91747.name: Blue Wolf Heavy Armor Set
91747.description: Double-click to obtain Blue Wolf Breastplate, Blue Wolf Gaiters, Blue Wolf Helmet (Heavy Armor), Blue Wolf Gloves (Heavy Armor), and Blue Wolf Boots(Heavy Armor), one for each.

91748.name: Blue Wolf Light Armor Set
91748.description: Double-click to obtain Blue Wolf Leather Armor, Blue Wolf Helmet (Light Armor), Blue Wolf Gloves (Light Armor), and Blue Wolf Boots (Light Armor), one for each.

91749.name: Blue Wolf Robe Set
91749.description: Double-click to obtain Blue Wolf Tunic, Blue Wolf Stockings, Blue Wolf Helmet (Robe), Blue Wolf Gloves (Robe), and Blue Wolf Boots (Robe), one for each.

91750.name: Doom Heavy Armor Set
91750.description: Double-click to obtain Doom Plate Armor, Doom Helmet (Heavy Armor), Doom Gloves (Heavy Armor), and Doom Boots (Heavy Armor), one for each.

91751.name: Doom Light Armor Set
91751.description: Double-click to obtain Leather Armor of Doom, Doom Helmet (Light Armor), Doom Gloves (Light Armor), and Doom Boots (Light Armor), one for each.

91752.name: Doom Robe Set
91752.description: Double-click to obtain Tunic of Doom, Stockings of Doom, Doom Helmet (Robe), Doom Gloves (Robe), and Doom Boots (Robe), one for each.

91753.name: Dark Light Accessory Set
91753.description: Double-click to obtain 2 Black Ore Rings, 2 Black Ore Earrings, and 1 Black Ore Necklace.

91756.name: Wish of Aden
91756.description: A material used to craft Aden Talisman.

91757.name: Magic Lamp Acceleration Potion
91757.description: 20% Magic Lamp gauge recharge for 1 hour when used. Cooldown 1 minute.

91758.name: Ruby Lv. 5
91758.description: 3-day. When equipped, 16% damage bonus for Soulshot, Blessed Soulshot, and Beast Soulshot. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

91759.name: Sapphire Lv. 5
91759.description: 3-day. When equipped, 16% damage bonus for Spiritshot, Blessed Spiritshot, and Beast Spiritshot. If identical Gems are equipped, only the effect of the highest level Gem is applied.

91760.name: Brooch Lv. 5
91760.description: 30-day. When equipped, it opens up 6 Gem slots and adds 15 slots to the inventory.

91761.name: Player Commendation Treasure Chest
91761.description: A box rewarded for PC Cafe login. Double-click to obtain one of the following items at random: Special Dragon's Fruit, PC Point Recharge Coin, Talisman of Baium, and S-grade Weapon Pack. Will be deleted when the event ends.

91762.name: Player Commendation Treasure Chest
91762.description: A box rewarded for PC Cafe login. Double-click to obtain one of the following items at random: Special Dragon's Fruit, PC Point Recharge Coin, Talisman of Baium, and Top-grade Weapon Pack (A-grade). Will be deleted when the event ends.

91764.name: Avadon Heavy Armor Set
91764.description: Double-click to obtain Avadon Breastplate, Avadon Gaiters, Avadon Circlet (Heavy Armor), Avadon Gloves (Heavy Armor), and Avadon Boots (Heavy Armor), one for each.

91765.name: Avadon Light Armor Set
91765.description: Double-click to obtain Avadon Leather Armor, Avadon Circlet (Light Armor), Avadon Gloves (Light Armor), and Avadon Boots (Light Armor), one for each.

91766.name: Avadon Robe Set
91766.description: Double-click to obtain Avadon Robe, Avadon Circlet (Robe), Avadon Gloves (Robe), and Avadon Boots (Robe), one for each.

91767.name: Aden Talisman Enchant Package
91767.description: A package used to upgrade Aden Talismans. Double-click to obtain 1 Aden Talisman and 10 Wish of Aden.

91768.name: Escape - High Priest Orven
91768.description: A magic scroll that teleports you to High Priest Orven in the Town of Aden.

91769.name: Shining Savior's Earring
91769.description: 1-day. When equipped, XP/SP Gain +2%, Max MP30, Max HP +50, MEN/Stun Attack Resistance +4%. Vampiric Rage effect. The effect does not stack if two identical earrings are worn.

91770.name: Shining Savior's Earring
91770.description: 30-day. When equipped, XP/SP Gain +2%, Max MP +30, Max HP +50, MEN/Stun Attack Resistance +4%. Vampiric Rage effect. The effect does not stack if two identical earrings are worn.

91771.name: Doll of Border - Frintezza Doll
91771.description:
7-day item. Boosts abilities with Frintezza Doll's Spell when stored in the inventory.

<Frintezza Doll's Spell Lv. 1>
CON +1, MEN +1, WIT +1, DEX +1, STR +1, INT +1, Stun/Paralysis Atk. Rate +10%.

91772.name: Scroll: PK
91772.description: Double-click to lower PK value by 1. It can only be used when PK is 1 or higher and Inclination is 0.

91773.name: Sayha's Grace Kit
91773.description: Double-click to obtain 200 Sayha's Blessing and 30 Sayha's Storm Lv. 3. If you’re lucky, you can also gain one of various items.

91774.name: Amazing Rudolph Herb
91774.description: Amazing Rudolph Herb. Transforms into Rudolph for 5 minutes. P. Atk./M. Atk. +150, P. Def./M. Def./Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +100, Movement Speed +10, HP/MP Recovery Bonus +30%.

91775.name: Plated Leather Set
91775.description: Double-click to obtain Plated Leather Armor, Plated Leather Gaiters, and Plated Leather Boots, one for each.

91776.name: Sayha's Gust
91776.description: Only for Lv. 75 or lower level characters. Sayha's Grace Consumption +100% and XP/SP Gain +300% while hunting monsters. The effect remains active even after death. Duration 20 minutes. Cooldown 1 minute. Available only when Sayha's Grace is 35,000 or higher.

91777.name: Magic Flame
91777.description: Only for Lv. 75 or lower level characters. 100% Magic Lamp gauge recharge for 1 hour when used. Cooldown 1 minute.

91778.name: Sayha's Storm Lv. 3
91778.description: Sayha's Grace Consumption +100% and XP/SP Gain +200% while hunting monsters. The effect remains active even after death. Duration 1 hour. Cooldown 1 minute. Available only when Sayha's Grace is 35,000 points or higher.

91779.name: Aden Supply Box
91779.description: Double-click to obtain one of the following items with a certain chance: +16 B-grade Weapon Pack, Antharas' Earring, Talisman of Baium, Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration, Morale Bean Cake, Dragon Scroll, and Sayha's Buff Scroll. Will be deleted when the event ends.

91780.name: Dragon Scroll
91780.description: For 20 minutes, P. Atk./M. Atk. +150, P. Critical/M. Critical Rate +30, Atk. Spd./Casting Spd. +50, P. Def./M. Def. +200, Max HP/Max MP/Max CP +500. The effect remains active even after death. Cooldown 1 minute.

91781.name: Sayha's Buff Scroll
91781.description: Activates Sayha's Shield, Sayha's Magic Barrier, Sayha's Decrease Weight, Sayha's Clarity, Sayha's Berserker Spirit, Sayha's Wind Walk, Sayha's Might, Sayha's Focus, Sayha's Haste, Sayha's Death Whisper, Sayha's Empower, Sayha's Wild Magic, Sayha's Acumen, Sayha's Concentration, Sayha's Prophecy, Sayha's Restore HP, and Sayha's Restore MP effects for 20 minutes on use. No item can be used while Sayha's Restore MP is active. Cooldown 1 minute.

91782.name: Nuia's Gift
91782.description: Double-click to obtain one of the following items at random: Special Dragon's Fruit, PC Point Recharge Coin, Talisman of Baium, and S-grade Weapon Pack. Will be deleted when the event ends.

100400.name: Dares Coin
100400.description: Premium coin given for supporting server.

100410.name: Starter Pack
100410.description: Double-click to get the following: Flanged Mace, Falchion, Enchanted Great Spear, Viper Fang, Zweihander, Bronze Breastplate, Bronze Gaiters, Bracer, Durable Leather Helmet, Bone Shield. 1x Necklace of Devotion, 2x Coral Earring, 2x Blue Coral Ring. 6000 Soulshot (No-grade), 3000 Blessed Spiritshot (No-grade), 300 Major Healing Potion, 100 Mana Potion, 50 Greater CP Potion, 25 Blessed Scroll of Escape and 25 Blessed Scroll of Resurrection.

100411.name: Starter Pack
100411.description: Double-click to get the following: Sword Breaker, Compound Bow, Durable Leather Shirt, Durable Leather Gaiters, Durable Leather Helmet, Bracer, Boots. 1x Necklace of Devotion, 2x Coral Earring, 2x Blue Coral Ring. 1000 Wooden Arrow, 6000 Soulshot (No-grade), 3000 Blessed Spiritshot (No-grade), 300 Major Healing Potion, 100 Mana Potion, 50 Greater CP Potion, 25 Blessed Scroll of Escape and 25 Blessed Scroll of Resurrection.

100412.name: Starter Pack
100412.description: Double-click to get the following: Mage Staff, Voodoo Doll, Tunic of Devotion, Stockings of Devotion, Leather Helmet, Bracer, Boots, Bone Shield. 1x Necklace of Devotion, 2x Coral Earring, 2x Blue Coral Ring. 6000 Soulshot (No-grade), 3000 Blessed Spiritshot (No-grade), 300 Major Healing Potion, 100 Mana Potion, 50 Greater CP Potion, 25 Blessed Scroll of Escape and 25 Blessed Scroll of Resurrection.

100420.name: Premium Buff Card
100420.description: 12-hour. Provides access to premium buffs: Blessing of Queen, Gift of Queen, Blessing of Seraphim and Gift of Seraphim. Can only be abtained by voting for the server. Cannot be enchanted or bestow special characteristics. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, stored in a private warehouse, or sold in a private store.

100421.name: Box with Premium Buff Card
100421.description: Double-click to receive Premium Buff Card for 12-hour duration. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

100500.name: PremiumCard
100500.description: 7-day. Provides Autoloot, expands slots by 50 and weight by 100% Cannot be enchanted or bestow special characteristics. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, stored in a private warehouse, or sold in a private store.

100501.name: PremiumCard
100501.description: 30-day. Provides Autoloot, expands slots by 50 and weight by 100% Cannot be enchanted or bestow special characteristics. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, stored in a private warehouse, or sold in a private store.

100502.name: PremiumCard
100502.description: 90-day. Provides Autoloot, expands slots by 50 and weight by 100% Cannot be enchanted or bestow special characteristics. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, stored in a private warehouse, or sold in a private store.

100600.name: Mana Potion
100600.description: Recovers mana over time with 100 mana per second.

100700.name: Donation Shining Jewel Box
100700.description: Double-click to get 1 of the following: Garnet, Jade, Ruby, Sapphire, Diamond, Pearl, Vital Stone. (Lvl 3)
